1b1(rgyud): / drug sbyang du/ ga tang
1b2(rgyud):
1b3(rgyud): sems dpe' la phyag 'tsha'o// zlang bzang bas gsol
2a1(rgyud): // pa ston pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang // rnam gsum de bzhin dran
2a2(rgyud): med/ 'jig rten 'anges pa'i dngos grub phyir// ma dor bsdus pa yis
2a3(rgyud): bdag la gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa// nyon cig/ 
2a4(rgyud): zla bzang dbang bskur don// rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum mchog/ rtsa yi kun spyod
2b1(rgyud): rtsol ba ni// mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad// rgyud du mdor bstan rnam gsum dang // rgyas par bshad
2b2(rgyud): pa rnam gsum 'gyur// rab tu mdor bstan mdor bstan che// rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan// mdor bstan
2b3(rgyud): rgyas par bshad pa nyid// rgyud yang dag par bsdus par brjod// rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad
2b4(rgyud): pa dka' 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o// mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad pa// 'grel bshad thams cad don
2b5(rgyud): ston byed// de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis// bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid// de ltar mthar drug rnams
3a1(rgyud): // kyis dag/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams dang // phung khams
3a2(rgyud): skye mched rigs drug rnams// dag pa 'jig rten khams la sogs// le'u lA ra ni 'dod rnams kyis// bden
3a3(rgyud): gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// dus kyi 'khor lo mngon brjod byed// dang por dbang bskur
3a4(rgyud): bdun po gang // byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir// rnam gsum 'a garten kun rdzob kyis// dam pa'i
3a5(rgyud): don gyis bzhi pa'o// bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi// rdo rje can bdag gis bstan pa// 'jig rten kun rdzob
3a6(rgyud): bden pa dang // dam pa'i don gyis bden pas so// chu dang cod pan dar dpyangs dang // rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs
3b1(rgyud): che// ming dang rjes gnang yang dag ldan// dbang bskur rnam bdun mi yi bdag/ lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa// mngon par
3b2(rgyud): dbang bskur gnyis gnyis so// rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/ gzhan pa khams sogs dag pa las// chu ni khams kyi dag pa ste/ 
3b3(rgyud): cod da pan phung po rnam sbyong byed// dar dpyangs pha rol phyin pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas skad rgyun mi 'chad pa// nyi zla cag tu
3b4(rgyud): dag par byed// yul dang dbang po leg/ sa dag pa// 'pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur// ra// ming ni byams sogs yang dag dag
3b5(rgyud): rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed// dpe nga bskur bdun po 'di rnams yin// dkyil 'khor be zhengs nas sbyin par bya// bum pa gsang ba'i/ 
3b6(rgyud): dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes mngon brjod pa// slar yang shes rab chen po nyid// de yi ye shes mngon brjod byed// 'gyur dang 'gyur ba de na
3b7(rgyud): 'dzag/ de nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o// lus ngag sems ni legs dag pas// dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis// bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag/ 
4a1(rgyud): // lus ngag sems ni dag par byed// byis pa dar ma de nas rgan// bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag po'o// shes rab nu mar yan lag ni// reg pas byang chub
4a2(rgyud): sems 'pho'i bde// 'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bskur ba// gang las bde thob de byis pa'o// yun ring gsang bar spro las skyes// byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bdo// gsad
4a3(rgyud): ba'i dbang bskur gsang ba ni// gang las bde thob de dar ma// yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// rdo rje'i rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde/ shes rab ye shes dbang bskur
4a4(rgyud): ba/ gang las g.yo ba'i bgrod de rgan// phyag rgya/ chen po rjes chags las// skyes pa g.yo med bde ba/ ni/ shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ gang
4a5(rgyud): g.yo med rtogs pa de// skye dgu'i bdag por rnam shes bya// skyob pa thams cad bskyed mdzad pa// rdo rje sem sa dpa' sems dpa' che// byang sems gnyis
4a6(rgyud): med mi 'gyur ba/ 'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi// dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir bshad ga/ rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed/ 'don
4a7(rgyud): kyi ni bsgrub pa bya/ rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// du sogs motshan ma de rnams kyis/ shes rab gzugs brnyan na mkha' mnyam/ yod dang med las/ 
4b1(rgyud): rnam par 'das// rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don// rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun nas yongasu dor ba yis// dub smig sgyu mkha' snang dang // sgron ma 'bar ba zla nyi ma// mun can cha dang thig le che// 
4b2(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba// bkab dang ma bka'i mig ngag gis// stong par 'di ni rjes brtags min// rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur// rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par gdang
4b3(rgyud): med gzugs la sgom pa de/ rnal 'byor pa yi sgom ma yin// dngos po dngos med sems kyi min// stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro// ji ltar bra phab me long la// gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes/ 
4b4(rgyud): de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos// mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pa sa// 'di la dngos po dngos med 'gyur// dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir// dngos po dngos med don yod pa// sgyu ma rmi lam
4b5(rgyud): mig 'phrul bzhin// med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong // yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i// sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// pra phab pa yi gzhon
4b6(rgyud): nu mas// ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong // nyi tshe ba yi mig dog gis// song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong // gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na// rang gi gdong pa cis mi mthong // gal te med pa'i gzugs
4b7(rgyud): mthong na// ri bong rA ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong min pa// skye ba med pa mthong ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin// gzugs brnyan mthong na de nas ni// ra
4b8(rgyud): ma chad par srog brtsol bya// steng 'og rtsa gsum po rnams la// lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las// zla nyi sgra gcan bshang gci dang // khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams su// chu me stong pas dang
5a1(rgyud): rlung // ye shes khams kyi ri rnams la// gang zhig blani mun can dang // bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams// srog dang thur sel rim pa las// lus ngag soms kyi rtsi rnams so// 
5a2(rgyud): zla ba thabs kyi sku yin te/ nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa// ci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung // steng 'og thugs kyi rtse gnyis dag/ mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o// 
5a3(rgyud): thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi// steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// lus
5a4(rgyud): can kun la yang dag gnas// 'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa dag la// steng 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams kyis// mun can khu ba 'bab ma la// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba gnas// skye dang 'chi
5a5(rgyud): dang 'khrig pa yi// dus su khu ba 'bab pa'o// mun can ma yang steng du 'bab// nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa las// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su// dbu ma
5a6(rgyud): nas ni mnyam pa 'bab// rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug/ 'byung dang 'jug pa'o mi yi bdag/ bdun cu rtsa lngas lhag pa yis// drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o// drug brgya rnams kyis lhag
5a7(rgyud): pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po// 'di yis dman pa gang de rnams// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'bab bo// phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams// lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o// 
5a8(rgyud): steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma// brkyang ma lug dang ser skya gzhan// chu dang me yi rang bzhin can// pad+ma rin chen 'dzin par 'dod// 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can// dbu
5b1(rgyud): ma'i na dang gson pa yang // 'khor lo la gra lan par 'dod//  dang 'og tu dbu ma galas// skragacan chub 'a'ababal// stong ba sa shes pa bzhin pa// de rdo rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod// 
5b2(rgyud): lam gyis bshang ba'i rtsa// nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste// skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab// zla ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma// gang de yid bzang mun pa 'bab// 'og tu
5b3(rgyud): khu ba 'bab gang de// mkha' 'gro gdong dang dung can ma// lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang // dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la// sa chu me rlung stong pa rnams// rab tu 'bab bsdud pa yis// 'thung 'gyur
5b4(rgyud): de ni 'jug pa dag/ bskyed pas 'jug ste sa la'o// lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus// a ba d+hu tir 'gro dang 'ong // lhagasang nor bu'i chu skyes la// lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni// 
5b5(rgyud): 'byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag/ sdud dang bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can// dung can skye bo thams cad kyi// thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o// 'od rnams bud med bde ba las// khu ba khrag 'bab
5b6(rgyud): dus dag tu// shes rab babs dngos yan lag gis// steng du g.yas dang g.yon dag dang // 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dang // rdul dang khu ba 'bab ba dag/ rdul 'bab byor de gtun mo// 
5b7(rgyud): ste// khu ba 'bab phyir mkha' 'gro gdong // steng du brjod dus bud med kyi// g.yung me skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma// rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga// rtag tu g.yon po'i rtsa la'o// 
5b8(rgyud): sa sogs gsas pa'i rtsal ste// dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba'i 'ad+ma'i 'dabs la// dkyil 'khor drug cu rnams rim bzhin// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus sbyor na/ 
6a1(rgyud): lug sogs glang la sogs pa la// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas// steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung // sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing // dbyug gus sna bug dag la'o// 
6a2(rgyud): rim pas chu tshod 'bab pa ni// drug cu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs// brgya phrag bcwo brgyad dbugs de rnams// chu tshod lngar ni 'bab pa'o// chu tshod drug cu nyin mtshan du// lus la dkyil 'khor
6a3(rgyud): rnams zhes pa'o// mdab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar// g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis// g.yon par rtag tu nam mkha' sogs// g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so// g.yon par
6a4(rgyud): rnam shes sogs 'byung ba// g.yas par sa sogs sgyu dad pa'o// nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung // phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// the bong ming med dag gis ni// gang phyir kha
6a5(rgyud): la dbang bskur ba// g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan chu na shes rab thabs yin te// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dang / gis// gang phyir ral grir 'gyur ba'o// zla phyed rnam pa'i phyag
6a6(rgyud): rgya ni// mche ba gri gug mthe chung ste// stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor// sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag mthil
6a7(rgyud): sbyar ba la// gri gug dang bcas rtsa gcig go// dbu ma'i rtsal mnyam pa de// bskyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po// phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum// gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa
6a8(rgyud): 'gags na// bshang ba gci ba'i rtsa 'gag go// sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na// 'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur// bskyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can// 'di rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur// 
6b1(rgyud): srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis// 'di ni rtsa yi kun spyod do// g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la// mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar// lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa// de las logs/ 
6b2(rgyud): na mchi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la// lnga dang phyogs chos nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig lhag gzhan rim pas// nyin zhag sum cu gsum rgyun// gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni// 
6b3(rgyud): drug gsum bung zla nyin zhag ches// phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams kyi che 'gro'o// rtsa ba nas gcig lhag pa yis// g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyu
6b4(rgyud): nyin zla nyin zhag zla ba dag/ nyin zhag gsum rnams rab gsum// nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/ 'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la// dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba ni/ 
6b5(rgyud): lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yis// mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams// skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'a/ khor gyis// de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang // phyogs gnyis
6b6(rgyud): rnam par nyams pa las// gzhan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang // dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir// 'chi
6b7(rgyud): ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya// a ba d+hU ti'i zhabs brten nas// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya// zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms
6b8(rgyud): pa las// gzhan du kun 'dar yan lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med// 'og tu'ang dung can mthur sel// de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o// 'chi ltas sla ba rnal 'byor pa'i// 'di ni
7a1(rgyud): dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur// mgo bo'i pad+ma gtsug tor las// khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste// mgrin pa snying khar mchog dga'o// dga' bral
7a2(rgyud): dga' ba de nas 'gyur// sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang nas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dga' mi 'pho ba// rab gnas mya
7a3(rgyud): ngan 'das pa min// chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag po// 'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde// de ni mya ngan las rab gnas// khu bzla 'char gtsug tor du// rdzogs pa gsang
7a4(rgyud): ba'i mtsho skyes la// bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i// pad+ma rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas// de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur// nag po'i ches gcig 'ongs pa na// 'dod chags
7a5(rgyud): bral bas gnam stong la// nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'a gro// de yi cha shas bcu drug la// gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o// zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de// chags
7a6(rgyud): pa'i bde la chags bral phyir// lus can thams cad 'chi ba na// zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro// steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la// de phyir zla ba bdud
7a7(rgyud): rtsi ni// steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag/ 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod bu yi// pad+mar zla ba bdud rtsinya// nyi rdul gnam stong
7a8(rgyud): gsang bar te// gtsug tor nor bur de dag go/ ces pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/ lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/ rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min// khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur/ 
7b1(rgyud): nor bur thugs dang gsang bar gsung // lte bar sku ste bde chen las// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las s+ho// thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang // 
7b2(rgyud): shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur// 'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje// mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro/ 
7b3(rgyud): phung po khams rnams spro ba ni// sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las// las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // drugra rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// 
7b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur// 'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med// / nub pa de yi nub pa med// 'char ba yi ni 'char ba med
7b5(rgyud): rab tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med// bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med do// skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med/ 'tsho ba'i 'chi ba yang med do// grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur
7b6(rgyud): ba'ang med// mi gnas pa yi mi gnas med// dngos po med pa'i dngos med med// dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med// 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi 'gyur ba yi yang
7b7(rgyud): mi 'gyur// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no// 'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur min te// rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med/ 
7b8(rgyud): dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid cig/ rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems// rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar son// der son zla ba g.yo ba med// mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur sgom// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams su// 
8a1(rgyud): sku gsung thugs rnams sgom pa ste// rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus pa// ye shes dung can mar sgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi// thig le/ 
8a2(rgyud): rim pas mgo bo las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang // 'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so// ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// gling
8a3(rgyud): ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste// zlang chang dang rdzogs pa min// de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs// ye
8a4(rgyud): chang dang rdzogs pa min// ji ltar ri ngong mtshan mas dbus/ rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems// 'khor ba'i ngag chags mtshan
8a5(rgyud): ma yis// bskyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs// dkar po nag po rab tu gnas// de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang/ de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so// skad cig gcig mngon
8a6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa la ni g.ye mi 'gyur// gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems// de ni skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// res dga' dkar min la mi
8a7(rgyud): 'gro phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa// rdzogs pa la gnas gnyis su med// gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'o// rdo rje nor dur rdzogs par 'gyur// dri chags bral las cha nyams
8a8(rgyud): pa rdo rje nas nyams la rab rdzogs// slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba// slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa min// 'di
8b1(rgyud): yi bde ba che rang bzhin// rdzogs pa'i sgra yi brjod par bya// dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang sdud pa'i rgyu yin no// srid las mya ngan 'das par 'gro// de las slar yang srid
8b2(rgyud): par 'ong // rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang // bgrod pa dag las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid// nye khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi
8b3(rgyud): dbugs// 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis// phyogs gnyis yang dog gnon pa ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa// rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur/ 
8b4(rgyud): ba med// rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchog/ cha shas rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems// rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba// don gcig
8b5(rgyud): gnyis su med pa chos// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs sen pa'i sems// kun na sa rab tu rdzogs pa'o// chags bral dang po chags pa che// 
8b6(rgyud): rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur che// yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs gnyis kyis// bag chags rnams kyis ma mkhyud pa'o// ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa// de ni rgya mtsho'i chur mtshungs pa// de bzhin
8b7(rgyud): dngos po'i tshigs 'di ni// 'gyur ba med pa 'gyur mong mtshungs// ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'di// zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis// 'bras bu'i dus su
8b8(rgyud): rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang // mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin// mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal
9a1(rgyud): ni/ dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rma la rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// de bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde// sems rdzogs
9a2(rgyud): char gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig min gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi// phyogs gcig yang ngag gnas pa ni// lcags la drag po'i mes
9a3(rgyud): gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med bde// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang // sems la 'dod pa'i mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par
9a4(rgyud): byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga' zhig du ya dang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems// 'ga' zhi ga du yang bag chags med// lcags ni gser nyid du gyur pa// 
9a5(rgyud): me yis dri ma med par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 'dod chags me yis dri ma med// ji ltar nor bu / rig las// rdo na rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur
9a6(rgyud): med bde reg las// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'dir ni mang po brjod pas ci// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yi// lcags rnams rab tu 'bigs byed pa// ro yi mthu ni brtag bya min// ci zhig/ 
9a7(rgyud): slar yang don dam pas// blo bur dri mas g.yegs pa yi// sems ni rab tu 'bigs byed pa// ye shes mthu ni brtag bya min// sems la glo bur dri ma med// sems las sun ring dus can min/ 
9a8(rgyud): sems med par ni skye ba med// sems la mi zad gnas pa min// gal te 'di nyid bro bur ba// de tshe sngon du sems dri meng // gang che sems las dus ring can// de che de ni tsi las skyes// gal te/ 
9b1(rgyud): sems med par skye na// de chen mkha'i me tog mtshungs// gal te sems la rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu thar pa min// ji ltar drangs kyi dri ma ni// ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yod
9b2(rgyud): nyid nyams pa med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni// stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de yi ye shes nyid nyams med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// ji
9b3(rgyud): ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags// lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro min// de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min// chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med// bde ba las
9b4(rgyud): gzhan bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems// mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni// med par bde ba smra mi nus// lang tsho'i dga' ba thob pa na// bde ba
9b5(rgyud): chen po rang gis rig/ de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i// bde ba smra bar nus ma yin// 'gyur meng ting 'dzin thob/ pan// rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig 'gyur// 'gyur med las
9b6(rgyud): skyes bde rig pa// thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tshom za// de lta na yang yid bde min// chags bral nyid du mi bya'o// 'phos pa las ni chags bral 'gyur// chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // 
9b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi nas slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'i srid las slar 'chi 'pho// de ltar sems can gyi srid pa// chags bral las 'byung
9b8(rgyud): gzhan du min// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spang // gang gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor 'khor ba bcings pa yis// 'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar// 
10a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyud tu smrar// rnal 'byor ba ci sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub
10a2(rgyud): par bya// rten ni 'pho ba thob pa na// brten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ rten dang brtan pa legs rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gro// sems kyi 'gyur med nyid thob na// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid
10a3(rgyud): med/ 'gyur med las byung sku yi ni// mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang // A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// hUM yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/ stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu// mi 'gyur las skyes bde
10a4(rgyud): pa 'bras// rgyu ni 'bras bus rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu rgyu yi/ su btab pa'o// stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu/ snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med
10a5(rgyud): pa// byang chub sems de mi 'pho ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa bral// ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog/ rtag dang chad las nges par
10a6(rgyud): grol// dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir// gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med pa dngos po min// dngos po dngos med yang dag sbyor// rdo rje'i rnal
10a7(rgyud): 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhin no// gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste// 'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro// phan tshun ma khyud pa zhi ba ste/ 
10a8(rgyud): ma ning gi ni go 'angang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing // shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras// shes rab rgyu las byung skyes phyir// shes rab la skyes rgyu skyes min// de phyir ye shes rgyu skyes min// / 
10b1(rgyud): shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang // de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung // phan tshun rgya yi btab pa'i
10b2(rgyud): gzugs// skye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das// skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam nges grol// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma
10b3(rgyud): 'gags pa'i// shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin// po yi shes bya rnam 'byed phyir// de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la// 'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin// ral gri
10b4(rgyud): chen po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci/ myo ga sham bu mo dang 'gregs pas// rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar// na mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsten
10b5(rgyud): pas bdag la de bzhin no// shes rab ma yin thabs kyang / min// 'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas bad ba rdzogs pa las// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// na mkha'
10b6(rgyud): bzhin du gos pa med// yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni// kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas// bcad du med pa dbye ba spangs// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' 'di// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod
10b7(rgyud): chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mong zad pa dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che// gti mug blo ste/ 
10b8(rgyud): gti mug sel// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor khro ba che// lha min khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// rdo rje mi phyed zhes par brjod// 'dir ni don chen
11a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid// mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs// sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis// 
11a2(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni// mi g.yo de phyir byang chub sems// nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshegs/ 
11a3(rgyud): zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho med da za ba// dam tshig sems dpa' 'o rigs 'dis// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid// shes
11a4(rgyud): rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// khro bo chen po dag chen po// khro dbo'i gzugs can bdud rnams kyis// 'gyur med bde da ba che thabs las// nam yang sems can don mi 'dor/ 
11a5(rgyud): sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod// mi 'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang // rnam shes gzugs dang
11a6(rgyud): 'du byed dang // 'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa// rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin// yid mig rna ba lus dang sna// lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid// sgra ro// 
11a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang dri// reg bya kha dog rnams kyis yang // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug rnams kyi yongs dag pa// lus ngag gsang ba dbang po sems// rtag tu dkyil
11a8(rgyud): 'khor rnam pa gsum// shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni dbang gis sgrub thabs te// mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs// rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag
11b1(rgyud): ldan// zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'ur le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gis sgrubs thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// 
11b2(rgyud): 'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dngad // bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal na ro ba'i
11b3(rgyud): 'grel bshad dang 'thun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A di bud+d+ha ud d+h+r-i ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bid skad du/ 
11b4(rgyud): mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dang / ral dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin
11b5(rgyud): mor byed pa'i sku ste pad+ma'i mdab ma rgyas pa'i spyan// sangs rgya/ sa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btung la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yi// mgo bos rab tu phyag
11b6(rgyud): 'tshal lag pa'i pad+mo sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni// rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i don tu'o// stong pa ye shes kyang
11b7(rgyud): ste thig le mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang // phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs tshad dang
11b8(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang po khyod
12a1(rgyud): la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni rab mchog lha rnams dang // mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams ngag gis shes pa/ 
12a2(rgyud): min pas so// mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni// lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis
12a3(rgyud): mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon// dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byang chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang // rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung
12a4(rgyud): po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang / stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i
12a5(rgyud): dbus su sgong skyes bzhin// lus dang ye shes na mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba bskyed min dag dang srid pa rnams bcur
12a6(rgyud): gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus ngag las// sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sem
12a7(rgyud): kyi kun tu rtog pa dag las grol// g.yon gyi yan lag du ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar po mdog/ sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar
12a8(rgyud): po bla ma dang // mjug rings dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyab
12b1(rgyud): tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhus ste de ni rnam gzhi gnyis kyi bye bas so// srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng dus bon rang / 
12b2(rgyud): gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'og tu gnas// kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol// a sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang
12b3(rgyud): ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang // ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed// ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang
12b4(rgyud): chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa// a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag nga las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi
12b5(rgyud): yi bdag/ dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan thA la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyis skye ba'i gnas// mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes
12b6(rgyud): mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go// a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgra pa'o lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste// sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po kham
12b7(rgyud): kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o// rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste/ 
12b8(rgyud): gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga// mgrin pa'o gdang la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phangs g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga// de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig tu/ 
13a1(rgyud): srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o// rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// gzhi byed/ 
13a2(rgyud): 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis// dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste/ 
13a3(rgyud): cha drug 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug du ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ste/ 
13a4(rgyud): sa ya khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi da ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so// mi yi dbang po phyi rol da srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid
13a5(rgyud): gang yin pa// de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo // phra rab brgya da rnams ngag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi
13a6(rgyud): rtse mo phra mo ste// 'di rnams kyis ni ske che shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor mo nyi ma ni// zung gis khru'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yi rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang
13a7(rgyud): grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang na mkha' dag la tshad yin no// dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 
13a8(rgyud): dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go/ gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu
13b1(rgyud): drug gzugs// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o// srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye/ 
13b2(rgyud): bas khams gsum mo// srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so// rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye mo'i
13b3(rgyud): chu ni gnyis pa'o// 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzang du bdag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bong bdun pa dang // lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o ma zhe dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni// 'od sngon man
13b4(rgyud): da ra ri ni Sha Ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o// gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni dmi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyod
13b5(rgyud): sa ste bdun pa 'dzam+bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis / shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bad ga po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo// byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag
13b6(rgyud): dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur// ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste// sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams/ 
13b7(rgyud): ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur// lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni// lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog
13b8(rgyud): sa yi gzha la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// rA ni lnga po rnam dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go/ de yi phyi rol gling dang ri be dag dang chu gter rnams te phyog
14a1(rgyud): rnams kun tu me dang rlung // chu gter drug po thams cad kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste// gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i
14a2(rgyud): stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te// srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag
14a3(rgyud): de bzhin no// tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshegs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun po la ni tshig mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams
14a4(rgyud): ngag ni rigs lnga'o// dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams ku na tu sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba 'i gnas// zhi dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas
14a5(rgyud): ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar// shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gci na rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung
14a6(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang // tshangs de nga khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste// de dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba
14a7(rgyud): mchog gi bskyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar bka' ba 'khor// gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod
14a8(rgyud): dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed// kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus
14b1(rgyud): gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can te rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de// rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang / 
14b2(rgyud): mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste// re re dag gi chang ni dus dang mnga' yis bsgyur
14b3(rgyud): ba'i mi rnams ngag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o// phra dbugs d+hu dang chu tshod nyin zhag d+hu dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung
14b4(rgyud): po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i nyin/ ga gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i da tshang du 'jug/ dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo
14b5(rgyud): can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so// phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal po lo ni mtha'
14b6(rgyud): ngadag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te// 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la/ 
14b7(rgyud): sta srid pa gsum gyi gnas kyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no// lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham+b+ha la zhes bya bar 'byung // de nas klu yi lo brgya
14b8(rgyud): rnams kyis nges par mkha'i yul du sa klo chos dag rab tu 'jug/ de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams ngag gis rig par bya// mtha' dgas gzhi la ni grub
15a1(rgyud): pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur// me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i dbang po'i lon
15a2(rgyud): rab tu grub// kla klo dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur// nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam
15a3(rgyud): par dbye// rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis
15a4(rgyud): bsgyur// rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya// steng 'og dag las dmig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug
15a5(rgyud): tsu'i cha dag gis// rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur ra// gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi
15a6(rgyud): mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni// de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs// gnas gsum dbus ma dag ni dbang phyug gis
15a7(rgyud): bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par// gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu ched dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni// bsgyur nas byin la skar mas
15a8(rgyud): bags lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis// skar mar gnyi
15b1(rgyud): dang chu tshong drag pa nor bu rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin// 'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs// ches rnams sbyin dang dor nga / 
15b2(rgyud): slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshong rkang pa rnams su te// tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang pa'i don// stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu
15b3(rgyud): gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la phyogs// bcu gcig me la ches shes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o// lnga dang bug par nyi shuH
15b4(rgyud): gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/  / de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyi ma'i rkang pa de dag ni sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// 'byung dang 'byung ba mda'
15b5(rgyud): dang rig byed me lag ri bong can ni snga ma'i cha dang gzhan la yang // tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang / mi mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams ni sbyin dang dor// rgyu zhing yod
15b6(rgyud): pas lhag ma bsgyur ba las ni dus dang nyi mas cha thob dag kyang de bzhin no// de nyid la ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig byed rnams kyis
15b7(rgyud): tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te de yi sum cha dag gis bsres pa'o// dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum btsos bu lon dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// bya ba lhag ma mig dmar ji
15b8(rgyud): bzhin re dus ri bong can rnams ngal ba'i las la rkang pa ste// longs spyod kyis ni chu tshong bsgyur nas mnga' dang yon tan zla bas cha thob longs spyod dang bcas pa// bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang gis/ 
16a1(rgyud): nyi ma la ni sbyin dang dor te gzhan du dag pa yong ma yin// nyi ma la ni dus ro sbrul dang bcu dang 'phrog byed 'drog byeng drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug/ me dang rnam 'dag
16a2(rgyud): kyang bgrod pa'i mthar te byang dang lho ru nor dang bu lon dag tu 'gyur// zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug ni nyin mor byed pas spyod// nyi ma la byin ches grangs dag kyang 'og
16a3(rgyud): tu ro yis bsgyur la gza' yi longs spyod bsres pa dag/ dman par gyur pa ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba'o// byed pa dag ni tshes la mig gis bsgyur
16a4(rgyud): bzla bral gang zhig bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma'o// dag pa'i da lo la klu bsres mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter gyis ba sgyur klu bsres rnams kyis sbyangs pa dag/ ri zla me yis rab tu
16a5(rgyud): phye ste nam mkha' ros bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod te// gnyis dang sum cu'i gza' dang chu tshod nges pa 'dir ldan zla ba dag la lo yi 'pho ba'o// lug sogs
16a6(rgyud): rnams kyis snron byed dag la gza' dang chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste// zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mnga' ste ri bong can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o// rig
16a7(rgyud): byed me 'byung zla ba mig dang lag pa dus dang rig byed mig ni drug pa dag la'o// drug dang zla ba mnga' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug zla rig byed ri dang 'jig rten dang // drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste
16a8(rgyud): stong pa mig mda' nyi ma'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o// zla drug 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin dang mtshan mo dag kyang nyi ma rab tu rgyu bas so// chu gter srog dang chu srang me ni nyin zhag so so'i
16b1(rgyud): dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gi/ lde phyogs su ni mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin mo'o// zla ba dag la mig dang nyi ma bsres pa tshig gis rnam bsgyur/ 
16b2(rgyud): zla ba'i tshigs la gcig bsres te// mkha' dus chu yis rab po thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba las kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skur ma'o// lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba gang yin de las chu tshod slar
16b3(rgyud): yang de bsgyur ba las chu srang ste// thob pas dman pa'i 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur te mun can mjug ma dag kyang rgyu skar phyed bsres pa'o// zla ba sum cus bsgyur ba nyin zhag so so dag dang bcas
16b4(rgyud): pa las ni ri mkha' ris thob pa// gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros thab dam ngan pa mi gsal nyin zhag go/ ri dus gcig gis bsres pa
16b5(rgyud): ngag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs te ri klu dus kyis bgos pa yi// lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thob slar yang nam mkha' ro yis bsgyur las ri la sogs pas chu
16b6(rgyud): chod do// mig dmar la ni phyed bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang // byed pas lhag por gyur na 'khor lo phyed ni dor bar bya ste dor ba'i lhag ma rim min
16b7(rgyud): 'gyur// skar ma drug cus bsgyur te chu tshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byung me zla bas bgo/ gang thob dal ba'i las ngag la yang nor dang bu lon dag ni rim pa min dang rim pas so// de
16b8(rgyud): nyid bco brgyad ri ni rab tu gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo phyeng la steng dang 'og tu ste// longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mnga' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa// snga ma byedal/ 
17a1(rgyud): bzung byer 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur// zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu
17a2(rgyud): tshong la'o// de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o// zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur/ 
17a3(rgyud): sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshong bsgyur// drug cu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu rkang pa dag las bzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid/ 
17a4(rgyud): zos pa dang ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gris sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste// sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba srogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag bzhag par bya/ 
17a5(rgyud): de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brdzi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang // zla skyes dkar po las/ ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang
17a6(rgyud): dag 'gyur// stong dang na mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' da ga nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yos dman// ri nas bug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye
17a7(rgyud): bas bsgyur// rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur// zla skyes dor te nyi ma'i dbus nas mi bdag bzang po mi bdag skar ma phyed kyang yang
17a8(rgyud): dag spang // lhag ma'i bya ba nor dang bu lon dal dang myur ba'i las kyang mig dmar ji lta bzhin du 'gyur// zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so// / 
17b1(rgyud): nyin nag tshogs ni ma kha'i mkha' rodang mig gis ngaman pa byas nas so mi chu gter dag gis dgo// ljags skar mas bsnun las snar sa slar yang chu tshong tha ma yi yang dal pa'i las la'o// 
17b2(rgyud): rgyu skar nyi ma snang ste 'phrog byed dgu dang rtse mo can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa'o// slar yang myur ba dag la rkang pa rab gsolam nu'i gnas la phyogs dang la stsogs de dag go// sbyin nan/ 
17b3(rgyud): mkha' dang zla bas bsgyur nas chu gter nor gyis dman pa ri dang rgyal ba mig gis bge/ skar mes bsgyur ba las kyang skar ma'i longs spyod slar yang chu tshod myur ba'i las la pa sangs kyi/ 
17b4(rgyud): rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyong zla dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las dal rkang pa ste// myur la de nyid la sogs dbye bas rab dgasal ma nu'i gnas dag las te sbyin dor mig dmar bzhin// 
17b5(rgyud): mkha' mig klu dang rig byed kyis dman gsal ba'i nyin zhag tshogs ni drug pa mkha' zla ba yis// bgo zhing skar ma sa bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang
17b6(rgyud): bco brgyad do// rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis ches dus rab gsal ro yi gnas la'o myur ba'i las la ro la sogs// myur ngal rgyu ba dag kyang rim pas rkang pa bgrod pa la ste 'khyog po nyid ni rim
17b7(rgyud): min gyis// phyed snga ma dang byed phyi mar yang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis gza' rnams kyi ni 'byung ba yang // sum cu rtsa bdun lag pas bsgyur ba'i zla ba rnams kyis mjug rings dag ni myur dang
17b8(rgyud): 'khyog por 'gyur// gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur// nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro/ 
18a1(rgyud): pa'i rnam par dbye bas so// g.yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g.yon nas 'gro ba ste// g.yas la gnas pa dag ni g.yas kyis/ 
18a2(rgyud): slar yang gsal bar 'dir ni phan tshun 'thob ste dgra yin phyir rang gi zhing la yang dag gnas rnams gal te de la dgra ngag gyur na nges par 'jab pa'o// skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thab pa
18a3(rgyud): min par nges shing 'dir ni phan mtshungs pa dag tu ldan// gal te nyi ma yi ni g.yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g.yon pa yis/ byang gi ra ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig du ni
18a4(rgyud): bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g.yas pa yang // tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ba mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o// g.yon du rgyu ba dag la g.yas min du ste
18a5(rgyud): nyi ma'i bgrod dbang gis g.yas la g.yas pa'i char// de/ ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bo/ nga 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu yang // tha skar la sogs
18a6(rgyud): nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su 'gro la'i ri mo'o// sgyu skar g.yas dang g.yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas// gzhu yi rnam pa'i
18a7(rgyud): dus khyim dag la 'go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pade mdab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o// me nas
18a8(rgyud): bsol ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o// dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri bo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o// 
18b1(rgyud): phyi nas g.yas dang g.yas min dag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis// lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang ma chan mo dag kyang ji srid bgrod pa dag gi mthar
18b2(rgyud): nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so// gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o// de phyir
18b3(rgyud): gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no// bug pa zhes bya ma grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad deng bzhi pa dag la ni// nyi ma
18b4(rgyud): karka Ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang // sing+ge bum par rab zhugs bcu ga/ nyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o// 'dir ni
18b5(rgyud): g.yon bgrong du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum pa/ ra nyi mas gnyis pa la// nyal dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro// 
18b6(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang // nyi ma karka Ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng+ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro// bu mos bug
18b7(rgyud): par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o// gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi sa la'o// de bzhin
18b8(rgyud): lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis karka Ta sogs khyim rnams ngag la'o// steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar// de nas g.yas
19a1(rgyud): phyogasul zang par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mnga' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas 'gro la'i ri/ 
19a2(rgyud): mo ste/ de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo // lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du
19a3(rgyud): 'gro bar byed// ke la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ri la byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o// mnga' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag
19a4(rgyud): la 'gro bor byed// phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin la 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so// khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi
19a5(rgyud): tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed// dum bu dum du ngag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rims pas so// tshad gang dum bu gang du
19a6(rgyud): nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o// lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyon mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o// ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo
19a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang da ni nub pa nub// dus dang thun mtshams bzhi dang thun tshed/ 
19a8(rgyud): nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun du ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams// dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor// chu tshong dus la dpag tshad stong phrag
19b1(rgyud): drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste// drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor// nyin dang mtshan mor 'go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshong bgrod/ 
19b2(rgyud): de 'go la dag la g.yas dang ni// g.yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum// lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag
19b3(rgyud): ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur// zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mnga' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku lI ra dang seng ge la'o// bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs
19b4(rgyud): rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur// dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char ba dag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skur bye bas so// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa
19b5(rgyud): dag las so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa// lus la dbu// gas lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dong dus rnams dag gi grangs// stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug
19b6(rgyud): ngag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshang du rab tu grags pa ste// stong dus me yis rab tu phye ba dag ni chu tsheng du 'gyur drug cu 'ocha yis nyin zhag kyang // zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa
19b7(rgyud): ngag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams ngag gi mtshan mo'o// bla ma'i lo drug du 'gyur ba sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o// ches zhes bya ba'i lo ni nyi skyes kyis te de bzhin mun
19b8(rgyud): can gyi dgu rgyal po mjug rings dman// de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i dus kyi lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum// phyed dang bcas pa'i nyon zhag grangs dag
20a1(rgyud): las kyang lo brgyar 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor los dman no 'dir// srog ni snying stobs la 'bab rdul gyi bar dang mun pa la yang lus ngag sems kyi dbye bas so// lha mi
20a2(rgyud): lag 'gro rnams ni de nas lnga pa nyid 'gyur zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mo dag gis kyang // grangs ni shin tu nges pa 'di dag dus kyi 'khor lor rab grags pa yin no mi yi dbang // ma bcad dus
20a3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i bgrod pa dag la bu lon dgu ni bsres par gyur pa mtha' dag rnams// bkra shis la sogs gza' ni lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las ngag la yang rkang pa'i chu tshod te// sa skyes
20a4(rgyud): la ni rig byed dus mer rab 'gyur srid pa'i gnas rnams dag lu rgyu ba'i dbye ba yis// snga phyi phyed la mtshungs par bu lon nor gyi bgrod pa dag las gnas kyi dbye bas nges par
20a5(rgyud): sbyar// dang por rgyal dbang grangs kyi chu tshod dag ste me dang // mig ni rnam gsum dag tu 'gyur// gnas gnyis// ngag la gcig dang mig ste bco brgyad tshes dang drag po me
20a6(rgyud): dang rtsa bar drag po dang // sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad cu dag dang brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la 'dir ni gsum bcas lnga bcu'o// de yis nyi ma rnam dag gyur la bu lon ngag dang nor yang rim
20a7(rgyud): ba min dang rim pas so// rig byed dag dang bug pa zla ba'i grangs ni gza' lag myur ba'i las la chu tshod dag tu 'gyur// gnas gnyis la ni bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma nu myos byed
20a8(rgyud): drag po ri dang dbang po mkhag// rtsa ba dag las rig byed drag po dang ni rab gsapa nges par bcu gnyis pa la nyi shuste// nyi shu brgyad dang sum cu rtsa bani dag kyang ma nu'i gnas la rgyu ba'i dbyibs
20b1(rgyud): yang dag gnas// chu gter nam mkha' dag dang zla ba'i grangs te 'di dag rnams ni bla ma'i chu tshod chog su 'gyur// gnas gnyis dag la phyogs kyi tshad dang dgu nor dus drug lag pa zla ba dag dang rtsa
20b2(rgyud): bar ni// me drug bug pa dang ni drag po mi bdag thub pa dang te rgyu ba thams cad rim pas so// myur dal 'khyog po la yang gza' yi tshegs ni nges par nyi ma'i dbye ba dag gis rgyu bar byed// drug dang
20b3(rgyud): zla ba chu gter grangs kyi chu tshod dag ni pa sangs kyi yang myur ba'i las la 'gyur// gnas gsum dag la nyi shu lnga ste gnyis ni rgyal ba zhes dang de bzhin lag mig rnam pa gnyis// skyon dang tshes
20b4(rgyud): dang brgyad de rtsa bar drug dang nam mkha' yon tan ngag dang gci ngag gis dman pa'i brgya// mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs te brtan pa srid pa'i gnas la ba sangs rgyu ba rim pas so// 
20b5(rgyud): nyi ma'i bu la drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod tshegs pa 'di dag du 'gyur mi yi dbang // drug dang 'byung ba dag/ ngang 'byung bar rig byed chu gter mig dang zung dang stong pa rtsa
20b6(rgyud): bar ni// phyogs dang rig byed dag dang 'byung ba ro dang nor dang rtse mo can ni rim pas bzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams kyi ni rgyu ba mtha' dag dus kyi 'khor lo dag las shin
20b7(rgyud): tu nges par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug phyed bcas zla ba nges par nor gyis bsgyur ba dag ni bkra shis la sogs pa// gza' rnams ngag gi dal ba'i las la rkang par 'gyur te mig bug mig gi
20b8(rgyud): grangs kyi chu tshod do// de nyid bco brgyad ri dgas brtan pa sa yi phyi ma dang ni snga ma'i cha la ste// phyogs ri me ni gza' lag gi'o dbang phyug dgu me bla ma'i snga cha dag dang gzhan la yang // dkar po'i mda'
21a1(rgyud): dang chug ter zla ba spen pa yi yang mig bcas mig dang nyin zhag dus su 'gyur// zla ba la nis skyes longs spyod nu tshong dgu bcu dag ste lnga dang 'jig rten zla ba'i grangs// bas sa/ 
21a2(rgyud): kyi sde de bzhin gza' lag gi yang gcig tu bsdus pa mkha' ro sreg za dag tu 'gyur// 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhog bu lon chu ched longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o// zla bar bla ma'i
21a3(rgyud): longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu ched drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te// chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do// gcig tu gyur pa nyin
21a4(rgyud): zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyid bcas mtshan mor bcas// gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyi na zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' drug gi yang
21a5(rgyud): longs spyod do// zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i la/ sa la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni chab snang // / de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag
21a6(rgyud): ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de// sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman// nyi mo'o bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla
21a7(rgyud): ba'i chu tshod lnga// gang zhig ma sprad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste// de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag de'o// sgra gcan
21a8(rgyud): zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las// thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu chod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcen zla ba'i longs spyod las// 
21b1(rgyud): chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya// mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas
21b2(rgyud): so/ rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste// rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis nga rgyu chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur// 
21b3(rgyud): phyed bcas zla bar chu tshod gnyis ni nyin zhag so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab du'o// phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag du ni da yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur// / 
21b4(rgyud): slar yang dpal du 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi lo/ ngas spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur// de yi 'char ba'i cha dag/ shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes
21b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang / mangs bsnun bgrod pa'i nyon zhag dag gis rab tu dam/ na// bug pa bsres pa rnams ni rang gis bgrod pa'i yon
21b6(rgyud): tan dbang gis gza' rnams dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// sa skyes la ni ri klu drug gi nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur te ri bug ri klu zla skyes la'o// lha yi bla ma dag la so me rig byed du 'gyur ba
21b7(rgyud): sangs la ni ri dang rgyal ba mig/ nyi ma'i bu la drug drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig gi nyin zhag tshogs ni dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro// sa skyes la na ri dus gcig kyang nges par nor du 'gyur te zla ba'i
21b8(rgyud): bu la brgyas bsnun pa// me dang nyi ma ri yis dman zhing pa sangs dag la nyin zhag bcus bsgyur chu gter brgyad kyis dman// stong mkha' dus mig ngag dang mkha' lag gdengs can dus
22a1(rgyud): rnams blon po nyi skyes dag la bu lon 'gyur// sa skyes la ni phyed bcas dgu ste lag la phyed lhag mi bdag rgyu skar nyi ma bla ma la'o// pa sangs la drug nyi skyes
22a2(rgyud): la skyon bu lon du 'gyur mtha' dag longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las// dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag
22a3(rgyud): las dag 'gyur baglang pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so// zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis// cha thob dag kyang bu
22a4(rgyud): lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyis rjes su ma spyad chu tshod phyed// slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa de nyan zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur// drug cu'i
22a5(rgyud): cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyeg po ra 'char ba dag la yang // zla skyes blon po myur ba dag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug rings
22a6(rgyud): 'khyog po la// dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med// myur la shar du kha phyogs 'gyur te slar yang 'khyeg por rgyu la rab zhugs gzhan
22a7(rgyud): du mngon par phyogs// dal la lho ru bzhin phyogs 'gyur te rang bgrod yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba la yang byang du gdong // zla ba'i nyin zhag sum cu gang dag chu gter gyis bsgyur mkha'
22a8(rgyud): mig zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste// khyim ni bcu gnyis po rnams dus kyis bsgyur ba brgyad dang rig byed dag kyang nyi ma'i rkang pa'o// de yi nang du 'grib dang 'phel ba dag kyang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i dbang
22b1(rgyud): gis rim min rim pa ste// 'khor lo byed phyed dag la mtha' dag nor dang dus kyi grangs rnams rig par bya'o mi yi dbang // tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan
22b2(rgyud): rab tu 'jug sde dkyil 'khor yang // rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshong drug cu'o// phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis
22b3(rgyud): chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste// gnag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams ngag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin// mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams ngag gi lo yi
22b4(rgyud): longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya// gnas gnyis phyog/ das kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya// 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag
22b5(rgyud): drug gi le grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la'o// slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams/ kyi lo yi grangs dag du ni rab tu 'gyur// stong pa stong pa nam
22b6(rgyud): mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad// gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags// stong pa stong pa
22b7(rgyud): mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste// stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur// lo ni
22b8(rgyud): 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas// slar yang tha skar la sogs dag dang rab byung zhes dang de bzhin nag pa'i zla ba la sogs dang // gza'
23a1(rgyud): dang sbyor ba tshes dang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin dang po dag ste de yi dus su ni// lha rnams dag dang lha min rnams kyis 'khrug pa drag po sa gzhi'i gnas rnams su
23a2(rgyud): ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sde pa drug ni nyi ma'i dbyangs bcas nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyi ma dag la ste// a sogs thung ngu nyin zhag ces bya sum 'gyur ri bong can cha phyed
23a3(rgyud): bcas zla ba zla ba la// chu tshod ha sogs dbyangs bcas sum 'gyur gang yin de dag rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni mtshan mo gsum// dpal ldan stong pa gzhom med la sogs sum 'gyur
23a4(rgyud): gang de rnams kyang sgra gcan gyi ni dus sbyor gsum// 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs ni mo yi bdag po phyed bcas zla ba dag dang lo gsum mo// phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba der
23a5(rgyud): nas thub mchog rnams kyis bcad pa dag ni dus kyi 'kho/ ra lor 'gyur// zla bar bsreg pa gza' gcig dang // ni mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod tshogs la gnyis dang rkang
23a6(rgyud): pa mnga'// 'khor lo dag las nges par lha mo drug cu rnams kyis rnam par phye ba dag ni gzar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang chu tshod thub pa nor gyis bsgyur ba'i lha mo rnams las
23a7(rgyud): tshogs la gnyis// sbyin dor sbyin pa dag dang ri bong can gyi rkang pa dang po lnga ste 'dir ni drug gis so// zla ba'i phyogs gsum nyin zhag rnams ni su 'gyur dag mi nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni
23a8(rgyud): rab tu grags// drug cus phye bi'i skar ma gnyis dang nyi ma'i nyin zhag dang por spyod ldan dbang phyug chu tshong ngo // dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' yi tshogs dang bcas pa 'di dag bya
23b1(rgyud): dang lus la dbyer med par// bsdu ba dang ni spro ba'i slad du srid pa gsum gyi gnas su nyi ma dus kyi gzugs dang ni// shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye dang ni mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs dang myur/ 
23b2(rgyud): 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba ste// chags bral dang ni thub mchog rigs dang tshangs dang drag po la sogs lha rnams kyis ni shes ma yin// a sogs lnga yis dbyangs gang dang po'i tshes grangs
23b3(rgyud): dbang gis dga' ba la sogs lnga dang ldan gyur pa// de dag 'dir ni 'char byed mi bdag gal te de las skyes la sogs gza' dag ma gyur na'o// sa skyes mi shis shar bar gyur cing gal
23b4(rgyud): te slar yang smin drug dag dang ldan pa nyid gyur pa// de la gal te g.yul dang nang du gyur na mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/  te dang po'i dbyangs kyi'o// bzang po zla skyes dag gis gza'
23b5(rgyud): 'di la ni gal te mchu nyid ldan na gnyis pa 'chi bar 'gyur/ ra// rgyal ba bla ma dag la gal te skrag tu gyur na ga/ sum pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin// stong pa'i tshes
23b6(rgyud): dang pa sangs dag la gal te mon grur gyur na bzhi pa dag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// rdzogs pa spen pa dag dang lhan cig du ni bra nye gyur na lnga pa 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur// nyi ma dag la dga' ba 'char
23b7(rgyud): ba rnams kyi rmar yang 'gyur te gzir ba rnams ni nyon mongs nyid// zla ba la ni bzang po 'char ba rnams kyi nges par g.yul dang nad dag la yang de bzhin 'gyur// bden par 'char
23b8(rgyud): ba lnga po rnams kyi 'bras bu mang por 'chi ba'i sbyor bas dman pa dag la 'gyur// nad dang g.yul dang yul du bgrod dang bag ma dag la dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu shes par bya// de ltar rgyu
24a1(rgyud): skar gza' ste dbyangs tshogs tshes rnams dag ni de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis// phyogs dang zla ba bgrod pa dag dang lo dang drug cu'i lo rnams la yang 'dir ni 'char/ 
24a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// nag pa sogs la 'dir ni yan lag bcu gnyis dag gis 'char 'gyur phyogs kyi dbye ba de nyid do// nyin zhag dbyangs rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis dag gis 'dir ni 'char
24a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te zla ba'i dbye ba la'o// zla ba drug gis bgrod pa'i yan lag dag sde rab byung la sogs bcu gnyis lo rnams dag gau lo// de ltar dbyangs ni lnga po rnams ngag 'dir ni 'char
24a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te de ni phyi nas nub pa'o// dang po la ni dbyangs rna mas byis pa rang tshes yon tan dbang gis dpal ldan gzhon nu gnyis pa la// dar bab rgan po rim pas me dang
24a5(rgyud): chu gter nyin zhag la ste lnga pa la ni nub par 'gyur// a sogs dbyangs lnga gang dag nges par yon tan gyis/ bsgyur de dag rnams ni rnam gnyis sum cu nyid// ka sogs
24a6(rgyud): sde pa'i yi ge rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis mtha' dag sbyar bar bya ba ste// thung ngu rnams ni 'dir yang dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi dbye bas so// ring
24a7(rgyud): po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la shin tu nges par 'gyur te spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so// nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar de la gsal bar mda' yi chu tshod nyi ma'i dus sbyor tsho dgu pa// lug gi
24a8(rgyud): dus sbyor la sogs 'di dag rnams kyang 'dir ni rang bzhin gsum ste brtan g.yo shin tu mnyam lug dang karka Ta srang chu srin 'dir ni g.yo ba dag ste de las gnyis pa brtan pa'o// lhag sa
24b1(rgyud): gzhan ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin de dag nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su rtag pa nyid du 'char// de la yud tsam sum cu rnams dang nyin zhag dus la chu tshod dag kyang drug cu kho na ste// dang por sum cug
24b2(rgyud): dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur ba nyid de yud tsam+bu dag la'o// sde pa'i yi ge sum cu chu tshod rnams la rab tu 'gyur te thung dang ring po rab dbye bas// zla ba'i dbus su chos kyi cha la
24b3(rgyud): 'char bar brjod de de dag nub pa dag kyang de nyid la'o// stong pa rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag kyang a la sogs pa dbyangs ni lnga po rnams kyi rigs// sgra gcan me dang zla nyi zla skyes mig
24b4(rgyud): dmar pa sangs bla ma mjug rings spen pa 'dir lhag lha// da sngar brjod dus sbyor re re de la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis chu tshed rnams ni bsgrub par bya// de yi dbus su dbyang
24b5(rgyud): gang byung ba'i gza' zhes bya ba stobs ldan de yis dkyil/ 'khor bsgrub par bya// g.yon pa dag nas thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams 'dir ni 'char bar 'gyur te g.yas pa nas
24b6(rgyud): kyang gzhan dag go/ g.yon la stong pa la sogs de nyid dag dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba sgra gcan la sogs mtha' dag ste// g.yas la de nyid 'dzin ma sogs dang gza' yi tshogs ni nges par
24b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid// phyi rol du yang dus kyi chu tshod gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa dbyangs bcas dag ni bsgrub par bya// dris na g.yul gyi slad du 'chi bar 'gyur te stong pa la ni dus
24b8(rgyud): dag shar bar gyur pa na'o// rlung du nyi ma dag la 'pham zhing me las skyes shar ba dag la rma ru 'gyur ba yin// chu dang bla ma la ni 'dum par 'gyur te sa la spen pa shar la 'khrug par mi
25a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'chi dang nyon mongs rmar 'gyur bde bdag dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'dri byed nad pa rnams kyi'o// g.yul du dag ni nges par rab tu nyams par 'gyur te sgra
25a2(rgyud): gcan stong pa dag la shar na yang // rlung dang zla ba dag la 'pham dang g.yul du rma yang zla skyes me la shar ba dag la'o// chul pa sangs la ni don rnyed sa la mjug rings shar ba dag la
25a3(rgyud): dgra yang dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin bgrod pa bag ma dag la g.yon gyi lam la gza' rnams kyis ni dge ba'i 'bras bu 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams gang dag nges par
25a4(rgyud): bcu yis bsgyur te khyim gyi 'khor lo ngag gis bsre/ slar yang de dag 'byung bas bsnun te nye ba'i skye bo dang da ldan bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma ni// zla med mnga' dang ri bo mi
25a5(rgyud): mnyam gnas su gyur na mi rnams la ni rnyed pa yod ma/ yin// mig dang rig byed ro ste shin tu mnyam pa'i/ gnas su gyur na bya ba dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur// lo dang
25a6(rgyud): zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus ni dus sbyor dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste// dus sbyor gcig ni lnga yi dbye ba gza' tshogs dang ldan dbyangs dang bcas pa'i de nyid tha dad do// de nyid
25a7(rgyud): gcig ni dbugs rnams drug cu mngon lhag yon tan brgya yi dus kyi chu tshod dag la gnas// chu tshod cha shas chu srang drug cu de yi cha shas zhes pa dbugs drug rnams so mi yi dbang // 
25a8(rgyud): dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dge dge ba'i 'bras bu dag kyang rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par byed// lha shes rnams kyis nyin zhag 'das pa'i dbang gis nyi ma zla ba bsgrubs nas
25b1(rgyud): dus kyi chu chod do// da ltar byung ba shes pa min par dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'jig rten 'dir ni gang brjod pa// de ni long ba yis kyang long ba bzung nas glang chen seng+ges gtams
25b2(rgyud): pa'i thibs por rab tu 'jug/ phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa la gza' yi stobs dang bcas pa'i dus sbyor sbyor ba sbyin pa ni// skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la dus me nyi mas
25b3(rgyud): skyes nyin mor byed pa'i bu rnams kyis// de la 'chi dang nad dang rma dang nges par mtha' dag nor ni rnam par nyams pa dag kyang byed// de phyir spang bar bya ste nges par bdag gis dus sbyor
25b4(rgyud): gzhan ni rab tu sbyin par bya// skye dang bdun par gnas pa'i khyim la sgra gcan zla ba zla skyes bla ma pa sangs dang bcas pas// ngagra nyams rang nyid rgyas shing g.yul du
25b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal te dga' ma dang bcas nor dag 'thob par 'gyur// yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis te slar/ yang gal te rang lus g.yon gyi rtsa las gyur pa na// nges
25b6(rgyud): par don ni thams cad 'grub ste mtha' dag sa yi steng du dag pa'i gza' dang tshes la'o// rgyu skar rnams ni dgu dang dgu dang dgu yis cha gsum byas te skyes pa'i rgyu skar dang po las/ gdug
25b7(rgyud): pa rnams ni zla ba dag dang lhan cig mi mnyam gnas gyur nad pa rnams ni 'chi ba nyid// tha skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum sbrul yang smras par gyur pa nam gru nyid kyi bar du ste// sdig
25b8(rgyud): zla skyes pa'i rgyu skar gal te rtsa gcig dag la gyur na mi rnams dag ni rnam par nyams// drug dang tshes dang brgyad dang ri zla bcu dang bcu dgu nyi shu gcig gi lo bzang rnams// nyi zla
26a1(rgyud): mig dmar gza' lhag nyi skyes bla ma lag 'gro dkar po rnams kyis de dag rim pas spyod// de dang nang gi gnas skabs la yang de las sde pa brgyad po rnams kyi
26a2(rgyud): yi ge dag la ni// drag po rnams kyis zhi ba min pa byed cing mchog tu bde byed zhi ba'i rang bzhin gza' gang dag/ rgyal gyi zla bar nyi ma chu srin la son ma rig pa ste bum par nyi ma mchu la
26a3(rgyud): yang // 'du byed du 'gyur mi yi bdag po nya ru nyi ma dpo dag la ni rnam par shes pa ste// lug tu nyi ma nag pa la ni ming dang gzugs so glang 'khrig la son sa ga snron dag la// mig sogs
26a4(rgyud): dang ni reg pa dag sto nya ma karka Tar gnas chu zla la ni tshor ba ngar 'gyur// seng ger nyi ma gro zhin la yang sred pa bu mo dang ni srang du son pa khrums dang ni// the skar zla ba dag la len
26a5(rgyud): pa nyid dang srid par 'gyur te smin drug sdig par nyi ma la/ skye ba dang ni gzhu la nyi ma gnas pa mgo dag la yang de/ bzhin rga shi rim pa ste// de ltar nyi zla'i dbye ba dag las
26a6(rgyud): gnyis ka bgrod pa'i dbang gis rgyal po yan lag bcu gnyis so// rgyal dang mchu yi mtshams su chu srin dag la nyi ma gnas pa'i gza' de la ni ma rig pa// de nas gnyis po la ni shi bar/ 
26a7(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin skye ba gsum pa la'o// de bzhin srid pa la sogs thams cad yan lag bcu gnyis bar du rim pa dag gis yongs su 'gyur// de nas me dang chu gter mda'
26a8(rgyud): ste chu srin bgrod pa'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag drug pa'o// tshes shes bya ba'i gza' yis phyogs te nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang gis res 'ga' yan lag bcu drug gis// 'du byed mchu
26b1(rgyud): yi mtshams ngag du ste bus par nyi ma son pa de la 'du byed kho na'o// de nas gnyis pa la ni rnam par shes par 'gyur te nyin zhag gsum pa la ni ming dang gzugs// de ltar zla ba
26b2(rgyud): gnyis la yan lag du gyur nyi ma'i dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas so// de lam rig la sogs yan lag mi mnyam pa yang bya ba kun la dge bar 'gyur ba ste// gang zhig 'du
26b3(rgyud): byed la sogs mnyam pa dag kyang rtag tu dbang bgrod bag ma dag la dge ba min// de bzhin phyogs kyi dbye ba dag la ri bong can gyi baglod pa'i dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis gang // dger
26b4(rgyud): dang nag po'i phyogs la dang po'i tshes grangs dbang gis spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba dag gis so// nyi ma mig dmar mdzu dag rings spen pa g.yas sam rgyab tu yang dag gnas pas
26b5(rgyud): dgra ni 'chi bar byed// g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i rang bzhi na gza' tshogs mtha' dag g.yul gyis sar ni de bzhin kho na'o// rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti drag po rlung dang bcas pa
26b6(rgyud): g.yas dang rgyab tu bde ba sbyin pa ste// g.yon dang mdun du 'chi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pas gnyis ka'i dpung ni 'joms par 'gyur// tshangs ma drag mo gzhon nu ma dang
26b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i bdag gis 'gro ma phag mo rdo rje lag ma dang // tsa muN+Da nyid dpal mo dag ni nor gyi tshe sa la 'gyur te dang po'i tshes dang dgu pa la// brgya byin du ste gnod
26b8(rgyud): sbyin me zur lha min gshin rje chu lha rlung dang dbang ldan sa la'o// 'di ni 'char ba dag tu byed de slar yang ches rnams la ni brgyad gnyis dbye bas tha dad do// de'i rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la
27a1(rgyud): brgya byin gshin rje chu dang gnod sbyin du yang 'dir 'char 'gyur// slar yang nag po'i phyogs la rtse mo can dang lA min rlung dang dbang ldan bur du rim pas so// drag
27a2(rgyud): po shar nas gzhan phyed du 'gro nyin zhag dbang gis byang du yang sde byang gi nyi ma la'o// chu nas me ldan dag tu de ni nges par 'gro ste lho ru lho yi nyi ma dag la'o// shar nas thun byed dag la
27a3(rgyud): rlung du rab tu 'jug ste de bzhin du ni lho ru 'gro bar byed// dbang ldan chu dang me dang gnod sbyin lha min grong khyer du 'gro rlung du nyi ma nub par 'gyur// dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan dor nas rlung
27a4(rgyud): dag las kyang rnam par rgyal 'gyur mtshan ma'i 'thab mo da // / 'khrug pa dag la rtsa ba'i sgra gcan gyis ni dag yo stobs 'joms de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min/ 
27a5(rgyud): dbyangs dman 'thab mo pa ni mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul la lhag pa dag gis 'joms par byed pa ste// dbugs la gnyis kyi min gang snying la rab tu 'jug na de ni 'jug
27a6(rgyud): pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// pho nyas brjod pa dang po'i ming de rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur te phyis kyi ming de pham par 'gyur// 'du ba kha dog dbyangs la sogs pa mnyam dang mi mnyam
27a7(rgyud): gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras meng ston pa nyid// dus ni 'thab mo'i sa la mi bdag rnams kyi g.yos dang gal te g.yas min dag la mun can 'gyur// g.yul du lha yi mgon po dag ni 'phrog
27a8(rgyud): byed drag po dang bcas mi rnams kyis kyang 'joms par 'gyur// de phyir dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan 'khyog po drag po lha min rnams las srid gsum rnam rgyal ba// g.yul gyi dus su
27b1(rgyud): sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shes par bya ste gzhan du dgra ni nyams pa med// sa la rgyu skar byas nas thub pa dus kyis bsgyur ba dbang po gnod sbyin chu dang gshin rjer ni// de yi 'khor
27b2(rgyud): lo 'khor bar byed de nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis mtha' dag rnams ni rig par bya// rgyu skar gang la dus dang mun can du yang rab gyur lta ba lhung na gnyis po dag la yang // g.yul du/ 
27b3(rgyud): dgra yi sde rnams dag ni 'phrul la nges par ltung ste lto yi dbus su rgyal bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dus la gnas pa rnams ni 'chi dang bcas par 'gyur zhing dpung rnams mnyam du ltung / 
27b4(rgyud): ba ni// lte ba'i cha la nges sing rnams te brang 'gro 'gro ba'i dbang gis de ro ni sde rnams bcom par 'gyur/ de lta ba'i cha ni spangs pa rnams ngag rnam par rgyal bar yu
27b5(rgyud): te lto bar zhugs la gnyis po yang // de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa dus kyi 'khor lor shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang briSh+Ti dag
27b6(rgyud): po gza tshogs dang bcas dbyangs ni 'char ba dag dang bcas gyur pa// de dag thams cad btang nas rgyal rigs rnams kyis srid gsum rnam rgyal go cig pu gzung bar bya ba ste// gang
27b7(rgyud): gis zla ba nyi ma za zhing skabs gsum pa dag 'jigs byed drag po'i gzugs can mig sman mdog/ sa la gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mor shar dang nub dang lho dang byang du yang ni 'khor ba'o// 
27b8(rgyud): g.yul du 'pham pa'i dgra bo dag ni gal te 'phral la rdzong gi nang du zhugs par gyur pa na// phyi rol du ni 'khrul 'khor bya ste rgyun chad med par rdo dang me mda' rab tu 'bab pa dang // ral gri la
28a1(rgyud): sogs gcod pa'i 'khrul 'khor dag dngas gzhi'i gnas la gur dang cog ni dbye ba yis// de yi rdzong ni phye mar byas te nyin zhag nyung zad dag gis gdug pa de ni
28a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// ka ba bzhi ni brgyad gnyis khru ldan mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas nas gnas brgyad du ni phug gyur pa// tha dad rnams ni sdong bu chu gter dus dang dus rnams kyis te rgyab tu
28a3(rgyud): yang ni gcig gis so// rtsa bar 'khrul 'khor tshad ni lag pa bcu ru 'gyur te steng gi cha dag la ni de yi phyed// rgyogs mnga' khru gnyis dag gis dman par 'gyur te o log bcu yi
28a4(rgyud): steng gi cha ni lhag pa'o// zlum por phyed bcas khru gnyis da dag ste sor mo thub pa ma nur nges pa'i bug pa gcig tu ni// khru gang dor nas rgyogs mnga' rab tu gzhug ste oM
28a5(rgyud): log bcu yi rgyab kyi cha la gzer gyis gdab/ mgo bor a long dag la thag pa lnga bcu bdags par bya ste steng gi tsha de ni zlum po phyed// rgyogs mda'i mthar ni mdzub
28a6(rgyud): mo dang bcas rab tu 'jug ste gnya' non zlum po dag ni mtho gang ngo // rgyogs mda'i mdzub mo la ni 'ur mthil thag par bcas pa dag la nges par khru gsum dag tu 'gyur// de yi nang
28a7(rgyud): du rdo ba rab tu bcug ste stobs ldan 'then byed rnams kyis 'then par gyur pa dag/ btang ba myur du nam mkhar 'gro ste 'phral la nges par ltung zhing khang steng sogs dang lam srang du// mtha' dag
28a8(rgyud): phye mar byas nas sa yi 'og tu 'gro ste rdo rje 'bab pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin// de yi 'dzub mo zla ba phyed pas gzhi'i gnas su tshangs pa'i ri mo ngos gnyis dag tu ni// brgyad gnyis btang ba'i
28b1(rgyud): gnas rnams dag ste lag pa gnyis ka'i khu chur bcings las btang bar bya// gtong ba sa la reg pa nyid de mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa 'khrul 'khor nang du gnas pas ni// rang 'dod rdob
28b2(rgyud): ltung ste rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis rjeng ni rnam par gzhom pa'i don du'o// gang zhig bsnun pas glang chen 'phral la nges par ltung ba de la srog chags phra mo dag ni ci// rdzong gi
