53b3(rgyud): tu med pa'i srid bdag gis rtag pa'i srog gis thar pa'o// gang du thar pa'i tshad ni steng du nges par brjod pa de na rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan pa'o// rig byed 'di ni rang byung min te sring ba gsum gyi
53b4(rgyud): gnas su rig byed sgra ni don brjod byed// tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi dag gis sngon ni rig byed sgra dag gis kyang don ni rab tu gsal bar byas// ci ste sgra dang don ni tha dad min na me sgra
53b5(rgyud): brjod pa dag gis kha ni cis mi sreg/ de phyir nges par ston/ pa po yod rig pa'i yul dang ma 'ongs don dang 'das pa/ dag la yang // rig byed nam mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni
53b6(rgyud): gnas kyi dbye ba dag las kha yis rab brjod byas pa'o// rigs pas gnyis skyes kha yis bklags pa nyid tshe ba ste kun tu 'gro ba gzhan rnams klog pa'o// gang phyir dmangs la sogs pa'i
53b7(rgyud): rigs ni kun 'gro min pa'i rig byed 'di dag klog dang 'dri ba min// de phyir shes ldan mkhas par gyur pa'i mi rnams dag la rig byed dag ni tshad mar mi 'gyur ro// gal te thams
53b8(rgyud): cad byed pa dbang phyug yod na de yang 'gro ba'i las longs spyod po gzhan ma yin// gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed po min na de yang kun nas thams cad byed por mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni gal te byed po
54a1(rgyud): gzhan dag bskul na 'di ni byed po dag gi mchog tu gzhan dbang nyid// de phyir dge dang mi dge'i 'bras ster byed po dbang phyug med de srog chags las ni dor nas so// sa dang chu/ 
54a2(rgyud): me rlung gi rdul phran 'dir ni gal te mkha' la byed po'i dang por yod pa min// rdzas dag med pa la ni yul dang rnam par bral ba'i thams cad byed po sna tshogs mi byed do// yul dang rnam par bral ba byed
54a3(rgyud): po 'di yi tshad ma mngon sum dang ni lkog tu gyur pa med// yang dag sbyor ba nyid las thams cad du 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dod pas ma yin las kyi gzugs// yang dag sbyor ba las ni chu shel las
54a4(rgyud): kyang chu ru 'gyur te me long dag las dngos po'i gzugs/ sgyur ba'i rgyu las lce 'dzag rang gi sgra las gcig sho ngas dag pa'i sa bon las ni myu gur 'gyur// khab len las kya
54a5(rgyud): lcags kyi thur ma dag ni g.yo bar 'gyur te 'dod pas 'di la ci yang min// dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di ni srid pa ga/ sum gyi gnas su su zhig gis kyang sprul pa min// gal te
54a6(rgyud): bdag ni kun tu 'gro na gnyen dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ji ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur// gal te 'di ni rtag par gyur na 'dod pa'i mnga' yis bsnun pa'i gnas skabs nyid du cis rab 'gyur// 
54a7(rgyud): gal te bya ba dang bcas gyur na gnyid log dus su 'di ni rmongs pa nyid du ji ltar 'gro// de ltar nges par bdag 'di kun 'gro khyab bdag dang ni sngon gyi bya ba dang ni bcas pa min// bdag med 'byung
54a8(rgyud): ba yod cing dge dang mi dgo'i 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par dman// 'gro ba po med ma lus thar pa'i slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'ching ba yod de bcings pa med// dngos po dngos med dag kyang
54b1(rgyud): yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin med pa dag gi srid pa yod// 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang gdengs can rnams kyi don bcas tshig gis 'joms mi 'gyur// gang zhig de nyid gang / 
54b2(rgyud): zag ces bya lus la gnas par smra ba de ni rang bzhin dag gis nyams// kun rdzob dag gis don ni smra ba po yang don dam ma rig med pa dag tu 'dod pa'o// srid gsum mtha' dag rnam par shes pa nyid
54b3(rgyud): du smra ba po yang rnam par shes pa 'dod par byed// gang zhig snying rje stong nyid gnyis su med pa smra bo phyogs nyams de ni ma nyams par 'gyur ro// skye bo sngon gyi las rnams nyams su myong 'gyur 'di la
54b4(rgyud): byas pa rnams ni skye ba gzhan la'o// gal te de lta yin na lus da ni 'jigs par mi 'gyur mi rnams skye ba gzhan dag gi su// dpag med srid pa dag gis 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar
54b5(rgyud): 'gyur dang thar par 'jug pa med pa nyid// 'di dag stag gzig rnams kyang nges par 'dod par 'gyur te gzhan pa'i rig sa kyis rab tu dman pa'o// gal te 'byung ba gcig tu gyur
54b6(rgyud): bas chang gi nus pa bzhin du dbang bcas sems su rab 'gyur na// shing rnams dag la ci phyir mir 'gyur sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha' sbyor phyir ro// 'di dag rnams la skye bo'i nus pa med na
54b7(rgyud): 'byung ba yang dag sbyor ba'i nus pa mchog tu brdzun// chu rol mdzes pa'i tshig 'di dag ni mi rnams dag la bde ba'i 'bras bu star min lam nyams so// srog ni lus kyi tshang dag yin na gal te lag
54b8(rgyud): pa rkang pa bcad pas nyams par 'gyur ram ci// rtag pa dag ni lus kyi mthu las phra mor 'gyur zhing sbom por yang ni rab tu 'gyur ram ci// 'khor ba'i las las grol ba gang zhig 'jig rten steng na
55a1(rgyud): gnas pa bde ba dag gi gnas su 'gro// 'jig rten gsum yang phra rab dag gis gang zhig bkod pa de ni dus kyis rtag tu rtag pa min// zhes pa la sogs ye shes slad du dus
55a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor los sa la bstan pa rab tu gsal mdzad pa// 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu rnams kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste// sems ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis
55a3(rgyud): nye bar bzhag pa dag las shel bzhin tshon ldan nyid 'gyur ba// gang yin de phyir rang gzhan rigs su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang rnal 'byor pa yis sun mi dbyung // chos ni sems can phan pa yul
55a4(rgyud): dang rnam par bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gnod pa'o// da 'tshe ba rig byed tshad ma can ni bde ba'i 'bras bu mi ster du sa kun du ni sdug bsngal ster// dam pa'i byams ldan rmongs pa'i
55a5(rgyud): tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can bde la rjes su chags// de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag dang mi bdag yid kyis rang bzhin med pa sgom par gyis// lha mi bla ma
55a6(rgyud): nga ni mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu dbang po sa steng du ni 'khor los bsgyur// sa 'og dag tu klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang kun tu 'gro dang mchog nga ste// ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang
55a7(rgyud): 'gyur med mchog dang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang // rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang ma dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyabs su song // khyod ni ma dang khyod ni pa ste khyod/ 
55a8(rgyud): ni 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang yang // khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phun sum tshogs pa yang // khyod ni 'ba' zhig gnas dang khyod ni yon tan mchog gi
55b1(rgyud): gnas te skyo rnams bcom po khyod da do// khyong ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang ming bzhi nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag skyabs mchi// dpal ldan dang ba'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba dang sa/ 
55b2(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor la chen po las nang nges pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa'o// lus la sna tshogs chad dang nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus dang zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ni/ 
55b3(rgyud): rtsa rnams kyi ni phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin dag la skyes bu mu stegs rnams kyi 'dod pa dang // rig byed dang ni byed po la sogs dbye ba bdag gis bos pas dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan du gsol// bla
55b4(rgyud): bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas bde bar gshegs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsungs// dang por ya dang ngag bsten bya bla ma dag kyang dam tshig ldan zhing rdo rje theg par
55b5(rgyud): lhag par gnas// de nyid bsgoms shing ma chags dri ma dgadang rnam par bral zhing bzod pa'i ngang tshul lam la zhug sa// slob ma rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs
55b6(rgyud): pa 'phrog cing de nyid las ni tshangs spyod ldan// bdud rnams la ni rdo rje dbyug pa de yang 'dzin ma'i bzhi la rdo rje sems dpar rab grags pa'o// nga rgyal dang ldan khro bas zil mnan dam tshig rnams dral
55b7(rgyud): rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa dag kyang med// slob ma rnams ni slu ba don du gnyer zhing mchog gi bde ba'i gnas las sems nyams dbang ma bskur// longs spyod dag la kun chags bag med rtsub
55b8(rgyud): mo'i tshig dang bcas shing dbang po'i don du 'dod ldan pa// de nyid dmyal ba bzhin du slob ma mkhas pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni spang bar bya// zab cing rgya che la sems bla ma'i nges
56a1(rgyud): pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan yon tan shes// thar pa don gnyer rgyud la gus shing g.yo ba min pa'i sems ldan de nyid thob pa shin tu sbed // gdug pa
56a2(rgyud): rnams kyi grogs nyams slob ma de nyid bla ma shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis bsdu bya ba// shes rab dbang la sogs pa'i rgyur te gzhan zhes bya ba slar yang 'bring po bsod nams ngag gi
56a3(rgyud): rgyur// nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs byas nas// sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni bsod nams don du bu rnam
56a4(rgyud): dag la sbyin par bya// yang na mtha' dag yon tan gter da ni bstan pa'i slad du rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la ma chod par bya// mchod pa med na lo gcig du ni rgyud kyi rgyal po
56a5(rgyud): dag las bla mas bstan par mi bya'o// dbang gi don dus ni yongs brtags nags dang grong khyer grong rdal grong / gi phyogs kyi cha dag dang // thab khung rnams kyi mtshan nyid
56a6(rgyud): dang ni bum pa dang bcas rdul tshon sbyin sreg pur bu la sogs dang // slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dang gang yang rgyal ba'i bdag po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dag/ shes nas slob
56a7(rgyud): dpon gyis ni dge dang mi dge'i 'bras slad zhi ba la sogs mtha' dag rab tu bya// sa yi rigs ni yon tan dbang gis rnam bzhir 'gyur ba dmangs rigs rje'u rgyal po bram ze ste/ 
56a8(rgyud): gnag dang ser dang dmar ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa dkar ba'i kha dog rnams kyis rig par bya// rul pa chu skyes pad+ma'i dri dang mchog gi dri rnams rim pas nor gyi blo gros dag tu 'gyur// sbyar dang
56b1(rgyud): lan tshwa dmangs rigs mngar dang tsha ba rje dang mi bdag gzhan pa dag ni gnyis skyes so// dkar po dag ni zhi dang rgyas pa la ste sprin nag dang mtshungs bsad dang bskrad pa dag la yang // dmar po
56b2(rgyud): dbang dang dgug pa la ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa rengs dang rmongs pa la yang 'gyur// las kyi cha ni thams cad dag la ljang kur gyur te lnga pa dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs// ro dang dri
56b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag yon tan gtor ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// dbang ldan dang ni byang gi sa gzhi dag la zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag tu 'gyur ba ste// me yi mtshams dang shar
56b4(rgyud): gyi char ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par bsad pa dag dang bsku dra pa'o// bden bral dang ni lho phyogs su yang gsal bar rtag tu dbang du bya dang dgug pa dag kyang ngo // rlung gi mtshams
56b5(rgyud): dang nub kyi phyogs su nges par mchog gi mi bdag rengs pa/ dang ni rmongs pa'o// thab khung grong gi phyogs brgya/ de dag tu nges par rab tu 'gyur te zlum po dang ni chu gter zur// 
56b6(rgyud): zla kham zur lnga pa dang rang bzhin yon+tan dbang gis zur bdun pa dang zur ni gsum pa dang // zur drug pa dang zur brgyad par 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis de dag rnams kyi snying po'i mtshan ma ni// pad+ma
56b7(rgyud): 'khor lo gri gug ral gri mda' zhes bya dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog dag dang sbrul// gcig gnyis phyed dang gcig ni khru ste mkha' dus mkha' mig mkha' ma mkha' dus dag ni sor du 'gyur
56b8(rgyud): phyed kyi yan lag drug gi cha shas nyi ma nyi ma'i cha shas dag gis thebs dang kha khyer dang // mchu dang mtshan ma'i phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer dag gi steng du rigs kyi dbang gis kun nas so// 
57a1(rgyud): kha khyer phyi rol du yang chu skyes mdab ma rnams mdzod mi bdag zhi rgyas la ste gzhan la min// yang na las ni thams cad la yang rdo rjer 'gyur te sa la phur pa dag gi phyi
57a2(rgyud): ba brgyad// n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad tha ka rus lcags seng ldeng las skyes tsU ta bil ba arga skyes// de bzhin shel gyi bum pa dang ni dngul mchog rang bzhin dpal ldan thod pa dag dang lcags kyi
57a3(rgyud): dang // zangs zhes bya dang gser gyi bum pa rab gsal nges par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhin no// zlum po brgyad gnyis sor du brjod de gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis dpangs dang
57a4(rgyud): sor gnyis dag gi mchu// drug gi mgrin pa sor brgyad kha ste ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zhi rgyas dag la'o gzhan dal min// snga dro nas ni thun brgyad po rnams nyin zhag so so'i
57a5(rgyud): dus su zhi dang rgyas pa sogs la 'gyur// de bzhin de yi/ thun phyed dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su las brgya/ de dag ni rab tu bya// nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed dag ni nyin dang / 
57a6(rgyud): mtshan mo'i dus su zhi ba dag la spang bar bya// dus sbyor gdug pa'i gza' rnams gnas pa dag ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed de bzhin nyid du rab tu grags// 'o ma dang bcas yam shing mda'
57a7(rgyud): brgya zhi dang rgyas pa dag la bsad pa la ni mi rus so// dbye ba la ni bya rog mjug ma seng ldeng las skyes king shu ka ni dgug dang dbang la'o// bil ba smyo byed dag ni khru phyed mda' brgya'i grangs
57a8(rgyud): rnams rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa dag la ste// 'o ma mar dang khrag dang zhag dang rdul dang rdo rje chu dang mchil ma tshang rnams bsreg bya ste// dUr ba 'bru dang sha dang dug dang bcas pa dag dang de
57b1(rgyud): bzhin skye tshe me tog dmar po dang // bil ba brnyings pa'i phreng ba dang ni gser bzang me tog rnams nyid zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o// gshin rje bden bral zur dang chur bcas rlung dang gnod
57b2(rgyud): sbyin drag po dbang po dag dang me ru ni// slob dpon dag gi gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag la'o// tshon ni las gnyis dag la 'gyur te gtso bo'i pad+ma la yang
57b3(rgyud): dkar nag nyi ma ser po'o// phyi rol du ni sangs rgyas dbye bas lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis// thab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor la ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams
57b4(rgyud): su yang tshen ni gdab par 'gyur// dgod pa la sogs pa/ sang gtor la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje dag las lha rnams spro ba'o// shel la sogs pa'i mchod yon snod
57b5(rgyud): pa pad+ma nor gyi mdab ma mthe bong dag ni bcu gnyis kyang // yu ba'i rtse mor snyim pa'i snod de khyor ba dag kyang sreg bya dag la'o// zhi dang drag po chags dang bcas par 'gyur
57b6(rgyud): te rigs kyi dbang gis lha ni rengs pa dag gi sku// de bzhin las gnyis dag la rab tu gsal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro// rnam pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang po
57b7(rgyud): gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung po khams sogs kyi// dbye ba yi te de las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul chen rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// thig skud khru ni brgyad par 'gyur
57b8(rgyud): te sum sgril slob dpon gyi ni lag pa'i mthe bo'i nas gcig gis// sboms su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi lam na gnas pa thig skung gcig ste gzhan pa ma yin no// zhi ba la sogs dag la rim
58a1(rgyud): pa yongs su bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha min cog pu dang // skyil krung phyed pa dbye ba gnyis dang bshang lam rkang par gnas pa dag kyang las kyi dbye bas gdan// shel dang
58a2(rgyud): mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de tse dang ni// pad+ma zhes bya dbang mig lud tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la phreng bar 'gyur// dri zhim me tog
58a3(rgyud): dkar po dang ni tsha ba dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod// bsil dang bshang ba sha yi spos ni sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang ska ba'o// 'khrul 'khor n+ya gro d+ha mdab
58a4(rgyud): dur khrod ro yi ras dang gro ga'i mdab dang arka'i mdab ma la nga / shi rI laN+Da sA li btags pa dag dang dur khrod sar gnas srol ba khrag dang dug dang ni// kha che tsan+dan dmar dang 'bras bu
58a5(rgyud): gsum gyi khu ba yung bab blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste// dur ba bsil rus mjug sgro gser dang seng ldeng las skyes bi la ba skyes dang arka smyug gu'o// kham por dpal ldan thod par
58a6(rgyud): mngar gsum khrag dang spra tshil gong bu so phag dag gi dbus su ni// brlan dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dag dang ro khang sa gzhi me yis gdung dang sa dag la// 'khrul 'khor bzhag par bya bar
58a7(rgyud): 'gyur te dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis sngags pa yis ni rig par bya// zla ba glang chen yi dgas rnga mo ri dgas rta dang phyugs dang ru sbal lus la rim pas so// dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyog
58a8(rgyud): kun du gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par bsreg bya ste// phyi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dag la phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su
58b1(rgyud): gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs// de nas bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje gsum gyis sa
58b2(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rab gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha' ru ste// tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' rus gzhi'i gnas las na mkha' dag la rdo rje brtsegs pa'o// dbus su/ 
58b3(rgyud): chu skyes nyi ma'i khru ste lte ba gdan dang bcas pa dag kyang dus kyi khrur 'gyur ro// de yi steng du bdag nyid nyes pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// sa yi phyogs/ 
58b4(rgyud): rnams su 'dir dang po rdo rje gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams dal gtor ma sbyin bya ste// phyi nas rdo rje bzhi yis phye/ dgas dang phyogs bral du gnas bdud kyi tshogs ni nges par
58b5(rgyud): bsreg par bya// sa yi lha mo spyan drangs chu dang bcas pa'i me tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon rab tu sbyin/ de la gsol ba btab ste phyi nas sa yi gnas la dag pa
58b6(rgyud): dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod// rgyal bas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud ni bcom pa dag lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya zhing lha mchog gis btung ba zhes cig
58b7(rgyud): bzhes cig bdag gi mchod yon no// ji ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi sde ni stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa// de bzhin bdag gis kyang ni slob ma rnams la dbang
58b8(rgyud): bskur slad du bdud rnams nyams pa dag tu bya// gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnam bral btsun mo dang bcas pa// de dag rnams kyi mchog
59a1(rgyud): gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol// de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab/ 
59a2(rgyud): phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// zug rngu sol ba dang bcas ra ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na// gnas
59a3(rgyud): de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yis phyir na sbyang bar bya// sa la rin chen dung dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste// khang bzang
59a4(rgyud): don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod la sogs slad du'o// rdzogs pa dag la sa ni sbyang dang ga/ zung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu/ 
59a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la ji la ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid// dbang la sogs pa nya la mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag
59a6(rgyud): ngag la yang // de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min// dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la
59a7(rgyud): rab tu gnas par 'gyur// srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang
59a8(rgyud): mtha' dag shes nas ni// bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur// slob ma'i mgo bo snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i
59b1(rgyud): pad+mar ni// rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis srang byas shing // de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i
59b2(rgyud): dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid// dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin
59b3(rgyud): du mnyam par bkod pa ru sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag/ khru tshang gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni// thig skud rdo rje rdul chen lha dang gshin rje chung bdag
59b4(rgyud): du sta byang du rdo rje dril bu dag/ bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang da ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms
59b5(rgyud): dgongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo // gal te rdul mo/ na rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khoradag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang // mtshan ma ngan pa de
59b6(rgyud): ngag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyis bzlas pa rab tu bya// slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya// shes rab thabs kyi yan
59b7(rgyud): lag dbus su yongs 'joms su 'gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya// sa la g.yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin// g.yul du sde ni nyams
59b8(rgyud): par 'gyur te sa bzhi dag tu mtshan mo'i thab mo la ni bsnun pa'o// de phyir g.yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya// a sogs ka sogs / 
60a1(rgyud): ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar bla nyi me steng du// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g.yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing // shes/ 
60a2(rgyud): rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i pad+ma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul chen dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya// thig ni ro dang dgu
60a3(rgyud): bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya// sor byed brjod pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// snying po las ni phyi
60a4(rgyud): rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor che dan po sgo yi mtshams// ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya// gtso
60a5(rgyud): bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni// nyi ma'i re mig ngag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar
60a6(rgyud): 'gyur// bzhi yos sangs rgyas la sogs pad+mar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang // lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur// gnas
60a7(rgyud): de nas 'dir ji srid re kha'i bar du nyi mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te// phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dri la sogs pa rnams kyi zla nyi pad+ma nyid// phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis
60a8(rgyud): re khA gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang // de bzhin lo dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed// de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang
60b1(rgyud): bzhin snam bu dang ni do sha la sa ru 'gyur// sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur// thig phyed steng du do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar ni bA
60b2(rgyud): lIr yang rab tu 'gyur// re mig drug gi rta babs 'og tu nor gyi pad+ma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam bu'o// de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re khA lnga yi bar du'o// 
60b3(rgyud): phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i pad+ma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i mdab ldan nyi mo'i re mig dag gis bya// snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang // ra ba sogs
60b4(rgyud): dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni ba rgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya// de dag rnams kyi tho dag mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba
60b5(rgyud): yang // de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu
60b6(rgyud): 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni// nyi ma dag gis sgro yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang // rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs
60b7(rgyud): dang // dbye ba lnga yi 'bru 'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshen dag gis// phyogs kyi cha la chen gyis sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur/ 
60b8(rgyud): ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rims pas so// shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs po dag ste nub tu yang // gser mdog
61a1(rgyud): byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so// dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i rnam bu dang ni do shal dag gis// pad+ma zla nyi'i kha/ 
61a2(rgyud): dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ljang ku dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur// dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba
61a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yi// dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du// zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed pad ma
61a4(rgyud): dkar po'i steng du yang // chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gis gdan du 'gyur/ chu skyes dkar po'i lte ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed
61a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te phyogs su'o// phyi rol du ni gtso bo'i pad+ma'i da khang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar/ ka ba ser po bA ku lI ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs
61a6(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs so// dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi pad+ma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu// phyogs kyi char ni pad+ma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis pad+ma dkar
61a7(rgyud): po zur du yang // zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i mdab ldan no// mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha// 
61a8(rgyud): bar du gnas// ka ba'i 'og gi sgo'i mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur// dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur dus yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi
61b1(rgyud): dag go mi yi dbang // phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dgas dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur// g.yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rdza
61b2(rgyud): che dang byang chub shing // dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang ba gyur pa dang // do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo
61b3(rgyud): yi dbus su'o// 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol du// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang
61b4(rgyud): 'gyur// sgom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re khA ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed// chad pa das 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong
61b5(rgyud): rdal de bzhin nyid du skyong // mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sdug sa pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dang / sa grub med// rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de
61b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya// gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur// dkyil 'khor dag la
61b7(rgyud): dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la ni// de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o// do
61b8(rgyud): shal byed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la pad+ma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya// nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang // rab
62a1(rgyud): rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang mu skyes re khA nyis 'gyur ro// snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste/ 
62a2(rgyud): do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni nas gcig sa chu sreg za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o// dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la// sgo nas
62a3(rgyud): tsartsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur// de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i ri mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur// de yi/ 
62a4(rgyud): phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu sreg za rlung rnams pa lta bar bya// gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyu dar gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya/ 
62a5(rgyud): de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag/ gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste// re mig drug drug dag gi sa rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang ni sa 'og bdun po nyid/ 
62a6(rgyud): de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang de bzhin rang gi lus dag la ni sbyang bar bya// gnyis dang chu gter gcig dang chu gter gcig nyi dus ro rtse mo can gnyis dus phyed dus phyed dang // dus dang/ 
62a7(rgyud): dus ni rab phye dag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi cha rnams rim pa yis// snying por lte ba rtsibs sam pad+ma'i mdab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba dang // pad+ma rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur te sa dag
62a8(rgyud): dang ni de nas sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs dang / ka ba ra ba kha khyer dag dang slar yang de nas snam bu dang ni do shal sa ngag dang / me long sa yi snam bur 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams
62b1(rgyud): kyis/ phyi rol du ni sgo sogs thams cad nyis 'gyur du 'gyur phyi rol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro// phyi rol du ni pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni nyin byed dag gis so// 
62b2(rgyud): yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba nyi ma dag gi gdan steng du// a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa dag dang srid gsum bskyed par byed pa'i yum ni bzhag par bya// stong
62b3(rgyud): pa a yig rnam par bcad pa dbyangs dang bral ba mchog las sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// yang dag 'byung ba sngags kyi skye gnas mchog gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje dag ni bzhi pa'o// rgyal
62b4(rgyud): baba'i bdag po'i pad+ma sna tshogs mdog la zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du hUM yig ste// phyogs mdab rnams la a sogs stong pa phyogs bral mdab ma la yang ha sogs stong pa rnam pa
62b5(rgyud): babazhi// dbang ldan bden bral zur dang rtse mo can dang rlung du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang chags pa ste// hI yig la so gas bum pa rnams kyi bcu ru 'gyur te haM haHzhes pa dag gi
62b6(rgyud): mtha' 'dir ro// shar gyi chu skyes steng du i yig rtse mo can du pad+ma la gnas I yig ring po nyid// gshin rje lce min du ni ra yig dag ste nor sbyin 'phrog byed du gnas thung ring u yig dag/ chu dang
62b7(rgyud): rlung gi zur dag du yang pad+ma la gnas thung ngu ring po dag gi laM yig ste// nag po dmar po dag dang dkar po gser mchog dang mtshungs zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par bya// shar gyi sgo yi
62b8(rgyud): lha dang me yi pad+ma la gnas thung dang ring ba dag ni de bzhin nyid// de bzhin ar yig zung ni gshin rje lha min dag tu gnas te nub tu al yi go zung dag go// o oM gnod sbyin drag po ru ste lha/ 
63a1(rgyud): chug shin rje gnod sbyin dang bcas sgro yi byang du ni// oM aHsogs te rim pa yis ni slar yang ya ra wal lha sogs sgo yi pad+ma la'o// shar dang byang gi sgor ni
63a2(rgyud): bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan du 'gyur ba ste// lho dang nub tu pad+mar nyi ma dag ni gnyis pa dag gi gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis pad+ma/ 
63a3(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma dag kyang gdan du 'gyur// g.yas dang rgyab du nyi mar 'gyur te lha yi bdag po nor sbyin du yang zla ba'i gdan du 'gyur// thig le'i rnam pa dag gis rnam phye nges par pad+ma la gnas ka sogs
63a4(rgyud): sde yi yi ge yang // rtsa ba sdong bu mdab ma dang ni ge sar lte ba dag la rim pas yongs su bkod pa ste// ka sogs nam mkha'i mtha' ni ka kha ga g+ha nga zhes thung ngu ring po rang gi sa la'o/ 
63a5(rgyud): thig le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyin byed du 'gyur gdan yang lte bdag gi steng du'o// sde drug thung dang ring rnams rang bzhi na yon tan dbang gi kha khyer dag la ka ba'i ngos su ni// dri la
63a6(rgyud): sogs rnams rim pas rang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi cha nas rang gi phyogs rnams su// phyi rol du ni thig le la sogs kyis phye sum 'gyur nyi mas kha khyer dag la de bzhin nyid// 'dod ma thams
63a7(rgyud): cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye bas so// thung dang ring ba'i ha yig dag ni lha dang nor sbyin nub dang lho ru tsartsi ka sogs kyi// khyab 'jug ma sogs dag gi
63a8(rgyud): k+Sha yig a sogs kyis phyi me dang 'phrog byed rlung dang lha min du// hi la sogs dang k+Shi la sogs pa grangs brgyad pad+ma'i mdab ma la gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogs su// ya sogs thung dang ring ba drug
63b1(rgyud): rnams lnga yi pad mdab me yi pad+ma dag la rim pa yis// de bzhin gshin rje lnga min pad+ma'i mdab mar thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye bsar sogs te// gnod sbyin drag por wa la sogs dang chu gter dang bcas/ 
63b2(rgyud): rlung gi pad mad ba rnams la la la sogs// shar gyi sgo yi lho dag du yang pad+ma'i mdab ma la gnas dbyangs kyis phye ba tsa yoM sde// thung ngu lha min gyi ste ring po rnams kyang me yi zur na gnas pa rlung gi
63b3(rgyud): yin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshin rjer me dang ro yi gdong pa dag gi Ta sde thung dang ring po'i rab dbye yis// g.yon dang dbang ldan du yang ba sngar 'gyur te chu gter dang ni ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kyi'o// 
63b4(rgyud): brgya byin dang ni tshangs pa dag gi chur bcas rlung du thung ngu ring po ta yi sde pa'o// shar gyi sgo yi byang du pad+ma'i mdab ma/ dar lha min dag yi ka sde thung ngur 'gyur ba ste// lho ru gshin
63b5(rgyud): rje dag gi ring por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po byang dag dang ni nub tu yang // phyugs kyi bdag po dzaM b+ha lo yi thung dang ring ba sa ster 'gyur ba nyid do rgyal po skye// lha min la sogs rnams
63b6(rgyud): kyi rang gi sa bon du 'gyur mdab ma la ni rang rang sde mtha' dbus// mdab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la yang nyin zhag dbang gis rang rang sde pa dag gi yi ge rnams// yA rA wA lA haM haHdrug kyang nges par
63b7(rgyud): shing rta dag la steng dang rtsa ba lha sogs su// sgo las g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs can rnams kyi ya sogs la gnas ha yig dag tu rab tu 'gyur// sde drug brtsegs pa'i gzugs dang slar
63b8(rgyud): yang ha ya ra wa la dang kA sogs ldan pa'i ya sogs ni// phyogs kyi 'khor lor ka sogs sde rnams g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas tsa sogs gzhan la lugs 'thun te// shar dang gshin
64a1(rgyud): rje byang dang chu dang me dang lha min dang ni dbang ldan rlung gi zur du'o// aM aHzla ba nyi ma dag gi dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so// hUM gi yi ge
64a2(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo dang ni de bzhin aHyig bum pa'i sa bon dag tu 'gyur// oM yig rnga bo che yir 'gyur te chu ru ho yang byang chub shing dag gir ni rab tu 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar dbyangs
64a3(rgyud): ldan rnams ni rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye bar 'gyur// phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis 'gyur// thob tu
64a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngog sa pa rnams spyan drang ba dang // dpal ldan sa la bas dang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdad ni gzhom pa dag
64a5(rgyud): kyang ngo // sgo rnams srung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag po'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya// dang la ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min
64a6(rgyud): rlung dbang zur du rim pas so// slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas// slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin
64a7(rgyud): sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya// zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur// byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i so la
64a8(rgyud): rtsa ba'i pad+ma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro// zabs ni pad+ma'i tshad du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i pad+ma mtshan mar bcas pa'o// pad+ma phyed la pad+ma'i phyi ru bum pa dang bcas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi
64b1(rgyud): mtshan mar 'gyur// de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dag gi rgya yi cha// steng du rdo rje phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dngangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// 
64b2(rgyud): phyi rol 'og tu pad+ma'i mdab ma rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya// de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par re khA gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur// slob dpon
64b3(rgyud): dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i pad+ma dag las nyis 'gyur ro// g.yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g.yas su 'gyur/ 
64b4(rgyud): kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i/ yang nam mkha' yi pad+ma yum gyi'o// zhal dang gas/ dang ba dag kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi/ 
64b5(rgyud): dang lus la'o// thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas srung ba byas na sa ni// dpal ldan rdo rje ngag gis bsang ba sogs dang tshur
64b6(rgyud): bcas me tog rnams kyis me la mchod yon nyid// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par byas te rang snying pad+mar zla ba'i steng du bsgoms nas so// zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag
64b7(rgyud): gi pad+ma g.yon na ril ba chu skyes dag dang ni// g.yas na dbyug pa bgrang phreng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser meg ldan gos dang bcas pa ste// me yi snying khar zla ba'i steng du dri med 'phro byed
64b8(rgyud): dza las lcags kyu nges par bsgom par bya// de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod// de ltar thab la yang ni yang dag 'gyur
65a1(rgyud): te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo // mchog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bo yis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin bsreg dag ni rab tu bya// gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kya
65a2(rgyud): mnga' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dur bA mar dang 'o ma yis// skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g.yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku// slob dpon las kyi rdo rje
65a3(rgyud): can gyis slar yang me la bsreg blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya// rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang // dri la sogs
65a4(rgyud): dang spos dag phul nas rang snying pad+mar ye shes me ni gshe// gas su gsol bar bya// phyi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis
65a5(rgyud): nges par sbyin// dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slad du'o// rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags
65a6(rgyud): kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na// zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag bzhag par bya// slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje pad+ma las skyes rab bgrod
65a7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dag gis// spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o// lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad bdag gi ming ni sngon du oM/ 
65a8(rgyud): zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste// sbyin sreg la ni swA hA'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag la na maH'i mtha'// dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu la sogs rim pas yongs su bkod/ 
65b1(rgyud): rnams spyan dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang i dgr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ar+g+ha ka me zhes par 'gyur// rgyas pa la ni swA hA'i mtha'i sngags su 'gyur te mi bdag dang
65b2(rgyud): la 'di na maH'i mtha'// dgug pa la ni bau ShaT mtha' ru 'gyur te ba Sha Ta mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid du ni// hUM yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis phaT
65b3(rgyud): mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o// dkar dang dmar dang nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa dag ste las kyi dbye ba dag gis sngags// shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje dag ni
65b4(rgyud): sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang // lho ru gsu rang gi rdo rje nub du yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs
65b5(rgyud): kyi dbang gis sa ya cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur// rlung / me chu dang sa ye lha rnams dag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi/ bdag i ri u li'o// oM AHhUM ni phyag rgya gsum ste sA
65b6(rgyud): hA'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga// hUM AHoM ho rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur// a sogs dang bcas haM yig drug ste
65b7(rgyud): rkang na maHsogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur// phrem gi yi ge sna tshogs yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o// hUM yig ye shes sa bon
65b8(rgyud): snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste// hUM yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo // lha dang lha mo rnams kyi phreng ba'i sngag/ 
66a1(rgyud): ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis// rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so// rin chen gas
66a2(rgyud): zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba ngan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis// rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam
66a3(rgyud): bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad du dbul bar bya// dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag
66a4(rgyud): nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma// di ring nyid nas mi bzad 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag da ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi// khyed kyi
66a5(rgyud): zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lu sa ngag sems ni dag pas so// zhes pa gsar bcas me tog dag gis maN+Dal byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba
66a6(rgyud): gdab par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag kyang spyi bos gzung bar bgyi// rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// ral gri
66a7(rgyud): la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi// sems can rnams ni thor pa'i slad du rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ 
66a8(rgyud): slob ma khrus byas dri yis rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te// dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gi mngon par bsngags parab sbyin bya/ lce la'ang
66b1(rgyud): bdud rtsings par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o// sngags ni hUM gi yi ge gcig ste a ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o// khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na
66b2(rgyud): mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing // g.yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing ba dag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de// bzhad dang hUM gi
66b3(rgyud): yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed// ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon+tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang zhi ba'o// sku phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan pa ra
66b4(rgyud): bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste// gsung po dbas pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur// thugs phebs pas ni gzhan
66b5(rgyud): gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad she sa par 'gyur// ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur/ 
66b6(rgyud): sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur// mi phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// stong
66b7(rgyud): pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa stengs du na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya// dbab
66b8(rgyud): pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyis sgom pa'i stobs dang ni// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig dag gi tshe// sangs rgyas
67a1(rgyud): rosang byed bas bdud 'i da 'a las kyil 'kho gu zhig dun mchog gi sula'o// rang byin rlabs pas dman pa rnams mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la ngos sa/ 
67a2(rgyud): yod pa min// phebs pa btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying kha spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya// lus
67a3(rgyud): la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzab don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod pa dag la bgrod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par bya// 'cha dang / 
67a4(rgyud): mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chadagi btung ba de bzhin nyid// 'khor bar rdo rje'i nags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag go
67a5(rgyud): gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ma chan gyis rab sbyin bya// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka'/ 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyod kyis kyang ni
67a6(rgyud): bskyang bar bya// tsho lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po la min dbang po'i chos// ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o// grogs po rje bo
67a7(rgyud): rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang // dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga// dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon
67a8(rgyud): par bsngags te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya// dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor// gang gi gnas su me tog bzang
67b1(rgyud): bo lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges// phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal
67b2(rgyud): po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum dag gis lha mo rnams kyi khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma
67b3(rgyud): rnams kyi dar dbyangs nyid// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya// khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos
67b4(rgyud): rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin// rdo rje dril bu rab btu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni ba stan par bya// nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag la ni srog gcod bya
67b5(rgyud): ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig/ rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid la yang / gzhan gyi bud med dbrog/ chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams
67b6(rgyud): dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor la ni bsten par bya// gdol pa mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yi pad+mar smang mi bya// sems can don gyi slad du nor dang
67b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya// rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs// chu ni sgrol ma la sogs
67b8(rgyud): lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ khro bo'i phyag brgya go cha byas pa sngags 'dis
68a1(rgyud): dbab par bya'o// oM bi sh+ya krong+ga hUM hUM a dz+wa la/ ma la a ku la/ b+hI Sha Na badz+ras/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang ltung bar bya ba rnams nus pa
68a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM b+ha shrI sing ha d+ha dza d+hi ri hrIH khro bo'i mdun du'o// oM hUM b+haM/ ma hA pad+ma ba ti d+ha nur ban d+ha ri
68a3(rgyud): hUM/ rgyab tu'o// oM hUM bi hU ti/ a~M ku she d+hA ri Ni hU~M dza/ lho ru'o// hUM bu su ra hA ri Ni tsin+tA ma Ni d+ha dza d+ha ra Ni sU/ g.yo na dur// oM shrI ba ra ha ri Ni buSh+pa ha re hU~M/ me tog dbang ldan gyi gra ru'o// oM shrI raH
68a4(rgyud): sha ri d+hu pa haste hUM/ spos me'i gra ru'o// oM shri b+hA Shi Ni gdan d+ha ha ste hUM/ dri bden bral du'o// oM shrI dza gad pA li ni A ra dI pa te hUM/ mar me rlung du'o// de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag
68a5(rgyud): rgya'i cho ga rgyas par bshang ba/ khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo
68a6(rgyud): brkyang ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid skyed pa'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang ba nas
68a7(rgyud): dkyil ba ni/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo mnyam par byas te/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun mkhyud de/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spos kyi
68a8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa so sor brkyang ste/ dpung pa'i rtakha gnyis su bzhag pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// 'byung po
68b1(rgyud): 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM shrI dza
68b2(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o// oM hUM dzaHrgyal ba'i'o// oM hrI dzaHrdzogs byed kyi'o// oM sU dzaHdur khrod kyi bdag po'i'o// oM ruM dzaHrigs sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o// oM hrIHhUM dzaH'byung po'i dbang gi'o// 
68b3(rgyud): oM oM dzaHmngag gzhug mchog gi'o// 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste/ sngon du 'bum bzlas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zla
68b4(rgyud): banya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ji ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras chan dkar po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / 'o ma dang / sha rnams kyis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin
68b5(rgyud): nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo // gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la mchi'o// 'ongs na sgo ba don med par mi byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis
68b6(rgyud): shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las byed la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dgra thams cad char gcod par byed do// zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas stor shing rgyab tu zhon na/ lha'i
68b7(rgyud): 'dzig/ na du yang khyer pa skyed do// brgya sbyi pa khyer bar byed ci nal dun 'o// des rgyal ba'i nub pa'i byas pa sha nga/ mtshan ma snyen byed ma'i mdun song / 
68b8(rgyud): khrag brgyadang brgyad bzlas na nyim bdun pa nyi ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o// rjes gning rdzogs pa'i byang chub nga mim srang nga'i 'jigs 'jom sa dus kyi la bar ma rjes su log po ste/ sdig pa'i dris
69a1(rgyud): 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin bya/ dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dpung gis sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// bum pa gsang
69a2(rgyud): bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ye shes ngag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du
69a3(rgyud): 'gyur// gal te g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo// rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o// 
69a4(rgyud): bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gi sa gong ma la ni dag pa med// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba gang zhig/ dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste// / 
69a5(rgyud): rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan bla ma'i thug/ sa dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin
69a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o// byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang
69a7(rgyud): mnga' ru 'gyur// drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ri bo dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin las so// phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang // sgyu yi byams
69a8(rgyud): pa dang ni ming sogs dral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o// dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan// bud med thams cad la smod/ 
69b1(rgyud): nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la'o// klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas// sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal
69b2(rgyud): bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus bya ste// klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcing ste nor mdab pad+mar bzhi yis dar dbyangs bcing bar bya// phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma
69b3(rgyud): dang bral re khA lnga po spangs// dang po chu lha ni dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong dang ni gong ma'i byed pa la yang gnas brtan zhes par 'gyur// 
69b4(rgyud): ba ste// phyag rgya dar dbyangs cod pan dag dang rdo rje mchod phyir thog/ sa ni bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya// de dag slob dpon slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par dag pa nyid
69b5(rgyud): steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag du yang ri mo ga/ sum ni kun nas so// de rnams zur du nor bu gser gyi bum par chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i kha rnams so// dung
69b6(rgyud): sogs gser gyi snod dang yang na dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi chu ni bsgrub par bya// snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya// me tog sogs dang dri yi
69b7(rgyud): til mar nyi ma me yis smin pa dag gis lha la byug par bya// phye ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma chu yis bkru bar bya// don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang 'bras
69b8(rgyud): bu mchog gis 'di la nges par bya bas nas ni// de yi gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g.yogs pa'o// dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mthar ni mnyam pa'i sa
70a1(rgyud): yi gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re khA lA byas te// dbus su pad+ma mdab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis rgyan pa'o// de yi dbus su bzhag par bya ba
70a2(rgyud): zhal gyi pad+ma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha dang lha mo 'am// mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs bsngags pa'o// rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung
70a3(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu byas nas ni// phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas a li ka li'i
70a4(rgyud): rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams// snying mgrin nga lte ba gsang ba mgo dang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya// de ltar nges pa nyid du bsgom par
70a5(rgyud): bya ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams dag gi lus la yang // khro ba'i rgyal po dag gis srid med sring mnyam ye shes/ sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni// bcing dang
70a6(rgyud): mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyi zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya// a sogs ka sogs dag
70a7(rgyud): las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yon tan la gnas sa bon gang // rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus su zla nyi kha sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par// mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i sum
70a8(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yan lag dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te// yi ge rnams kyis phye ba de nyid rab gsal mdab ma mdab mar glegs bam rnams la bsgom par bya// mchod rten snying por dpal
70b1(rgyud): ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad+ma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid// bgrang phreng la ni hUM gi yi ge nor bu yongs su bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams// dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bskur
70b2(rgyud): ba'i bcu rnams dag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la// de dag kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor gyi dpe byad rnams ni stong g.yogs la// ka sogs sde ba dbyangs dang bcas
70b3(rgyud): mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni pus mkhyud dag la bsgom par bya// haM haHdpal ldan tshwa la ste aM aHzhes pa gzung ni mgul rgyan ska rags dag la'o// de bzhin du yang a yig zung ni gdub bu dag
70b4(rgyud): la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha hA yang // mtha' dag lus dal gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom par bya// rang lus ye shes rnam par dag las rdorje
70b5(rgyud): gsum dang bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun/ lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rang rang sa bon dag gi rim pas dgod par bya// sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas pa
70b6(rgyud): 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs sogs la'o// nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis rang gi lus las sa bon gzhug par bya// 'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang
70b7(rgyud): sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur// phyi nas dri dang spos dang shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni// gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag
70b8(rgyud): gis lha la mchod par bya// de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang mchog gi ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin// khron pa rdzing dang mtshe'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal
71a1(rgyud): bo nor rnams dgod par bya// chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya// sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lnga dag
71a2(rgyud): po phyag na zhags pa bsgom par bya// skyed mos tshal du shing gcig dpag bsam ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur nas so// cod pan dar dbyangs dag dang do shal gdub bu dang
71a3(rgyud): ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa// slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so// sbyin bdag gis ni bsod nams slad du mtha' dag tshogs kyi
71a4(rgyud): rigs la gzhan don du gnyer bya ste// bsod nams 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla maud byang chub thob par shog/ ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni
71a5(rgyud): gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par bya// de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya// lo ni nyi shu yan chad
71a6(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha// dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni sgom pa'i don du'o// dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por
71a7(rgyud): reg pa gang yin bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do// gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur// shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs
71a8(rgyud): kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas nas ni// rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs
71b1(rgyud): shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes pa'i bu mo ni// khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas// sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru
71b2(rgyud): 'phang ba byas nas ni// phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o// skrag dang rnam par 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang ldan dang
71b3(rgyud): bu skyes ma// khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min// shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mi yi dbang // sngar/ 
71b4(rgyud): brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phywa dag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya// 'dod pa bskyod par bye/ dad pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid du 'gyur/ 
71b5(rgyud): gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar bya/ sa nas thig le bzang po 'dzag/ o zlas bkug pa mtsho/ ga gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum
71b6(rgyud): gyi mthar// blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis so// 'dod pa dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la'o// 
71b7(rgyud): byi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la lte slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la// 'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma la// oT+Ta thig le gsum gyi mtha'
71b8(rgyud): ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed// 'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste// gang ba dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dag
72a1(rgyud): pa nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur// 'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o// o T+Ta dang ni nA da dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig
72a2(rgyud): skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur// sems kyi bsam pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis sring mo'o// rdo rje zhugs pas bu mo byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo
72a3(rgyud): dag ni de bzhin nyid// thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags nyams las so// 'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste sa chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i
72a4(rgyud): dngos rnams so// chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le me lhung gsum pa'o// 'di dag rnal 'byor gsum ra gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag
72a5(rgyud): rgya ste// chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde// 'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu/ 
72a6(rgyud): dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o// shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum bskyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo'o// rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams ste phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsartsi kA sogs/ 
72a7(rgyud): yang tsha mo// 'khor lo la gnas dus kun du ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// / 
72a8(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po'o// spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang tsha rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so// 'khor
72b1(rgyud): lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab 'ga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams ngag gis bsten par bya// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bungad
72b2(rgyud): meng zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag bsod nams ngag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed na// sa gzhi sbyin dang
72b3(rgyud): glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang // bsod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o// sgrol ma rmangs mo rnam
72b4(rgyud): pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma // sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyi ngas skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba
72b5(rgyud): mkhar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi/ rdo rje ma// yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur/ ma~M yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni// phreng ba mkhan
72b6(rgyud): / du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thags mkhan ma// rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags// tsA mur+t+ti ni sha 'tshong mar
72b7(rgyud): 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma// phag mo khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshem bu ma// tshangs ma nya ba mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i
72b8(rgyud): gnas dag du yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur// dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad pa tshes mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gnas so// rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor
73a1(rgyud): 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin bal mkhan mo'o// khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'chir ma rab phye shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o// 'od zer can ni
73a2(rgyud): ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan tsun+d+ra 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan// drag spyan ma ni khron pa
73a3(rgyud): byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o// khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur
73a4(rgyud): mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phag pa mo// lce spyang gdong dam gtum mo dag dang sa yi gzhi yi stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma// bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu gsal
73a5(rgyud): zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma// mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan b+hil+lIr 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i/ gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye
73a6(rgyud): bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te// zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang rtsong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni// rmongs rnams 'ching bar
73a7(rgyud): byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la dngos grub ster// bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim pas so// bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye/ 
73a8(rgyud): ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams// khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbye sa stengs gnas su yi dgas dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad// lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye
73b1(rgyud): ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed do// sa 'og rnams su
73b2(rgyud): gtum mo brgyad ste mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas// yi dgas zhes bya yi dgas 'jig rten du ste la mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ tshangs pa'i yul
73b3(rgyud): sar dpal ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma// rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid// bu mo
73b4(rgyud): rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo// rje'u mo rmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sa ma mig dang lag pa dang bral rnamachu sna ni tshong ma rnams// mtha'/ 
73b5(rgyud): dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par bya ste rgya/ la po slob dpon snying rje dang // bcas pa'i thugs lnga/ na dri ma dag dang rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su
73b6(rgyud): zhon pas so// dang por bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya// rtse mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag
73b7(rgyud): gis chos phyag rgya// po nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcan dang sha dang rul pa'i dri rnams so// 
73b8(rgyud): dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma// dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma ki dang spyan ma yang / 
74a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni seng ge ri dgas rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las// mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor
74a2(rgyud): lo can// yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal shin tu bzang mo'o// cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can// 
74a3(rgyud): ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma// ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma// sbom zhing thung
74a4(rgyud): la yan lag shin tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma// pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig/ dedag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs// seng ge
74a5(rgyud): dag kyang 'brog ni gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can// ri dwags mgyog/ sa 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems
74a6(rgyud): te shin tu 'jigs pa'o// rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o// khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya
74a7(rgyud): yi dri ru 'gyur// glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o// sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang
74a8(rgyud): bzhin no// mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// shin tu dga' bo byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis mchim
74b1(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur// mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur// mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo
74b2(rgyud): rje ma// sha za mo ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje mi yi dbang // gdugs pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg bya rdo rje ma// mdzes ma sems can pan
74b3(rgyud): pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can// lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo// mi mo 'dod la rjes su
74b4(rgyud): chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems dam ste// klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchogs da yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// de bzhin
74b5(rgyud): gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// sa yi steng gi gan sa su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye
74b6(rgyud): bas phye ba'o// chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te// phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs
74b7(rgyud): kyis bskor ba'o// de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur// phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung
74b8(rgyud): pa'i slad du rab tu bya// rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na// shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal
75a1(rgyud): 'byor ldan pa dag ni spros ci dgos// mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa// nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa
75a2(rgyud): phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/ khyi rta ba lang glang po lug dang ra dang ri dgas bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs// ku b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku li ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang
75a3(rgyud): sbal pa ru sbal dung // bse ru stag dang dom dang ne'u le bcas 'bri dang lce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang // 'brog dgon khyi dang seng ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo
75a4(rgyud): skyes// go d+hA byi ba shA li dzA ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzungs mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad// khengs ldan mdab chag/ sa dang ni ne tso khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi
75a5(rgyud): gter// lA ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya tsa Ta ka/ dang ngur pa dang ni ngang pa dang // dpal ldan khrung khrung / khu byug mig dang ra dza ka dang b+ha ga ba tI ti ti ri dang bzhad// chu la
75a6(rgyud): 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya// bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dgas dag dang gtsug phud can dang bya gag b+he dra g+ha ra dang // hor ba ljon shing dag ni gzhan
75a7(rgyud): te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rigs su 'gyur// mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu da mu kha bug gi rkang steng nyal// b+he ru NA dang aM ba ri ka brgyad pa mchog gi mdab
75a8(rgyud): chags su 'gyur mi y-i bdag po kye// sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyis// rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni
75b1(rgyud): mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya// rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur// so dang sgra dang lpags pa la sogs sha
75b2(rgyud): bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dang pad+ma dang // shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo ba sgyu ma chu so dang // bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang sna tshogs lus la gnas
75b3(rgyud): pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang // mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshang ba dang // lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed pa rnams kyi lha
75b4(rgyud): rnams mchod par bya// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang de bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rna/ rnams kyang // sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag
75b5(rgyud): lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang // sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnam sa 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// chu dang mchod yon dri dang / 
75b6(rgyud): spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang // lha ba shes dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yong // khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba
75b7(rgyud): dag dang sha dang mchin pa dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni// sgyu ma lpags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang // rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma mdab ma brgya
75b8(rgyud): pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste// rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos// drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs
76a1(rgyud): mtshan ma'o// de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni ser po dang // khab bam yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu
76a2(rgyud): nya yi rgyu dang rtse gsum ste// dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o// rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs
76a3(rgyud): dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang // chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni// rtog rtse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru
76a4(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur// ba lang ra dang kham por rgyud ldan 'phangs dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthal du 'gyur ba ste/ 8/ rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mda' dang gtsug pud
76a5(rgyud): can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// slar yang dmangs rigs
76a6(rgyud): la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis ut+pa la 'am thong gshol lo// rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dbyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smug gu rin chen phreng ba ni// rje rigs ma/ 
76a7(rgyud): yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i// yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi smre Da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pan nyid dang bgrang dro // bshang ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang
76a8(rgyud): bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur ba ste// rna ba sna dong mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang baspu skra
76b1(rgyud): dang brgyad po yang // sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang lpags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro// 
76b2(rgyud): mi yi dbang // rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshang lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs// lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams
76b3(rgyud): brgyad du 'gyur// sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur// bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa
76b4(rgyud): gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang dab shang lam dag dang b+ha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang du dag/ rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas
76b5(rgyud): su chan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad// sgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu da/ ba rnams// rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la/ 
76b6(rgyud): nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams// dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye bo dag la bzhi// sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa ba sangs spen pa gdeng / 
76b7(rgyud): can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes rlung las skyes pa dag/ brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slor yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog
76b8(rgyud): dang // reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams/ 6/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste// kha dog la
77a1(rgyud): sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams// gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de/ 
77a2(rgyud): bzhin zhing du brjod// tshan do ha ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs// dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang
77a3(rgyud): bar bcas pa ni// yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma// gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+mar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye
77a4(rgyud): ba'i gnas// zhing dang chen do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khyo da sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go// gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa
77a5(rgyud): dag kyang nye ba'i gnas// de ltar zhing la sogs pa tham/ sa cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu
77a6(rgyud): gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags// shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug/ chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa
77a7(rgyud): chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do// yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi
77a8(rgyud): bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams
77b1(rgyud): sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba'am gcer
77b2(rgyud): bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze 'om// thong ba can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang // smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdigs
77b3(rgyud): med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grwa ba nyid 'gyur te// rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te de nyid thob pa mi yi dbang // mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang
77b4(rgyud): slar yang de bzhin ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang // de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gte du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// phyag rgya'i don du ming
77b5(rgyud): gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so// bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no// khru
77b6(rgyud): tshur brla yi steng du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa/ 
77b7(rgyud): sa la reg pa mi bskyed phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyi// g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rgyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir
77b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ g.yon pa skyil krung steng du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi// g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu
78a1(rgyud): tshur bcings pa la// gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni// mdzum mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdub cu/ 
78a2(rgyud): bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang ba'o// lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste// nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo
