78a3(rgyud): las skyes rtse mo lnga pa ni// bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha nyid du'o// 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag
78a4(rgyud): rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o// gang zhig cung zad bzung ba ra bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang // bza' ba btung ba brtson 'gras dang
78a5(rgyud): bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par/ bya// gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya// sa la sogs la dkyil
78a6(rgyud): 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog mtha'/ 
78a7(rgyud): bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi// mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// lag pa dag gi
78a8(rgyud): rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i mdab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang // mdzub mo gnyis
78b1(rgyud): ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o// rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis
78b2(rgyud): ga'i mthil du mthe bo la sogs mtha' dag rnams// lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas// khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mnga' dang
78b3(rgyud): mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur// mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la// dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing
78b4(rgyud): dpal ldan mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyuradar// rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o// khu tshur bcings
78b5(rgyud): shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o// rtsa bar mdzub mo ming / med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni
78b6(rgyud): mdung la ste// thang kar khu tshur dbyug pa la'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang ba dag sta la// steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen lpags pa
78b7(rgyud): ngag la'o// mche ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba byed pa'o// khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur// 
78b8(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o// sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad mdab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la// gzhu la lag pa
79a1(rgyud): gan rgyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o// gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la/ 
79a2(rgyud): rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba pad+ma la// chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro// me long la ni shin tu mnyam
79a3(rgyud): pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur// mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po ram par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o// mgo bo la ni
79a4(rgyud): mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o// cod pan la ni lag pa dag gi/ sa dung gi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur/ 
79a5(rgyud): lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig/ tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la// lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i
79a6(rgyud): rgyan la ste// lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni ske rags la// khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa
79a7(rgyud): rkang gdub la// de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdub bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur// mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang
79a8(rgyud): ba pa rnams kyi// dri ba rnams dang gdangs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o// 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnam/ 
79b1(rgyud): kyi rigs su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs te tshigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams ngag gi'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi/ 
79b2(rgyud): phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi// khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rwa can rnams kyi'o// mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe chung phan tshun bcings
79b3(rgyud): shing bshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste// sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub
79b4(rgyud): mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan la 'og tu sbyar byas pa/ 8 / 'bar ba dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o// mdzub mo bstan na
79b5(rgyud): legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyu/ ra te rnal 'byor pa la yang // gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings
79b6(rgyud): pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur// ser mo'i se gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces par brjod par 'gyur ba ste// mtho bong dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod
79b7(rgyud): ni tshim par byed pa'o// ser mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang bas skal bzang leg par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang // g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen
79b8(rgyud): gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed// skye gnas dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs pas kyang // sor mo sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang
80a1(rgyud): pas dam tshig brjod par byed pa yin// mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'khrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa brjod par byed// mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang
80a2(rgyud): ni snying kha kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang pa sa la rdebs na nga yis bza' bar bya// lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so la
80a3(rgyud): bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do// lag pa'i rgyab kyis song cig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug gcig 'dug gcig go/ byin pa brla la nyed na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal
80a4(rgyud): so nges par brjod par byed// rkang pa rab tu skyong bas gnyi dang/ nga pus mo zung dag skyong ba bdag la bdag la shin tu dag da' bgyis// yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa
80a5(rgyud): gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o// phan tshun lag pa ba cings pas bdag gi khyim du di ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dang ga ni brjod par byed// mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang
80a6(rgyud): dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya// rkang pa la ni 'khrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang // mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de ring
80a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o// skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya ba brjod par byed// so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis di ring bza' bar bya/ 
80a8(rgyud): lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'ongs par brjod par byed// mchu la so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi sgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya// sgeg pa'i sbyor ba
80b1(rgyud): yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o// klu yi sbyor ba yis ni klu ste mchog gi
80b2(rgyud): yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri// phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos// mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa dang ni
80b3(rgyud): snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste// gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa/ 
80b4(rgyud): yis rig par bya// gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams// pho nya mo ni phreng la blta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal pa bzang
80b5(rgyud): la brjod par byed// mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su de/ sa par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par/ 'gyur// steng du blta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du
80b6(rgyud): gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig/ yon por lta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' ba brjod par byed// zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grogs po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas
80b7(rgyud): 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// skra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so// mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas
80b8(rgyud): yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed// mchu la lta bas skal ba bzang ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying khar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag bzung la ltan bdag ni rab tu
81a1(rgyud): gtum mor brjod phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la ldan srin mo'o// rgyab tu ldan lag 'gro ma ste lte bar lta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni
81a2(rgyud): dam tshig can// gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa brla la blta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka'// pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa nges par brjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul
81a3(rgyud): sbyin pa mo// rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par lta na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang // sor mo kun gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum// po/ 
81a4(rgyud): nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus ngag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste// las kyi dbang / 
81a5(rgyud): bo rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang // khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan
81a6(rgyud): mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su 'gro// sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu
81a7(rgyud): yis// bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rje dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi// bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam
81a8(rgyud): par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su btang bar bya// rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya// de bzhin
81b1(rgyud): du ba la sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste// bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams
81b2(rgyud): la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya// dbang gi mthar ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stod kor gos zung dag/ dpal ldan
81b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag/ sgo na gnas pa rnam la rab sprin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar ni
81b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste// 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya/ 
81b5(rgyud): tI bu la dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag/ ni gzhon nu ma rnams la// byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod pa
81b6(rgyud): mchod byas te// slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol// dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas
81b7(rgyud): 'ching ba dang // chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang // dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ljang dang don nyams
81b8(rgyud): ba/ gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las byung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las// mngon par dbang
82a1(rgyud): bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / rgyal ba bskyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang // shes
82a2(rgyud): rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob// slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni
82a3(rgyud): bdag zhu'o// zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs// zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni
82a4(rgyud): sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyal ra ba'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs// zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma sreg pa'i dkyil 'khor dag
82a5(rgyud): la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa// rol pas mnan pa'i/ srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu/ de ni bsgrub par bya// bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba
82a6(rgyud): mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang // grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa// gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub
82a7(rgyud): par bya'o mi yi bdag po ste// nges par 'jadzam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod srung ba byas nas ni// dang por snying khar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyag
82a8(rgyud): bcur bsgom par bya// kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po gsags pa dag ni
82b1(rgyud): bshags byas te// sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i chog/ 
82b2(rgyud): kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pa rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'brog la yang byang
82b3(rgyud): chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dor ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do// stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro da mtha' dag
82b4(rgyud): 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman// de las sangs rgya ngas byang chub med cing gzhan pa na snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste// mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang
82b5(rgyud): mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dpag med yon/ tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya// chu yis me ni rnam par
82b6(rgyud): nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya// phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs// rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la
82b7(rgyud): ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyi sa la bzhag par bya// stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me
82b8(rgyud): rnams ni// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste/ oM yog ye shes las
83a1(rgyud): skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan// phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor gyi pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman// phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni
83a2(rgyud): nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang // snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu
83a3(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi// zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis// 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'phro dus/ 
83a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal nga ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal// mgrin pa da gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba
83a5(rgyud): phyed ni gtsigs pa'o// dpal ldan oM yig las skyes rgya/ la ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni// drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol
83a6(rgyud): pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs// g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma
83a7(rgyud): dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog/ phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar g.yas pa dang ni g.yon du yang // g.yas dang g.yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i
83a8(rgyud): lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so// phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni
83b1(rgyud): kha dog lnga rnams 'gro// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang // rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me/ 
83b2(rgyud): yi mngara'// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid// mdung dang dbyug pa dag snga rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o// dril bu phub dang khan
83b3(rgyud): gni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang // gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen pad+ma mun rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang // tshangs pa'i mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong lde
83b4(rgyud): gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o// bdud dang drag po de'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman dpa dag tu byed// gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag
83b5(rgyud): gi pad+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te// g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma rung nga bgrang phreng rim pas so// g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni
83b6(rgyud): mdab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid// g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o// mdab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad
83b7(rgyud): rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan// de dag rnams las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so// dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du
83b8(rgyud): chos kyi dung dang gaN+DI dang // de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur// nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag/ 
84a1(rgyud): na bsil ba'i snod// dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin// g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog phreng / 
84a2(rgyud): ba rim pas so// dmar mo'i g.yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdub bu rnams te phyag g.yon na// gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub po// 
84a3(rgyud): ser mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas Da ma ru ni rim pas te// g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i mkhar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo // 'o ma chu dang sman dang
84a4(rgyud): chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi// phyog das kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag/ zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo
84a5(rgyud): rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad// lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'a/ dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang
84a6(rgyud): na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i steng // mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs// shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi ni g.yas dang g.yas
84a7(rgyud): min pad+ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so// rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni sha
84a8(rgyud): du'o// shes rab phang par thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o// gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa dag gis phan tshun 'khyud// mtshan ma
84b1(rgyud): gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman// shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs// nag po
84b2(rgyud): rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste// g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur// mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu
84b3(rgyud): sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ni g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis// gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor
84b4(rgyud): lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te// g.yon du dadapal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang dbacas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar
84b5(rgyud): ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum ste/ g.yon na pad+ma dkar po mdab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag da/ nga me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo // ljang ku rnams kyi g.yas su
84b6(rgyud): rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste// g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do// lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan
84b7(rgyud): dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya// gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i
84b8(rgyud): bdag po'i pad+ma dag la res 'ga' ni// dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur// rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal
85a1(rgyud): 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya// dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur// phyi rol du ni brgyad pa brgyad
85a2(rgyud): kyis pad+ma mdab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni// tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma// shar gyi pad+mar tsartsi ka ste mer
85a3(rgyud): ni mkha' 'gre'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma// gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o// drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan
85a4(rgyud): du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o// brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i mdab ma la/ gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so// shar la sogs
85a5(rgyud): par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang // dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung mthung lkug sa kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma zung la'o// rdo rje mda'
85a6(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang ni dri med glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang // sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste// g.yon na thod pa
85a7(rgyud): dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang pad+ma dung dang lcags sgrog drag dang phub dang ni// nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrogs pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang // spyi blugs snod dang kha Ta ga dang sbrul dang de nas
85a8(rgyud): chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de// pad+ma nor mdab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no// 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba ma 'bar gdong me rlung gi shug ma dang ni
85b1(rgyud): rab gtum ma// drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsartsi ka yi pad+ma nor mdab la ni phyogs rnams su// g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal ma dpal ldan
85b2(rgyud): rgyal byed ma// brgyad po dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor mdab pad+ma la ni khyab 'dzag ma yi phyogs kyi char// keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsigs
85b3(rgyud): ma dang // nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor mdab pad+ma la ste phag mo'i mdab ma'i lha mo la'o// pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dgas bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng ba mig
85b4(rgyud): bzang ma// rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes mdab la rgyal po kye// rdo rje 'od dang rdo rjed lus dang mchog gi gser ldan ur ba sI dang bkra ba'i ri
85b5(rgyud): mo dang // raM b+hA zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor mdab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o// sA bi tri dang pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma/ 
85b6(rgyud): gA ya tI dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang pad+ma rig byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la// gau rI gang+gA dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur ma to ta lA dang mtshon byed ma// dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de
85b7(rgyud): bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi mdab ma la'o// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma ngang pa'i mdog dang 'dzin ma dang // pad+ma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin
85b8(rgyud): ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas// de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha min g.yo dang gshin rje me dang gdong drug dang // gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal
86a1(rgyud): ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go// ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shag ti dang // dbyug pa shag ti ngag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni ga
86a2(rgyud): con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda'// khab dang bgrang phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang // rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yas
86a3(rgyud): kyi phyag tu 'gyur// g.yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni ut+pal dang lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa chu skyes spyi blugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag du rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag/ 
86a4(rgyud): rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dil bu gzhu dang ni// pad+ma dang ni spyi blugs sbrul dang gzhu dang / de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang // zhags pa
86a5(rgyud): rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dag po dag gir 'gyur ra// pad+ma'i mdab ma dag la nag pa sogs kyi nor la ga chos rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis// mchog gi
86a6(rgyud): zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya// sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag/ dpal ldan 'khor lo
86a7(rgyud): dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag/ dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste// g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul
86a8(rgyud): te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyag/ dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma ri bong 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no// dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag
86b1(rgyud): na lag 'gro nyid dang kha T+wAM ga yi phyag/ 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya// ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag pad+ma nor bu
86b2(rgyud): dag gi phyag/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma karko Ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams// khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang lce sbrang gdong ma nges par g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams
86b3(rgyud): su// stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag/ bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o// rdo rje mig
86b4(rgyud): dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye ba/ denas g.yo ba'i mthar// yi dgas dmar dang mkha' 'gro/ de'i dbang po ma he rma bya glang po dang ba glang dang gdong lnga pa// rim
86b5(rgyud): pas tsA muN+Da la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang / phyogs bral rnams su'o// lha min la sogs rnams kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshegs
86b6(rgyud): kyi ni// glang po'i dbang po dang lug dang ni chu srin zhes dang ri dgas dang ni byi ba rim pas so// b+hi ru NA dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la sogs pa'i zur du ste// bse dang dom
86b7(rgyud): dang seng ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi// mkhar bgrod khro ba dang
86b8(rgyud): bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa// 'od zer can dang tsun+d+ra lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni// rta dang glang po seng ge bdun gyi grangs
87a1(rgyud): / 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o// shar du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang // bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo ma ni nor sbyin sa
87a2(rgyud): gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o// snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar// gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs can rigs dang // 
87a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la// dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas par rengs 'dod ma// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma
87a4(rgyud): gsod pa dang ni skyeng 'dod ma// rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod ma ngar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid// dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa
87a5(rgyud): 'dod ma dag ni drug pa'o// lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gan sa pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang / gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rgyal
87a6(rgyud): dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang // tsa muN+Da sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang // kun tu gdong dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang sked
87a7(rgyud): 'dod ma// reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci
87a8(rgyud): zag par 'dod ma dang // sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rjod pa mang po lnga pa lhag ma za ba dang // g.yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'tshong ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la
87b1(rgyud): 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir// 
87b2(rgyud): zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas// de/ 
87b3(rgyud): la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin// 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'khrul ji bzhin nyid du'o// rtag dang mi rtag
87b4(rgyud): mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don sla dad du// sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste snying por gyur dpa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba med// gang zhig
87b5(rgyud): bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang // de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu bya// dpal
87b6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o// lha rnams 'khor lo a li ka li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o// rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni a yig mngab
87b7(rgyud): ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig go/ dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnams gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go/ ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu
87b8(rgyud): sder ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ni shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas na// lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun
88a1(rgyud): la phan par mdzad pa bo// bdag cag bsrungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod// rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid
88a2(rgyud): pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni// gzigs nas bskyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas// rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag
88a3(rgyud): po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang // shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo // 'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad
88a4(rgyud): pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang // sgra drag sgrog das byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// shes rab thabs la rab byung / 
88a5(rgyud): mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta ga la gnas// rgyal ba'i ngagra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya// dri mang
88a6(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing // phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs
88a7(rgyud): byas te// mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba ste// gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams
88a8(rgyud): kyis byed// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar me yi steng du 'gyur// shar du dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pad+ma la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste// 
88b1(rgyud): byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o// mer ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig sgyu ma dang dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma// rlung du dpal
88b2(rgyud): ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+DI dag dang dung // me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin par gyi zur gyi cha la'o// shar du 'du byed dang ni sa bdag nges par pad+ma
88b3(rgyud): la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go/ byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do// me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang / 
88b4(rgyud): 'du shes gnyis po'o// dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o// lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi
88b5(rgyud): bum pa rnams// slar yang 'bar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang / dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag go/ byang du l+le dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur
88b6(rgyud): sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lce yi sgo yo g.yon du'o// nam mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// dang por thabs ni
88b7(rgyud): drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur// phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o// shar gyi sgor ni rab
88b8(rgyud): gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o// g.yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma// chu ru rengs byed dang ni
89a1(rgyud): mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags
89a2(rgyud): sgrog ma// 'dod pa tsun+d+ra shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yi dbus su ste// gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid// shar
89a3(rgyud): gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang // gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur// 
89a4(rgyud): shar du tsA mur+N+Na dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'ju gra ma dang rig byed gdong // gshin rje phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon
89a5(rgyud): po'o// nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par/ dus kyi gdong ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid// gnod sbyin du/ ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo
89a6(rgyud): nyid dang gdong drug pa// phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur// mar ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g.yas su'o// 
89a7(rgyud): lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo// rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo'o// dbang ldan du ni tshegs
89a8(rgyud): kyi dbang po gzhonu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char// drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o// de dag rnams kyis phyag rgyar rab grags ri/ 
89b1(rgyud): sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur// phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste// pad+ma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la
89b2(rgyud): gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni// me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi stang du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis
89b3(rgyud): 'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur// de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste// de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang
89b4(rgyud): gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur// shar gyi 'khor lo dertse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i dkyil 'kho ngaral gnas khyi gdong ma/ zhig shin rje dag tu nges par ro na sreg
89b5(rgyud): par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul ba dang bcas par// swA ga gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce smra/ nga dag gi gdong mar 'gyur// me dang lha min bdag por lhag
89b6(rgyud): ma dang ni mi bzang g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas// rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdong mo dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni// 'khor lo la gnas drug
89b7(rgyud): gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya// g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni mdab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshigs kyi'o// bcu dang nor gyi
89b8(rgyud): tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang bram po'o// g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste/ sa
90a1(rgyud): ga la ni sa gnyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o// dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan
90a2(rgyud): gyis gnas pa ste// rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas// gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi gzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis
90a3(rgyud): gnas lha rnams mdab mar lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid// g.yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon brkyang bdag/ 
90a4(rgyud): phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni ga yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur// g.yon pa'i sbyor da ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa bdag
90a5(rgyud): kyang mnyam pa'i stabs// yon tan dbang gis dbus mo rlu nga ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyu ra// cung zad dbus mo phyed na 'khyog pha rol par 'gyur te lhag ma
90a6(rgyud): dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid// slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o// cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams re 'ga' na// gzugs
90a7(rgyud): kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar pad+ma 'dzin po'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur// rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag/ drug gi cod
90a8(rgyud): pan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan// sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa
90b1(rgyud): ngag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go/ gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang // drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang sreg
90b2(rgyud): za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba dag las so// phub dang mdung dang mda' dang ngag sta dang ni Da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du// dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse
90b3(rgyud): gsum dag tu 'gyur// gzhu dang ut+pa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpag dang ni glang po'i lpags pa ste// 'dir ni/ 
90b4(rgyud): lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa// de dag rang bzhin yon dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gang zhig l-i la sogs pa
90b5(rgyud): sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skye/ sa pa// thung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim pas/ yongs bkod nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i gdan
90b6(rgyud): la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags// gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur// nA da dpal ldan rdo rje sems
90b7(rgyud): dpar 'gyur te me yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a yig go/ i yig thung ngu ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang r-i yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no// u yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang
90b8(rgyud): 'dir ni la yig rnam par snang mdzad do// bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so// dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin
91a1(rgyud): a yig las skyes nam mkha'i khams// rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni I raM U l-I thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur// mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs
91a2(rgyud): yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste// mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o// rin chen dbang po mA ma kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos
91a3(rgyud): dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste// de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so// aM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis a
91a4(rgyud): yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o// e yig thung ngu nam mkha'i sto dang po ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur// oM yig 'jig rten mgon po a la yang de bzhin
91a5(rgyud): 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o// a yig/ chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin AHyig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma// e yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi/ 
91a6(rgyud): dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma// oM yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin a la yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma// dpal ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo rje dang ni
91a7(rgyud): sgra yi rdo rje ma dgazung // nam mkha'i snying po dri rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag rung // sa yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba ni zung du 'gyur// de ltar rigs
91a8(rgyud): ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya// haM yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig shin tu sngon mo'o// ha yig thung
91b1(rgyud): gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o// yaM lnga rim pas rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis po dag kyang rung // raM wA/ rmugs byed nga rgyal
91b2(rgyud): ma ste waM dang rAHzhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro// laM yAHrengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo ba// 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su
91b3(rgyud): 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po ste// yA wA rA lA de bzhin glang po rta dang seng ge dang ni phag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma
91b4(rgyud): / brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma// 'dod bcun+da rung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o// a yig dag dang aM dang rnam par bcad pa haM dang haHdang
91b5(rgyud): ha hA las skyes nus ma brgyad// bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yi/ ga rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur/ oM hu~M ho AHdud dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos
91b6(rgyud): kyi gaN+DI'o// ha yig tsA mur+N+Na ste haM dang haHzhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o// hA dang k+Sha k+Sha k+ShaM k+ShaHdbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma// hI hU~M hA hU~M rgyab tu pad+ma mchog
91b7(rgyud): gi mdab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o// k+Shi k+ShI k+ShA k+Shu~M de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no// shar dang g.yas dang g.yas min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan
91b8(rgyud): dang ni rlung gi pad+ma la// mdab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung du ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa// hi kI la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi
92a1(rgyud): mdab ma la// rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsa muN+Da la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so// taM naHbrgya byin chu gter gdong ste baM maHzhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni
92a2(rgyud): dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang // TaM Na me dang gzhon nu dag ste tsam dang nyaHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung // kaM daHkhyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang saM dang 'dir ni b+haHnyid do// 
92a3(rgyud): tsa sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi pad+ma'i mdab mar lha mo rnams kyir 'gyur// nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi chos rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs// de nyid la zhon
92a4(rgyud): ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnam das kyi// sde bdun brtseg pa la gnas k+Sha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang / 
92a5(rgyud): bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mang na phyogs 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rig sa kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur// don yod
92a6(rgyud): grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go/ phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon// dpal ldan yum dang chos
92a7(rgyud): kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma// mA ma ki dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dang
92a8(rgyud): gis spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma// khro bo dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do// gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par rab tugag
92b1(rgyud): rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so// mkha' snying
92b2(rgyud): dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o// rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba// yum dang khro bo'i dbang
92b3(rgyud): po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid// stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang // rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma
92b4(rgyud): rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu gra/ dgas// drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rang
92b5(rgyud): tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsun+d+har rab grags pa// rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim bas shes par bya// 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar
92b6(rgyud): yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags// rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i dag/ rlung me chus tsA mur+N+Na dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dang
92b7(rgyud): mo bzhi pa ste// dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrog byed lha min mer ni gnas pa yang // tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag
92b8(rgyud): med// me dang dpal ldan phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod grub pa dngag ni de bzhin nyid// mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags// rnam pa ce
93a1(rgyud): ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying nga nu'i bdag por rab tu grags
93a2(rgyud): pa yin// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drag pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o// rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya rig
93a3(rgyud): ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi pad mdab la ni nor lag ches te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams// zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu
93a4(rgyud): 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang // klu ba rgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i mdab ma nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar
93a5(rgyud): 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig sgyu ma// mkha/ 'a snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro/ 'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags// nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong / 
93a6(rgyud): ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan pag gdong mo// dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gos ser mo 'bar ma lce sbrang ma// de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams
93a7(rgyud): cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o// lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par
93a8(rgyud): ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa// klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa
93b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang // mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu
93b2(rgyud): 'gyur// ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
93b3(rgyud): khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas// phyi rol du ni tsA muN+Da la sogs pa lha mo brgyad pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku// lha la sogs pa chos
93b4(rgyud): kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzodags pa'i sku// gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi da yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o// sku yi rdo rje lhan
93b5(rgyud): cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o// gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur/ te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o// thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs/ 
93b6(rgyud): pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa po// ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa
93b7(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla a sogs ka sogs dang // rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang
93b8(rgyud): mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te// 'di dag gis ni byin rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya// stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes
94a1(rgyud): mchod pa rjes su chags pa la// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa po yis tad swa b+ha ba At+ma ko ha~M brjod par bya// bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis/ 
94a2(rgyud): snying khar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur// rigs ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi
94a3(rgyud): bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// 'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// lag pa rkang
94a4(rgyud): pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste// klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams ngas sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur/ 
94a5(rgyud): dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so// thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/ 
94a6(rgyud): rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams// nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud// dung
94a7(rgyud): dang gaN+DI ma Ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis// 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor
94a8(rgyud): ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o// lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul
94b1(rgyud): can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas// khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// tsA mud+d+ha sogs thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i mdab mar gas
94b2(rgyud): rnams nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis// lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas pad+ma'i mdab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs kyis so// gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum
94b3(rgyud): mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag/ skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag ba spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas/ 
94b4(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs// de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang ba bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yi phyag rgya'o// rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du
94b5(rgyud): yang dag gnas pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum/ ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba/ las// dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos
94b6(rgyud): las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o// longs spyod las na sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par
94b7(rgyud): slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sang ba ste// de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas// sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te/ 
94b8(rgyud): lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so// longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo // dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le
95a1(rgyud): grol ba gsum gyi mthar// de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o// g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni gas
95a2(rgyud): pa bskum pa gang yin pa// de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las// sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i
95a3(rgyud): gdan// nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga// gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan// 
95a4(rgyud): ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams// thams
95a5(rgyud): cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzug/ sa ni mdzag pa gang de rdo rje can// shes rab chos 'byung / dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par
95a6(rgyud): thig le yis// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba// 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas
95a7(rgyud): sbyangs byas te// phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig du ni dgug par bya// zla ba nyi ma a sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas
95a8(rgyud): pa// so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te// dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum// shes
95b1(rgyud): rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste// so
95b2(rgyud): sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur// shes rab sbyar la
95b3(rgyud): gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur// dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin// de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab
95b4(rgyud): mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te/ 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub dpa dag ni 'bring po yang // 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur
95b5(rgyud): te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid/ so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa tha/ cu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do// srog stsol dag kyang
95b6(rgyud): ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag na rin chen no// gdol pa mo la rjes su dran pa pad+ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can// re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te/ 
95b7(rgyud): slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o// so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o// bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog
95b8(rgyud): dang dpyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems dpa'o// srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur// thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing
96a1(rgyud): gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtum mo'i smra bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur/ shes
96a2(rgyud): rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin// 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ 
96a3(rgyud): phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis/ 
96a4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob// mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te/  mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o// sro ngag gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems
96a5(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis mchod// bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nya mas shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so// rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med
96a6(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so// de nas ting 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te
96a7(rgyud): sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na// nA da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bzhag nas bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha'
96a8(rgyud): la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta bas so// bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug/ shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje
96b1(rgyud): nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la// bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la// srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu
96b2(rgyud): ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste// de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu// gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang
96b3(rgyud): dag la nges par sbyar bar bya// phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min// dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam
96b4(rgyud): par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste// pad+mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs dpa// bde ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa
96b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o// gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par
96b6(rgyud): 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan// de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes
96b7(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro// de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod
96b8(rgyud): pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te// sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang
97a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi gu bar gsungs// thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o// srog gi rtsol ba'i me yi ri bong can
97a2(rgyud): ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o// mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so// gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid
97a3(rgyud): 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mthara' ru'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba// bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam dang
97a4(rgyud): zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang spro dang rab tu rmongs pa der 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal/ pa dag/ rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu
97a5(rgyud): ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du// rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid bsrubs gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su// nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar
97a6(rgyud): po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma ki te chang ma yin// go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min// rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag
97a7(rgyud): pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste// stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin// nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las
97a8(rgyud): kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te// bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid// bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems
97b1(rgyud): dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skang // de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so// gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag
97b2(rgyud): nyid la sogs pa// bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur// rengs pa dang ni zho dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams
97b3(rgyud): kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug
97b4(rgyud): dang dbang // ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang dmatshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o// sgom dang bzla/ nges pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang
97b5(rgyud): rdo rje ni// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsu ma po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya// phyogs ni lhag pa las byung bung ba dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa
97b6(rgyud): g.yas dang gcig shos dag ni// phung po'i bdud la glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin// lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi
97b7(rgyud): bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag/ nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya// de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug
97b8(rgyud): dpal ldan thod pa ste// nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so// de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de
98a1(rgyud): bzhin nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so// gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i
98a2(rgyud): kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las// sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig
98a3(rgyud): bu ste// thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ 
98a4(rgyud): dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i tsa dad pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du
98a5(rgyud): mtshon cha'i phyag/ spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi tshe dab kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings/ dri med 'ong zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil
98a6(rgyud): 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni// zhabs gnyis dag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas// 'thung po rnams dang lha min gdangs can
98a7(rgyud): lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa// bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// klu rnams chu skyes mdab
98a8(rgyud): brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas// zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i mdab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi// rtse mo thams cad mnan na/ 
98b1(rgyud): sprin gyi rigs ni lto bdag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa// de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin nagra dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lnga rnams dang niH/ 
98b2(rgyud): mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur// rangs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang
98b3(rgyud): bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang // sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis// zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar
98b4(rgyud): dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs// drag po la yang bsam gta/ dan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyi dad kyi gzugs// dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang
98b5(rgyud): bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs/ rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchu ga gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs/ 
98b6(rgyud): zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis
98b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis// yum dag gri ni las rnams thams cad gnyi
98b8(rgyud): ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la bsad pa dang ni gso ba yang // dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag
99a1(rgyud): du ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya// pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun du ni 'jig rten grags/ 
99a2(rgyud): de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min// gtso bo'i thugs khar pad+ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni// hUM yig ye
99a3(rgyud): las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya// de yi dbus su dzaHyig lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas// rnam gsu
99a4(rgyud): srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam dadu rab tu gzhug bya ste// thams cad zla ba zhu ba dang mchu dngas rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad+mar spro bar bya// de ni nyi
99a5(rgyud): mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa// de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so// 
99a6(rgyud): de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster ba nyid du 'gyur// dzaHhUM baM ho rim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje zhags pa dril bu ste/ oM AHhUM ho de bzhin du gsung/ 
99a7(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do// I r-I A l-I de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so// haHhuM ha phreM nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug du yang de bzhin gsungs// 
99a8(rgyud): ba nyi ma'i dbus su a li ka li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te// de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi pad+ma can// glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag
99b1(rgyud): nachu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang // dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzung
99b2(rgyud): nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab gyis rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis// ba sgrub bya den
99b3(rgyud): bkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed// gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed// 
99b4(rgyud): 'byung por grags pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa med byed rab mtsho dag rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed// klu rnam das kyis 'od dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis
99b5(rgyud): 'khyud pa dag tu byed// gtum mo rnams kyis srung ba byed de/ mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o// de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal
99b6(rgyud): 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hrIHste ut+pa la kha ma bye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni i k+Sha'i gzhu// de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyis gas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar
99b7(rgyud): du bkang // pad+ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya yi ni snying kha lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la ma yis bsnun byas shing // mgrin
99b8(rgyud): par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni khrid par byed pa ste// gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par dkri ba byas// lha mo rnams
100a1(rgyud): kyis spyo bar byed cing khro skyes rnams kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun// 'byung po rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang
100a2(rgyud): ni sen mo rnon po 'debs// rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams ngag gis bcings// nus ma rnams kyis gos bral rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yin/ 
100a3(rgyud): zhabs la ltung bar byas// de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug
100a4(rgyud): pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hUM yig ring po las skyes ral dgri bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can
100a5(rgyud): phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni bsdigs mdzub zhags pa'i phyag rnga mo'i steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya zhags pas
100a6(rgyud): bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te// yaHyig las skes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung lngar bgod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni// zhon pa rtse mo can dang
100a7(rgyud): g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya// de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos// dbye ba las yang rnga mos
100a8(rgyud): dman zhing rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya// nyi zla'i dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas// do las byung ba'i zhal
100b1(rgyud): gcig pa ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can// ru sbal la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya
100b2(rgyud): 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bsgyel te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings// dkyil 'khor du ni kun tu khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas// de yi
100b3(rgyud): steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la ste// phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya// rmongs pa
100b4(rgyud): la yang sprul rnams kyis ni kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gye dal bar bsgom par bya// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phrem gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas
100b5(rgyud): nas// de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin/ dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can// rta yidag yi steng du g.yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub
100b6(rgyud): bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya skra rnams dag las myur du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis dman pa yang // kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
100b7(rgyud): bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang lce spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du khams kun zos// de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchogs yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste/ 
100b8(rgyud): bsad pa dag la'o// bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos// zhi dang rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni
101a1(rgyud): bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur// dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus
101a2(rgyud): sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do// rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no// stong pa'i sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang kur
101a3(rgyud): 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o// sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni// nyams pa'i don to me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te mi
101a4(rgyud): dag kyang // nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong da pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min pa// glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi// 
101a5(rgyud): bsam gtan 'gyur// klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la nim mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bse dang seng ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshung
101a6(rgyud): pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can// rta yi dag la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes// khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs
101a7(rgyud): kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya// phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par
101a8(rgyud): ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya// dpa' bo g.yul gyi dus su
101b1(rgyud): lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa 'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag/ brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po ro sreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya// dri dang smyos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang
101b2(rgyud): kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas// mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te// thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i pad+ma
101b3(rgyud): gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang // mdab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma// phyi rol re khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
101b4(rgyud): du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas// de yi ga da yas min du ni yi dgas lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor la ngas ni g.yas su rkang pa'o// sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal
101b5(rgyud): ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srung bar rab byas nas// sngags pas thab kyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas/ pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa// de yi
101b6(rgyud): sngags ni oM haM praM hUM phaT kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin bsreg bya// rdo rje skyil krungs bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed// sbyin sreg rdzogs na
101b7(rgyud): ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa// gang zhig sgra sgrogs sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de// thab kyi mtha' ru
101b8(rgyud): gnas nas ka ha ka ha rgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de// de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur// ro sreg gan+da
102a1(rgyud): su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste// g.yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di
102a2(rgyud): skad smra bar 'gyur// dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smros shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi// de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du
