102a3(rgyud): gnyer bar bya// ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang // rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag
102a4(rgyud): la stsol// dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rangs dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang // bdag gi dngos grub tham das cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag
102a5(rgyud): gis bgyi'o smra// 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bad/ ga po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang // lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang
102a6(rgyud): yin der 'gro ste// de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs pas sa ya steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed// de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya// 
102a7(rgyud): ming gi dang po thug kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste// de las yan lag so so yan lag so so'i
102a8(rgyud): sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na// bsgom bya mchod bya bzlas bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so// so sor sngags kyi rigs
102b1(rgyud): ni nges par dbye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o// sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid// phyi nas zhi ba la sogs
102b2(rgyud): rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyuraro// bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya'o// grub
102b3(rgyud): pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i shi ya rol bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster// khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed
102b4(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnam sa kyi mig sman sa ni rab 'byed dang // mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa
102b5(rgyud): nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhagal ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas// srung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi rol bu dag gam mig
102b6(rgyud): sman ni/ byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas par rab tu bya// ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la bzung bar bya// 'tsho
102b7(rgyud): bar pho nya de ni 'tshol nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur// pho nya'i dri ma mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod// pho nya sprul la
102b8(rgyud): sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge min 'gyur// pho nya'i rkang pa g.yon pa mngon
103a1(rgyud): nan chung mar brjod g.yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o// lag pas rang gi yan lag dag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste// mig dang kha ni rab tu
103a2(rgyud): gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjod// gal te snying kha'i pad+ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya// dang por srung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la/ 
103a3(rgyud): yang bde ba byed par 'gyur// sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bong la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya// la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying kha kha nang dpral
103a4(rgyud): ba ba la// huM k+Sha h+ya hA la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam dpa thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis// g.yon gyi lus da la sa bon thung ngu rna ba mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs
103a5(rgyud): la// g.yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so// rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i mdam bu sbrul gyi sa bon ldan
103a6(rgyud): pas srung byas nas// huM k+ShaM ldan pas snying khar shin tu bsnan na myur du so yis zin pa bskyod par byed par 'gyur// sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas myur du rengs par byed
103a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying khar rtse mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'pho ba ste// spyi bor stong pa rab tu zhug
103a8(rgyud): shings ni rkang par gnas nges par dug ni gcod par byed// dpral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges par dug ni med par byed// dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs
103b1(rgyud): pas 'jug pa dag ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed// tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdong du srog ni rab tu 'bab par dug med byed la sbyar byas te// yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni/ 
103b2(rgyud): TaM ga Na sbyar bya// dzA ti badz+ri gzhon nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa lang ga lI dang de ba dA li dang // bra h+ni k+Sha ro a shwa gan+d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban+d+ha karko Ta ki dang // bshang pa shA dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa
103b3(rgyud): dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni// sna ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung po'i rims dang brtan dang ltos 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms// nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang / 
103b4(rgyud): mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni// spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs ldan ma dga' chi gzu dgas chu chod phyed ni rab tu rgyu// de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum
103b5(rgyud): po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste// de nyid la ni sgra la gyis sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phu ga pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro// nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed la nyin
103b6(rgyud): mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang // tho rangs dag dang nyi ma nub pa la yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod de// thun mtshams dbus su stong pa chu gter dag la rigs ldan dus kyis sos
103b7(rgyud): zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu// 'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya// nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i na
103b8(rgyud): la'o// phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur// mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' med dag gi
104a1(rgyud): chu tshod rnams// nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi ljongs spyod dbye bas drug tu 'gyur// mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor
104a2(rgyud): rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar// pad+ma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma mangs rigs sprin nag dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag
104a3(rgyud): ni kha dog sna tshogs so// de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dbyi mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i
104a4(rgyud): mdog/ mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste// de phyir de des par kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yi
104a5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa// bsgoms na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges pa ra 'phrog/ rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma dag la nyi ma'i steng du kI gyi yi ge
104a6(rgyud): mdab chags mgon po ni// klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya// de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por oM yig dag dang bak+Shi
104a7(rgyud): swA hA'i mtha' can te// don bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i mdab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya// mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdangs can
104a8(rgyud): bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur// rab mchog sa yi steng du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams// sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur de gdon
104b1(rgyud): gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin brjod par byed// de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya// rig byed dang ni mdab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag
104b2(rgyud): po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la// snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aM a zung ste i la sogs pa mdab brgyad la// e ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis/ 
104b3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha k+Sha gnyis skyes la// thun mtshams mdab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams// A sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu/ 
104b4(rgyud): srin bum pa'i dngang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga/ phyi rol mdab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi b+h+yo bidz+ra tA dak+Sha la sogs yi ge rnams// de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang ni sosa?
104b5(rgyud): las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do// snying khor yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can g.yo bar na nga ba dbang dgug pa la// zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang me dang
104b6(rgyud): rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas ba srid pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo 'di
104b7(rgyud): ni byed de 'dir// sdug brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badz+ra tik+Sh+Na la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya// rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsib
104b8(rgyud): la bar du yang // bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa do me ru Na las so// de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra ya k+She ts+tsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur// de yi phyi rol i hrISh+Ti
105a1(rgyud): bi kr-i tAnan las rnam gnyis hUM dang pa du 'gyur// re miganas ni ri mig par la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o// dbye dang bas dang dbang la ya ma ra nI/ 
105a2(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur te k+She me dos tsa sogs// rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrang ba la// der ni snying po dag rnam yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad
105a3(rgyud): snga ma bzhin// yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur// yi ge rnams kyis snga mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa haM dang saM dang saM dug
105a4(rgyud): thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di ya dang bdag gis shes rab yi ge u ru 'gyur// maM muHhaM huHdasaM suHmany+dzuHnyid ni pad+ma nor mdab la ste nyi ma'i mdab ma la// phyi rol du
105a5(rgyud): shrI badz+ra g+ho 'aHsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+ha dra hUM dang phaT duHgyur// bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdza da cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul// de bzhin sngar brjod 'a/ 
105a6(rgyud): lo rnams dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// sgra ni gang zhig snying
105a7(rgyud): kha'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa// de la mi yi sems ni gcig tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ste// 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid
105a8(rgyud): skyes pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos// khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// skyil krungs bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa
105b1(rgyud): min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis// phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis// kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus
105b2(rgyud): la dug kyang yang dag 'gog/ dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo // kha yang bkab ste sna yi bu ga pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi
105b3(rgyud): rlung ni ma lus pa// srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa// dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam
105b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster/ nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan
105b5(rgyud): pa'i mig gis blta// phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mdo na par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mtho nga bar 'gyur// zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gan+da
105b6(rgyud): pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong // yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so// nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su
105b7(rgyud): bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba// de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med klog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang // 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par
105b8(rgyud): dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod// ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni lpags pa dag la khab bzhin reg/ de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi
106a1(rgyud): ba tsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya// zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de ltar yid
106a2(rgyud): la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su
106a3(rgyud): 'thun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te// 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od bar du ma 'phro bar byed// phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul
106a4(rgyud): dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi// sems dang sems byung ba ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i ga zugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o// snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las
106a5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med// rnam par 'gyur ba med
106a6(rgyud): cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas// ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rigs pa bsgom par bya// srid
106a7(rgyud): gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de// sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur// gang
106a8(rgyud): gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa// de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan// ba lang bse rta glang po'i
106b1(rgyud): mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni// bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa ste// bsgrub ldan rnams kyi ba glang lpags pa
106b2(rgyud): som pa l+li'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang // de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs// tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog
106b3(rgyud): byed dag sde khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum// oM yig de dag yi ge gsum sde zla nyi sreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtsa gsum mo// rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon+tan
106b4(rgyud): la gnas sring srung na de'i gzugs can te// de yi dbus su ga zhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do// rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs
106b5(rgyud): pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de// dus kyi/ sa shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog cha gas rnam la gsod pa dag kyang bstan// mi rnams mtho ris
106b6(rgyud): don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// sol ba'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin// sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed
106b7(rgyud): tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang // de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyed don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med srung byas nas// bu yi byin pa dag kyang yi dgas kyi/ 
106b8(rgyud): ni 'jig rten du song ba yi sbyin par 'gyur ro lo/ des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas// gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rtamachog
107a1(rgyud): skyes bu gzhan du 'gyur ba na// dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin// gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang / 
107a2(rgyud): bud med dag gi srung bar byed// shi bar gyur na khyod sum khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings// ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni long
107a3(rgyud): sgyed ster// sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ 'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgo// 
107a4(rgyud): yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba spyi dran pa la ni rab sbyin bya// smad 'tshong ngam pa lus kyi phyag rgya ru zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste// rang dbang
107a5(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye she sa phyag rgya'o// smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lo// ni mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo// 
107a6(rgyud): rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur// sngon tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur// sangs rgyas nyid kyi/ 
107a7(rgyud): slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin// 'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin// gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis/ 
107a8(rgyud): skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba bskyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs// zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing 'ching bu dum bus lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs// smad 'tshong ngam
107b1(rgyud): dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste// bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na// chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba bskyed
107b2(rgyud): mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin// byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te// ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin
107b3(rgyud): rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir// snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis// rab tu byin na dman pa nyid
107b4(rgyud): dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde da'abras ster// gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi da yi bdag po rigs byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur// gang la rig
107b5(rgyud): byed tshad mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste// gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam ma/ nga phyugs dang mi rnams ngag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur// gang la
107b6(rgyud): 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o// gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed par gsungs/ 
107b7(rgyud): de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nad ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer// sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi gnas su ste// gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin/ 
107b8(rgyud): par gyur pa de ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste// 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas
108a1(rgyud): pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang // dge 'dun ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min// slob dpon
108a2(rgyud): ngag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yi bstan pa'o// dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste// de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa
108a3(rgyud): gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o// dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnam
108a4(rgyud): lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang / bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // nyan thos rnams la
108a5(rgyud): mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog gi bde byed 'dod/ pa'i sbyin pa yang // sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snyi nga dang dus kun du ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa// de dag
108a6(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur// slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa// de dag bgegs
108a7(rgyud): kyi mgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro// gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad// mi rnams
108a8(rgyud): dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs// mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlu ma ral pa can// thos dang
108b1(rgyud): klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang // 'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang // rigs dang rigs ni min pa la/ 
108b2(rgyud): dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o// sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste// 'di dag kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo
108b3(rgyud): yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de// zhi dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgyad dang bsnyung gnas ri las mchong pa dang // g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis
108b4(rgyud): zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchong pas so// bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste// 'jug ngogs bsnyung / 
108b5(rgyud): gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni// grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyis yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so// de yi phyir
108b6(rgyud): na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin// gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang // slar yang phrag dog
108b7(rgyud): byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te// gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed// de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog
108b8(rgyud): yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang
109a1(rgyud): smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi// sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi
109a2(rgyud): de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro// sa dang dpal 'byor skad du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag/ bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis
109a3(rgyud): dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na// glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa// de la gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma
109a4(rgyud): yin ji ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o// sdug/ ras dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya// rang byin rlabs pas
109a5(rgyud): lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan pa/ zlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang // dag pa'i rim pas/ dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i
109a6(rgyud): sems kyis so// ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o// me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching
109a7(rgyud): ba med// ma bcings na ni gser dang bral na smra bo rnam la longs spyod med pa nyid// de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur// bcings pa/ 
109a8(rgyud): med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min// bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dgas bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// drag po rnams ni/ 
109b1(rgyud): drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang // dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la// gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas
109b2(rgyud): gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni// ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa
109b3(rgyud): dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjod par byed// gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid// rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi
109b4(rgyud): nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin / bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyi ral 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang // sbyin sreg sngags
109b5(rgyud): kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang // bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster
109b6(rgyud): bar byed// de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya// rang gi sems ni rgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur// 
109b7(rgyud): sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min// gang
109b8(rgyud): zhig mkha' ye shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster// oM AHhuM ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya// rab tu 'bar
110a1(rgyud): bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas sgom pa byasaM nas ni// snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la// phyi rol du ni zur gsum byas
110a2(rgyud): nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o// de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas// mthe bong dang ni ming mang ngag gis nyin
110a3(rgyud): zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya// yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thogs mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te// 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pa
110a4(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o// pho nya mo rnams dgade la zas kyi phud ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyi das sbyin// 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i
110a5(rgyud): don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go// mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje/ rnams kyis yan lag dgod// gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i
110a6(rgyud): yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la// lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste// mngon sum dag ni de nyid
110a7(rgyud): sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang // de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya/ 
110a8(rgyud): yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don// gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya// nam mkha' la ni de nyid
110b1(rgyud): sbyor ba dag gis rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa// lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur gyi bar// de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag
110b2(rgyud): 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag la gsungs// byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du
110b3(rgyud): mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas// de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi bskyed
110b4(rgyud): mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// dpal dang dpo'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor dalo las// sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
110b5(rgyud): gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes/ slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba
110b6(rgyud): rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug a li ka li dag la gnas pa nyid// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos
110b7(rgyud): khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs// ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod// sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin
110b8(rgyud): rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste// mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams// ra ba lnga yi re khA sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha'
111a1(rgyud): las skyes rnams kyis so// dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs lpags pa la sogs kyis// nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis
111a2(rgyud): nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid// dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis// ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce
111a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas// de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rdo rje a sogs
111a4(rgyud): ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs/ dmas kyis// stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum dkyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid// de bzhin du ni
111a5(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no// sde pa ka la sogs pa drug por ma pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis/ 
111a6(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams ngag gis dbye// so ser yi ge'i dbye/ 
111a7(rgyud): ba sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang na mkha'i dngos po dag las so// dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya Na ma na dang \u0f88\u0f90 dang dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+ha dzA D+ha b+ha dA sha rnams te me
111a8(rgyud): yi dbye ba ro la sogs// chu yi dbye ba u yig zla kha tsha Sha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba liM la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par bye// 
111b1(rgyud): gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogasde pa mtha' dag rnams// 'jig
111b2(rgyud): rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'dra ba'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis dbang po mtha' dag du 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnam so// 
111b3(rgyud): ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan k+Sha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur// sku ni/ 
111b4(rgyud): gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyi das ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// lnga yi bang ngaganyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i
111b5(rgyud): mgon po dgu dag nyid// dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid da bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsad/ ga bdag nyid de// ya la sogs pa rnams kyi sgo skyong
111b6(rgyud): mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so// khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis// so sor yi ge
111b7(rgyud): dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// de bzhin yi ge so so ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs
111b8(rgyud): dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya// stong pa gnom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste// gtsug tor nas ni/ 
112a1(rgyud): chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o// rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis/ 
112a2(rgyud): de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku'i rdo rje la sogs kyis// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can// yi ge so so'i ming
112a3(rgyud): can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag dag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo cig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// phung po rnams kyis lnga
112a4(rgyud): yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis rlabs bu dgu pa yang // bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sog/ ngas pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid kyang // de bzhin
112a5(rgyud): so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug ma/ tha' yas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i/ chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshan ma 'od dpag
112a6(rgyud): med// nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas/ 
112a7(rgyud): 'di dag dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyi spros pa'o// chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang // mkha' yi snying po reg
112a8(rgyud): bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsartsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma// bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas// de dag nges par byams
112b1(rgyud): pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo// sa yi snying
112b2(rgyud): po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lnga// gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas// 'di dag dpal
112b3(rgyud): ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o// lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang // spyan ma
112b4(rgyud): dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dadri yi rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso bo yaM
112b5(rgyud): ni btang snyoms ngag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rna mas spros pa'o// gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyed dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug
112b6(rgyud): tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te na mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan// gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yis rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang // steng dang 'og
112b7(rgyud): du yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi mthar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o// phyogs kyi mdab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral mdab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste// nyi ma'i
112b8(rgyud): steng du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs// thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka/ phyag rgya sbrul
113a1(rgyud): dang stag gi lpags pa mi bzang glang po'i bdag po'i lpags pa bshus pa rlon pa 'dzin// gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyis phyi rol du ni 'khor lo gsum
113a2(rgyud): rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis// sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dpa' bo rnam
113a3(rgyud): kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dpal ldan dang po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa cha'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te// zhing tshan do ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod
113a4(rgyud): sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang // de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyog bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste// shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsu/ 
113a5(rgyud): gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo/ cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la// rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung
113a6(rgyud): po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po// phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas// sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag
113a7(rgyud): la kun nas so// 'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsung pa ste// zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dzaM b+ha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams// ngag
113a8(rgyud): dang rkang lag pa shang lam b+ha gnyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te// shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yaM phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por
113b1(rgyud): 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha// phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'bar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad// phyi rol
113b2(rgyud): du gnas dkyil 'khor lo ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshigs rnams te// der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu
113b3(rgyud): 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las// rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// rnal 'byor/ 
113b4(rgyud): rjes su rig po'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha da' 'gro ma rnams kyis// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros
113b5(rgyud): pa'o// thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'a khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab na sa// snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad+ma'i mdab ma
113b6(rgyud): byed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang // gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis ma rnams kyis// nyi ma rnams kyi sgro dang sgo khyung dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang / 
113b7(rgyud): ni do sha las// gsum gyis kyang ni rab lnga yi re khA rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam du'o// nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so// 
113b8(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum pa'o// dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi mir bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan// 'khor long ni
114a1(rgyud): / phreng ba sngon pos ni ljang ku dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon/ 
114a2(rgyud): po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang ku'i mdog tu 'gyur// cha drug gis ni tshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams
114a3(rgyud): te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha me brgyad// mdab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de mdab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams// phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral
114a4(rgyud): du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tsa ka sa sogs
114a5(rgyud): stong sogs yi ge rnams// rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring po sa sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams// steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang
114a6(rgyud): gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o// sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+Sha dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong
114a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri gug thod pa can// g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste// rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin
114a8(rgyud): pa lag pa g.yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgya// mgo dang rked pa'i nges la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yis phreng ba'o// mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang Da ma rung
114b1(rgyud): rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril bu// mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o// dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni skar/ 
114b2(rgyud): dag dang rna rgyan te// rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya// gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams
114b3(rgyud): kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o// zla byed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i lpags pa'o// zla nyi sreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang
114b4(rgyud): ldan lus la thal ba ste// phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed// phyogs kyi mdab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa Da ma ru dang
114b5(rgyud): rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid de// bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams/ kyi phyogs bral mdab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag/ na'o// de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde
114b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o// ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang ku'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su// rgyal ba bskyed mdzad rigs la gtso
114b7(rgyud): ngo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so// sbyin pa sogs dang phung po
114b8(rgyud): 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyas sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya// lhun po'i
115a1(rgyud): phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang chan do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrongs dang khyim ni rlung gi byed kyi
115a2(rgyud): mtshams su ste// 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo'i nyin cig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las// 
115a3(rgyud): rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te// rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang lkoge dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang // gtsug to/ 
115a4(rgyud): snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni ga sang ba'i 'khor lo la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgya 'o// ga dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis
115a5(rgyud): gnyis par// gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thi ga le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa// kun na sa dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas
115a6(rgyud): te dus ni thams cad do// zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de// bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor
115a7(rgyud): lo 'di dag go// shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming // rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang
115a8(rgyud): mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste// srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes 'thun pa'o// ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang
115b1(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mngar gyur pa// de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang / 
115b2(rgyud): mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can// bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla
115b3(rgyud): pa'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o// lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las// gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor
115b4(rgyud): byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams// nag po da dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gang na ni gzhan rnams te// 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams
115b5(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gangadan rnams so// zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i mdab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te// slar yang rkang pa gnyis
115b6(rgyud): 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te// nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i
115b7(rgyud): zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la// rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o// rtse mo can la gzugs
115b8(rgyud): dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o// chu la zhal yang reg bya dang gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdang zhal ni bzhi pa'o// sa la dri la sogs pa reg bya'i
116a1(rgyud): mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o// de bzhin du ni ye shes
116a2(rgyud): khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so// gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsreg pa lnga// shes rab
116a3(rgyud): thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi// thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum/ 
116a4(rgyud): dus sbyor phyed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni// thun mtshoms cha shas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'i cha
116a5(rgyud): shas la// shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag/ kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtsham// sa la'o// shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges
116a6(rgyud): par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje can gyi g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o// mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas
116a7(rgyud): phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur// drag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid// shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba
116a8(rgyud): dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de// g.yas dang g.yas min
116b1(rgyud): nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang ku dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas// dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dam
116b2(rgyud): po dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid// ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// sngon po rnams kyi kha dog
116b3(rgyud): sna tshogs slar yang ljang ku rnams kyi sngon po rnams su de bzhin gsungs// de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rig phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya// shes rab brgyud
116b4(rgyud): ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rigs pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so// g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba 'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas
116b5(rgyud): bya ba la sogs so// shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go// mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas
116b6(rgyud): dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o// nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs// g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i
116b7(rgyud): rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so// shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud// g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma
116b8(rgyud): 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos// rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste// g.yas nas rig pa drag po min da
117a1(rgyud): slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi ba dag/ stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros// rdzogs ldan
117a2(rgyud): gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las// de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag
117a3(rgyud): dang // kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste// mdun gyi zhal nas 'brig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid// 
117a4(rgyud): rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin du dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur// rgyal ba'i ba dag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te
117a5(rgyud): g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o// rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi/ zhal nas so// mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang
117a6(rgyud): rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros// g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams// mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang
117a7(rgyud): snying kha'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas// g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas// 'khor lo rnams
117a8(rgyud): kyis zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba bskyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go/ dpal ldan bla/ 
117b1(rgyud): bzla ba chu shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba// de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la rten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste// mu ni sa bon khams
117b2(rgyud): kun tu brtan nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni// sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so// srid gsum gnas na sems
117b3(rgyud): can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med// sems la gnas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste// yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min
117b4(rgyud): mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu sbyor/ sems de dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal rab gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// gang gis myu gu 'di bskyed bskyed
117b5(rgyud): par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ nyams pa de yis skyes pa rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi bskyed byed do// snga ma gang de gzhon gyi
117b6(rgyud): dngos las shi ba zhes po'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min// gang gis stong pa nas nas la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde nas bde la rjes chags skad
117b7(rgyud): cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su tshogs pa min// phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis bskyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las chos de las/ 
117b8(rgyud): gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o// dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi re/ 
118a1(rgyud): ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes lta bya rnams// 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang
118a2(rgyud): drung dang ri bong can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings// rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'bo med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o// slar yangs sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo tshe
118a3(rgyud): po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas// phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa// phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug
118a4(rgyud): bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis// rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo/ rje yang dag gnas// de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo// 
118a5(rgyud): rdzu 'phral rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas kha lha min dang ni mi rnams dang // longs spyod rdzogs pas
118a6(rgyud): gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zang par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par
118a7(rgyud): ste// me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis// 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang
118a8(rgyud): bzhin kun// kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed// de ltar sangs rgyas skar 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na
118b1(rgyud): 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro// de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di// rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul
118b2(rgyud): duma'i rang gi ngo bo'o// de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min// 'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos
118b3(rgyud): kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o// mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang na mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang // gnas dang skyes dang nyams pa rnam
118b4(rgyud): gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun// sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs da ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te/ 
118b5(rgyud): 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba brda 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no// spu dang / lpags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin dus
118b6(rgyud): pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa// de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o// zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par
118b7(rgyud): shes pa ste// de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do// spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang
118b8(rgyud): zhigs bcur gsungs pa rnams// sde ba drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster// de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa
119a1(rgyud): rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya// lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min// sems
119a2(rgyud): can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin// de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod de rnam par mi rtog pa las so// / 
119a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba ngu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur// de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o// sems
119a4(rgyud): can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byam/ sa pa la sogs sems su 'gyur// mi dge'i yon te/ dan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs
119a5(rgyud): sems su 'gyur// dus kun du ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// thar pa 'jug pas dman zhing smod pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams
119a6(rgyud): cad dus su bdud kyi sems// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed// bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog du 'jigs byed yin te/ 
119a7(rgyud): ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phral ldan// bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/ de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha'
119a8(rgyud): yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang ni
119b1(rgyud): khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de// las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes 'thun chad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed// gal te tshad 'di dag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams
119b2(rgyud): kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung // skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag
119b3(rgyud): dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa// de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnam
119b4(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang rang / nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang // stong pa
119b5(rgyud): las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams// mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang
119b6(rgyud): dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min// rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min// sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi/ 
119b7(rgyud): yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin rlabs pa'o// 
119b8(rgyud): gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa// de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnam/ 
120a1(rgyud): byed// rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slang dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa
120a2(rgyud): gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste// glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes 'thun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang
120a3(rgyud): bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus kyis dbyings ni de nas 'gyur// 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang // mi gtsang
120a4(rgyud): ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun du// shin tu dga' bo'i dga' ba del gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang
120a5(rgyud): rigs min mngon spyod cing // lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya// rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams
120a6(rgyud): kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed// thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying khaM la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog/ thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas
120a7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang // de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde na'o// de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbying
120a8(rgyud): kyis ster byed de// srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas// rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor
120b1(rgyud): rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te// gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o// gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag
120b2(rgyud): rgya rnam pa gnyis// de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis// gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs/ 
120b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te// brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi lo// rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog bskyed/ 
120b4(rgyud): ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya// rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas// sangs rgyas byin rang/ 
120b5(rgyud): sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste// gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang
120b6(rgyud): bar bya// de la gang zhig pu ru gyur pa rgyal ba bskyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig chen bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ 
120b7(rgyud): de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin dzaM b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste// me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phral che ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ 
120b8(rgyud): zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste// lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste// de nas stong
121a1(rgyud): pa dang ni rig byed bar du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang lho nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung bo'o// 
121a2(rgyud): de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'odade nyams pa las dbang ma yin// 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya// 
121a3(rgyud): de dag rnams kyis chu me rlung na mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya// byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur// 
121a4(rgyud): gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang du dad ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste/ skyugs pa snying khags dang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab
121a5(rgyud): zhugs min// bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste// 'di ngag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma
121a6(rgyud): yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan// shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhing lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni
121a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid// de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i
121a8(rgyud): 'bras bu ster bar don du 'jug par byed// mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma'ikhums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya// gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin
121b1(rgyud): gyis brlab par rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying khar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste// 'di yi 'ong bar rnams kyi gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas na/ 
121b2(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya// shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni
121b3(rgyud): bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku// gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can
121b4(rgyud): gyis gsod par byed// srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag dpo'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsu dngas pa gang // de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams
121b5(rgyud): 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la ni yang ma yin no// gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byang po g.yul gyi yul la da / ga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa// de rnam
121b6(rgyud): la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya// 
121b7(rgyud): sems can rnams ni srung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste// de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed // bsgrub
121b8(rgyud): bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes tshogs// reg
122a1(rgyud): pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa rkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas
122a2(rgyud): dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/ rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos
122a3(rgyud): kyi skur gyur pa// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don
122a4(rgyud): ni byed pa po// sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs
122a5(rgyud): pa he ru ka ni byung bar gyur// gdug pa rnams ni smin pa 'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don// rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de
122a6(rgyud): yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad// bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grab par byung bar gyur// zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus
122a7(rgyud): mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur// gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so// chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag
122a8(rgyud): yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las// sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin
122b1(rgyud): rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis// nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste// gtsang ma'i gan
122b2(rgyud): la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o// gang zhig e wa yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o// sems
122b3(rgyud): can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun du// nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol
122b4(rgyud): sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi/ rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o// khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs/ dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ 
122b5(rgyud): sgra la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o// gang zhig e waM yi ge las gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs/ 
122b6(rgyud): pa'o// gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams kyis kyang bskor ba'o// dus gsum gnas gsum du zhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi
122b7(rgyud): slad du'o// rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste// rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying kha'i chu skyes stegs
122b8(rgyud): dang // bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa// de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig
123a1(rgyud): par bya// skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni// bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar
123a2(rgyud): mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so// don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/ gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du
123a3(rgyud): 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs// dud 'gro yi dgas lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la// byung dang 'byung
123a4(rgyud): 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing // rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa/ 
123a5(rgyud): 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul
123a6(rgyud): pa sgyu ma ni// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o// sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab
123a7(rgyud): zhugs pa// 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la na mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o// rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa// gsung gi
123a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams ngag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas// dri med no/ 
123b1(rgyud): bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs// de dag rnams kyi thabs
123b2(rgyud): ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams// bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams// phyag rgya drug rnams
123b3(rgyud): stong pa drug ste srid gsum bskyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o// 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni// pad+ma'o nyon mongs zad
123b4(rgyud): pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o// mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te/ 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang
123b5(rgyud): dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de/ bzhin rig par bya// gang du nges par rigs kyi gzug sa ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs// 
123b6(rgyud): gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste// gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o// gang du 'khor ba
123b7(rgyud): 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o// gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs// gang du shes pa min pa'i
123b8(rgyud): dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid// 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams// gzhan ni khams drug dbye ba
124a1(rgyud): rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang namakha' zhing rnams// gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o// gang du nga rgyal mtha' das/ 
124a2(rgyud): nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma ki ste de ni chu nyid do// gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar ma ste de ni me yin no// gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol
124a3(rgyud): ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo // gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'// gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogos yum sto
124a4(rgyud): ni 'gyur med do// mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang na mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba
124a5(rgyud): chen po'o// mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad// 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po// rang gi/ zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang
124a6(rgyud): yin de ni lce// rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtog tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste// thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di
124a7(rgyud): yi chos// dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams// gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul
124a8(rgyud): rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni// dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste// khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni
124b1(rgyud): mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min// ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis// rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog/ 
124b2(rgyud): gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang // ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste// de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rabags/ 
124b3(rgyud): nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste/ bcing ba khro bo mo g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang
124b4(rgyud): mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab// 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so// gtsug
124b5(rgyud): tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par snga ra bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams// yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas rtsa rtsi kA la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste/ 
124b6(rgyud): skye bo rnams ni srung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du// klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros// lha
124b7(rgyud): min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros// gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar// sems/ 
124b8(rgyud): can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya// de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste// 'dir ni
125a1(rgyud): dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o// gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nus la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang
125a2(rgyud): shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang // de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan// 'jig
125a3(rgyud): rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o// sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid// gang zhig
125a4(rgyud): mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste// ye shes me lce ra rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag
125a5(rgyud): sreg byed cing // lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor/ rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed/ shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang
125a6(rgyud): rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur// dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa gyur med
125a7(rgyud): nyid ni bzhi pa ste// sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o// nam mkha' ra kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs/ 
125a8(rgyud): ba yis// stong pa las ni du ba smig sgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur// de yi du
125b1(rgyud): su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba dum longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrang ba'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste// re khA nag/ 
125b2(rgyud): bo dri med 'od zer 'pho ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o// de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni tshul nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te// rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang
125b3(rgyud): rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid// gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa rab bya ste// 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongasu
125b4(rgyud): bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o// zla ba drug gis sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba ma nyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur// chags dang chags bram
125b5(rgyud): mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo// ozla 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus// 
125b6(rgyud): gnyid dang gnyid yur 'tshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang // de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med// nyon mongs
125b7(rgyud): bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o// sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir// me yi rnam pa me
125b8(rgyud): min g.yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pa rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min// rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya/ 
126a1(rgyud): min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so// nAd thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lugu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thur sel
126a2(rgyud): lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid// rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste// du ba la
126a3(rgyud): sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya// dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang g.yon la
126a4(rgyud): bcing // phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog nga gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang / dpad+mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor/ 
126a5(rgyud): ba bde ba'i slad du ste// sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal// sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing tshwa yang 'bar byed la ste
126a6(rgyud): gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur shing mtshan ma ni// rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med
126a7(rgyud): pa ye shes sku// ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub du 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o// 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung
126a8(rgyud): nyid do// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni o T+Ta nyid// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba/ 
126b1(rgyud): rim pas 'di yi ni// gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur// 'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi
