126b2(rgyud): gsung du 'gyur// gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o// yig nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le na da
126b3(rgyud): rim pa yis// bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o// sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi
126b4(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin ni// lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen/ rapa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g.yo med sems la zhengan pa ste// ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs lnga
126b5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur// sprul ba la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim khas nges par rab tu 'gyur// de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi
126b6(rgyud): sred pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su te// rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya// thig le
126b7(rgyud): btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang // de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya// gang phyir/ 
126b8(rgyud): a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing // hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de/ 
127a1(rgyud): 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni// rnam pa kun ldan cig lemapa' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyum
127a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'di la'o// l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams// phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mida' rnams da
127a3(rgyud): ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste// dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams// slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi
127a4(rgyud): yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab// de ltar thun mtsha mas bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo rau rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu
127a5(rgyud): sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid/ dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang / mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// de bzhin
127a6(rgyud): ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ 
127a7(rgyud): de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab/ 
127a8(rgyud): snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya// phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag wa gzhan du gnas
127b1(rgyud): de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste// snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o// de phyir/ 
127b2(rgyud): de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug/ zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste// thun dang thun
127b3(rgyud): la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis// sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la// gza'
127b4(rgyud): rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams nga du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o// rig byed dus kyi dbug/ ras kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa mkha' 'gro ma ni sna
127b5(rgyud): tshogs gzugs// zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mtsho ga gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur// gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang
127b6(rgyud): phyogs bral mdab mar thun chod longs spyod mtha'// lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o// spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya
127b7(rgyud): lha yis bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs// phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes// sa skyes stong pa sbrul zla nyi ma gzar
127b8(rgyud): lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pasprul mkha' gcig/ mal mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung // gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi
128a1(rgyud): longs spyod mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung // mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro/ 
128a2(rgyud): dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma// de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya// 
128a3(rgyud): ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las// de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci// 
128a4(rgyud): pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems drang 'gyur med la// sgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin// 
128a5(rgyud): nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyis ga'i bgrod pa'i nga// bang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams// yan lag rna/ mas kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug
128a6(rgyud): pa la yang mjug rings za// thun mtshams kun dang thun brgya de nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag ba bcu gnyis rnams// dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag
128a7(rgyud): kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs// yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par// de phyir
128a8(rgyud): dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so// de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las lur/ 
128b1(rgyud): gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang ngo'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o// zla ba drug dung dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// drug pa / 
128b2(rgyud): ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs// reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no// nyin dang mtshan
128b3(rgyud): mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster// sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skye spen// sngags pa lus
128b4(rgyud): la sogs pa khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu// zhil blo nyi'i khyim ste ganga' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / 
128b5(rgyud): dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur ba/ la te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o// zhi la dkar po'i/ zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs
128b6(rgyud): thun tshod lag pa la/ rengs la ser po me yi thun la'i rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la// dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs
128b7(rgyud): drug pa'i thun la'o// bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar// sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni
128b8(rgyud): longs spyod byed po min// 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed// sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs/ 
129a1(rgyud): ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed// gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no// dang po'i dbugs
129a2(rgyud): ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur// de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum
129a3(rgyud): 'gyur ni// 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams// chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur
129a4(rgyud): chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so// gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste// de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams
129a5(rgyud): kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum// kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnya/ ma 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ 
129a6(rgyud): ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur// 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab
129a7(rgyud): dbye yis// ge tse bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ma la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so// de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs/ 
129a8(rgyud): gzugs// lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o// gtso bo yi ni phra mo ngango bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya
129b1(rgyud): gang / de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so// gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku
129b2(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnamaso// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas
129b3(rgyud): reg bya du ba rdul dang ni// snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste// de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu
129b4(rgyud): ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di// brgyad po rnams kyi rkang rab drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gan das pa 'khor lo'i tshul// dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad
129b5(rgyud): de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas/ 
129b6(rgyud): de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku// gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o// dbugs
129b7(rgyud): ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te// thig le bkag par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// 
129b8(rgyud): 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa
130a1(rgyud): ma yin no// gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te// dbugs ni mkha' ma pa na mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song
130a2(rgyud): na thams cad stong par bskul bar byed// lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la// rang rang chad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su
130a3(rgyud): 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya// stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te// stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag long spyong
130a4(rgyud): lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o// rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i na zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi de dar ni sgra gcan 'jug/ rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag
130a5(rgyud): mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'ju ga/ nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste// mkha'
130a6(rgyud): mkha' na mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug/ mkha' mkha' na mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug
130a7(rgyud): ste// de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur// de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur// gcig gnyis gsum
130a8(rgyud): ngang chu gter mnga' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa// bug pa ces bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo ri rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o// de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang
130b1(rgyud): bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo ri rba rnams dag tu 'gyur// gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin po phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang
130b2(rgyud): lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams// zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dang // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig/ 
130b3(rgyud): lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams// gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams// brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab
130b4(rgyud): gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te// de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs lag denas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing // gza' yi mtha' yang
130b5(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi bskyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do// dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang / na tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur// khams dang
130b6(rgyud): phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste// sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab bzhugs pa// rig
130b7(rgyud): ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya// gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi mchog lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur// de yi gsung gi
130b8(rgyud): mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur// shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gsu
131a1(rgyud): gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med/ 
131a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur// lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur/ 
131a3(rgyud): de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur// rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams// 
131a4(rgyud): srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha/ 'am sangs rgyas zhal// rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyi/ sa shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang / 
131a5(rgyud): thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang // srog dang thur sel la gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs
131a6(rgyud): su rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed// rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur/ 
131a7(rgyud): de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin// zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid// thun mtshams de ni
131a8(rgyud): lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o// phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar// srog dang thur
131b1(rgyud): sel bang par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go// zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gags// chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad
131b2(rgyud): cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs// dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtog gyur pa// de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste/ 
131b3(rgyud): gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro// khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges pA ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs// rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor
131b4(rgyud): pa la grub pa'i dus su na mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur// de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni ma tshan mo phyed la 'gyur// rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog
131b5(rgyud): gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur// lus zhi dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa na mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur// sna tshogs
131b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang // skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste// sems ni dam
131b7(rgyud): pa'i bde bas gang zhing mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o// sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed// chu las sa me rlung phye rtse
131b8(rgyud): mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste// rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la// rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gi
132a1(rgyud): bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum bskyed par mdzad pa rnam par gzigs nas ni// gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i
132a2(rgyud): rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste// so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor// sa la sogs
132a3(rgyud): pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams// de dag rnams dang thabs gcig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par
132a4(rgyud): bzhugs// yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang sre dag za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin// srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur
132a5(rgyud): gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste// slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so// dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis
132a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed// 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so// de yi dbus su las kyis ni chen po dag gi rang
132a7(rgyud): bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur// lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams// mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra
132a8(rgyud): nI la lce ni pad+ma rA ga ste// nub ni kar ka ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo// dbus ni ljang ka de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dang por
132b1(rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no// de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur 'gyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag go// de yi phyi rol
132b2(rgyud): dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rigs byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro// 
132b3(rgyud): brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khrang ba brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur
132b4(rgyud): de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas lte gas dang chu skyes de bzhin no// zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang / dbyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te// brang phyed
132b5(rgyud): phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyu la po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so// nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten
132b6(rgyud): tshad// rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter byed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyis// gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang
132b7(rgyud): shangs dang ni// shangs kyi 'og tu kok+ko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus// de nas snying kha lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur// 
132b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid/ oM/ mdzod bu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde bskyed byed gnas pa gang // dpal ldan
133a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o// phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi
133a2(rgyud): 'khor lo ste// thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying khe la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o// gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor
133a3(rgyud): rnams las brgyad cha'o// 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dgatu/ lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag
133a4(rgyud): chad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin lha yi ri bo da// ga ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi ched yin no// / de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de
133a5(rgyud): yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur// de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor
133a6(rgyud): 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus// gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams// sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur
133a7(rgyud): te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams// phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor mi lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyan
133a8(rgyud): par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis zad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis// rtsibs brgyad
133b1(rgyud): mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur// sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag
133b2(rgyud): par bya// steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang
133b3(rgyud): bcas 'khor lo drug sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin/ 
133b4(rgyud): thabs kyang ma yin no// lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gis gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste// / shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu/ 
133b5(rgyud): ril bu mig sman ro tsa na// lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyog/ sa mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zla/ ra du'o// dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi
133b6(rgyud): bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do// nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni// gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas
133b7(rgyud): nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so// dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes bzhi dang drag po la// dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs
133b8(rgyud): ba lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs// khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba mdab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las// ra ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du ster rwa yi zlum po dag
134a1(rgyud): ni zhi cha'o// phyi rol rA yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da ri yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o// dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin mdab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid
134a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod bu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad// de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnam// 
134a3(rgyud): phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o// pad+ma'i mtha' las tshad dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o// / 
134a4(rgyud): gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// gsang ba'i chu skyes drag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan
134a5(rgyud): gyi tshad 'gyur te// gdan nas pad+ma'i sngon mtshams snying kha ra son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin po'i rtsa ba'o// de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang byed
134a6(rgyud): bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum// gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying khar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te// phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong ba'i tshad dang de yi
134a7(rgyud): steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang // mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral pa dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di// de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni/ 
134a8(rgyud): mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no// gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no// lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni steng
134b1(rgyud): bu dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no// rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te// nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang ku de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las
134b2(rgyud): byung ba'o// lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te// skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi
134b3(rgyud): ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams// sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go// sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par
134b4(rgyud): byed cing dag kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni// 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa na mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed// ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog
134b5(rgyud): ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kya/  // chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams da// ga gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// bcom ldan
134b6(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing // slar yang thams cad tshogs pa 'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug
134b7(rgyud): pabapar 'gyur// rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir// mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por
134b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// phyi rol du ni sgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so// longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs
135a1(rgyud): pa rnams// rA la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po ma dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung // gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa
135a2(rgyud): khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong // 'dir na chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung // nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'dra
135a3(rgyud): shes chu dang ni// gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so// 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha// 
135a4(rgyud): lug dang 'khrig pa karka Tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srong rnams su// sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams da te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar
135a5(rgyud): ro// de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// 'gro ba 'di ni/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun
135a6(rgyud): gyis rab tu gang // gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan// mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can
135a7(rgyud): rnams kyis mi mthong ste// gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur// yi dgas rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams ngag
135a8(rgyud): gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so// 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te// mngal ni rab tu gzung ba mdzod cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gi/ 
135b1(rgyud): byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni// nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag
135b2(rgyud): pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o// de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste// bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis
135b3(rgyud): bcings pa ma yin no// de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye// sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'brog lhags
135b4(rgyud): dag ni nam yang ma yin no// gang dag chos la mngon 'jom das rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags// shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni
135b5(rgyud): gnyen gyi bsod nams ngag las mtho ris te// mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na ma tho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/ 'jug ngogs lus po lhung
135b6(rgyud): las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin// de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang // mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun
135b7(rgyud): zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang // bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis nyi ma khyod kyis
135b8(rgyud): thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug pa mdzod// gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug bdag ni nyes pa can// dbyug pa 'di ni ma
136a1(rgyud): yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi// 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yiso// 
136a2(rgyud): de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dag po bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsad par 'gyur// chags las sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang
136a3(rgyud): 'grogs las so// de ni rtsa nas dbyung slang mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin// de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag
136a4(rgyud): gi tshogs 'di ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing / thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs rapa 'phrog/ chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams
136a5(rgyud): bar gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste// sems na rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed// sems can rnams
136a6(rgyud): kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad// des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar gyur// sa dang chu dang me
136a7(rgyud): dang rlung dang na mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni// gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te// phyugs dang bcas
136a8(rgyud): ba mo ya~M lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang // mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin// bsreg byas dang / 
136b1(rgyud): dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tut+ma ka ni me nyid do// rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang // kak+Shi ka shis dang mu pi mnyam dang
136b2(rgyud): mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros pa bla ste// btsag ni sa'i lan tshwa gang zhig ze che rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tshwa nag po thab kyi tsha// 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra ya ba k+Sha
136b3(rgyud): ra sad dza dang // tsha la kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no// rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me// rlung dang stong pa'i rang
136b4(rgyud): bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang ba shin no// gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang da rA can nag po chu dang me dang rlung // nag po brtsegs pa stong / 
136b5(rgyud): pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya// rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang ma tshungs mgo dang dug la sogs pa'i gzugs// de dag rnam
136b6(rgyud): kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnam pa bzhi// ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min// grub pa lcags
136b7(rgyud): ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o// gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang // lcags
136b8(rgyud): ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rul pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so// dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste mi la gnas shing skol ba de ni rim pa yis/ 
137a1(rgyud): sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur// sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang mdab ma 'bugs byed
137a2(rgyud): 'dar dang bcas pa ste// 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sbyar bad rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o// mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu
137a3(rgyud): 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o// su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing bdag ni gang zhig byed// bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin
137a4(rgyud): zes na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur// ye shes med de nas bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang / 
137a5(rgyud): rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'god par 'gyur// gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma pa sregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// gang zhig rdzas ni sdig
137a6(rgyud): pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad// gang zhig byugs pas 'phral/ 
137a7(rgyud): la zangs kyi mdab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te// mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan dag rnams
137a8(rgyud): kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur gang de nges par lo dus par dang ni// bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig dbugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro// sman rnams
137b1(rgyud): thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams ngag dang 'gyur byed sde dang sbyar ba'i sde rnams dang // bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsab mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste// dngul
137b2(rgyud): rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o// gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid// glang po mi yin
137b3(rgyud): ni lan bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing rtsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni sbyangs pa de rnams slu bar bya// yang nas yang du me yi cha
137b4(rgyud): ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar slu bar bya zhing bskam pa dar bya// de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyu dar po 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang // lcags rnams
137b5(rgyud): zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag gis brgyad/ kyi cha shes 'gyur// khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying khar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid// 
137b6(rgyud): drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad
137b7(rgyud): kha sbyar byed// khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye ga sha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste// de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag
137b8(rgyud): so ser byed pa na// dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol// de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug
138a1(rgyud): bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi mdab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste// lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag
138a2(rgyud): tu dag pa'i in+d+ra ni la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo// nub tu rin chen kar ke ta sti me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul// rlung gi mdab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag las
138a3(rgyud): skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la// snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa// mdab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa 'am dngul las skyes
138a4(rgyud): pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag/ cod pan sa dngas rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste ga danod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid// ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyag
138a5(rgyud): dang phyogs bral mdab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so// dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so/ 'i dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas// oM dz+r-i
138a6(rgyud): swA hA'i mtha' ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas dza len+d+ra ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis// rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkha' rnams dag gi bsrung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya// de ltar
138a7(rgyud): srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// so phag 'gyur byed sbyar ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya// de nas slar yang / 
138a8(rgyud): snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o// slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste yang de la zhu bar bya// dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang
138b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za// zhenye rnon por gan zangs dang lhang cher skye sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa// mnyam pa gcig tu bsreg pa 'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni ljang cher dag
138b2(rgyud): po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam// dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cher bskyed pas 'phel bar bya// rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab
138b3(rgyud): tu sbyin mi bya// phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag/ de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni
138b4(rgyud): bi Da mchog rnams kyis// ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur// reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa lhang cher
138b5(rgyud): lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur// lhang tsher dag las/ lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobasu 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na ya/ nga brgyad 'gyur ro// de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin
138b6(rgyud): te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro// de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar// me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum
138b7(rgyud): phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur// reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur// 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam
138b8(rgyud): ba dag tu rab tu 'gyur// slar yang gzhan ni nyis dang gsum 'gyur gser zha'i khu ba 'bra mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so// rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad
139a1(rgyud): nas thugs par bya// gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sbrul zangs na nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu 'i dag gis dang // gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin ljang cher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni
139a2(rgyud): bsreg bya dag gis bsang byas nas// mnyam pa'i 'gyur byeng dug dang lan sde nye ba'i ri rnams dag dang lhag dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni// mkhris pa sbyar po dag gis nyin nag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni
139a3(rgyud): rdo ba'i dbus su thugs byas te// sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du ma dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa// dngul chu de ni bcu drug tsha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par
139a4(rgyud): rab tu 'gyur te slar// zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge 'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug pa sngal 'joms pa ste// dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag
139a5(rgyud): pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shi/ nga dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs// de yi skye gnas de
139a6(rgyud): rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya// de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tshal 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni// lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes
139a7(rgyud): nas nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya// nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni// sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags/ 
139a8(rgyud): kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang // ba yi 'o ma gsar ba rnying pa sA li lo ma sbyar pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang // rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba
139b1(rgyud): bos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o// stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas// nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar
139b2(rgyud): bya ste nyungs kar cha las mtha' ma skye che cha shas so// khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur// 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po sku dkar gnyer/ 
139b3(rgyud): ma dag dang bral bar byed// karko Ti dang de ba dA lI cha gsum bri ha ti dang ni ma pa ki rA ta tik+Sh+Na// bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya// de bzhin zla ba'i
139b4(rgyud): chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+ha wA ta yi chu// ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so// gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster
139b5(rgyud): byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te/ phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bca sa bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid// gsal ba mi phyugs
139b6(rgyud): sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin// de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur// darjod pa las
139b7(rgyud): li paN+Di chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus mdab ma'i khu ba yis// ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du ljags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag du yang mnyes byas nas// gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so
139b8(rgyud): so'i dus su Te ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni ba byed pa// de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dgar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis mo lon dbyings// pok+kaN dang bar snang shak+Shu ki ri mchu yis ran
140a1(rgyud): g.yong ngum chu dag kyang bsang par bya// sma gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar reng ljang cher skyes dang gser dang khab le na mnyam pa dag/ gcig tu byas nas sros
140a2(rgyud): bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste// sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog/ zla ba drug dang gnyis
140a3(rgyud): gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngas grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur// thun mong
140a4(rgyud): dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste// mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag
140a5(rgyud): las min// gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod/ ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes
140a6(rgyud): gter ni gsal bar byed// der ni nyin zhag so so'i dris su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya// ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la
140a7(rgyud): rdzas kyi dngos grub po// dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skyes gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni
140a8(rgyud): shing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu mo rnams ni sgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya// mkha' 'grom rnams sgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs pa
140b1(rgyud): byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya// klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya// dub la sogs sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i
140b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya// srog la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig
140b3(rgyud): skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ka/ 
140b4(rgyud): zhig bgrong bya min pa de yang sring gsum go nas su bsam ga tan bgrong bya'o// ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka'ang dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid// de lta
140b5(rgyud): de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig/ sgra gcan ma dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod des chu sreg za rlung dang stong pa gang / 
140b6(rgyud): lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa gcig shos dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su// gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu
140b7(rgyud): gsungs// snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid// pad+mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdad brtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go/ 
140b8(rgyud): de las ni/ gang zhig rus pa la sogs rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste// lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o// de rnam
141a1(rgyud): tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya// sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyim nyi shu zhes
141a2(rgyud): pa dang // dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa thug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs// de dag thams cad bsdus ba sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa ba ni srog go rgyu
141a3(rgyud): dang // gza' rnams dag gis rgyu ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu ba brjod// ye shes na mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog
141a4(rgyud): gsum po yang // nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang da ni slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams da ngag dang // mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang
141a5(rgyud): de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par// bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// mngon shes lnga dang / 
141a6(rgyud): stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag go spyan lnga dang // de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni// bdun te lam gyi
141a7(rgyud): yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang // bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no// 
141a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag/ skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dag ni ma 'dres pa yis sangs rgyas
141b1(rgyud): chos// rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste// khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom pa
141b2(rgyud): bya ba yin// zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis// 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi
141b3(rgyud): / ru brjod// mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug/ gza' dang ra bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no// rtsa dang bug
141b4(rgyud): pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyu dag dag ni bcu gcig go/ nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel// nyes pa
141b5(rgyud): 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rna/ mas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes ces pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur// 
141b6(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis spras pa ste// dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs// de phyir
141b7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste// dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang // gang
141b8(rgyud): la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med// sa bon dang ni
142a1(rgyud): gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med// mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag
142a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro smos pa med// brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang
142a3(rgyud): zhabs// 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srong ba gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa// rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phangs dus kyi 'bon
142a4(rgyud): lo la phyag 'tshal// spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can/ 8/ ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phangs bgrod byed rnam
142a5(rgyud): par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas// bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid
142a6(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa'i 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te// dam pa
142a7(rgyud): rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad ba// gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa// 'jig
142a8(rgyud): rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo// gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yos dang g.yon/ 
142b1(rgyud): dang mdun dang rgyab// steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang // shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes
142b2(rgyud): pa'ang skyes pa bud med min// gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud// gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig
142b3(rgyud): bral de bdag ste// de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med// de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes
142b4(rgyud): pa chen po'o// de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnya ma 'bras stor bu rnams ngag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so// sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhab
142b5(rgyud): pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed// mi shes/ gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa// myur du mnar med 'gro ba
142b6(rgyud): gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed blo ma skyo ba skyed pa po// shes rab ye shes 'thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba// nyams pa gang zhig rtse
142b7(rgyud): gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o// dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o// sbyin bdag gang yin
142b8(rgyud): gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster// ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo sgyu can// dang ldan
143a1(rgyud): dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lnga yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa// de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i nub
143a2(rgyud): rtogs pa na// sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang // de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams a li ka li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod de nyi
143a3(rgyud): ma kye// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sde ba sbyor bcing bas brjod// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan
143a4(rgyud): pa nyid du mdzod// ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa/ rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi
143a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog/ nyi ma khyo/ da dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni// tshangs pa'i rigs 'di
143a6(rgyud): las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni// dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can// 
143a7(rgyud): sut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos// ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas// thub pa'i
143a8(rgyud): dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni// rigs ldan zhadas kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje si
143b1(rgyud): drub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las byung nas ye shes lam la bzhag par mdzod// khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar
143b2(rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas khyod// bud med sbyor shing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra/ khyod ni ni yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog
143b3(rgyud): khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud// khyod ni grol yang srid po 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug/ tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par
143b4(rgyud): gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung // sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu dgasal bar byas// rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi mas
143b5(rgyud): bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA pa ra// khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi/ 
143b6(rgyud): sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la// thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlab pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob// 
143b7(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin// dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la
143b8(rgyud): gnas gyur cig/ sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas// sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang / 
144a1(rgyud): bskul ba nges par ni// dang pong khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag mtshang med pa glegs bum dag la gnas pa dang // de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad/ 
144a2(rgyud): byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen// gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
144a3(rgyud): mau yi 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs grol du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa rnams// gang dgas 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad dusu 'ching
144a4(rgyud): byed pa// de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig/ rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa'
144a5(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha// thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba/ 'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos
144a6(rgyud): gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang // bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu
144a7(rgyud): gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las// ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi
144a8(rgyud): 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dad bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las// dus phyis yon tan/ 
144b1(rgyud): phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang // dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du// mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang // dus kyi/ 
144b2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad cing bskul te// legs par sbyar gyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis// 
144b3(rgyud): dpal sa skya'i gtsug log khang chen por/ yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// / gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag
144b4(rgyud): pa yis// 'di la bskul zhing 'thun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob des// kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog/ 
144b5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shri ka lA tsakra ut+ta ra tan+t+ra rA dzA tan+t+ra hr-i da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyu da kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs
144b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang
144b7(rgyud): thob pa// rgyal mchog pho brang shaM b+ha lar grags kA la pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug sing+ge yi// gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung gyur
144b8(rgyud): zhes sogs bden te lha mchog blam khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang // zla banyis sgra gcan me lhas stengs lnga yul nam mkha' bsod nams sdig las 'byung // mi rnams pajom/ 
145a1(rgyud): srid par yi dgas dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can// rig byed pa dang thod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun la so
145a2(rgyud): ba dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der// skyes la sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni// thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams
145a3(rgyud): kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa stengs 'dir lhung de ni bden pa ste// bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rigs
145a4(rgyud): byed zhi chos khyab 'jug ches bla ma// sha yi kha zas bka/ dag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde
145a5(rgyud): gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni// sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya// srog chags rnams la srog
145a6(rgyud): chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'di nyams pa// yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min// srog gcod
145a7(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing // skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur// seng+ga
145a8(rgyud): sbrul dang ne le stag dang bya reg skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas
145b1(rgyud): lce la sha yi ro mong ro la rjes su tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro// dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan na/ 
145b2(rgyud): yang bya khwa rnams kyis bsad pa dang // pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyi shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de che bza' bar bya bar
145b3(rgyud): gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bskur min// sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su sdug
145b4(rgyud): bsngal 'gyur// srog chags yi dgas la sogs skyes gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du// gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun
145b5(rgyud): tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba rnams kyi lus ni/ nga yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang / 'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni sa
145b6(rgyud): par blta// mtho yor shes pa yod la rang gzhan rnam pa bral ba nyid las rdo ba'i mtho yor phung por 'gyur// sa stengs gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod
145b7(rgyud): pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam par bral bar legs par sad las shes// shaM b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'go ba rnams// 
145b8(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral te rtog med de rnams kyis// longs
146a1(rgyud): spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sang 'gyur ba// zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi me dang mun pa gcig pu snang bar byed pa yang // sa
146a2(rgyud): sogs dri sogs mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs drug pa gnyis// de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis// de rnams longs spyod byed po
146a3(rgyud): srog chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis brlang ba// phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum po mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung // sprul sku longs sku dang ni de bzhin
146a4(rgyud): chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po las ni rab tu byung // khong stong min ni dang gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur// de bzhin gsum la
146a5(rgyud): sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur// phung po khams dang dbang po'iyan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/ 
146a6(rgyud): rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la
146a7(rgyud): gnas// gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa// yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang // / 
146a8(rgyud): las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni// rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang yin// 
146b1(rgyud): gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa la
146b2(rgyud): las// de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid
146b3(rgyud): pas de yi phyir// srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min// sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang chub phyogs
146b4(rgyud): kyi stong pa nyid// gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal ma cho ga sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris // de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan
146b5(rgyud): 'pho min phung de'i mtshams sbyor ni// mar me kha ton rgya dang / dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon sgyur/ gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi chog
146b6(rgyud): las byung ngo zhes pa bden// chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te// phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min
146b7(rgyud): zhing de yi phyir// gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma mini la rang dang bdag gzhan la phan phun tshogs chen
146b8(rgyud): bopo'i rten gyur pa// dngos med dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad dka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab
147a1(rgyud): la spros pa med// dpe med so sor rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs
147a2(rgyud): spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs// blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsung mdzad cing // 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad
147a3(rgyud): pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i
147a4(rgyud): rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang // slar ya/ nga la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu da zhi ba gang mthong ba// rnam pa du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi
147a5(rgyud): thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms/ phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsu
147a6(rgyud): spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba// rtogs dka' brtag par
147a7(rgyud): dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid// mi mnyam bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas
147a8(rgyud): rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su// zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa stengs nam mkha'i rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings
147b1(rgyud): su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun du ni rnam par bzhugs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus// khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad+ma/ 
147b2(rgyud): chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan// yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yi khams
147b3(rgyud): la rab brten pa// skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi// 
147b4(rgyud): zhal brgya rigs 'dzin dbang po zla ba sa sogs yul dang yul da can bdag po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya pa de rgyu la das gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs
147b5(rgyud): rnams la// de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur/ ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga/ dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs
147b6(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas btab des// gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams
147b7(rgyud): gang zhig du// thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po
147b8(rgyud): ste// sreg gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams// khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni las yin rdul ni srog chags phung po yi// de yi thabs kyis/ 
148a1(rgyud): sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bu sa gzhan du// rang gi las kyi phung po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs
148a2(rgyud): par byed// de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu la ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jigs 'gyur sreg byed me ni 'ba' zhig gi/ 
148a3(rgyud): dkar po'i bsam gtan dag bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems can lus ngag las// pad+ma khyab byed snying po'i ze'u 'bru'i dbang phyug dag bcom thig le bzang po sgom par
148a4(rgyud): byed// de bus lus po sbas pa brtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gas dang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po
148a5(rgyud): mchod 'os pa// bsam gtan 'di ni sreg lugs za ba/ sa ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong // gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin
148a6(rgyud): dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhag
148a7(rgyud): gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa rnams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la
148a8(rgyud): zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan/ 
148b1(rgyud): la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe/ 
148b2(rgyud): pa la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel// de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog
148b3(rgyud): pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan
148b4(rgyud): du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa la des ldog gyur pa nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel ba ra 'gyur// de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du/ 
148b5(rgyud): 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab tha khas dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs da
148b6(rgyud): nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa
148b7(rgyud): dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma sprad par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan
148b8(rgyud): pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyi mo nam mkha' 'bar ba la sogs pas// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil
149a1(rgyud): du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong // srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas
149a2(rgyud): mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed// rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od
149a3(rgyud): mang 'phro bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bor dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur// nam mkha' ra bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa
149a4(rgyud): nyid mthong bso// nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod cha dgas 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so// yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur
149a5(rgyud): te khu ba dri med bde ba yis// sna rtser bltas pas nga rgya la 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung las so// srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas
149a6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim pa zhin sa zung re// khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la
149a7(rgyud): tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid// khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang
149a8(rgyud): gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnams
149b1(rgyud): dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lta ba ye shes spyan// rgyu 'thun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na
149b2(rgyud): nges par rdo rje 'dzin// lus kyi sa bon khu ba phab ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying kha sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig
149b3(rgyud): gang gis mgrin pA da rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu gar
149b4(rgyud): 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag med gang
149b5(rgyud): gis rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems / snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor/ 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i
149b6(rgyud): skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma mgrin par yang // sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug rings te// gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa
149b7(rgyud): tsan ni stong pa mun pa'i khams// gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drag po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang // gzugs kyi phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams
149b8(rgyud): kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi// dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig kod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams kyang
150a1(rgyud): sngon mo la sogs de rnams so// gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom
150a2(rgyud): 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed do// sgra gcan dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pa gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste// mjug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa
150a3(rgyud): gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems// srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes
150a4(rgyud): rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms pa byang chub sems// dgyes pa 'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dang rang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur// zhal brgyad pa la
150a5(rgyud): zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pas tshangs pa bde ba dang bcwa/ sa dam tshig sems// lte bar srog rlung bkang bas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid// 
150a6(rgyud): snying khar bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur/ 
150a7(rgyud): dpral ba rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras// lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang / 
150a8(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshigs dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug
150b1(rgyud): gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lor brgyad// mgrin par sum cu
150b2(rgyud): rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha// 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog/ 
150b3(rgyud): tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lha// dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku/ rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gun mkha' lag
150b4(rgyud): pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zla ba'i cha/ shas sum cu na mkha' na mkha' gdengs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla bzang po// rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la
150b5(rgyud): gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje chu dang bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis ldag par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang
150b6(rgyud): pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la// mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng+ge ste// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri
150b7(rgyud): ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa// dpal ldan 'das par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung // der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams
150b8(rgyud): de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad// rtse dang sha dang rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'das pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas// srog chags so so'i sangs rgyas lha yul
151a1(rgyud): bar snang sa stengs rang rang gnas su gtso bo'i gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin// rang byin rlabs
151a2(rgyud): pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga bzung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus por yang // bdud rnams yang dag bzung // 
151a3(rgyud): phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dod
151a4(rgyud): par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang dro// bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis// bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang
151a5(rgyud): yod min lha yul sa stengs bsod nams tshul khrims rna/ ma par dman// stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pa/ sa rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas
151a6(rgyud): pa de// brten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas sgrub pa min// bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi// 
151a7(rgyud): bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// / 
151a8(rgyud): de ni shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha bshos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas// sa 'og 'jig rten
151b1(rgyud): lha yul sa stengs par snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sdug gang zhig ni// zla ba gcig la namakha' rnam pa/ 
151b2(rgyud): stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun par dbyer med bzlas// steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lan gsum bral nas srog rlung gang bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas// grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin
151b3(rgyud): pa lta bur na mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa de// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal sring chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos
