151b4(rgyud): po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mig g.yo dri bral blo byed cing // tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru// bsod nams ye shes tshul
151b5(rgyud): khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral nas rdo rje sems dpa'/ 'gyur// shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas long mi spyod// yon tan ma
151b6(rgyud): lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longs spyod min// sha dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// de yis/ 
151b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur// byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro// nyin
151b8(rgyud): byed dus sum mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nye ba rnams kyi tshang dus su// dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro// chang nye bud med rnam
152a1(rgyud): kyi dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hU ti dman rigs cis ma yin// gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pu nyid du dam 'cha' la// gang gis bsgrub bya/ 
152a2(rgyud): med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'go ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan
152a3(rgyud): tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bca' na mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du// sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca' bum pa
152a4(rgyud): lta bur byas te shin tu stsol bas byung ba'i phyir// nam mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rta ga nges par grub// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro yi yul rnam
152a5(rgyud): bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin// de ni gang gis thog/ mar rtogs pas sa stengs par snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni// rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ 
152a6(rgyud): ba de ni sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin lo// gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa stengs par snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis// rna bas don rnams nges par rtog par gyur pas
152a7(rgyud): ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal ba gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas// mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs
152a8(rgyud): rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam// rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi
152b1(rgyud): gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min// dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni// rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis
152b2(rgyud): bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa ste// byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos mi mthun par de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la
152b3(rgyud): gcig shos de med do// gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin// mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par gsal byas
152b4(rgyud): de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin// sgra dang don dag gal te ga cig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur te na mkha' tsam dong
152b5(rgyud): gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid// stong pa sgra dang ldan pa ra gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgra med 'gyu// ro// gang gis na mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g.yo ba'i
152b6(rgyud): 'gro ba des na med pa nyid// gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos ma mthun las grub gyur na// de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur// 
152b7(rgyud): na mkha' sa stengs dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang // lha dang srin po dang ni rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas lha min klu// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi
152b8(rgyud): rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig du yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis// dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan
153a1(rgyud): dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na// dpe ni na mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub// mo ga sham bu mo na mkha' tsam
153a2(rgyud): las skyes pa na mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams// 
153a3(rgyud): ni phyi dang tha dad min// gal te lha cig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min// 
153a4(rgyud): srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang na mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid
153a5(rgyud): lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnam/ sa rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grag/ srog tsho/ gas rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus
153a6(rgyud): gzhan bsam pas 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur// srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po
153a7(rgyud): bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te// sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'go// srog chags srog dang lhan cig/ 
153a8(rgyud): bems po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa// srid pa sum cu rtsa cig rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro// gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang
153b1(rgyud): bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni// nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu
153b2(rgyud): 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med na sems med la// srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bems po dag
153b3(rgyud): dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dag/ phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung bas na// ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i chos rnams
153b4(rgyud): 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang na gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med// ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag
153b5(rgyud): gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir ri/ ga pa dang ni rigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du/ 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag
153b6(rgyud): kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag kyang bya ba yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// tha ma sa cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam
153b7(rgyud): mkha'i khams// gzugs dang reg pa sgra dang dri dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min// rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang byung ba las min zhing me dang 'din mas
153b8(rgyud): min// sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs par 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min// rkang dang rus pa chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshil bu lpags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam/ 
154a1(rgyud): shig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// der ni lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de// 'dod chags
154a2(rgyud): gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// gal te 'ge ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du// de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba
154a3(rgyud): rnams rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig 'di yi ma rig blo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig min// sngon du rnam par dag pa lhan skyes bems po yang
154a4(rgyud): ni rig pa rnams dag 'gyur// bems po ma lus rnam pa ra rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe ni rab tu rtogs pa sa grub// de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas
154a5(rgyud): tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur// bye brag par gyu/ ra yang na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu/ gu sogs// gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar
154a6(rgyud): 'gyur te rgyal rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin// thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' lo// phra rab rdul rnams 'das pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i
154a7(rgyud): srid pa rdul phran phung po min// rdul phran bral te na mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min// gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po
154a8(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// 'thung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul bran de rdul kyang // sdud dang skyed pa bral bas na mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan
154b1(rgyud): pas// phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis na mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub// dngul chu
154b2(rgyud): nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med cha mang chad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min// cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po che med min// dngul chus zangs
154b3(rgyud): ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la
154b4(rgyud): gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min/ rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las na mkha'id dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grag/ gang phyir
154b5(rgyud): rmos long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin/ de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yon gyi bag
154b6(rgyud): chags min// gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min// sna nang bcas pa gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin/ 
154b7(rgyud): lce yi nad can ro mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed// rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'das
154b8(rgyud): pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yis// drag po dang ni tshangs po'ang seng ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba
155a1(rgyud): mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung // 'di ni/ 
155a2(rgyud): thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis yang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min kla dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams
155a3(rgyud): dang na mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang
155a4(rgyud): gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus go sum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa tha dmas cad rdul phran gyis stong na mkha'i dkyil ltar so// ngan pa 'am rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen
155a5(rgyud): pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin// gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas te// gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs
155a6(rgyud): lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang // byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs pud/ 
155a7(rgyud): bo gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min// gang zhig gzugs
155a8(rgyud): sogs khams drug dang ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug/ stong pa snang dang
155b1(rgyud): mun pas gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa// snang bas rab tu sang ba rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min// 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal / 
155b2(rgyud): bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po// klu sgrub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing // nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon
155b3(rgyud): can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtho'i can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung // ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag
155b4(rgyud): rngub dag kyang de bzhin thong bar chang 'thung zhing // kha Ta ga/ dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu rgyu ba
155b5(rgyud): ster ba na bza' sngon po can// sha yaM dam tshig can rgyathod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o// gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs
155b6(rgyud): ba'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur// ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon
155b7(rgyud): nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed/ sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can
155b8(rgyud): gyis rgyal po la 'doms po// gang gi ming gis rnam rtog yod kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min// de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor
156a1(rgyud): 'phrog 'dod pa ni// log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur// skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs byu
156a2(rgyud): kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes
156a3(rgyud): phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdad kyis bsres par 'gyur// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi
156a4(rgyud): rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyi da ra gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa nga'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu
156a5(rgyud): 'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum cu rtsa dra ga rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur// bdud kyis/ 
156a6(rgyud): sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhig sems can bslu phyir kha cig du ni 'jigs pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed// lha rnams sha
156a7(rgyud): yis dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed// sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha cig du yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jig byed ston par byed// long ba rlag
156a8(rgyud): phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lha'i 'jig byed dus ni mo lha rab tu byung // bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thungs par gyur// nya dang rus spol phag rgod mi yi
156b1(rgyud): seng ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ri dgas la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par khyab 'jug gis mi bza'// sa gsum bla mas yi dgra
156b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos ra ma na yi chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas// 'jigs sde med pas skyabs sed/ 
156b3(rgyud): bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kar mi ri yis sha yi ched du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing // lha dang kA yi dbang po rnams
156b4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos// lha ba shos 'bras chan khur ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa'o/ thug sha khar rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams
156b5(rgyud): la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang / sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor brtsas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la// khrus bcas
156b6(rgyud): sbrang rtsi mar sar za zhing tsan da na me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod// gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min// srin po'i dbang po
156b7(rgyud): mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng ges sprad// mdung can ma dang dr-i pa ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te khyo mo lnga lnga yang // gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod
156b8(rgyud): nang gi chu yi gtsang sbra an+d+ra la sogs yul// sin d+ha'i yul na ba glang sha ba kha ba chen skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams tshang 'thung zhing // gA re sogs na ma he d+hu sha ma kha bar mi se ren rta glang
157a1(rgyud): sha/ de dzing stag dang mi sha zal po kar yul na bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha/ bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kan+d+ha ra yi yul// nyin dang
157a2(rgyud): mtshan gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung // bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad
157a3(rgyud): pa'i// khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i bi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pa dag shi na ma dag bu yi chung mar bag ma len pa nges par go kha'i yul// rug mar sman
157a4(rgyud): zla'i tsha mo len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus// so ra me dang tsam pa ka sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo'ang yin// spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po
157a5(rgyud): kaR+ShA ta la sogs par ro// ma yi tsha mo chung mar len la ma/ la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul// bod na khru/ sa dang gtsang sbra med la pa ru lAn ta re go stan rigs ngan
157a6(rgyud): yul// skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed// gal te yul ches spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min// 
157a7(rgyud): sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i yul can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang song mchog gi bka' thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis// mtho ris don
157a8(rgyud): du mi dang ba glang gsod cing b+ha gar bkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams// ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung
157b1(rgyud): ba b+ha ga mchog bkrugs rta yi po rtags bcad pa la// khu ba khrag gis rnam par bgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed// de lta'i sha ba'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin
157b2(rgyud): rig byed ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyis grub// nges pa dang ldan ni pa'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i dati mitho ris rnam par nyams// pa la sogs pa'i don du che babyed cing khyim pa
157b3(rgyud): mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod// dga'athub rnams ni 'che ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung shing gong ma goms sogs yod // daN+DI dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin
157b4(rgyud): 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang gi phyir// shes pas dgrol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag gsod pa gnyi des skyes rnams ni ngu 'bong 'gro// lha la sogs pa mchod
157b5(rgyud): nyid pas gal te sha zos pa la nyes pa mi skyed na// bcu gnyi sa pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshe sa dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i du sa dag tu// khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi
157b6(rgyud): ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'// pha la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams// 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi
157b7(rgyud): rigs brgyud rnam par spangs// bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mthe ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas// gnas dang gnasu rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang
157b8(rgyud): ster byed su zhig ni// ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan bzhugs pa// bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na/ bram ze
158a1(rgyud): la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur// gang gi pha dag dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis yi dgas skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges pa'i bu
158a2(rgyud): yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed// tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster
158a3(rgyud): ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs skyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur// zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo sems can dang bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog
158a4(rgyud): tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag/ gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba// gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor
158a5(rgyud): yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul/ min// sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig paragyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshangs gzugs sna
158a6(rgyud): tshegs nam mkha' tsam yang seng ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid te// yi dgas la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman// sa dang chu dang
158a7(rgyud): me yi lus can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis bzung bya'i kha dog gzugs// dri ni sna yis bzung bya 'dir
158a8(rgyud): ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis// gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de
158b1(rgyud): tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min// mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa na mkha' tsam la na mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin pa
158b2(rgyud): rlung rnams ro yi dbang po gnyis// bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mo mar me med na yang // byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi
158b3(rgyud): dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur// srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang // bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na
158b4(rgyud): skar ma ma lus kyang // bya rog srin bya lce spyang khri rnams dam lus 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston/ de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus sgrub pa'i theb brang dag gis
158b5(rgyud): skyes bu rnams la yang // byol song rnams ni gang du rang gi sems la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'a cha' la// de dag shes pa bram ze rnams la srid pa gang
158b6(rgyud): las mig gis bzung byi'i rgyu gzhan min// lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed// bram ze shi nas yi dgas gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la
158b7(rgyud): zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed// sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed// blo dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur
158b8(rgyud): ba'i yi dgas spyod pa ltos// mun pa bsal ba min par gyur la mun las khwa ta de yi bshang ba las byung ba// mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyed byed des na mes po khA ta mchod
159a1(rgyud): par 'os// ba glang rgya ba dang rwa yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag byed cing // khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ 
159a2(rgyud): pa ldag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams// sgra med yi ge med las na mkhar 'gyur te na mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las// rlung las me la me las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las 'bras bu'i
159a3(rgyud): kha zas rnams// zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/ bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags
159a4(rgyud): phung po rab tu 'byung // mo bsham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha da ltar phra// nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul
159a5(rgyud): dang bral zhing yon tan med pa na mkha'i rtags// rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang na mkha'i dang // sa po de rnams so// gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing
159a6(rgyud): nam mkha'i sa stengs dag tu zhing ba'i grub mthar ldan// gang zhig de yis nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnams gsum lam ldan sgar mo 'jigs byed ma// de ni nam mkha' las 'das na mkha'i
159a7(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings 'khyil pa can// na mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma// 'chu 'phyang skar ma'i mig
159a8(rgyud): can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed za byed rnams kyi tha byed ma// gsal dang mi gsal cig ma rigs las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma// rig ma'i 'khor
159b1(rgyud): lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs// mi gsal bya rog ra yi gzhu la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan ru sbal spu yis byas// nam mkha' me/ 
159b2(rgyud): tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar 'gyur na// sangs rgyas
159b3(rgyud): pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min// 'di ni thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems can rnams kyi bsod// 
159b4(rgyud): nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur// gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyis bsgrubs/ 
159b5(rgyud): grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis ni de rnams de/ sa par 'bebs par byed pa ste// stag la sogs pa/ 'gas la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon che sogs
159b6(rgyud): kyis min// sngags kyis the brang la sogs rnams kyis sa yi 'khor yug rtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas
159b7(rgyud): bsgrubs nas// gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster// skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams
159b8(rgyud): cad 'joms par byed// seng ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur// byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las
160a1(rgyud): gzhan ma gsungs// dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu b+ha gar bkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs
160a2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min// sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa yi dgas sa gzhir shing cig las ni gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis
160a3(rgyud): byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can gyis grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas lhas 'jug
160a4(rgyud): pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bsko/ dar bar ston// grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la ston byed// sangs rgyas
160a5(rgyud): rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min// grub pa rnams kyis ri dgas rigs bskyed ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin// 
160a6(rgyud): dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// gang zhig drag po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston// 
160a7(rgyud): rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khang sa stengs las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs par bzhag par gyur pas thar pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal po
160a8(rgyud): srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin// sha yi/ 
160b1(rgyud): bas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lnga min rigs su skyes// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lnga yi rigs su 'di ste'o// mgo zlum dang ni yu/ 
160b2(rgyud): sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro// mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro// sems can phan pa byas pas
160b3(rgyud): bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par na mkha' tsam pos ston// sangs
160b4(rgyud): rgyas rnams dang 'jig byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can de rnams kyis bstan pa lha rten gang // g.yul du zhug/ das pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma
160b5(rgyud): lus 'jig par byed// de rnams rigs gcig gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par smra dang gtsang sbra rab tu 'jugagazhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan
160b6(rgyud): rang gi chung ma bsten// khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang // srog dang thun gsum dag dag dang nyi ma ri la shar bar gyur nas ldan lngar
160b7(rgyud): phyag byed cing // sa steng lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob// drag po'i g.yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal/ 
160b8(rgyud): po ni// rgyal po thab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod nas su// sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung brgyud
161a1(rgyud): 'chad par 'byung // grub pa bya Di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can// dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun
161a2(rgyud): la phan 'dogs pa// slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lta dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod
161a3(rgyud): dge bcu lam gyis grub par gyur pa 'phags pa'i lha dang la ba'i na bza' rta dbyangs dang // phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa pad+ma'i myu gu zhes// bong go sa la rtog pa'i
161a4(rgyud): rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi dang // de bzhin ga/ zhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phro/ dag byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs// sa dang chu dang
161a5(rgyud): byin za rlung dang na mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yang yan lag drug/ de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// nyi ma gang du tshangadra/ 
161a6(rgyud): pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jig par 'gyur ba des na dus phyi mar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor gla glo dang ni mu stegs 'jig par 'gyur// thung dang ring ba lnga rnams rang bzhin
161a7(rgyud): yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// a sogs ma ning dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsungs nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir ro// ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du
161a8(rgyud): a ko ka ni ring po phyugs bdag tshig las 'gyur// de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod// thog ma'i lo nas na mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba/ 
161b1(rgyud): tsin tsi ni yi dbang phyug 'byung // de yi bka' yis yi dgas dbang bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan skar mor byin rlabs pa// phyi nas sa stengs son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug
161b2(rgyud): cu rtsa brgyad gla glo yi// mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jigs par byed// der ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i
161b3(rgyud): yul// gla glo rnams kyi lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de ngo yis brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshogs skye dgu rnams ni der bzhag nas// 
161b4(rgyud): bde la bkod de ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya// nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dang dadu po mig gis dus kyi dus su son pa'i lo yi tshad// slar
161b5(rgyud): yang skye bo rnams ni gla glor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad lo la/ bsgyur ba'i bar// yang nas yang dung yis rtsod pa/ 'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid// dzi/ 
161b6(rgyud): srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan na mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams// phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lha na mkha' sa gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba glang sogs// sa 'og kla dang
161b7(rgyud): lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang // 
161b8(rgyud): stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod// slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod// sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dregs
162a1(rgyud): spyod blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon// klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// slar yang de la
162a2(rgyud): bsrung ba bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya// zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza' lha me tog
162a3(rgyud): bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lhag la// 'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi gtor ma lha yi bla ma'o thug sha khar gyis// pa ba sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas
162a4(rgyud): spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de skyon la// nyi ma slar yang phyo/ dag su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing khur ba 'bras da chen gyis// glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas
162a5(rgyud): pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar// 'bru dang / mar sar 'o ma dur ba mnga' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma 'i mchod yon btung // sbyin sreg rjes la dung phor gang / 
162a6(rgyud): ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta dang glang po khrus pa'o// yi dgas la sogs gtor ma sran chen sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur// srin po la sogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje
162a7(rgyud): phur bus phyogs mtshams rtogs par phur bus gdab// slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi tshogs rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye
162a8(rgyud): dgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad+ma lnga yis bskor// gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang lnga/ 
162b1(rgyud): sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol tu// gang zhig zur rnams dar dpyangs bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur// rgyal chen phyogs kyi/ 
162b2(rgyud): zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams// de nang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phreng du 'gyur// pad+ma'i ge/ 
162b3(rgyud): sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do// chu skyes mdab mar srung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum par de// de ltar pad+ma gnyis la gyur te/ 
162b4(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis der// klu rnam das bung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar de bzhi ngan lha dang lha min dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang
162b5(rgyud): ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rna mas// srung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ te khrag dang gi wang la sogs rnams kyis bri// rdzogs
162b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus srang 'khor gsungs// bud med bu 'dod pa las bu dang rgyal po dag dang g.yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// 
162b7(rgyud): nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur// skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis so// 
162b8(rgyud): bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i lam gyi mchode las na mkha' sogs la min// bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu pa 'am ral pa can nam
163a1(rgyud): dbyug gu can// dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams// sum cu'i dam tshig can gyi mi dbang pos de rnams
163a2(rgyud): yul nas bskrad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las byas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin// yug sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa sprad nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras
163a3(rgyud): ster me la 'tsho bor byed// gang du yul na bdud ris de yod mi bdag dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin// rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dag dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nam
163a4(rgyud): kyis// skal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yu dal sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa stengs ma lus mi yi rgyal po sprin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha
163a5(rgyud): rgyal po// bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtswa da pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// skyes bu bas ma gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes
163a6(rgyud): rab kyis thabs 'phel// shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te 'khor ba
163a7(rgyud): byon pa ma yin na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig namakha'i khams rnams su// de ni brdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo'i
163a8(rgyud): gar bzhugs shes pa// 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las gzhan du min// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams sa steng dmyal ba'i dmyal bas/ 
163b1(rgyud): 'dir zhi ba la sogs kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha
163b2(rgyud): yul sa steng dag nas ltung bar 'gyur// skyon ngos byin rlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam la'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis brjin tshig 'jam/ 
163b3(rgyud): pos bdag nyid drung du khrid par byed// chang pa stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig bu zhes brjod// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyis laganas shin tu snyan pa'i
163b4(rgyud): tshig gis bdag nyid drung du 'khrid// na mkha' tsam zhig/ ston zhing bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa long zhig bu zhes gsung // sems can rnams kyis bsams
163b5(rgyud): pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong / sal bar mdzad// de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyi ni thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden pa yin/ 
163b6(rgyud): gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang
163b7(rgyud): chub lung bstan to// mo gsham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams// srog ni nam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas
163b8(rgyud): glog cing dgod// srog chags bya rog rwa min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor// srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa steng 'chi ba'i tshe/ 
164a1(rgyud): na mi ltung med// rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang
164a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang // khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// de kun she b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs
164a3(rgyud): gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bstan// dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams btul mdzad pa// de kun sha b+ha la yi dpal ldan ka lA pa mi
164a4(rgyud): skyed mos tshal gyis dus 'khor gyi// don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas dris// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng ge'i khril
164a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs/ dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyim// rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya
164a6(rgyud): rdzogs so// l-its+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong mnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha
164a7(rgyud): sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dza la saM ba ra nA ma ut+ta ra tan+ta/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro rgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma// dpal rnga
164a8(rgyud): rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 
164b1(rgyud): 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba min// dngu/ 
164b2(rgyud): mar yang ni mi dmig so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin
164b3(rgyud): gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo
164b4(rgyud): yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub// ngo / mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brda ra bstan to// DA ni na mkha' 'gro ba zhes// khams las
164b5(rgyud): mngon du brtags pa ste// na mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pa/ mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis/ 
164b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par btags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs/ 
164b7(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// she zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu/ 
164b8(rgyud): kun nas thams cad ni bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems pa'i ting 'dzin dang / byang chub steng/ 
165a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin
165a2(rgyud): nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams
165a3(rgyud): gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbying
165a4(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// namakha' dbyings kyi mtha' ma/ ngas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam pa kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gon/ 
165a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bo// mkha' 'gro ma bde mchog go// bskal pabye ba grangs med par/ sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag
165a6(rgyud): gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de ni bdag gi brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog
165a7(rgyud): go// rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnam
165a8(rgyud): 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur
165b1(rgyud): gyi byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor ba// sangs rgyas/ 
165b2(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yi
165b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa
165b4(rgyud): de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyadam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las de de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag
165b5(rgyud): rgya brtags pa ste dang po'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems da pa'i de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
165b6(rgyud): sbyor ba// mkha' 'go sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug
165b7(rgyud): bde ba che// de bas bde ba nyid kyi ni// sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dang sdom mi
165b8(rgyud): dgos// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dka' bas 'grub// de bas ci ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun pa de bzhin thams cad sbyor// spyad
166a1(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa 'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung / 
166a2(rgyud): gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid
166a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad sgrub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur// bskul pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams
166a4(rgyud): cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gis ni// bsgrubs na kun du 'gro ba 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchogada'adi ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad
166a5(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sem sa dpar bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/ bsod nam/ 
166a6(rgyud): chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// shin tu byin gyis brlabs na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
166a7(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / 
166a8(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni rig pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma
166b1(rgyud): zhugs pa'ang // bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad grub// 'di/ 
166b2(rgyud): dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid
166b3(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par// de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis// bkod/ 
166b4(rgyud): pa rab 'byam tshogs dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod ba mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
166b5(rgyud): rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni gzhir 'gyur/ grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// 
166b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khoms gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis// ci ltar bde bar bsten byed cing // rang gi lha
166b7(rgyud): yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub pa
166b8(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tshe nad med bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad
167a1(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// 
167a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu sbyor bar brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o// / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom
167a3(rgyud): ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dang ldan rang gi dam tshig
167a4(rgyud): bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor/ dbang phyug bde ba tshe// rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// 
167a5(rgyud): so so rjes su rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi/ mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// 
167a6(rgyud): de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig
167a7(rgyud): spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar// thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo
167a8(rgyud): yis// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni// ma lus skal pa bzang po kun// bde ba so so rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya 'di
167b1(rgyud): yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lnga// namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'dzin/ 
167b2(rgyud): du// phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun nas byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis/ 
167b3(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur/ 
167b4(rgyud): lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjes
167b5(rgyud): sbyor ba mchod byed cing // rtag tu myang bar byed pa na// shin tu/ sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams/ cad bdag nyid kyi// ras ya na bde ba des// rdo rje sems
167b6(rgyud): dpo'i dpal tshe dang // lang tshe nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi
167b7(rgyud): mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod
167b8(rgyud): ba bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor lo sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// dngos grub kun
168a1(rgyud): gyi bde mos pas// de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ 
168a2(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyis bde myos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// namakha'i dbyings kyi mthar klas pa'i// dbang phyug kun gyi bde myos pa// dam pa rgya
168a3(rgyud): gang yang ming // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog nges// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo
168a4(rgyud): sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mtsho gi las// lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba bskal
168a5(rgyud): pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom lda na 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 
168a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// skal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba// 'dod
168a7(rgyud): chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs che dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par de spyod do// sangs rgyas pa
168a8(rgyud): rol phyin grub pa// gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub
168b1(rgyud): bde chen po// skal ba bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// bskal pa bzang po longs
168b2(rgyud): spyod kun// rang gis spyad par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ 
168b3(rgyud): khoms gsum dag na mo lus pa'o// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi
168b4(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na// longs daspyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu cheni las ni bkra shi sa brtan// phrogs las grub dang dran las 'ga'// 
168b5(rgyud): 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid// 'jig rten da khang phyug kun dang bcas// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs
168b6(rgyud): nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yis
168b7(rgyud): mi sbyin cing yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed
168b8(rgyud): na// las mchog dag ni rab 'byam dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za// sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// 
169a1(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba rab grub pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul
169a2(rgyud): pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar spyod pa 'thun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldan lha dag las// dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges pa
169a3(rgyud): 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar pha rol mu steg
169a4(rgyud): rnams// chos dang 'thun par cher gcod do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyug
169a5(rgyud): bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su/ nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pa dgyes shing rol// 
169a6(rgyud): dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de
169a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang
169a8(rgyud): byang chub dka' ba rnams// brtan par sems can dag la smin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems can kun gyi don byed cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa
169b1(rgyud): kun tu srid par gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'as de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sna/ 
169b2(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyi skal ba bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor pa com ldan 'das// rdo rje sam
169b3(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyor// rtog pa'i
169b4(rgyud): cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba
169b5(rgyud): thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid da ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas// sems can kun don rnams sprul na// myur du shin tu
169b6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am// yang na de bzhin lo re ni// ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo thams
169b7(rgyud): cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lugs su// bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod
169b8(rgyud): ba yis/ slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// mchod pa byas nas des smyung po// de las gnon yang rtog kun gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad nam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i/ 
170a1(rgyud): gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag
170a2(rgyud): nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste// rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las
170a3(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
170a4(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i ma chog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun dgyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs
170a5(rgyud): rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sem sa dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba / bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
170a6(rgyud): gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu ston pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal
170a7(rgyud): 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang
170a8(rgyud): ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyis snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la// 
170b1(rgyud): sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// yang
170b2(rgyud): dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus// dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag
170b3(rgyud): nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang
170b4(rgyud): tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang snyun du yod pa'ang / min// dngos grub mtha' med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par
170b5(rgyud): rtsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung / smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen
170b6(rgyud): bo'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog
170b7(rgyud): rtsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sprin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang dam pa brnyes// khams
170b8(rgyud): gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas
171a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas// bstod/ 
171a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis/ dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni lta bu mi ngom pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang // legs so zhes nas dngos grub ni// mchog rnams
171a3(rgyud): kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad// de nas de
171a4(rgyud): yis sgrub pa dang // shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub dag/ gang gi das srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob pa shad// rdo rje sa gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad
171a5(rgyud): bsdu bar bya// thal mo lan gsum rnam par sbyar ba yi// thal ma/ lan gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gang dag ga nga lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor
171a6(rgyud): ba yas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang // Sha Da ba la sogs pa yi// ci nas yongs su mi skyo bar// rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya// kun tu kun nas thams
171a7(rgyud): cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa// rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin
171a8(rgyud): pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glur blangs pas// kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor
171b1(rgyud): dam pa rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba// de
171b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste// de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par bkrol// dpal
171b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs byung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du
171b4(rgyud): sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro gtu ma gdug par gyur// shin tu gdug par khro ba yis// // 'o dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sems
171b5(rgyud): can de/ bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas// shin tu ga/ dug pa chen por gyur// blo ni bdud kyis byin rlabs/ nas// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad// phra men ma dang gnod
171b6(rgyud): byed gdon// bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid// shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur pan gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub po rnams la yang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed// bstan pa dag
171b7(rgyud): kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha// tshangs pa drung du nye ba re dong // tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong // tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams
171b8(rgyud): kyang // lha chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen dang // rdo rje can la skyabs su dong // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni/ 
172a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dpung ba gnyis ni rdo rje bcings// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bstsu/ 
172a2(rgyud): mdzad na// de mi bka' tsam gyis bsgrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshigs bcings pa// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na// gzhan lnga smos kyang tsanag dgos// rdo rje se rgo'i
172a3(rgyud): gtogs pas// 'jig rten khams nim lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til bru bzhin tu rgyus// shin tu gdug par gtum pa la// nibs pan par mi 'gyur te// 
172a4(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kying // 'jig rkyen gsus dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros
172a5(rgyud): yis// khams gsum ma lus spos ci dgos// de nasas yin mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs rang dro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor babrum
172a6(rgyud): bcom ldan de nyid rnam 'byong ba// rdo rje khro bar gyur nas byung / dpal chen rdo rje ru// 'ab bas thal bas rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon par 'bar ba'i dang // da kyi dkyil 'khor ma
172a7(rgyud): 8//  ga chen pa'i dus snang drag/ du rjong kyi ni mi ba drwa// ra bachen po sgra bar ba// yod yang po'i du ldan can// 'jigs pa chen podus ltar drag/ drung srong bzhin du
172a8(rgyud): khrol sogs pa'i nul ldan po// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma khro gtor bcas par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu lang dbang chen nyid dbang bcas// 'i blag ni/ 
172b1(rgyud): rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni bsil ba yis// thams cad pab nas slar yang ni// thal ba
172b2(rgyud): gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs// bdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal po de ni de dag dang // lhan cig/ 
172b3(rgyud): dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas
172b4(rgyud): shing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams
172b5(rgyud): ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul
172b6(rgyud): ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang
172b7(rgyud): chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chos su gnas par gyur// ci ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pa mi gos pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum
172b8(rgyud): gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag/ 'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na// rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod
173a1(rgyud): chags thams cad dag pas na// mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro// kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang
173a2(rgyud): rgyal// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// pad+mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// pad+mo gar dbang la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha'
173a3(rgyud): klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par spangs// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ 
173a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngo na byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gdug cing brkam par gyur// shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis// 
173a5(rgyud): dgas rnams dang dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni// shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur// bkres de nga skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed/ 
173a6(rgyud): shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur// na mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs// kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs
173a7(rgyud): mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// rab tu gdung
173a8(rgyud): ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du// rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi// nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs
173b1(rgyud): kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol// dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs byung ba'o// / 'das pa'i dus na
173b2(rgyud): sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar 'gyur// shin tu/ 
173b3(rgyud): brtson 'grus chung ba yis// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyar ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal
173b4(rgyud): ni byung bar gyur// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdi dag med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i// sems can
173b5(rgyud): rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byi ba rkun po chom po yis// thams cad rnam pa/ ra sbyong bar byed// brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang // ngo 'thon stobs
173b6(rgyud): kyis de bzhin du// ngag cha lnga yis bskal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna
173b7(rgyud): tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par gyur// khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag pos gnon// sdig
173b8(rgyud): med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas// lha mo b+hi mo phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas// 
174a1(rgyud): rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas// lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs// de tshe long / 
174a2(rgyud): spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni ra bo mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
174a3(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs/ 
174a4(rgyud): dang rtsal gyis grub pa yis// drag shul sbyor bas bsku da bas na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par/ rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha'
174a5(rgyud): yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// tham/ sa cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs
174a6(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams/

174b1(rgyud): can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gi dbugs phyung ba'o// / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// namakha'i dbyings kyi ma

174b3(rgyud): byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa
174b4(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// / dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde
174b5(rgyud): 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad/ bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshes
174b6(rgyud): pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pa smras// dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pa na// rdo rje klu dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnar 'phrul// me tog
174b7(rgyud): bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam// skying mos tshal/ 
174b8(rgyud): la sogs pa sgrub// der ni dang por gdan bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad+mar ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams
175a1(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de ni rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// stan de dag ni thams cad la// rdzi/ 
175a2(rgyud): ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs// sgo srung dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// bud
175a3(rgyud): med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// mi yi tshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi
175a4(rgyud): dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o// rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas// mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni// mthu yi ras rab tu grub pa ste// pad+mo'i snod kyi nang du bzhag chags pa
175a5(rgyud): chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg sa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di/ ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal/ 
175a6(rgyud): chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag
175a7(rgyud): pa ni// ra sa ya na kun slong ba// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs nas// rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
175a8(rgyud): kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyar ba// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde mchog gis// 'dus pa der na
175b1(rgyud): shuzhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// 'dis ni
175b2(rgyud): srung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'byor pa
175b3(rgyud): yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos bzang bgos nas ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos// slong pas dal gyis dal gyis su// gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// 
175b4(rgyud): bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas danyi zla rnams// shar bdag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pakun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub
175b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// nges po'i lam dang kun ldan pa// rnam par/ 'das pas rnam par rgyan// brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni// stong pa shin tu rnal 'byer/ 
175b6(rgyud): yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhangs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ 'di dag nyid kyi glur blang
175b7(rgyud): na// shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shi ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na// yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs// 
175b8(rgyud): 'bradrang ba rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab sgrub pa// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// 'jig rten gsum la sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig rten gsum po
176a1(rgyud): bdag la bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur// na mkha'i dpyid/

176a3(rgyud): cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du// gan+d+ha ba dang sha dpal// glu dbyangs sna tshogs glus sgrub bo// 
176a4(rgyud): de nas de nyid dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid la// glu 'di yis ni bskul ba ra bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag/ 
176a5(rgyud): pa'i/ mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas/ mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par ma dzod// kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog
176a6(rgyud): tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig ho// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gas
176a7(rgyud): ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor
176a8(rgyud): bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ho// kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs la ston// dzaHhUM baM ho// e ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs// rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la ho// de
176b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i

176b4(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ 
176b5(rgyud): rnam pa mang po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa/ med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pas ku na gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par

176b7(rgyud): rnam par sprul// hU~M shiSh+yA bi ra hUM/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rab byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya// nam
176b8(rgyud): mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun
177a1(rgyud): gyis rab bskul nas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa sprin chen rnam bkod pa// rab

177a3(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grub// ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams
177a4(rgyud): dang // 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon med rol mo'i sil snyan kar// rnam par 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg bya'i bde myos
177a5(rgyud): bas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing // mchod pa dgakyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// rnam pa kun tu skal
177a6(rgyud): bzang po'i// bde ba yang dag grub par byed// sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin rlabs pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar
177a7(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs/ 
177a8(rgyud): dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyar ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas tham
177b1(rgyud): cad nyid kyi// dngos grub ma lus lus med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar// rnam par rol pa
177b2(rgyud): mchog tu snang // de nas yang dag rab bsang bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal
177b3(rgyud): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam par grub par mdzod// oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po
177b4(rgyud): thams cad grub par mchod// glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// / rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus lu/ nas med pa'i// rab 'byom las la'ang sbyar du rung // gang ga grub
177b5(rgyud): par ma gyur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas nas// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'gru pa// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis
177b6(rgyud): ni// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// slob ma thams cad bzung bar bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par// snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyed nas// de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi// ras kyis g.yog/ 
177b7(rgyud): te gzud par bya// dngos grub ci ltar 'thob 'dod par// slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog
