177b8(rgyud): ni blang bar bya// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas// ji lta bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba'i rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la/ 
178a1(rgyud): g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses// zhi bI btung ba bzhin mangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs
178a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'go sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang // rgyas mi'i thebs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mna' ni bsgag byas nas// sangs rgyas thams
178a3(rgyud): cad 'thun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa byin par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad
178a4(rgyud): dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi rnam des dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa po// de dag la ni snyi dang rings nas// snying las khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin// sems
178a5(rgyud): can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa'i shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du grub pa po// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir
178a6(rgyud): mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da'
178a7(rgyud): bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rten/ rdo sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad
178a8(rgyud): bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas// ji lta'i nul
178b1(rgyud): bzhin gar byed par// slob ma rnams la bde bar sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyin cad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
178b2(rgyud): grub// de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod// 'dod don 'bras bu
178b3(rgyud): phun tshegs 'grub// de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas// kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// 
178b4(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing // rtog pa kun rab sbyar ba yi// ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems
178b5(rgyud): can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul dubastan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad
178b6(rgyud): rnam sbyang phyir// grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs sgrub pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes 'thun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya// gzhan
178b7(rgyud): yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa// ma lus
178b8(rgyud): pad+mo rnam sbyang phyir// skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad+mo sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// nor gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir// na mkha' kun
179a1(rgyud): gyi bdag po che// rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i phyir// rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rta mchog rab tu 'byung ba
179a2(rgyud): 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam
179a3(rgyud): par spyod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam
179a4(rgyud): pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// kun tu sangs rgyas thams ca da kyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par
179a5(rgyud): 'phrul pa ston// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa/ sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma
179a6(rgyud): yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pas// khams gsum dag ni ma lus par// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// pad+mo sgyu ma rnam
179a7(rgyud): 'phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// 'jal dum g.yul 'byed grub pa dag
179a8(rgyud): rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par// rta yi gar gyis/ 
179b1(rgyud): ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ 
179b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa// sna tshogs kyis ni rnamal par rol// rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 'dul ba rnam
179b3(rgyud): ba sna tshogs kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu sgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung
179b4(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs dbas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed// bcom ldan 'das
179b5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas tha mas cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i mchog las sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha
179b6(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa ste drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal gyi lha// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam
179b7(rgyud): sprul pa'o// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjes su sgrub// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi bskyed mos tshal sogs par// kun tu sna chog bskal bzang po// 
179b8(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa'i rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa dum sna tshog/ 
180a1(rgyud): pa'i// sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag/ rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ 
180a2(rgyud): pad+mo'i bskyed mos tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag gi ma do dag tu// bde 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // rgyal po'i bskyed mos tshal/ 
180a3(rgyud): dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub par ru// rdo rje rta ni
180a4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub pa rnam/ pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la // dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu sgrub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ 
180a5(rgyud): pad+ma mar// phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la// 'jig rten dbang gi kha rda ga dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser// kha dog kun dang ci 'byor pa// bla bre rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis rnams// thams
180a6(rgyud): cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad
180a7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams brtags pa ci 'dra ba// phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig btab shes rab can// phyogs
180a8(rgyud): kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar// rab tu brtag par su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi
180b1(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur
180b2(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshigs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi
180b3(rgyud): zla gam bzhin// pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ci ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal// rta mchog
180b4(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje'o// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnam sa ni spangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// dbasgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo// srog chags bsad par mi bya
180b5(rgyud): zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // byang chub sems ni mi/ btang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yong mi btang / kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por// bdag rang bsgrubs pas
180b6(rgyud): skal ba bzang // bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa / shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na/ 
180b7(rgyud): shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad bsgrubs pa'i phyir// skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal// stong nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan// 'dod chags thams cad
180b8(rgyud): rnams dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // log pa lta dang ldan pas na// skal ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na// dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal ba'ang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// 
181a1(rgyud): bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas// rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongs su/ 
181a2(rgyud): 'dzin med pas// thug pa thams cad skal ba ngan// bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal ba bzang // lta ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i// slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan// 
181a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi slob dpon la gnas pas// 'khor
181a4(rgyud): lor 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma da la/ gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid da du gsang brjod pas// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri// skal ba/ 
181a5(rgyud): bzang la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug/ gsang pa yang dag mi shes te// g.yas pa
181a6(rgyud): yis ni gzhug par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul te// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub po// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// 
181a7(rgyud): yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges// gang la yongs su btang dka' gang // de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin tu khyad par can// da dang de ni bla ma la// 
181a8(rgyud): nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba'am// 'on te sems la dgos pa dag/ de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de la gal te mchog bdog la// de yang
181b1(rgyud): ngan pa'i yon 'bul na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo shin tu rgyan pa'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis slu ba ni// sangs rgyas/ 
181b2(rgyud): byang chub mchog gi yon// ma chen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis slu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi// 'on te mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar
181b3(rgyud): ba'i ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// 
181b4(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin tu rgyan pa'i rta dag dang / glang po shin tu rgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no// khams kyi rang bzhin thams
181b5(rgyud): cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin tu na dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs bar+t+ta ga/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// 
181b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag
181b7(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs/ 
181b8(rgyud): rgyan gyis spras// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas// slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku/ 
182a1(rgyud): nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bskur bsdus pa'o// 
182a2(rgyud): blugs pa dang ni byas pa'am// brdungs pa'am yang na bris pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnam/ 
182a3(rgyud): kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje
182a4(rgyud): rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+mo rgya gram dpag med tshe'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams tham das cad kyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mda'
182a5(rgyud): dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shul phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag pas mas shing dang lcug ma dang // pad+mo rta mgrin 'phang mtho ba/ 
182a6(rgyud): rta mgrin ljang ku de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa ya// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang / 
182a7(rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi bang kun// ku mun da dang mu ra dza// me tog bdag pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
182a8(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tsho gas// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// 
182b1(rgyud): grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni mkhar sil dang // dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i/ 
182b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang ni ran chen snod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan
182b3(rgyud): dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo rje ser ba'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar ba kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa khams por de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen
182b4(rgyud): dang ni de bzhin te// rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang drang chu dang de bzhin te// lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras drang de bzhin me dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa
182b5(rgyud): thams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i cho ga/ sa// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// pad+mo sna tsheg/ sa dmar po dang // ljang ku de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing ka
182b6(rgyud): ser po leb rgan dag/ pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad+mo sprang po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsol shing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhano// 
182b7(rgyud): gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang // rdo rje rgya gram de
182b8(rgyud): bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.yo ma lus kun// rang 'byung rnams kyi
183a1(rgyud): mtshan ma'i rgya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang
183a2(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems
183a3(rgyud): dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal ldan
183a4(rgyud): g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum du bya// srid zhur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis
183a5(rgyud): blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig/ gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ 
183a6(rgyud): drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// btungad de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos
183a7(rgyud): pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgad na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por
183a8(rgyud): bcas// khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin// rang gi sbyor ldan snying kar bcing // mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin// rgyas pa btung ba'i phyag kyang bya// 
183b1(rgyud): lus pa'i yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying ka kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas/ 
183b2(rgyud): khams gsum pa yang phyag byas nas// mthu bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos// phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// gar gyi rgyun rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag
183b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya// rang gi don rnams grub par byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams
183b4(rgyud): cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// / mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang // g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ 
183b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang
183b6(rgyud): 'grogs pa// dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi// sbyor ba de nyid bteg nas su// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// spyi bo'i mtsham
183b7(rgyud): su bzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas phab nas su// skal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 
183b8(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba skal bzang po bde ba chen pos bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// de bzhin g.yon du/ 
184a1(rgyud): bsgyur bar bya// de ni sbyor bas bteg gnas su// spyi bo'i mtshams su bzhag par bya// skal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dngul bar bya// dpal rdo rje
184a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba sangs kyi mchod pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// / mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// 
184a3(rgyud): dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pas// phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo ste// mchod pa'i
184a4(rgyud): gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyi sa dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa tham
184a5(rgyud): cad dbul bar bya// dpal pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal
184a6(rgyud): sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin
184a7(rgyud): nyug pa dang // me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba'ang 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis// mchod pa tham
184a8(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos
184b1(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha' dbyings kyi mthar klas pa'i// rang 'thung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i// rlabs chen dam pa
184b2(rgyud): gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod pa rab 'bum grub pa
184b3(rgyud): rnams// ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa thams
184b4(rgyud): cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// kun tu
184b5(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog rnams kyi// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes
184b6(rgyud): pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhug / bde ba kun la zhen pa dang / dngo gus rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir/ 
184b7(rgyud): chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs
184b8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// thod pa'i
185a1(rgyud): phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbyung // mi mjed la sogs de 'grub bo// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ 
185a2(rgyud): lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs pas bslangs
185a3(rgyud): nas ni// las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang lding // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog du dga' ba la
185a4(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yi// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // 
185a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dpung rnams thams ca da rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / ngo // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad
185a6(rgyud): dag pa dang // pad+mo'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar rig pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing
185a7(rgyud): ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad+mo la
185a8(rgyud): sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// mi mjed la sogs rgyan pa bzhin// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad// 
185b1(rgyud): bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // rdo rje sems
185b2(rgyud): dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i
185b3(rgyud): gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rjesas
185b4(rgyud): dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga
185b5(rgyud): bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag ni// pad bcas rdo rje rgya/ gram mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod// pa bzhin du 'ag 'od lding // rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug
185b6(rgyud): rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor pa da ba'i mchog ril pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs
185b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi kham por 'grub// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yi// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding
185b8(rgyud): dpal ldan che dang gzhan 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grug/ mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje che bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de la
186a1(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang 'byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// rnam pa' kun gyi/ 
186a2(rgyud): skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro/ 
186a3(rgyud): sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes 'thun pa'i// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mnga' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni// bdud bzhi dag las
186a4(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur// tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje ma da' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa 'dag cing phab pa dang // gshibs te chongs pa'i stabs dag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag
186a5(rgyud): rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum dag las chongs par/ 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // phrogs pa dag gi khyad par du/ 
186a6(rgyud): sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'o// lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i
186a7(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad rtsed nas ni// dpag bsams shing ltar rtag tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// myang ba btungs pa ltar byas pas// drag po dbang
186a8(rgyud): po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum dag bskams par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis// drag po dbang po
186b1(rgyud): dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs btsas pa'i// khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dag
186b2(rgyud): bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje spyan nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang
186b3(rgyud): bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // 
186b4(rgyud): ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs dang nye dbang drag por bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pi bang len pa'i
186b5(rgyud): tshul ston cing // ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// la/ sa rnams grub par rab 'byam dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi bang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes
186b6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// rims dang gdon dang dug zhen pa'i// sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug
186b7(rgyud): bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pa// gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par
186b8(rgyud): byed// dpal rdo rje rdza rdzas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas nas ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par
187a1(rgyud): 'grub// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byed// 'dra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis ni bar 'gyur// 
187a2(rgyud): drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/ skad cig tsam gyis 'tshe bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos// 
187a3(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// namakha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// namakha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dang / 
187a4(rgyud): phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'a/ gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams
187a5(rgyud): kyis// bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnam sa thams cad rab grub cing // srid pa shin tu sgrub pa ni// 
187a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod la bdag la bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i
187a7(rgyud): mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan
187a8(rgyud): du gsol// dzaHhUM bi ho// kye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du
187b1(rgyud): gsol// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog kun tu kun nas thams cad du// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
187b2(rgyud): sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir/ 
187b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i
187b4(rgyud): mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe
187b5(rgyud): bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par ga gas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha
187b6(rgyud): rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha'
187b7(rgyud): klas par// rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// 
187b8(rgyud): gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong shing // rnam pa kun tu mitshad byed ba// de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog// mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor
188a1(rgyud): legs par bskor// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil
188a2(rgyud): mo krung bcas nas// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun blo
188a3(rgyud): dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgab// dpa' bo drod pa'i dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ 
188a4(rgyud): pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang
188a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dang / sa grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs/ rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas
188a6(rgyud): bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// 
188a7(rgyud): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dpal grub
188a8(rgyud): spyan gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// snang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun blong ba// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin/ 
188b1(rgyud): gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no// sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin nal bzang gzungs ma yin// sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa rnam pa'i/ 
188b2(rgyud): spyan yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad
188b3(rgyud): rab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ sha rdza'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi glu blang ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab
188b4(rgyud): bar 'phros pa yi// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs skyed pa// sbrul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grwa dngas snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam
188b5(rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin go/ shegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod do// dpal rnam pa ra snang mdzad sbyor ba a la la la ho// de ring grub par mdzod/ 
188b6(rgyud): glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// na mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag
188b7(rgyud): gi sang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'
188b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyis rnal 'byor/ 
189a1(rgyud): gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i
189a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste// 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang glugs pa
189a3(rgyud): che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gdug gtum po yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir// 'od ni dpal
189a4(rgyud): ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod shi daphreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu de dag/ rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub po// ma lus lus pa
189a5(rgyud): med pa 'grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba 'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// 
189a6(rgyud): rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i
189a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas// na mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa// na mkha' kun
189a8(rgyud): tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshulo ston pas// nam mkha'
189b1(rgyud): las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi spyod par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi ma mkha' 'gro mi bzang tshogs// mkha' las sgyu makun blags nas// lus pa med par de ba'o// 
189b2(rgyud): nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar
189b3(rgyud): byed pas// skyil mo krung ni byed bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brla bsdams na// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgya so btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su// 
189b4(rgyud): gar dag byed cing de za'o// de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas// legs par bsdams te phye dar btags nas// rab tu bkram ste btung ba rgya// sgyu ma de dag
189b5(rgyud): nyid kyis ni// de nas bla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyi// bud med kun la de spyod do// bde bar ro/ ga pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal
189b6(rgyud): rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas
189b7(rgyud): pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du 'bugs
189b8(rgyud): 'byin gar byed lus lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me gtong grub pa yis// 
190a1(rgyud): khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin// mngon par gtor zhing se gol rdob// dal bus gyen du 'bugs
190a2(rgyud): 'byin pas// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ri// de bzhin
190a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rgal// de bzhin gzhan las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs
190a4(rgyud): bar sreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po sa 'debs ma yi rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis po'o// gas dam pa shin tu rmongs byed pa'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'deg byed
190a5(rgyud): ma'o// lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya// drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad// bdun pa zab mo yi rgya// brgyad pa lasakyi phyag rgya yin// de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag rgya lan
190a6(rgyud): rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong // gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal
190a7(rgyud): bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
190a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad do// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du
190b1(rgyud): gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas mnams su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba zhugs// hUM a la la la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag
190b2(rgyud): la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzad// ma lus pa dag bsnams du gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rdo rje thams
190b3(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems
190b4(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad rnam de dag phyir// pad+mo phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam dpa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod
190b5(rgyud): chags thams cad gsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'di// sangs rgyas che ni rin chen spras/ gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams
190b6(rgyud): cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas// pad mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag ni brgya
190b7(rgyud): rnams 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna
190b8(rgyud): tshogs pa'o// skal ba bzang po dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phye mar gnas// rgyal po'i skyil mi krung / 
191a1(rgyud): bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo mar po ci bden
191a2(rgyud): bzung // rang gi snying kar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgyab cing
191a3(rgyud): bar bya// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo dkar po ci bder bzung // 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ma thing
191a4(rgyud): kha ci bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pa// dpal dgyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// sems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ser po ci bder bzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar
191a5(rgyud): byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya// snyems pa'i ga pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo leb rgan mchog bzung ste/ rang gi snying kar 'dren tshul gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing ba ru/ 
191a6(rgyud): rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin no// rgya chen ma yi 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan// pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang
191a7(rgyud): mo'i 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnams so// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad
191a8(rgyud): par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kyi sems dpa' pad+mo dga'
191b1(rgyud): mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la la ho// kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi bla bdag lag/ 
191b2(rgyud): a la la laM ho// pad+ma sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i rdul gyis gar mdzad pa// pad+mod ma tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad dadung
191b3(rgyud): rnam par sbyongs// pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par
191b4(rgyud): 'gyur// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gdags// ne ri mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// dpal ldan nyi ma
191b5(rgyud): phyag rgyar gnas// na mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs/ re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'bebs// shin
191b6(rgyud): tu gdug cing gtum mo la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por gyur// drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed// 
191b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/ shin tu legs par 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan// g.yon
191b8(rgyud): pa 'byed cing gyen du 'dog/ drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pas// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpal khams
192a1(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams
192a2(rgyud): / thams cad gzhig par bya// dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog ldan mchod pa che// ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa drag/ rang gi don rnams 'grub pa/ 
192a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor
192a4(rgyud): ldan pas// mjal dum g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sadangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs mjal duman dam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde
192a5(rgyud): mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chu ba mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re/ kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la la ho// mi zad gter gyi
192a6(rgyud): dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog/ bud med
192a7(rgyud): rin chen dag pa dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// 
192a8(rgyud): dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ 
192b1(rgyud): thams cad dag par mos pa yi// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa
192b2(rgyud): rnams la gdug par ston// zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ 
192b3(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis// dpal ldan pad+mo sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje bcas shing slong ba sgrub// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis
192b4(rgyud): btab na ni// shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang // de ma thag tu/ kun bslang nas// ldang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/  thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal
192b5(rgyud): rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyor ba yis// brkyang brkum pa yi tshul byas nas// khro 'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu/ 
192b6(rgyud): bshig/ dpal rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// mos byed
192b7(rgyud): stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil
192b8(rgyud): 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas gnon// hi he he ha he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab
193a1(rgyud): tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyi ngo 'thon dbang phyug non// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyi gnon pa'i
193a2(rgyud): stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen non// mnyam sbyor ru Ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa non// sbyor chen tshangs las
193a3(rgyud): grol ma drongs shig sma ra Ta// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' dongs a la la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum
193a4(rgyud): ba'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub zhugs a la la da la ho// oM suM b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT phaT// mdza' bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs rtogs de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza'
193a5(rgyud): po sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' ba shes su zhig zer// rgol ba la yang bya'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa med kyang bla / de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig
193a6(rgyud): zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// 
193a7(rgyud): mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// rdo rje spyan ni gnyis
193a8(rgyud): dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid
193b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thal mo mnyam
193b2(rgyud): sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtsom dgug/ mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs
193b3(rgyud): rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong
193b4(rgyud): gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// 'grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ 
193b5(rgyud): de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub// gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed/ ngal so po ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs
193b6(rgyud): nas ni// mngag zhug mar ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod// gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon du// 'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// 
193b7(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad mo dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa
193b8(rgyud): byangan rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan pad+mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo mnyam
194a1(rgyud): par phyir bkug ste// mthe bong rdo rje g.yogs pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs
194a2(rgyud): rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzub mo rtse bsnyams bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rta zhes
194a3(rgyud): grags pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha yi skal bzang smos ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// 
194a4(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag dgi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad
194a5(rgyud): dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bu dag dngos grub ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi
194a6(rgyud): mnyam pa// na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis// mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i// dam pa rgya chen gang
194a7(rgyud): yang med// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'o// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibasu ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya// 
194a8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bskal
194b1(rgyud): babazang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// bud med kun gyi sku sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa
194b2(rgyud): mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang lding // dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod
194b3(rgyud): ma yin med pa'ang min// dbu mar yang ni dmigasu med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o// thams cad namakha'i mtshan nyid de// namakha' la yang ma
194b4(rgyud): nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams dad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong / dadang ni reg par 'gyur// dmig su yod pa'ang ma yin te// 
194b5(rgyud): bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyad/ 
194b6(rgyud): dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes
194b7(rgyud): pas mi gos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos// shin tu gdug cing drag po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// 
194b8(rgyud): rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor ba'i
195a1(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang // byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub
195a2(rgyud): pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs skal ba bzang po dpal
195a3(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// // bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrogs pa dang // yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de na nor rnams kun kyang phrogs// 'o byed 'khyud
195a4(rgyud): la sogs pa yis// khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'deb/ das so// thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang ma da la sos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// 
195a5(rgyud): gnas gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su// gar byas nas ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ 
195a6(rgyud): rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes so// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing // bde
195a7(rgyud): ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho/ 
195a8(rgyud): bar byed// bud mod mkhas pasgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sbyar ba// rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ rdoH
195b1(rgyud): nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa
195b2(rgyud): yang dag sgrub// gsang bar lta la gnas na no// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ 
195b3(rgyud): steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog/ steg po'i lta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis
195b4(rgyud): drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa ngas pi'i// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed// mcheb da chung bad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i
195b5(rgyud): bzhin// khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum// gsal ra lta zhing legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nyi dbang ba ces// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyal po sgyu mas
195b6(rgyud): rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myos pas g.yem spro ba// mdzes pa'i gzhin ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni gzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag
195b7(rgyud): kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lta// g.yas pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// dngos grub kun
195b8(rgyud): gyi bde ba'i mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa'i gzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang thar par byed// spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba// rta gdong ljang ser
196a1(rgyud): kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan na// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog
196a2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i mchu sos mnan te// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spro ba// steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum
196a3(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum
196a4(rgyud): dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyi ni re myong zhing // ma ma chu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun
196a5(rgyud): gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa// 'dzum ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tshe ba ra byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong par
196a6(rgyud): rab sbyor ba// zam zim lta ba rnam bsgyur bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par lta ba'i gar byas
196a7(rgyud): pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud
196a8(rgyud): med thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed// 
196b1(rgyud): khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum// lta ba gsal la bde ba gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan// steg bcas lta
196b2(rgyud): ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// na mastu sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa
196b3(rgyud): ma lus pa// lus pa med par thams cad 'grub// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// lan cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i/ 
196b4(rgyud): phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par dam gyur cing // spel ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i// dam pa rgya nan de dag med// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba an+d+ha
196b5(rgyud): sAd+ha ni swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/ su b+ha gI staM ma hA na de bi ho ri/ 
196b6(rgyud): mi ri/ ri taM/ ni ri shri ye swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs na// 
196b7(rgyud): bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos// traM b+ha ba TA TA/ tra Ta tra Ta/ re ba/ re ba thams cad rab kun rdzogs// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shrI badz+ra pad+ma ba Da ba mu kha
196b8(rgyud): yo gI shA ra hi hi hi hi hi// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang // gre sgyur bcos shing bzlas
197a1(rgyud): pa dang // dus su rab ni mchog rnams kyi// hUM la sogs pa'i glu brang zhing // tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par// ci ltar spro bar glu kun gyis// hUM gi glu yi phyag
197a2(rgyud): rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o// lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog/ cha lugs bzhin du gar bya zhing // ka ka la sha Da ba la sogs// glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang // oM gyi glu yi
197a3(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar blang // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sems can thams cad thar par byed// rdo rje drag po gad me che// mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing // 'brug
197a4(rgyud): gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di da yis rnal 'byor pa// khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thar par byed cig gsod par byed// shi ba mod la 'tshe/ 
197a5(rgyud): bar byed// rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / Te zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// thams cad dag par rab ba sgrubs pa'o// hi zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam
197a6(rgyud): par rgyal bar byed// ka ka la l+ye dang tse ra'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka ha sha yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o// glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud
197a7(rgyud): gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud mangs rgyud stag dang // sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas// ma brdungs par yang rab tu
197a8(rgyud): 'grug// las rnams kun la mchog tu ni// brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos/ 
197b1(rgyud): grub thams cad rabasgrub pa'o// dza srung so r+tha sma rA / hu lu hu lu/ prA sik+Sh+ma TikA/ d+hAdzaHkini d+hun tA ng+ku/ kr-i/ b+hudza u lu hu lu/ a la la la to/ shud+d+ha sid+d+ha/ da mI ram sar+b+bAn Ta b+he g+he/ 
197b2(rgyud): Ta Ta g+he g+haM g+haM/ Ta b+hai Ta ke gai gai gai/ Ta ta ke/ Ta ta kai/ Ta ge/ ho Ta Na/ Tak+ki hU dzaHge ta ge d+hi na/ Tak+ki hU tAM/ a la la hau/ ruT+Ta maT+Ta/ thal mo brda ba brtag pa'o// Ta g+he g+ho/ Ta g+he g+he/ Ta ke na Ta g+ho g+ho g+haM/ Ta g+he/ 
197b3(rgyud): g+ho Ta g+hu/ rgyun gyi rnga'o// A A A/ hUM hUM hUM/ dI bA bAM/ d+ha d+ha d+haM/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o// d+hek+ko k+Sho k+kok+Sho/ d+he badz+ra badz+ra d+hung / ko ko ko ka/ hUM b+h+yo hU b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu d+hU b+h+yo/ d+hi/ k+Sha~M k+ShAk+ShA k+Sha/ 
197b4(rgyud): T+Te/ kyA kyA kyA/ D+ho ka~M ko kau/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o// // pad+ma pad+ma hri/ pad+ma pad+ma tri/ pad+ma pad+ma sha~M/ pad+ma pad+ma sha~M / dpal pad+mo brdabs pa'i rnga'o// tAM twA twAM/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ 
197b5(rgyud): taT tA TA TA TA TA TA/ tAM/ tA tA tA/ twA tA ta twA tA/ tr-i Te ke tad+yAt+t+wa/ tuT+TAt+ta/ rgyal po'i ji'o// Tak+ki hU~M dzaHTak+ki hUM dzaHsems pa'i 'gros so// tA nA trA tA tA trA trA/ myur zhing rab tu myur ba'o// 
197b6(rgyud): ta Ta b+ha ta/ ba truM/ ta thA ga ta/ ba hUM/ te TA b+ha ta ta b+ha hi ne/ dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o// ta tA b+ha Ta Ta b+ha tA tA/ shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje
197b7(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag sbyar bas// lag gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa yi// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor gyi
197b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'du 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig smos// g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang // thal mo dal bus brdabs pas 'grub// 
198a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i thal mo yin par gsungs// gnyis ka kun tu sdud pa yin// thal mo'i sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang // thal mo dal bus/ 
198a2(rgyud): bsdu ba dang // glu dang sil snyan gar byed pas// steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // dgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang // mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub// steg la sogs
198a3(rgyud): pa'i nyams dang ldan// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gar byas pas// thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' sdig pa la// dpal la dpa'
198a4(rgyud): bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la// dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la/  rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la// shAkya thub pa mi sdug la// ngo
198a5(rgyud): mtshar la ni a ra li// rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas rtag/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i phyir// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlob// lta bas/ 
198a6(rgyud): mi ngoms pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi// mchog tu gyur pa'ang rab tu stsol// thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog/ re
198a7(rgyud): ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis// rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar// rdo rje sems da
198a8(rgyud): dpal gyi lha// sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir// mchod pa dam
198b1(rgyud): par sbyar bar bya// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol ba bdag dang gar byas te// de nas rgol bar ci rig
198b2(rgyud): par/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du// pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// 
198b3(rgyud): de nas slar du rgol ba yang // rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur// de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni// rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya// de nas slar ni rgol ba yang // bdag nyid 'byung bar rab tu 'gru
198b4(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// sdom pa thams cad rab ston dpa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu// khyad par du ni ba shad par bya// la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong
198b5(rgyud): pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang // la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dga'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang gzi che bde dang zhi bar
198b6(rgyud): ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugasu snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus
198b7(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog rnams las// a ra li thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod ru tam te a la la la ho// rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa/ 
198b8(rgyud): dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzod a la la la ho// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
199a1(rgyud): sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon miza// de ltar rab tu gar byas te// de las gang zhig pas gyur pa// tshogs la de yis
199a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi zas// yon dang bcas par dbul bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin rtag par
199a3(rgyud): bsrungs par 'gyur// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang // mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang // bdud dang sems can dmyal ba'i rnams// 'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos
199a4(rgyud): grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bad dag po dang // sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gar gyi phyag
199a5(rgyud): rgya shes pa'o// rab tu dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag
199a6(rgyud): la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs
199a7(rgyud): bzhugs ho rta mchog ho// rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho// bde bas slong la rnam par rol cig hUM snang mdzod// a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha'
199a8(rgyud): 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis// slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol// kye ma'o bde grub par mdzod// kye ma 'o bde ba bde ba stsa lo// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu dgyes par
199b1(rgyud): gyur// a la la ho// e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig/ mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs bskor kun tu zhugs// 'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor
199b2(rgyud): ga/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla med pa// rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// hUM rdo/ 
199b3(rgyud): rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// / rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khril/ 
199b4(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// la lar rab tu drag cing skye bor drag/ ral drag pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnam
199b5(rgyud): pa'i sku// la lar rab tu nges zhing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad// la lar rab tu 'bar/ ba'i chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par
199b6(rgyud): mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gtor mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal sgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la
199b7(rgyud): grub par mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/ la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi// la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub// rdo rje
199b8(rgyud): gla'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang // mthing kha ser po kun bsdus pa// me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyegs mthing kha
200a1(rgyud): ljang gu'i mdog/ mtshon sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// khams las byung ba thams cad dang / 
200a2(rgyud): srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// tsan dan gnyis dang gle rtsi dang // ga bur na ga shaM la ki/ bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las
200a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dang // sa rdzag bur gla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag las btsos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skye// tsan dan gur gum smri ka dang / 
200a4(rgyud): ga bur dang ni gla rtsi dang // bcas pa bdug pa grub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug smel da dang // gla sgang ga bur gla rtsi dang // 'di rnams zhib tu btag/ 
200a5(rgyud): pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar// shing tshwa pa tA lo drA dang // na le sham dang ga bur sbyar// sa ha ka re ni nga mar gyis// sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no// dpal rdo rje
200a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o// me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan dan
200a7(rgyud): bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du rus ka/ spyan ras gzigs dbang ka pi ta// ce bog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs
200a8(rgyud): la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spos// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la can dan dmar// ga bur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdag
200b1(rgyud): pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang // spos rnams thams cad ci snyed pa// rdo rje rta la 'dul du rung // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang // myos dang de bzhin
200b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi dang // gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan tshwa la sogs raM kun dang // kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin// bdag nyid kun gyi ro sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa
200b3(rgyud): med par 'grub// sha dang chang du ldan pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub// a 'bra smon dang dgun 'bru dang // pa na sa dang na le
200b4(rgyud): ker// a ru ga la sogs 'bras bu'i// phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'a dadi rnams te// dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob// // kha ra sbrang rtsi byugs pa yi// a 'bra la sogs tshig gus
200b5(rgyud): byug/ sa ha ra yi mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya// yungs dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis 'thun par kha bsgyur nas// shun pagro ba la sogs byas// 
200b6(rgyud): mchod nga'i tshen 'bul bar bya// 'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams la bshes 'bul lo// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs
200b7(rgyud): dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyug chen skal bzang po// rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor
200b8(rgyud): ma dkar po dang // bad+ma me tog ldan pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul ni dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po'i khabs sna tshogs pa// sha dang chang du ldan pa dang // glu dang sil snyan
201a1(rgyud): skal bzang dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dngul// kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang // sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang // ba shos dag rdo rje rtul
201a2(rgyud): dbul// mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo sbyar// 
201a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med pa myur du 'grub// spyi ba dang ni dpral pa dang // 'jam pa gnyis dang rtag par ni// sangs
201a4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya // dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'gying zhing mtha'u nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar// byas
201a5(rgyud): nas thal mo brdab par bya// sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// de yis dag med sdig med/ par// bdag gi longs spyod nyid du spyod// 'di yis srung ba byas
201a6(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che// 'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par
201a7(rgyud): sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// sor me rtse mo kun spad nas// mthe bong rdo rje mnan pa ni// sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste// pad+ma/ 
201a8(rgyud): rin chen phyag rgya 'di// bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba// rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa// lus pa med par myur du 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gra pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// 
201b1(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dgu rgyun te// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni// 'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// dar gyi mtha' ma sbyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal/ 
201b2(rgyud): mo brdab par bya// 'di yis srung ba byas nas no// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// khams gsum dag ni rgyal srid che// 'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo'i nor/ 
201b3(rgyud): bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du// ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar
201b4(rgyud): nas/ mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhi// yongs su bsgyur te/ bteg gnas su// dpral par legs par bzhag/ nas ni// khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar bdag/ ma lus
201b5(rgyud): lus pa med par 'grub// dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi// mdzub mo gnyis pa'i ma dud par bcing // gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya
201b6(rgyud): yongasu bsgyur te bteg nas kyang // khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na// rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis srung ba byas na ni// rdo rje las kyi
201b7(rgyud): dpal dang 'dra// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// ma mo dang ni byad ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub// dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang / 
201b8(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje
202a1(rgyud): thal me'i 'od// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// 'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// 'di yis srung ba
202a2(rgyud): byas na ni// rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
202a3(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo snyam te phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs
202a4(rgyud): shing // rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa// ma lus lus dpa med par 'grub// dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bsku dar ba'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin
202a5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// ser mo phan tshun bsnol
202a6(rgyud): ba ni// rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad// sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni// rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu// g.yas pa'i
202a7(rgyud): mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di// rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya// dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba// rab 'byam las rnams dngos grub ni// ma lus lus pa med par
202a8(rgyud): 'grub dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhag/ mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bsgyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin
202b1(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dpal bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de las gung mo ljags kyu ni// bdag gi snying kar sbyar bar
202b2(rgyud): bya 'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis// sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni// las rnams kun la
202b3(rgyud): sbyor bar byed// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar
202b4(rgyud): yongs bsgyur na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang // sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na// dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog/ rab 'byam gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ 
202b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// sbyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// de/ 
202b6(rgyud): ma thag tu 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya btsongs pa las// gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de// gung mo na mkha'i rdo rje mchog/ phyag
202b7(rgyud): rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la
