287b7(rgyud): par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar
287b8(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// 
288a1(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje
288a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa// chags pa med
288a3(rgyud): cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes
288a4(rgyud): bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang dadapa' bo chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen
288a5(rgyud): po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang // chos kyi da byings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtu bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po gti mug
288a6(rgyud): rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
288a7(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po sa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen
288a8(rgyud): po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu las sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'gro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung
288b1(rgyud): bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang // dpa' bo chen
288b2(rgyud): po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dag dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med
288b3(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpal
288b4(rgyud): bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang // dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen
288b5(rgyud): po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs pa che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje na mkha'
288b6(rgyud): snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang // dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje
288b7(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom
288b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i
289a1(rgyud): b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor/ 
289a2(rgyud): ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhwa
289a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha'
289a4(rgyud): 'go ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
289a5(rgyud): mchin mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen me sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / 'ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen ma mau'u
289a6(rgyud): thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa bsrungs ma zhes bya ba
289a7(rgyud): dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jig byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor/ 
289a8(rgyud): ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor mtshon mo rta rna ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya
289b1(rgyud): ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / 
289b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma
289b3(rgyud): chen mo 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug
289b4(rgyud): par hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa dang / tsum b+ha nas snyi dang rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal
289b5(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas zhus te/ dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' gro
289b6(rgyud): ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams
289b7(rgyud): cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo
289b8(rgyud): phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje bsreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo/ 
290a1(rgyud): gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis na mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi
290a2(rgyud): bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal he ru ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs
290a3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag nyid chos las yang dag byung // 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin/ 
290a4(rgyud): no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis gnyis su me dad pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs rapa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje
290a5(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rna ma par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang / phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor
290a6(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug
290a7(rgyud): tu dgod pa ste/ srung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo // rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa
290a8(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dang drug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo
290b1(rgyud): g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen po tsaN+Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang namakha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su
290b2(rgyud): med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mochog gi mchod pa byas nas
290b3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gi spyi boso gtugs so// de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi
290b4(rgyud): pa spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te byung na/ des gdul ba du ma la thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shi dalus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyangs yongs su gang bar byas
290b5(rgyud): te// sna tshogs pas mdun gyi na mkha' yongs su gang ra mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs snam gas pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing
290b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang
290b7(rgyud): me dang rlung dang / dbang chen gyi stong du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa// de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi/ 
290b8(rgyud): dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyila'i'akhor chen por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung
291a1(rgyud): nas brtan par bzhugs so// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas rgyan pa// rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril
291a2(rgyud): bu dang // rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu
291a3(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs
291a4(rgyud): dang / ro dang / ro sreg pa dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / lce dasprang me'i sgra sgrogs padapa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang da/ mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra phreng dang / a la l-i'i sgra sgrogs pa/ 
291a5(rgyud): dril bu dang / cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa ga ra byed pas nye bar rgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang / dge ba'i las kyis grol ba sems
291a6(rgyud): can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa'i thal
291a7(rgyud): mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum pa'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'a'o/ 
291a8(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan
291b1(rgyud): pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster shing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po leg so legs so// lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod
291b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ 
291b3(rgyud): snying kar zla ba bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul pa// bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// der ni gsang ba byin rlabs pa// snying po
291b4(rgyud): mchog ni legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste/ mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sar+b+bad+had+d+haHswa b+hA ba shud+d+he haM/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba
291b5(rgyud): At+ma ko tsa/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho ha/ oM yoH/ shud+d+haHsarbe d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+ho haM/ oM dz+nyA na~M shud+d+haHsarbAd+harmA dz+nyA na~M shud+d+ha hi/ oM sa ma ya shud+d+he sarba d+harmAHsa ma sa
291b6(rgyud): shud+d+hi haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shUn+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f7f/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAd+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM sarba man+ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsaH
291b7(rgyud): man+ta shud+d+ho tsaM/ oM kro d+ha shud+d+ha sarbad+harmAHkr-id+d+ha shud+d+ho he/ oM tsit+ti shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmAHtsit+ta shud+d+ho ha/ oM bA kaM shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA bAka shud+d+ha haM/ oM kA ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHka ya shud+d+ha haM/ oM dz+nyAn/ 
291b8(rgyud): a mr-i ti shuHsarbaHrmA dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+hoH/ e nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+he/ sarbad+harmAnA nA sa ma ya shud+d+ho \u0f7f/ i tsAr+yan ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmaHtsAr+ya na ya shud+d+heH/ oM tri yo ga pa ri shud+d+ha/ sa
292a1(rgyud): d+harmAHtri yo ga ba ri shud+d+ho haM/ oM a b+hi She ka shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa b+hi She ka shud+d+ho he/ oM bu dza shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHpU dza shud+d+ho haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a dA ya bu dza Shadz+ra/ 
292a2(rgyud): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM maN+Da la shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA maN+Da la shud+d+ho haM/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA a d+hi pa ti shud+d+ho haM/ oM bI ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA bi ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM yo gI ni shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA
292a3(rgyud): yo gI ni shud+d+ho haM/ oM ta tra shud+d+haHsarbe d+har+m+maHta tra shud+d+ho ha/ haM i ti he tu a pa ga ta sarba d+harmA he tu a pa ga to he/ ru i ti rU ka ra a pa ga ta sarba d+har+m+ma rU ka ra a pa ga to haM/ ka i ti nA/ 
292a4(rgyud): kA tsit+ta s+thi ta sarba d+harmA nA kA tsit+ta s+thi to haM/ oM dzA Ti ta ka ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHdz+nyA Ti ta kA ra shud+d+ho haM/ oM swa b+ha bad shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM dzA la shud+d+haHsarba/ 
292a5(rgyud): d+harmA dzA la shud+d+ho he/ oM A ha ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA A ha ri shud+d+ho haM/ oM b+hak+Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA b+hak+Sha shud+d+ho \u0f7f/ i oM sa mA hi ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA a sa mA hi ta shud+d+heH
292a6(rgyud): oM sau sa~M be da na~M shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA sa~M saM be dan shud+d+ha haM/ oM dwe Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA dwe She shud+d+ho he/ oM ma ha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/ mo ha shud+d+ho Na/ oM rA ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA rA ga shud+d+haH/ 
292a7(rgyud): oM mA na shud+d+haHsarbe d+harmA mA na shud+d+ho / oM ai ra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA \u0f7fi ra~M shud+d+ho \u0f7f/ oM kha badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkha badz+ra shud+d+ho ha~M/ oM ti tsakra pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmAHti tsakra ba ra shud+d+hoH/ 
292a8(rgyud): DA ki na~M shud+d+ho/ sarba d+harmA DA ka ni shud+d+ha \u0f7f/ oM ku le shud+d+haHsarbad+harmAHku la shud+d+ho ha/ oM mA tra~M shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHmAtra~M shud+d+ho ha~M/ oM bi tri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbe tri shud+d+ho / 'di ltar
292b1(rgyud): dzInye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// pu dza o a go ra de ma ka o tri ko ka la ka hi bre gri so so su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag
292b2(rgyud): pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/ shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu po de dag rnam par sgom// 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa ba ni bdag nyid dge/ dus
292b3(rgyud): dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// mngon mtho he ru ka las byung // mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// gsang chen
292b4(rgyud): mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis// dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya// gang gi/ das de nyid shes pa yis// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang
292b5(rgyud): yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan du de nyid ma bstan gcig/ mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan du slob ma smra ba dang // 
292b6(rgyud): brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang // ngan pa der ni lhung bar 'gyur// glegs bam bshes min la ster ba// ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi// bol
292b7(rgyud): mig rims dang dug dang nad// mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur// mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid
292b8(rgyud): 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du// de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni// myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod
293a1(rgyud): rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin// lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur// de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par
293a2(rgyud): 'gyur// mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spang // bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing // drag cing log ltar rang bzhin ngan// mi srun snying rje med pa dang // brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang // 
293a3(rgyud): sbyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin// puk+ka sI ni mdzes
293a4(rgyud): sdug blang // gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par rgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral ngo
293a5(rgyud): tshe med// nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags par nga gi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis long // phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i
293a6(rgyud): rgyan yang byas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs// rtag tu ma ha mAM sa bza'// thams cad btung bas myos pa dang // ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang / 
293a7(rgyud): lpags pa chen po gos su gyon// rjes su 'thun pa'i bza' ba za// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang // grong ngam mgon pa dag tu yang // gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na// rtag tu chags pas mi/ 
293a8(rgyud): gnas shing // rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshong 'dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa// nyan thos yongs su longs spyod/ 
293b1(rgyud): pa'i/ gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya// ji ltar skyes bu dngul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol// rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing // / 
293b2(rgyud): chen sha chen zas su bza'// myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi// dpa' ba'i gtso bas rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyid na// g.yeng ba thams
293b3(rgyud): cad rnam spangs pa'i// de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig/ 
293b4(rgyud): sems ni byas nas kyang // sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na/ bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur// shes ra dab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol
293b5(rgyud): sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// rnam grol sangs rgyasarbams cad kyang // skye ba'i 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin
293b6(rgyud): thabs yin no// sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang // gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs
293b7(rgyud): dri ba mo// 'dod pa'i longs spyad dag la spyod// de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur ba// a lo ka li rtag tu sgom// rang gi lce yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/ 
293b8(rgyud): bis brda' rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor ba yi lag g.yon gyis// brji rnams la ni 'jug par gyi// dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsus// 'gro
294a1(rgyud): g.yon las byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid// mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas// srin lag
294a2(rgyud): dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la ni mi zad sku// sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthil po nya
294a3(rgyud): 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru
294a4(rgyud): bshad// rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags// 'o byed ma da ni stong pa ste/ de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu
294a5(rgyud): gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni mi bston cing / rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams// de dang lhan cig bza' bas bza'// 
294a6(rgyud): dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi
294a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang // sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag/ 'di na de bzhin dam
294a8(rgyud): tshig dang // sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // lha yi dam tshig/ 
294b1(rgyud): yid 'ong ba// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog/ dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus// mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus// rang rigs sna
294b2(rgyud): tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du// slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs// gzhan
294b3(rgyud): yang cho ga'i ri ma pa dang // mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas// phyugs kyis mtshan nyid sngags pas rtogs// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang // rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa
294b4(rgyud): dang // mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te// phyi rol ma mo'i/ phyag rgya dag/ phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu
294b5(rgyud): bslabs// phyi yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ mtshan nyi da spyod pa dag la mkhas// he ru ka dpa la rigs la sa byung // dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yul gyi
294b6(rgyud): spyod pa'i khyad par dang // slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim// thams cad rgyud rnam/ 
294b7(rgyud): rnam par shes// 'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang // mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te// bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag/ shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // phyi rol bstan bcos/ 
294b8(rgyud): yongs la mkhas// phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni// bza' ba thams cad bza' ba bya// yi ge brgya pas thams/ 
295a1(rgyud): cad du// gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su// rang gi ming dang ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla/ 
295a2(rgyud): don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang // snying po dang ni nye snying dang // gsang sngags
295a3(rgyud): btus par rjes su srung // dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed// 'di ni gsang sngags thams
295a4(rgyud): cad do// ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba dag/ rna' ba sbas pa ste// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus dpa yin// gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no// 'gro
295a5(rgyud): ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab// de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te/ dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yis// sgom 'di ni mchog yin te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// 
295a6(rgyud): skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste// snying rje chos kyi go cha yin// shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin// nyon
295a7(rgyud): mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs// phyir bzlog chen mos srung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyis rdo rjes mtshan// 
295a8(rgyud): thams cad mchog gi srung ba che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// bka' yi 'khor lo srung ba che// phur bus bgegs mod dngos grub 'gyur// srung ba mchog ni 'di dag
295b1(rgyud): gis// sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol// rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang // rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang // steng gi gur dang bla re yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrang byas nas// mi gsod gsod pa
295b2(rgyud): med pa yin// gang gis rang sems thul ba yis// bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin// gang la gang gis bsod pa yin// mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te// gru bzhi pa ni byug pa// 
295b3(rgyud): yin// tsan dan dkar po lus yin te// mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad// rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa
295b4(rgyud): ste// mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// 
295b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid/ kyi gsang ba gsungs pa// de nas yang dag pa dbya ba// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// bla ma brgyud/ 
295b6(rgyud): pas bshad pa bzhin// phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// 
295b7(rgyud): tshes grangs med cing skar ma med// bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin// gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// / 
295b8(rgyud): dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// ril bu dang ni ri rtsi dang // chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang // rgya
296a1(rgyud): mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas// ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam// sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang // lha khang
296a2(rgyud): dang ni mchod rten gnas// khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang // yid ni
296a3(rgyud): gang du dga' ba der// sna tshogs bde mchod dam pa ni// de ru ba sgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni// du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis// ye shes lnga yi ba dad / 
296a4(rgyud): rtsis ni// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang // bzod pa'i pha rol/ phyin pa yi// me tog 'bad pas dag ma par bya//  sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan// mnyam par gzhag
296a5(rgyud): pas rgya cher bya// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// bas ma gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub// tshangs pa'i gan sa bzhi la gnas te// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya// dge/ 
296a6(rgyud): ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang du bltas na ni// chos rnams thams cad stong pa yin// byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems
296a7(rgyud): tsam la ni rab tu gnas// rang gi snying kha mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par sgom// de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin// sna tshogs
296a8(rgyud): 'od zer gsal ba yi// rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab// sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin// nam mkha'i khams ni sgom dga' bas// 
296b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin// til gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // byang chub sems dang bla ma'i
296b2(rgyud): gtso// lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing brjed par bya// sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs// khro ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba rigs drug
296b3(rgyud): sems can rnams// sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed// na mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab de'i// mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su// thams cad gsum la skyabs su
296b4(rgyud): mchi// byang chub mthar thug par du ni// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams// sangs rgyas go 'phang de la bzhag/ de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdag/ dge ba'i
296b5(rgyud): las las byung ba la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal dang // gzu gas dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes
296b6(rgyud): de bzhin no// b+h+rUM A hrIHhoHhUM hri// de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de bzhin// de bzhin
296b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad ni// he ru ka dpal rdo rje yi// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin// oM hUM traM aM khaM haM// gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang // de bzhin phrag
296b8(rgyud): dog 'dod chags dang // ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched dag ni thams cad la// dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha' nyid dag gi
297a1(rgyud): lA mA pAM tAM khAM// ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang // 'gugs byed dang ni gar dbang dang // pad+ma'i dra ba mo lha'o// mkha' mnyam na mkha' lta bu'o// de ltar phung po
297a2(rgyud): khams dang ni// skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas// tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// yongs su dag par shes par bya// tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste// bdag kyang yongasu dag
297a3(rgyud): pa yin// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro// sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis// he ru ka dpal dag gyur nas// sems can kun gyi don yang byed// he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog/ 
297a4(rgyud): thob nas sems can ma lus po// 'di la 'jig cing god par shog/ oM pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/ pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ho ho/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa b+hA
297a5(rgyud): ba shud+d+he haM/ lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya// dngos medamadun sogs phyogs bcu ru// snying po'i phreng da spro bar bya// des na snying po de mthong nas// dra bar ba de
297a6(rgyud): bzhin te// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlab// bla re mda' yi dra ba dang // rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor// phyi rol ring nas dgod por bya// oM me de ni badz+ri b+ha ba badz+ra ba d+ha hUM// oM badz+ra
297a7(rgyud): prAka ra hUM baM hUM// oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM pa hUM// oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha ra dz+wa la tA sha t+tA/ oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lA rka hUM hUM hUM/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo// gtso bo brgyad po 'bar/ 
297a8(rgyud): bdag ni de mthong nas ni legs pa ru// nyi ma'i dkyil 'bar dbus bzhugs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// dag pa'i shel dang bla mdag pra/ 
297b1(rgyud): phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan// shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu// mi bskyod pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs// rgyan rnams thams cad yong
297b2(rgyud): su rdzogs// thams cad mtshan mas mtshan ma yin// dpe byad kun gyis rgyan pa ste// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin
297b3(rgyud): mdzad cing // dpa' chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs// dkar zhing se sa ljang ku ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis// de yi khro bo brgyad
297b4(rgyud): dag s+ho// rdo rje drag po na larka// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// za'i sbyar rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stobs pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba// khro bo 'di/ 
297b5(rgyud): dag rnam par dgod// sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ ljang ku du ba'i mdog can te// dkar zhing gnag la gur gum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan
297b6(rgyud): can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad ra'i rus pa yi// rgyan gyis spud pa rab tu 'bar// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pa'i nang bzhugs shing / 
297b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog
297b8(rgyud): kyang 'chang // thams cad dril bu seng te'u// shes rab 'de bas legs par 'khyud // dmar ser dbu skra dag gis rgyan// mche ba rnams gtsigs 'jigs pa can// swa/ 
298a1(rgyud): gi lpags pa gos su banabs// 'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des ni bdag nyid rgyan du byas// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// khro zhing 'bar la/ 
298a2(rgyud): g.yo ba dang // drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// lcags kyu zhags pa kha n+da/ 
298a3(rgyud): 'chang // dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// mgo yi de zhal sku la 'chang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan// thabs dang shes rab mnyam/ 
298a4(rgyud): par ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'dzi dgas byed bsgom par bya// khro bo gnyis po rnam pa dar sgom// steng du gtsug tor 'khor sbyar te// rdo rje
298a5(rgyud): 'jigs byed rnam par sgom// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go/ dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin// thod pa dang ni/ Ta 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing // zhags pa
298a6(rgyud): lcags kyu dril rdo rje// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// phur bu khro bo byas nas su// de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro// de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni// bgegs ni myur du
298a7(rgyud): med par gyis// gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su// phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs// mthe bong bsdigs mdzub sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdeg
298a8(rgyud): oM suM b+hani su b+ha d+hu hUMbaT shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na d+hu hU~M phaT byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ma hU rU la nub bya'o// oM a ni ya tiHb+ha ga pa'i dA ra dza hUM hUM phaT// lho phyogs su'o// 
298b1(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la// rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin// oM gA gA gA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta shi/ 
298b2(rgyud): g+haM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM huM hUM phaT/ hU hA hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha re A dz+nyA sarba duSh+TAn pa ya ti kA ya bAkrit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bu rdo rje khri bai ru// bailtas nas yongasu
298b3(rgyud): brtag par bya// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// dngos grub rdo rjes brngu bar bya// oM hUM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM hUM phaT phaT// mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig
298b4(rgyud): gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla// oM kha badz+ra d+h+ri ka badz+ra hU~M badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra a na da lArka badz+re hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
298b5(rgyud): kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kAl badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hai Shan badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra suSh+NI Sha tsakr-i brti badz+ra hUM
298b6(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra pA tA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ bka'i 'di dag ni sgrub pa ni// de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur// mAngs rkang dang zhag kha chu// shu kra rak+ta lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yi/ 
298b7(rgyud): ril bur byas// zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur// sngo zhing ser la ljang ku ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zhing gnag la ljang ku dang // dud ka ser la ser skya dang / 
298b8(rgyud): dkar zhong ser la ljang gu dang // dmar zhing ser la ldang ba dag/ de ltar bzhin bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang gyes// 
299a1(rgyud): 'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang // dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis// rnal
299a2(rgyud): 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa// bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong // gcer bu 'am yang na mi gcer ba 'am// skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs// ji ltar ji srid ma ngal bar/ 
299a3(rgyud): 'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa bya// spong ba'i ye shes rdo rje ni// dad pas dran zhing mnyam par gzhag/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM
299a4(rgyud): a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka he/ smig sgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag/ 'di na mkha 'i dang mnyam pa yi// chos med chos min pa yang med// nam
299a5(rgyud): mkha' gos pa med pa ltar// dngos po med cing dmig/ su med// gang gi snying ka kha sbyar dbus gnas gas/ la// phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ 
299a6(rgyud): khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i// gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal// dbang po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba
299a7(rgyud): ma lus 'das pa'i snod gyur pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i// mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor
299a8(rgyud): gyis// chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom// chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur// dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams
299b1(rgyud): kyishin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las// 'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yis// theg le gcig pu yi ge med// skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na// ye
299b2(rgyud): shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/ sems pa rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// sems dpa' rjes su dran par sgom// sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni// chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung / 
299b3(rgyud): bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa// smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang // mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag
299b4(rgyud): dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// sngon po yi ni zhal da dang bzhi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// / yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung // sngo ba'i mdog can
299b5(rgyud): gzhu lta bu'o// rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan mar sgom// dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs// de yi steng du yi ge ram/ me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa// gru gsum
299b6(rgyud): pa la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab// nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas// rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya// de yi steng du chu nyid de// yi ge ba mchog las byung
299b7(rgyud): ba// du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba// zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can// de yi steng dus dkyil 'khor// lam las byung ba ser po ste// zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od zer ser
299b8(rgyud): khyab par 'khrigs// rnal 'byor de steng sgom pa ni// ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi// rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi ge sum las legs
300a1(rgyud): par byung // 'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o// de yi steng du bsam pa ni// bruM ni dkar po las byung ba// de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag/ khang pa
300a2(rgyud): brtsegs pa rnam par bsam// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing // ba dan phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams
300a3(rgyud): cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing // phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la// 
300a4(rgyud): de yi dbus su pad+ma che// sna tshogs mdab ma brgyad pa la// // lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas// dkar
300a5(rgyud): po ser po de bzhin te// dmar dang ljang ku zhal bzhi pa/ zhi zhing dgod dang khro ba dang // rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang / 
300a6(rgyud): dgra sta cang ti'u dang // gri gug thod pa kha Ta ga/ tshangs pa'i lpags pa gos su banabs// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te// sems dpa'i skyil
300a7(rgyud): mo krung du bzhugs// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cong pan can// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan// thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can/ 
300a8(rgyud): cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de// phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog/ bde ba
300b1(rgyud): chen po'i thabs sbyor bas// sku ni gnyis su med par thim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung // g.yas brkyang
300b2(rgyud): g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// dkar ston ser dmar nal mdog ste// 'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// phyag mtshan rim pa 'dzin pa
300b3(rgyud): yin thod pa'i dring ba'i rgyan dang ni// mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spung // zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa// zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ 
300b4(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa// na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis rgyan pa// stag gi lpags
300b5(rgyud): ba bgos pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'go mas dbang du 'khyud pa// sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la bsdigs mdzub kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa// byin pa
300b6(rgyud): gnyis kyis 'khril pa// bde ba dang dgyes pas mos pa/ khams dang / phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni laM ste ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams
300b7(rgyud): ni ma ste gsod byed ma'o// me'i khams ni re ste 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni yaM ste gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// na mkha'i khams ni khe sta pad pa'i dra ba ma'o// ser ba
300b8(rgyud): dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / dud ka dang / sngo ba'o// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad// oM mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te e gser gtso ma'i mdog
301a1(rgyud): lta bu/ 'du shes hU~M ste pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ho ljang ku/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' hUM dkar po// de bzhin gshegs
301a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka ste hi mdog nag po/ mig bruM ste gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rna ba hUM zhe sdang rdo rje ste nag po'o// sna ni khaM phrag dag rdo rje ste ser po'o// ngag
301a3(rgyud): chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o// reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje ste he ljang ku'o// skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste he dkar po'o// lus ni hUM ste dkar ba'o// ngag ni AHste dam
301a4(rgyud): po'o// yid ni oM ste sngon po'o// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so// de la sher gyi mdab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon
301a5(rgyud): bo'o// lho phyogs kyi mdab ma la lA ma ni ljang ku ste sngo ba/ sangs so// nub phyogs kyi mdab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo// byang gi mdab ma la gzugs can ma
301a6(rgyud): gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang po// g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur/ 
301a7(rgyud): ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang gri gug 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rje su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o// 
301a8(rgyud): mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi bzhag go/ shar du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po/ 
301b1(rgyud): byang du gr-i ha de ba tar rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ser po/ nub tu sau raSh+Ta rarta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma dmar po'o// lhor su bar+Na dI bar na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i ga
301b2(rgyud): chom ljang ku'o// mer na ga rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo dmar po'o// bden bral du sin dur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang / ser skya'o// 
301b3(rgyud): rlung phyogs na ma ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma dud ka'i mdog dang / dbang ldan du ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar bal/ 
301b4(rgyud): stabs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag ga denyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan
301b5(rgyud): la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas rgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig
301b6(rgyud): ga phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / bsngags mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam
301b7(rgyud): par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / sna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul brgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer kas
301b8(rgyud): 'og bag byas pa sha ra dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor khwa gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams so// me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang
302a1(rgyud): ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang / gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so// ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhin khwa gdong ma
302a2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin no// mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems
302a3(rgyud): can gyi don mdzod pa'o// dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo 'brel ba can no// 'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil
302a4(rgyud): 'khor la bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing / sna da tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste// chags pa'i bde ba chen
302a5(rgyud): po ni// de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed// a la la ho dgyes pa che// bde ba chen po de nyid yin// bde gsheg sa lha ni shin tu mdzes// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// 
302a6(rgyud): dga' bas srid pa dag las grol// bde bar gshegs pa dag pa ste// dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag/ mngal skyes gla yi dbang gyur par// rnal 'byor kha cig
302a7(rgyud): 'dod pa yin// mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste// ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni// mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// dngos dang
302a8(rgyud): dngos med rnam par sgom// rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar// bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla// skye ba can gyi lus grub ste// mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ 
302b1(rgyud): oM shrI kA ya DA ka ru lu ru lu b+hU huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dz+wA la sha ba ra swA hA// snying po'o// oM b+h+rUM ha ha b+hU hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye b+h+rUM be ro tsa nI ye b+h+rUM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying por
302b2(rgyud): oM b+h+rUM sarbe bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye hUM b+h+rU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM k+Sh+ma ma hA ba lak+Sh+ma hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra bi gi huM hUM phaT/ oM hA ra badz+ra rU hUM hU~M phaT/ oM khany+dza ro hi huM hUM phaT/ oM hrI ha ya grI bAH
302b3(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM shoN+Da nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM A kA shA gar+b+ha hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li shrI hi ru ki ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM si li pad+ma
302b4(rgyud): nan+te shwa ra si li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM haM laM bai ro tsa nI ye hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra bar+t+ti nI ye ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li badz+ra satwa d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM bIr+ye ma hA/ 
302b5(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM ka kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM pha Ta/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+hu tI ye huM hUM phaT/ 
302b6(rgyud): oM ya ma daSh+TA NI yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nA yo huM hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA mi hu hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro
302b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma sogs la// thog ma pad+ma la gnas nas/ mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzla// rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// zhi ba dang
302b8(rgyud): ni dbang nyid dang // rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag/ sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste// dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig can dag langs dus su// yan lag
303a1(rgyud): drug tu bsgom bya ba// rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta// oM ha snying ka la// na maHhi mgo bo la/ swAhA hu / 
303a2(rgyud): gtsug la/ oM bau Sha g+ho cha'o// hUM hUM ho migo la'o// phaT ha yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o// dkar dang sor dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ljang ku dud kha dang // yid kyis mdog dru/ 
303a3(rgyud): rnam par sgom// oM baM sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o// hA yo ya mi ni ste snying ka la'o// hriM mo'i rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o// hri hI g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// huM hUM
303a4(rgyud): skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug lo'o// phaT phaT na maHtsaN+Di ka/ da ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// mkha' 'gro rnams ni
303a5(rgyud): bzhugs nas kyang // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad 'di yis rnam par brtag/ 'chi med de shes lnga bza' zhing // ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// 
303a6(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas// dus bzhi rtag tu bsnyen pa bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / 
303a7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te// sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dog tu// gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sgom// rtsibs brgyad/ 
303a8(rgyud): dmar po'i mdog can la// nang gi mdab ma snga ma bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// gsung gi rdo rje rnam par sgom// gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas brgya
303b1(rgyud): ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing // rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs// pad+ma dril bus mnyam par 'khyud// dbang phyug chen po'i spags pa ni// phyag
303b2(rgyud): gnyis dag gis brkyang bar gnas// lhag ma lnga pa'i rim pa bzhin// dbang phyug chen po'i mthar thug par// zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta// dmar zhing sngol de bzhin
303b3(rgyud): ser/ g.yon pa dkar la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i dbu rgyan dag gis rgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes// zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang // sna tshogs pad+ma rnam dgod cing
303b4(rgyud): mchi ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // 'jigs pa'i zhal da ni rnam 'gyur zhing // sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gis lpags pa gos su bgos// mi mgo
303b5(rgyud): rlon pa'i phreng ba can// mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// mchod phyir tho/ gas dang thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de
303b6(rgyud): dag pha rol phyin drug ste// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o// de yi pang na bcom ldan ma// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// gcer
303b7(rgyud): bu skra ni grol ba ste// dum bu rgyan gyi ska rags can// phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang // gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing // pad ldan lag pas phyogs kun tu// 
303b8(rgyud): gdugs pa kun la bsdigs mdzub byed// drag cing bskal pa'i me yi gzi// zhal nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing // byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril// bde ba chen po thug
304a1(rgyud): rje'i bdag/ mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshang bzhin// pad+ma la sogs phyogs bkod na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// sngar
304a2(rgyud): bshad mdog tu gnas pa ste// 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar po// dum skyes ma ni de bzhin gnag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin// phyag g.yon kha Ta thod pa dang // g.yas
304a3(rgyud): ba cang ti'u gri gug 'dzin// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // mchi med lnga po'i bum stengs su// byang chub sems kyi snod kyang bzhag/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma
304a4(rgyud): ru pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste dkar po'o// dbyang du u dre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed ma chen mo ste dmar po'o// nub tu ti sha ku ne na dpa' bo
304a5(rgyud): chen po dang // rlung gi shugs can ma ste nag po'o// lho ru ke sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / 'chang 'thung ma ste gnam mdog ljang ku'o// me phyogs la ka ling ka
304a6(rgyud): na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs ma ste ser po dang dkar skya'o// bden bral du lAM ba ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste dkar ba'o// rlung phyogs su kaM/ pi rtsin 'jigs byed
304a7(rgyud): chen po dang / rta rnam ste ljang ku'o// dbang ldan la ni hi mo la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste gnam mdog sngo bsangs so// gsung gi 'khor los la spyod pa'o// myu gu
304a8(rgyud): can la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na khaT
304b1(rgyud): ga g.yas na cang te'u/ phyag brgya lnga la sogs pas rgyan pa g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa'o// dpa' bo la sogs pa lnga ma bzhin no// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis/ 
304b2(rgyud): gzhal gcig pa/ thod pa dang / sdig mdzub pad+ma can gyis 'khyud pa/ mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna ba tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgrin pa'i rgyan dang / 
304b3(rgyud): thong ba'i phreng // 'og bag dag gis sku rags can// sngar bshang sgo srung la sogs bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par
304b4(rgyud): dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang // dngul ba pad+ma de phreng ba can// phung po skye mched khams rnams kun/ sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag/ sngar bshad
304b5(rgyud): pa yi cho ga bzhin// yi ge rnams ni dgod cing smran / thugs ni AHste dmar po yin// gsung ni i ste dkar por bshad// rdo rje snyun hUM yin te/ 
304b6(rgyud): nam mkha' zla ba lta bu'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// dbang bskur bas ni
304b7(rgyud): gzhug par bya// thams cad byung ste thim nas su// thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya// oM shrI bA/ 
304b8(rgyud): DA ki A ro l-ig hUM phaT/ hAM hI DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ snying po'o// oM A ro lika hrIHhUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma DA ka ni ye hiHhu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// 
305a1(rgyud): oM sarba pad+ma DA ki nI ye a huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ya huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi Ni la
305a2(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT aM ku ri ka phaT huM hUM phaT/ oM ai rA bo tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha badz+ra dza Ti la di ha huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ma hA bi ra pa tse huM hUM/ 
305a3(rgyud): paT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha badz+ra hUM ka ra b+ha k+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ne huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na su b+ha dra gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga
305a4(rgyud): ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA/ tan+da ya taR+Sha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya badz+ra su dra A/ dkaD+D+h+ya huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM hrI ma hA b+hai ra/ 
305a5(rgyud): ba h+ni huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kaR+She huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+nyo bai ru pA k+Sha yai dz+haiM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM kha ga na ne huM hU~M phaT/ oM kA kA s+yai huM hU~M phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA
305a6(rgyud): s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka ra s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dAT+Ti ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ya~M ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+NI NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig
305a7(rgyud): gis mchod nas// bzlas pa'i tshig rab tu bya// dgug pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid// sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste// ngag gi dngos grub
305a8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang // tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la// de la thams cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa
305b1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i chags pas rjesu chags// 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag/ bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po// de yi dbang du gnas pa yin// sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes gnas nas/ 
305b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// b+hur bu 'dod chags chos kyi bdag/ bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni// dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing // chos/ 
305b3(rgyud): kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas// rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs 'grub// oM ha snying ka la/ na maHhi mgo la/ swA hA hu A ro li ka spyi gtsug la bo Sha Ta he go cha// hUM hUM ho mig
305b4(rgyud): la'o// phaT haM mtshan cha'o// chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rta mi chog ste/ 
305b5(rgyud): dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / sde ba dang // / dmar ba dang / gur gum gyi mdog dang // ljang kA/ ste bye brag go/ oM baM pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba
305b6(rgyud): la'o// haM oM pad+ma ya mi ni dang / hI mo pad+ma'i rmongs byed mo dang / hre hU~M pad+ma'i g.yo byed ma dang / hUM hUM pad+ma skrag byed ma dong / phaT phaT haM pad+ma tsaN+Di ka ste/ snying ka dang / mgo dang / 
305b7(rgyud): spyi gtsug dang / mig dang / chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so// dmar ba dang / sde ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang ku dang / dud kha'i mdog can no// bzlas pa'i dus su
305b8(rgyud): dgod pa ste// ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa yin// mnyam par gzhag pas drod 'byung ba// rtse gcig dmigs
306a1(rgyud): pas blang bya ste// gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang / 
306a2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar// lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis// snying po'i ye shes de nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la// ci bde bar ni bza' ba bza'// lha
306a3(rgyud): yi gzugs su gyur nas su// 'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por ste// bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis// nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs// sems can rjes su chags pa yi// lha mo gla
306a4(rgyud): 'dis bskul ba yis// byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi// sems can don ni bla med mdzad// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis// thugs rje bskyed cing bstan// 
306a5(rgyud): par mdzad// gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang // ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol// / 
306a6(rgyud): de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas// sna tshogs du ma mang pa yi// dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad// mig bye nas ni bstod pa ni// A ba ra ta ru su ra ta su kha bA hA su khi ma
306a7(rgyud): ta sau khyA ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho// su ra ta sau khyA ya te sa ma tsa ri taM/ su ga ta sAn+ta ma ya pra pi bi bi kuR+Ya bi kur+Ya/ su ra ta di ya pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi dzim+ba dzim+ba/ su ra teta su kha
306a8(rgyud): bed+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi nan+ta nan+ta su kha sa ngan pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi merda su ra ta ma ba si bi shwa dza la ho ha hUM ha ho ho// dza ya ma hA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho// su ra ke tu su kha ba hUM bi
306b1(rgyud): ti te dza mu kra dza ya te dza ra/ han ta ho bA rA hA/ sa su kha ho hU ha ho su ra to tA rag su kha ra ti rI dzin pa ra ma shrI ra ti ho// pa ra ma he tu ma ha su kha ho// su kha ma nu so nar ba ra me shwa ra ho// 
306b2(rgyud): ho b+ha ga ban ma hA su khaM hUM ho// ba hu bi ti bi shwa dzA la ra ti bi shwa ma ho// su ra ti su khaM ga tsit+ta pa ra ma ma hA su kha ho// su kha ma nu gr-ih+NA ho// su ra ta ut+ta ma san di su khaM a A ro li ka/ 
306b3(rgyud): a ma hA su kha gr-i h+Na ho// glu 'di dag ni blangs tsam gyis// dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'das// bde ba chen po yid 'dod pa// dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor tshogs chen
306b4(rgyud): po byin rlabs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che// pad+ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / 
306b5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'a khor dam pa ste// gzhal yas rtseg ma'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya// sngon po'i mdog
306b6(rgyud): can gzi brjid che// gsang ba las byung rtsibs brgyud pa// de yi dbus su pad+ma ni// sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar can// mdab ma brgyad tu bshad pa ste// rnam dag gdan du byas pa/ 
306b7(rgyud): yin// de yi dbus su zla ba sgom// der ni zla ba khyab par ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// lha mchog grol zhing bzhengs par 'gyur// oM hUM a ma hA su kha a la la ho// ma hA su ra
306b8(rgyud): tas+t+waM su ra ta su kha pi yau ka su ra ta ut+pa bo d+hi su khaM/ su kha ma na sod+d+hi ho// su ra ta ba ya sau khya ma ya oM AHhUM hoH/ b+ha ga wan ma hA su kha ut+ta ra ut+ta ra/ sar+b+ba ut+ta ma sau khya ma ya hUM/ a
307a1(rgyud): la lalo// ma hA su kha sta/ pa ram su lA ma le du bi bi ut+ta ma dz+wa la su la a la la 'o// su ra ta so khyams/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni// 'khor dang
307a2(rgyud): bcas par mnyam par bzhengs// thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa// phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mche
307a3(rgyud): ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'i zhal/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ khyab 'jug gi mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi lpags
307a4(rgyud): pa rlon pa brkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o// lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs so// thod pa'i phreng pa can/ mgo'i phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo'i phreng bas skra
307a5(rgyud): rags bcings pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can// zla ba byed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rje ga/ cod pan gnon// stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs/ 
307a6(rgyud): phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan// mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus rgyan pa ska rags can/ phyag
307a7(rgyud): g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub can// ska rags g.yer ko'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba// 'byung bar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed/ 
307a8(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin// mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ bya byed pa yang de bzhin sgom// sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa ste// rnam dag legs par brtag nas su// mnyam nyid
307b1(rgyud): chos kyi ro gcig byas// 'khor lo la ni rnam par blta// shar gyi mdab mar mkha' 'gro dang // lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te// nub phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni// byang phyogs
307b2(rgyud): gzugs can ma de bzhin// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku'i mdog can mchog dam pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te// spyan gsu
307b3(rgyud): pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur// gcer bu sgra grol 'jigs pa can// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i
307b4(rgyud): mig zur dang // nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// phyag rgya lnga yis rgyu yang gdab// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes/ 
307b5(rgyud): bdad rtsi gang bas dgod// de steng byang chub sems kyi sa ni// yongasu gang bar bzhag par bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// pU li ra ma la ya na thod
307b6(rgyud): ba'i dum bu dang // rab gtum ma ste dkar po'o// byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste ser po'o// nub tu u d+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste
307b7(rgyud): dmar po'o// lho phyogs su ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // sna chen ma ste ljang ku'o// me'i phyogs na go dA ba ri na lha dag dang // dpa' ba'i blo gros man mkha'i
307b8(rgyud): mdog can ma'o// bden bral du rA med shA ra na 'od dpag med dang // mi'u thung ma steng dkar skya'o// rlung gi phyogs na de bi ko Tan rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug
308a1(rgyud): ma ste ljang ku dang / mu tig lta bu'o// dbang ldan na ma la ban rdo rje lus dang shing grib ma ste pad+ma dang ser skya'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo na mkha' la spyod
308a2(rgyud): pa'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i cod pan thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs po// rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis 'khyud pa
308a3(rgyud): g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la khA T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u 'tshong ba/ phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo
308a4(rgyud): rnams ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa bsdigs mdzub kyi thod pa 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i ga zugs can no// skra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa
308a5(rgyud): gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi go/ sa can rnam par rol pa// mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang tshangs pa'i skad
308a6(rgyud): pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer ka'i sku rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams// kha gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar mkha' 'gro mdog bzhin du/ 
308a7(rgyud): kha gdong la sogs de bzhin no// mtshams rnams lha mo de bzhin te// gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing yid 'phrog pa'o// phyag sogs de ltar sgom nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab
308a8(rgyud): tu stsol// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod dang stod dang dbang yang bskur// sgom pa rtse gcig byas na ni// bdag med ma yi go 'phangs gnas// snying po ye shes dam tshig
308b1(rgyud): ni// sgrub bos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod nas// sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam pa spro// rtag tu dam tshig brkyang bya zhing // ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/ 
308b2(rgyud): dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyar ba yis// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// oM shrI tsit+ta DA ki d+hi ka a khaM huM hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hU ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i stong
308b3(rgyud): po'o// oM badz+ra DA ki nI hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM sarba badz+ra DA ki nI ye badz+ra baR+Sha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ 
308b4(rgyud): oM khadz+dza ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi Ni hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ka ra khaN+Da/ ka pA la ka re huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsat+taM huM hUM phaT/ oM/ ku ru ma hA kaM kA la ku ru hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsaN+Dak+Shi yai huM hUM
308b5(rgyud): phaT/ oM ban+d+ha kaM kA la ban+d+ha hu~M hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye hU~MhUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya bi ka Da pad+mi Ni tA sa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oMk+She b+ha ya su ra bai ri Na k+Sho b+ha ya
308b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI yai hu~M hUM phaT/ oM haM a mi tA b+hA hr-i huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI yai huM hUM phaT/ oM hra badz+ra b+hA ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bo badz+ra da ha phe huM hUM phaT/ oM dru
308b7(rgyud): man+ta ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rI s+yai huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi yi huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
308b8(rgyud): ya ma da~MSh+NI NI yai huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma~M ma tha nI ye hu~M hUM phaT// bzlas pa sgom par ldan byas nas/ spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// sngags pa myur du 'grub pa ste// rdo rje sems
309a1(rgyud): dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog/ thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// mkha' la spyod pa nyid
309a2(rgyud): thob 'gyur// 'di ni khams gsum thams cad du// go 'phang mchog la legs par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus du dam tshig can// yan lag drug tu sbyor ba bshad// oM ha
309a3(rgyud): snying kha ste rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po// na ma hi mgo la ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ser po// swA hA hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste zla ba dang ser skya'o// bau Sha Ta he go cha ste he ru
309a4(rgyud): ka na mkha'i mdog can no// hUM hUM ho mig la ste/ rdo rje nyi ma dgaser bco ma lta bu'o// phaT haM ni yan lag thams dacad kyi mtshon cha ste rta mchog ljang ku ser skya'o// a baM lte
309a5(rgyud): ba la ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro na mkha' dang ser skya'o// haM yau snying ka la yang mi ni dkar mo'o// hriM mo kha la ste/ rmo ngas byed mo dmar mo'o// hreM hrI mgo la ste g.yo byed ma ser
309a6(rgyud): bo'o// ai hAM hAM spri gtsug la ste skrag byed ma sngon po'o// phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste tsaN+Di ka dmar ser ro// ji ltar bde bar cho ga bzhin du smad cing gnas so// 'gro
309a7(rgyud): ba du ma'i bsam pa la// thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di// gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa// srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas// dri ma med cing nga rgyal med// yi ge med cing brjod
309a8(rgyud): du med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las thugs kyi sdom pa dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor/ 
309b1(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gyur pa// 'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba// shin tu gsang ba'i dngos grub stsol// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// sgrub pa'i don ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor snga
309b2(rgyud): ma'i dbus su ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// sna tshogs mdog can ge sar bcas// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// de yi dbus su yi ge hUM// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par
309b3(rgyud): bsgom// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad kun gyis rnam par rgyan// dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ byang chub
309b4(rgyud): sems kyi rgyu las ni// byang chub zla ba dri med pa// de mthong lha mo langs nas ni// glu 'di yis ni bskul/  bar byed// hU~M rol cig rol cig dgyes pa ho// bde ba
309b5(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje ni// bde ba chen po ro nyid las// 'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol// a la la ho dgyes pa che// khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te// khyod kyi zhal ni khums/ 
309b6(rgyud): tsam gyis// bdag gis 'dir ni ro cig rnyed// kye ma'o bcom ldan bde chen dgyes// oM rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod// ro dang ro mchog thams cad de// dgyes pa
309b7(rgyud): chen po bde ba rnams// rtag par dngos grub kun la yang // rol cig rol cig lha mo la// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang // bcom ldan rdo rje chen po ni// lha mo'i pad+ma dgyes
309b8(rgyud): pa rol// hUM a la la ho dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol// pad+ma mchog la dgyes par rol// oM a la la ho dgyes pa
310a1(rgyud): che// tshogs kyi bde bas dus rtag tu// rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis// pad+ma'i zhal mchog bye ba yi// pad+ma la ni rol bar mdzod// ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi/ 
310a2(rgyud): bzhin// lha rnams pad+ma nyid la rol// kye ma grogs po dgyes chen 'dir// rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyar// dus kun bde ba'i 'dir mdzod cig/ de ring dus ni 'di nyid du// yang dag
310a3(rgyud): byang chub 'das pa yin// a la la ho dgyes pa che// bde chen kun tu dgyes mchog rol// a lo la ho dgyes pa che// glu 'di dag gis bskul nas su// mnyam nyid las ni
310a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sdom pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par gyur//  'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa// sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar
310a5(rgyud): ba dang / ljang ku'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu mnan pa/ phyag gnyis
310a6(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis pon tshogs bdag gi lpags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang ti'u/ bzhi pa la dag
310a7(rgyud): staHrdzalnga pa la gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnams pa// phyag g.yon pa'i gsum na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa// lnga pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ drug pa la/ 
310a8(rgyud): bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can// dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan// 'jigs pa'i
310b1(rgyud): mche ba rnam sbyar zhal// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs// mi yi mgo de'i phreng ba 'dzin// mgrin nor gdu bu rna cha dang // mgo yi nor bus rnam
310b2(rgyud): par rgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de yi phang na bcom ldan ma// dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni// sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya// zhal cig pa la phyag
310b3(rgyud): gnyis pa// spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba// gcer bu ska rags 'og phag gis rnam par rgyan pa// phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste// bdud kyi khrag gis yongasu gang ba'i thod pa bsnams
310b4(rgyud): ga/ g.yas pa ni bsdigs mdzub rdo rje dang bcas pas phyodags bcur bsdigs par byed pa// bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can// khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag
310b5(rgyud): byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// thugs rje chen po'i/ bdag nyid can// chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin// a li ka li las byung ba// rnam par rtog pa med pa ste// chos
310b6(rgyud): dang chos min rnam par spangs// pad mdab lha mo dgod pa yis// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// mkha' 'go ma dang lA ma dang // dum skes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon
310b7(rgyud): phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis// rnal 'byor ma la dngos grub stsol// gnag cing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang ku drag po'i gzugs can te// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug
310b8(rgyud): pa// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnon pa dang // chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang // thod pa dag gi ngas
311a1(rgyud): rgyan can phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// gnag cing sngo la ldang ba dang // shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can// ser zhing gnag la ljang ku ste// snying rje
311a2(rgyud): ro ni yongasu rdzogs// dmar zhing gnag la ldang ba dang // sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor// ldang zhing gnag la ser ba dang // 'jam zhing khro bas 'jigs pa dang // thod pa dang ni
311a3(rgyud): kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yon pa cang ti'u gri gug ste// mgo bo rdo rje mdung g.yas na// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus// yongasu gang ba'i steng du yang // byang
311a4(rgyud): chub sems kyis gang snod gzhug/ khwa gdong la sog/ das lha mo rnams// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya// zhal
311a5(rgyud): cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum drag po'i gzug sa can la// skra grol ba yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa 'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// 
311a6(rgyud): gcer bu yi dgas gdan du mnan// 'dod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos// g.yon par mgo bo kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na thod pa gri gug go// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // gshin rje
311a7(rgyud): sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ spyan gsum pa la yi dgas gdan// skra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs// 
311a8(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gcer bu sna tshogs gzugs can la// dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos// g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga
311b1(rgyud): g.yas la cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod byas na// mtshams kyi dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur// khwa gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa// g.yas nas bskor zhing
311b2(rgyud): dgod par bya// khams dang skye mched phung po rnams// sku gsung thugs su rnam par sgom// sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// go cha bzhin du dgod par bya// dbang chen dang ni/ 
311b3(rgyud): chu dang ni// me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// de yi dbus su bkod pa ni// sa phyogs bzhi po dag yin no// ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid// 'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag/ 
311b4(rgyud): de dag na mkha'i khams yin te// pad+ma'i dra ba stong pa yi dan// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin// tshor nga rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes gar dbang rgyal po ste/ 
311b5(rgyud): 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems da pa' ste// bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ka/ mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste// rna ba zhi sdang rdo rje yin// sna ni phrag
311b6(rgyud): dog rdo rje ste// lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin// lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o// skye mched kun dbang rdo rje'o// hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// a zhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur// oM ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ 
311b7(rgyud): he ni rdo rje ye shes yin// lus sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom// bde ba'i chags pa bcom ldan 'das// chags pa med pa'ang de
311b8(rgyud): bzhin te// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur// rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/ 'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur/ 
312a1(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med rnam bsgoms na// spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyar byas nas// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis// cho ga bzhin du bzlas par
312a2(rgyud): bya// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka huM hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hrIHha ha hu~M hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni ye huM hUM phaT swA hA// oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI
312a3(rgyud): ye badz+ra war+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM ru pi NA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA ka/ 
312a4(rgyud): s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dAn+ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma da~Mts+tsha
312a5(rgyud): NI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma~M tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ spras dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa mchog ni dri sgom par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// mchog/ 
312a6(rgyud): tu gsang ba smras pa yin// bcu drug cha ni yongs rdzogs pa// sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso// sgom pa'i dus las langs nas ni// go cha gnyis ni rnam par dgod// 
312a7(rgyud): oM ha rdo rje sems dpa' snying ka la// na maHhi rnam par snang mdzad mgo bo la// swA hA hu pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la// bau Sha Ta he khrag 'thung ste dpung pa la'o// hUM hUM
312a8(rgyud): ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o// phaT haMrta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon tsha'o// oM ba rdo rje phag mo ste lte bo la'o// ha ya~M ya mi ni ste snying ka la'o// haM maM rmongs byed mos
312b1(rgyud): lce la'o// he hI g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT haM gtum mo ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// 'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam
312b2(rgyud): thams cad chos su ro gcig ste// mnyam pa nyid la rnam par bzhugs// mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di// rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs// dus bzhi 'am yang na dus
312b3(rgyud): gsum du// ci tsam nus pa bsrung ba bya// 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin te// gang ba yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las sdom pa'i dam tshig
312b4(rgyud): bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// / dade nas cho ga'i gzhung bzhin bshad// pad+ma mdab ba rgyud legs par mdzes// sna tshogs med pa ma yid 'ong
312b5(rgyud): ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam// lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i
312b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa// de steng a li ka li ste// dbus su reg bya stong pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gis khyab// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal nyid// zhal gdong lnga
312b7(rgyud): la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// g.yon brkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang nI
312b8(rgyud): dus mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bri// stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs// thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral gyi
313a1(rgyud): cod pan rgyan du thogs// zla ba phyed pa'i smyigatsug la// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul mnan// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// mi mgo'i phreng bcin/ 
313a2(rgyud): bste// zong rnon phreng bas rnam par rgyun// mgul rgyan gdubu rna cha dang // zod pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug pa rnam par sgom// byan
313a3(rgyud): gnyis thong pa dril bu yis// bag ma la ni rnam par 'khyud// phyag gzhan gnyis po dag gis ni// 'jigs byed chen po'i lpags rlon bsnams// g.yas pa'i phyag gsum
313a4(rgyud): la rdo rje gsor zhing ba dan gsum pa 'dzin pa// phyag 'ani pa la mdung rtse lnga pa// lnga pa la dag ste/ drug pa la rje dang te 'u rnams so// g.yon pa'i phyog gsum pa
313a5(rgyud): rdza la T+wAMg/ bzhi pa la rdo rje nags pa/ lnga pa la grI/ gug/ drug pa la drag po'i mgo bo// pa na gnas pa'i ngag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mngag can phyag
313a6(rgyud): gnyis pa// zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sgra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus rgyan pa'i ska rags can// phyag g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thong pa bsnams
313a7(rgyud): bas 'khyud ba/ phyag g.yas pa'i bsdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa kun la phyogs su bsdigs mdzub byed cing gri gug 'dzin pa// bskal pa'i me yig zi brjid can// khrag li dgyes
313a8(rgyud): shing khrig 'dzag pa// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par la khrig/ bang po'i mchog gi dam pa'o// drag pa'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par
313b1(rgyud): rol rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// he ru ka dpal rnam par sgom// na mkha'i mdog can ser ba dang // dmar dang ljang ku ser skya'o// khro dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang // rnga ma dang
313b2(rgyud): zhi bar ldan pa dang // khams dang skye mched dung po dang // reg pa'ang de bzhin sgom pa ste// mkha' 'gro lA ma de bzhin te// dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// phyag bzhi pa la gdong / 
313b3(rgyud): gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos can mchog yin no// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skra grol ba
313b4(rgyud): yis rnam par rgyan// lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // 'di dra ba'i rnam grol rab tu ster// shar dang lho dang nub dadang ni// byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod// dkar
313b5(rgyud): dang ser ba de bzhin du// dmar dang ljang ku chags pas/ myos// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang rta/ 'u gri gug 'chang // mtshams bzhi dag tu bum pa
313b6(rgyud): bzhi Ta ye shes lnga yis yongs gang ba// thod pa 'o mas yongs gang bas// bum pa'i steng du bzhag par bya// g.yon nas bskor zhing bkod nas kyang // ye shes sems dpa'
313b7(rgyud): bkug nas su// mchod dang bstod dang gzhug par bya// yid ngag lus la bkod nas ni// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// hUM AHoM ni rnam par sgom// gsang sngags ji
313b8(rgyud): bzhin bzlas na ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT// DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT// snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM
