339a1(rgyud): bo he ru ka/ sngags pa ci dang ci za ba// dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang // thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgya la// mnyam pa nyid la rab
339a2(rgyud): tu gnas// dam tshig can ni langs dus su// bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas// byang chub sems kyi chus khros pa// yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas// khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo
339a3(rgyud): dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'go ma'i// go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas// yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshod// mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la// smon la dag ni
339a4(rgyud): bya ba yin// de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu dang / mi rgyu mthong ba ni// rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas// sems
339a5(rgyud): can rang bzhin dag pa ste// srid po mchog tu byas pa/ yin// rdo rje phag mo bla med pa// phyag rgya ru ni byin rlabs nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad
339a6(rgyud): 'di ltar rab tu brtag/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las re'u mig dgod pa dang // gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / 
339a7(rgyud): de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// gnas dang 'dus pa mchog yin pas// dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni// mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur// gnyis med blos ni mnyam
339a8(rgyud): gzhag ste// 'khor lo gsum mdog ldan par ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog/ de yi dbus su pad+ma che// sna tshogs pad+ma legs
339b1(rgyud): par mdzes// mdab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas// ge sar ngag gis nye bar mdzes// gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed
339b2(rgyud): rgyan/ mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// a li ka li zhu gyur las// ye shes lnga ni rnam par sgom/ 
339b3(rgyud): de yi yongasu 'phel 'gyur bas// rdo rje he ru ka rnam sgom// dus mtha'i ma chen 'tshal ba yis// gdul dka' thams cad rab tu bsheg/ 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag
339b4(rgyud): zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing // zhal gyi mche ba rna dam par gtsigs// spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs// sku lus dag ni sngon po las// sngo zhing / 
339b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlab// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa rnam par
339b6(rgyud): mdzes// zhal drug dpa' bo mi sdug pa// sgeg pa dang ni bzhad pa dang // drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can// phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing // sku ni sna tshogs rgyan
339b7(rgyud): gyis spung // phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan// byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing // g.yan brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing // 
339b8(rgyud): g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ha ha mdzad cing hUM hUM mdzad// hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can// hUM hUM mdzad cing phaT phaT can// a Ta Ta yi sgra chen smra// sngo'i
340a1(rgyud): ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dkar po de bzhin te// steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che// zas su gdugs pa longs spyod cing // rdo rje dril bu maH
340a2(rgyud): ldan pas// lha mo dag gi nu ma 'chir// drag po'i lpags pa'i gos banabs shing // khrag rlon 'dzag pa rab gsol te// thod pa dang ni kha Ta 'dzin// mi dung dang gri gug ldugs
340a3(rgyud): kyu dang // zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gdug pa gtum zhing cang te'u dang // mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can// 'brel pa dag tu nye bar mdzes// de lta'i phyag dang sku mdog
340a4(rgyud): bzhugs// dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste// 'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par sgom// dum bu'i ska rags kyis d+ha dan cing // phag mo yang ni 'di 'drar sgom// rnal 'byor
340a5(rgyud): so mo nyi spangs nas na// thabs dang shes rab mnyam lnga nabs// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis// se sa can don gyi phyir byung ste// snying rje chen pos brlon pa/ 
340a6(rgyud): yis// na mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis// thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas// 'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas// sems can dan ni mchog nyid mdzad// spong pa'i ye shes
340a7(rgyud): las byung zhing // rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la// rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra// thog le sgron rnam sbangs pa// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas ni// phyingang nang gi
340a8(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// snying po ye shes dam tshig ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas// zla'i rdo rjes bon ni// de 'dir snying po bskam
340b1(rgyud): bya ste// bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor dag tu brtag/ mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis// pad+ma dag ni dgod par bya// shar du mkha' 'gro dgod par bya// byang du de bzhin lA ma ste/ 
340b2(rgyud): nub du dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // ser de de bzhin bzhi po ni// bzhin rnams sgyur zhing spyan gsum gdug/ skra grol
340b3(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can yin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis btab cing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi dpung pa la brten cing // cang te'u gri
340b4(rgyud): gug mgo bo ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog/ byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i// thod pa bum pa de'i steng du bzhag/ 'khor lo dgod par bya ba ni// sngon du
340b5(rgyud): grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// byin gyis brlab sogs rim pa yis// shar phyogs byang gi rim pa ste// pul+li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang // rab gtum ma ste nam/ 
340b6(rgyud): mkha' ser skya'o// dzA lan d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang // gtum mig ma ste mdog ser po'o// ar+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste mdog ljang ku'o// ar bu da na mche
340b7(rgyud): ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste mdog na mkha' ser skya'o// go da ba ri na lha dag dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste mdog ser po// rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / 
340b8(rgyud): mi'u thung ma ste mdog ljang ku/ de bI ko Tan rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ na mkha' ser s+ya/ mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste mdog ser po/ kA ma rub na m+bu
341a1(rgyud): gucan dang / sas+yA sa ste mdog ldug// madrin rdo rje la pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo sbyi nam mapa' dang ser m+b+ha/ DAsha ku ni 'jigs byed ce/ 
341a2(rgyud): po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste mdog ser/ ko sa len rdo rje hUM mdzad dang // chang 'thung ma ste mdog ljang ku/ ka ling ga na rab babang dang sngo bsangs lha me ste na mkha' ser
341a3(rgyud): skya la~M pA ka na rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzang mo ste mdog ser/ kAny+dzi na 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rnam ste mdog ljang ku/ hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste nam
341a4(rgyud): mkha' ser skya/ pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma s+t+wa~M mdog ser/ gri ha de ba tA dan rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste mdog ljang ku'o// 
341a5(rgyud): sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma ste na mkha' seraskya'o// su brta dA pa na mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste mdog ser/ na ga ra na he ru ka dang
341a6(rgyud): rab dpa' mo ste/ mdog ljang ku/ sin d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste na mkha' ser skya/ ma ru ta rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste mdog ser/ 
341a7(rgyud): ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa'i dang / brtson chen mo ste mdog ldeng ku/ yang na sku gsung thugs kyi ni// ji 'dod mdog ni dbyi ba bya// g.yon gyi rin pa ji lta bar// sgo rnams nga
341a8(rgyud): ni bya ba ste// shar du khwa gdong ma// byang du 'ug gdong ma/ nung du khyi gdong ma// lho ru bag gdong ma/ sngo ba dang / ljang ku dang / dmar ba dang / ser po'i mdog can na// me'i phyogs
341b1(rgyud): sugashin rje sreg ma mdog dmar po// bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rje po nyam mdog sngon po// rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba mdud ka 'am char sprin gyi mdog lta bu dbang
341b2(rgyud): ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar bre ser skya'o// zed pa'i bum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi
341b3(rgyud): pa zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba con/ stag gi lpags pa banabs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba// lha mo'i zhabs kyis 'khyud pa// gcer bu mgo bo'i
341b4(rgyud): phreng bas rgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dpral brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa / gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mnyam pa dang ldan pa/ lha ma
341b5(rgyud): num 'chir ba/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang ti'u ngabe/ yang na rigs gsum dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing / 
341b6(rgyud): lha mo skra grol gdug pa mo// kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// skra grol phyogs kyi gos can lo// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams
341b7(rgyud): bsgyur bathod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i phreng ba'i se ral rgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga yang 'chang // 'dod pa'i chags pas rab tu myas// rang gi thabs dang lhan
341b8(rgyud): cig tu'ami g.yo ba dang de bzhin sbyor// lte ba 'phyang zhing lag pa 'byung // sku lus 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur// rab 'jigs nyi ma pad+ma yi// steng du sgrub par rab gnas
342a1(rgyud): nas// gang zhing ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rjes su chags pas zhal nyid ni// de lta bu yi bsam pa yis// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// thod pa kha N+Da
342a2(rgyud): ga 'dzin cing // cang te'u gri gug mgo bo 'chang // dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun// yi dgas la ni bzhugs par sgom// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nye bsnyen
342a3(rgyud): rjesu rnal 'byor te// dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ sen mo dang so dag ni thod pa'i dum bu'o// skra dang spu dag ni keng rus chen po'o// 
342a4(rgyud): lpags pa dang dri ma dag ni keng rus can no// sha ni mche dab rnam par gtsigs pa'o// rtsa rgyus ni lha dgra'o// da rus pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// mkhal ma dag ni rdo rje
342a5(rgyud): 'od do// snying ni rdo rje sku'o// mig ni rdo rje myu gu can no// mkhris pa ni rdo rje ral pa can no// glo ba ni dpa'i ngo che na po'o// rgyu ma ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do// gnye ma ni rab tu
342a6(rgyud): bzang po'o// lto ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o// sgrung pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'o// skra mtshams ni mig mi bzang ngo // bad kan ni stobs po che'o// rnag ni rin chen rdo rje'o// khrag ni rta
342a7(rgyud): mgrin no// rdul ni na mkha'i snying po'o// tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o// mchi ma ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad do// snabs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// 
342a8(rgyud): bul+lI ra ma la ya ste/ mgo bor ni rab tu gtum ma'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// u r+yan te rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o// ar bu nga ste spyi bo'i rgyab
342b1(rgyud): tu sna chen ma ste gnas pa'o// go dra ba ri spen pa g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o// ra me shwar ste smin ma'i dbus su mi ru thung ma'o// de bI ko TA ste mig tu ni lang ka'i dang
342b2(rgyud): phyug ma'o// mA la ba ste phrag pa gnyis su ni shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so// kA ma ru pa ste mchan khung dag tu ni sa srung ma'o// oM dre ste nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo
342b3(rgyud): sti zhing ngo // tri sha ku ni ste lte bar na rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko sa la ste sna rtser ni chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka ling ga ste khar ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// l-i bA ka ste
342b4(rgyud): mgrin par ni shin tu bzang mo ste 'dus pa can no// dany+tsi ste snying dkar ni rta rna ma'o// hi ma la ya ste 'dom dasu ni bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i 'dus can no// pre ta pu ri ste
342b5(rgyud): mtshan ma la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// gr-i h+Na/ de ba tA ste bshad pa'i lam la ni dum skyes ma'o// 'dus pa can no// saM rASh+Ta ste bairla gnyis su chang 'tsheng
342b6(rgyud): ma'o// su bar+Na dI pa ste byin pa gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// nye ba'i 'dus pa can no// na ga ra ste sor mo rnams la ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la ni stobs
342b7(rgyud): chen ma ste 'di dag ni dur khrod do// ma ru ste mthe bong dag la ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o// ku lu tA ste dbus mo gnyis la ni brtson 'grus ma chen mo'o// 'di dag ni nye ba'i dur
342b8(rgyud): khrod do// sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o// chu'i khams ni bsod byed ma'o// me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma'o// rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// nam mkha'i khams
343a1(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o// gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do// tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go// 
343a2(rgyud): 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dpal he ru ka'o// mig gnyis
343a3(rgyud): ni gauti mug rdo rje'o// rna ba gnyis ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o// sna gnyis ni ser sna rdo rje'o// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ 
343a4(rgyud): yid ni mi 'khrugs rdo rje// ngag ni dpag med rdo rje/ lus da ni rdo rje rnam snang ngo // 'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yi na// rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes
343a5(rgyud): 'khor lo bkug nas su// de dag sprul cing bkod na/ sa ni// ji lta'i rim pas dbang yang bskur// zhug/ sa par gyur nas bcing bor bya// dgyes pas rjes su
343a6(rgyud): chags pas sbyor// rang gi ngo bo cig gyur nas// de la go cha gnyis po dgod// oM ha snying ka la rdo rje sems dpa'// na ma hi mgo bo la rnam par snang mdzad// swAhA hu spyi gtsug
343a7(rgyud): la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ bau Sha Ta he phrag pa gnyis la he ru ka/ huM hUM hoHmig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma'o// phaT haM lus thams cad kyi go cha ste rta mchog go/ oM baM lte ba lo rdo rje
343a8(rgyud): phag mi'o// haM yau snying ka la ya mi na'o// he maM kha la rmongs byed ma'o// hreM hUM mgo la bskyod byed ma'o// hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag tham/ 
343b1(rgyud): cad kyi mtshon cha'o// mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar// de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas// bskor cing bskor bar
343b2(rgyud): kun tu sbyar bar bya// rkang pa phyed mnan steng du blta gyen du phe gi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug
343b3(rgyud): dzaHhUM baM ho sbyor bas bkug nas bzhugs pa dang // bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// mkha' dkyil yongasu gang mthong nas// ye
343b4(rgyud): chu yi bdud rtsi yis// gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni// lag pas de la dbang bskur bya// glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis// dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar
343b5(rgyud): bya// de la sngags ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye huM hUM/ glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba 'am// yang na mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams thugs
343b6(rgyud): dgyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes par gyur te/ dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i
343b7(rgyud): bde chen po// gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// a la la ho// mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po// e la la
343b8(rgyud): ho// bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni// dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs// ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni// ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin sgom// rdo rjes
344a1(rgyud): dpa'i dbu rgyan can// ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang // tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag/ rdo rje phag mos
344a2(rgyud): sngags gang yin// mgul nas mgul du rnam par rgyan// lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni// phreng ba brgya phyed kyis rgyan cing // gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis// nor
344a3(rgyud): bu rna cha legs mdzes shing // sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma// lpags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyis// ska rags rgyan du byas
344a4(rgyud): pa yin// go cha drug po dag gis ni// phyag rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes// 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma// sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin// rnam snang mdzad ma
344a5(rgyud): sngags gang gis// thod pas spyi gtsug rgyan du byas// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag/ de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te// 
344a6(rgyud): chem ngam sngags kyis legs par srung // tshangs par spyod pa brtag gyur nas// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// de ltar rnam
344a7(rgyud): 'byor bdag nyid bsam// spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes sgom// snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po// rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las// khams
344a8(rgyud): gsum du ni spro bar bya// rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar// spro bya na mkha' thig le las// rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pos// ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar// khrom
344b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor ni// sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// char ba dran pa nye bar gzhag
344b2(rgyud): pa na lA ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// 'dun
344b3(rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni mi'u thung ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
344b4(rgyud): rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' ba'i bla gros can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang po lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// 
344b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o// shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o// dad pa'i stobs ni'o// jigs byed chen mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung
344b6(rgyud): gi shugs can ma'o// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang / 
344b7(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can
344b8(rgyud): ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o// dran pa yang dag byang
345a1(rgyud): chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen mo'o/ 
345a2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni dpa' bo chen mo'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni bya rog gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug
345a3(rgyud): pa'i gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong can ma'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru/ 
345a4(rgyud): ka'o// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni ga shin rje sreg ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o// mi dge
345a5(rgyud): chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje/ mche ba ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos mo skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o// dam tshig gi
345a6(rgyud): 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o// de nas dam tshig 'khor lo dag/ mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas par bya// ha ha/ hUM hUM/ hi hi/ phaT huM hUM a a/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka
345a7(rgyud): hUM phaT DA ki nI dz+wa la sha~M ba ra swA hA// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha Da ki nI ye badz+ra bir+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ 
345a8(rgyud): swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM baN+Da ro he huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM rU pa NI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM khaN+Da ka pA li ni ka/ 
345b1(rgyud): ra ka ra huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka ka la ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT/ oM tsat+tAk+Sha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kaM ka la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ka Ta daSh+Ti Na trA sa ya
345b2(rgyud): trA sa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM su rA bai ri Ne k+She b+ha ya k+She b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tA~M ye huM hUM phaT/ oM a mi tA b+ha hr-i hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pra b+ha/ 
345b3(rgyud): hraHhraHhuM hUM phaT/ oM laM kai shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra de ha paM pheM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ang+ku ri ka phaT phaT huM hUM phaT/ a ai ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dza Ti la ngaM/ 
345b4(rgyud): ha da he huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ma da hA bI ra pa tsa huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hUM kA ra b+hak+Sha bak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+ta mA lA ba laM bi/ 
345b5(rgyud): ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha d+de gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA tar+dz+dza ya tAr+N+Na ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma dai bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha dra
345b6(rgyud): A kan+d+hi ya A kaD+D+h+ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su~M b+ha dwe huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba hri hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM he ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM bi nA~M pAk+Shu dz+nye dz+haiM hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM khi gA na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba lar+b+hu
345b7(rgyud): hU~M hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be gai huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ra ha he huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da re ha~M huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI ba hr-i hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM shaiN+Ti ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kAM shwa gar+b+ha huM hUM huM hUM phaT/ 
345b8(rgyud): oM tsikra baR+Shi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka ki li ki li hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM su ra bI rI me hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+man te shwa ra~M sa~M li si hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA ba le tsu hUM la/ oM be tsan tsi li hi li hu hU
346a1(rgyud): oM tsakra bad+hi ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra swatwa d+hi li d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA ka se huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ 
346a2(rgyud): oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+hu tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti Ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM yai moM ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// dung / 
346a3(rgyud): chen phreng ba blangs nas su// lag g.yon mthe bong srin lag gis// gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya// dus bzhir ji lta 'dod pa ru// rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya// bsgom
346a4(rgyud): partse gcig bya ba ste// dam tshig dang ni dam tshig/ sbyor// bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus nas su// tshe// ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde
346a5(rgyud): bar// gcer bu skra grol 'dug pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin// rkang pa g.yas brkyang gnas nas su// mnyam par gzhag te phyag rgya bcis
346a6(rgyud): mdzub mo 'dud byas gang mo nges par sbyar// mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar// dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab gzhag nas// bcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod
346a7(rgyud): do// oM A ral+li hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dri sh+tsa hoH'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni// lnga yi bar du brjod par bya// skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis// rnal 'byor mtho ba'i
346a8(rgyud): gnas nas langs// lho byags kha bltas gnas pa yi// mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'drangs naso// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te// rdo rje thal mo gyen
346b1(rgyud): phye nas// gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod// oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ b+hu ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tsa/ un mA da/ a pasmA ra/ DA ka DA kin+na da ya/ i maM ba li gr-ih+Na tu sa ma ya
346b2(rgyud): rak+Sha n+tu/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM/ ya theSh+TaM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi pa tha dzi g+hA tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarbA tA ra ta yA/ sata su kha bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpa' bo
346b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma thams cad// bde chen mtshan gyis gar mdzad cing // bcom ldan sku gsung thugs le bzhugs// a li ka li mnyam byas te// der ni raM pha'i sbyor ba yis// steng
346b4(rgyud): du 'bar ba'i re pa ni// 'og tu 'dzags par byed pa yin// / 'dzag pa'i khu nga'i tshul can ni// 'chi med thigs dpa'i gzugasu 'gyur// bsrub dang bsrubs pa yang dag sbyor
346b5(rgyud): ye shes me la las kyi rlung // rab tu bskyed pas byas pa yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung // 'od zer ni 'bar bar byed// dam tshig 'khor lo des de bzhin
346b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dag bsregs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste/ thabs des lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ smin mtshas
346b7(rgyud): kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te/ byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te/ spyi
346b8(rgyud): be'i gtsug gser sgo dzA lan+d+ha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te/ so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas langs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
347a1(rgyud): cad kyi dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro// des skra'i rtse mo 'bum du bshags pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang / 'jug
347a2(rgyud): pa mthong ste/ dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so// rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag/ bsam pa med la bsam pa ste// sems kyang mtshon par
347a3(rgyud): bya ba min// bsam du med pa'i sgom pa yis// dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin// sems kyis bsams pa'i sems de ni// rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya// kha T+wAM ga ni lha
347a4(rgyud): yi sku// Da ma ru sgra shes rab yin// nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste// mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru ba sha/ dad // dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni// phog mo dag gi gzug
347a5(rgyud): su bstan// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs// ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba/ ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor sems ni ngal/ 
347a6(rgyud): bsos la// mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin// rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe// he ru ka sems dpa' rnal 'byor// lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams// sna tshogs rgyal mtshan
347a7(rgyud): ba dan can// sna tshogs rol mo sgra sgrogs shing // sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer// mngon par brjod
347a8(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las// gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma mo'i bsgom pa dbye bar bya// gsang sngags
347b1(rgyud): kun gyi gnas sbyor ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun la khyab// mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste// sem/ 
347b2(rgyud): can gyi snying la gnas// oM aM A/ i i/ u uM/ e ai/ oM au/ aM AHhUM// 'di ni bcom ldan de nyid kyi// he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog/ mkha' la dri med zla ba yi// lte ba'i dbus/ 
347b3(rgyud): su bsgom par bya// ri r-I li lI/ mkha' 'gro mi ni pad mdab bzhugs// kiM khaM gaM gAM / tse che dze dz+nye nya/ TaM ShaM De D+haM NaM/ taM thaM daM d+ha naM/ be phe be b+haM maM/ de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang // gtum
347b4(rgyud): mig ma la sogs kun gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'kho dar lo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ye da ra laM waM/ she ShaM saM haM k+ShaM/ de yi khA gdong la sogs dang / 
347b5(rgyud): gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi'o// yi ge kA yi bdag nyid ni// bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs// tham sa cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// sangs rgyas
347b6(rgyud): kun gyi gnas yin zhing // kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong // brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus// 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs// rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu// 'di ni bdag nyid
347b7(rgyud): bcings pa ste// 'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin// 'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing // shu kra'i gzugs kyis bde chen gnas// sku gsung thugs kyis sbyor ba yis// 'khor
347b8(rgyud): lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod// 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te// gang la yang ni bstan mi bya// sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang // gi cha yang ni de bzhin te// sngar bshad bzhin du/ 
348a1(rgyud): bkod nas kyang // phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid// byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te// lug su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// snga
348a2(rgyud): bshang 'khor lo rnam par dgod// thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la// 'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug go// dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod// rnal 'byor ma yang so sor te// rang gi thabs
348a3(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// gnyi su med pa'i gnas pa yin// dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang // gnyi su med par gnas pa yin// mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong sogs// rang gi thabs dang gnyis me/ 
348a4(rgyud): gnos// de ni rdo rje snying po'o// rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste/  // mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos zhu se nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa yin// mngon
348a5(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'go ma dang / dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rna mas sgom pas bskyed pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// 
348a6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa// gcig car du ni bskyed pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos gsung pa yin// phyag gnyis pa la
348a7(rgyud): zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur// 'jig byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan// rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang // zla ba phyed pas rnam par
348a8(rgyud): rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing // de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gser// pheg mos kyang ni rnam par 'khril// de yi
348b1(rgyud): mdog dang phyag gis gnas// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// rjod pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub kyis// phyog su bsdigs shing sgra grol la// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// 'khor
348b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste// phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyar// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs
348b3(rgyud): sgom pa mchog gi sgom pa'o// dbus khrag 'thung rdo rje ni// sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che// pad+ma'i dbus sgom pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang // 
348b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par ni// dpa' bo mdog ni nag po dal// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid// gsung gi 'kho dar le'i dpa' bo ni// dmar ba'i mdog can cher 'bar ba/ 
348b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gri'ang de bzhin nag po ste// sku mdog gnyisu rnam par sgom// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// zla ba ser skya legs rgyan pa// de la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar/ 
348b6(rgyud): ji 'dod gzugasu'ang 'gyur ba yin// khwa gdong la sogs kun ljang ku/ gshin rje srog sogs kun dung ka de ltar mdog gi bye brag gos// sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya// mtha
348b7(rgyud): 'gro ma thong kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gar gyi rnam par bzhugs// thams cad dbu skra grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos can bzhad pa'i zhal// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// rdo rje
348b8(rgyud): dril bus legs par 'khyud// rnal 'byor ma ni thod rdo rje// bsdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas// 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// rnal 'byor ma 'khor bsdigs mdzub can// pad+ma dril
349a1(rgyud): dus rnam par rgyan// rnal 'byor ma ni thod pad+ma// bsdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// 'khor lo dril bu rab tu 'bar// 
349a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma 'khor bsdigs mdzub can// thod po rkang gis gang ba'o// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug dang ni bsdigs mdzub bcas// gshin rje sreg
349a3(rgyud): sogs lha mo ni// cang te'u mgo bo bsdigs mdzub dang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas// dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas pa ste// mkha' gro
349a4(rgyud): ma yi byin pas 'khyil// gnyi su med par mnyam ldan pa// thugs rje chags pa'i bde bo che// ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas// bde ba'i bde ba gcig tu 'gyur/ 
349a5(rgyud): chos kyi ro las yang dag 'byung // rang ming sa bon dang bca sa pa// phreng ba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar/ gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas// hUM gnyis phaT dang
349a6(rgyud): yang dag sbyar// dpa' bo'i gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad// rang gi mong gi sa bon dbus// gsal byed dang ni mnyam par ldan// huM hUM phaT kyang
349a7(rgyud): de bzhin te// sngags pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya// dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ste// gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ 
349a8(rgyud): snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bA rA hi hu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ba ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/ lha mi'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// dus bzhi dag tu cho ga bzhin// rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas/ 
349b1(rgyud): pa bya// mdun du ba spu'i khung bu las// chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya// 'gro ba rigs drug grol
349b2(rgyud): nas ni// bla med gnasu 'dzegs par byed// sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyar ba// rigs lnga rnams kyi dbus su yang // gang gis rigs gsum dbus khyab pa// khams gsum gyi ni bdag
349b3(rgyud): po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las las dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u
349b4(rgyud): bcu drug pa'o// // rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa/ dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste// phyag bzhi po yi cho ga yis// dbang po bar ma rnam par sgom// gcig
349b5(rgyud): car bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa dag ni rnam parasgom// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum/ drag po 'jigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yis gan+da
349b6(rgyud): pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon// sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can// thod pa'i dbu rgyan mchog can te// zla ba phyed pa mdzes pa yin// sna tshogs rje
349b7(rgyud): rnam par mtshan// phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs// sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa ste// sngo zhing ljang ku dmar po ste// steng gi zhal gdong rnam par sgom// thod pa dang ni khA
349b8(rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang // rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'chir ba ste// stag gi lpags pa gsu banabs// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// sgra gros
350a1(rgyud): dum bu'i ska rags can// de phyag zhal dang mdog gis mtshan// mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la ser// lA ma ljang dang ser po ste// dum skyes ma ni dmar la ljang // gzug
350a2(rgyud): can ma ni ser la dmar// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug mgo ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ cang te'u sgra ni du ma sgrogs// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// thod pa dag gis cid pan byas/ 
350a3(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la drag po'i zhal// rang gi mdog dang phyag de bzhin// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar can te// bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang // 'dod pas lta zhing rtog pa ste// thugs
350a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// sngo dang ser bar rnam par/ sgom// de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'ang // dkar/ zhing sde bar rnam par bsgom// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 
350a5(rgyud): rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// cang te'u yi ni sna tshogs sgra// rdo rje sgra ni yongasu rdzogs// thod pa dang ni bsdigs mdzub dang // gri gug dang ni mi thod 'dzin// lnga
350a6(rgyud): mo'i phyag rnams de bzhin te// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs pa chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur// rdo rje phreng ba'i cad
350a7(rgyud): pan byas// dpa' bo rdo rje mtshan ma'o// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo gang // dmar zhing gnag la 'jigs pa ste// pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab// rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 
350a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// ljang dang dkar ba'i sku lus can// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang // ser dang ldang ba'i sku lus can// 'khor los dpa' bo yongasu khyab// 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang ster/ 
350b1(rgyud): bar byed// 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// dkar dmar dang yid 'phrog pa'o// rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// khwa gdeng sogs bzhi mkha'
350b2(rgyud): 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog pa'o// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni// dud ka dmar po de bzhin no// gshin
350b3(rgyud): rje dbyig to gri gug mgo/ thod pa dang ni khwa T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'gro ma// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// byin pa gnyis mnyam par 'khril// mkha' 'gro ma
350b4(rgyud): ni dgyes pa che// skra grol phyogs kyi gos 'ching zhing / dathod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thams cad phyag rgya lde 'dzin cing // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor// spyan gsu
350b5(rgyud): drag po rnam bsgyur ba// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol// chags pa'i mig gis rnam par lta// sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// gsang sngags rang ming sa bon dang / 
350b6(rgyud): dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// gsang sngags mchog kyang de bzhin no// oM shri badz+ra he he ru ru ke huM hUM phaT
350b7(rgyud): swA hA// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pAbA rA hi baM huM hUM phaT swA hA// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT// thams cad bsgoms te mthong ba na// bdag po dang ni 'khor las sogs// ye shes
350b8(rgyud): 'khor lo de mthong nas// legs par dbang bskur gzhug par bya// sgom pas gcig tu byas nas ni// bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par bya// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo chog
351a1(rgyud): mchog spros nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mthong ba na// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya// 'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma// 
351a2(rgyud): 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbang po bar ma'i sgo ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// / 
351a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje snying po'i gsang ba ste// gang yang de nyid rim pa dag/ sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba
351a4(rgyud): dag/ sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya// thams cad mkhyen/ pa'i ye shes dang // lam gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so// / a li/ mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya/ 
351a5(rgyud): mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug po// spyan gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhan/ g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhag/ sa// 'jigs byed dong ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo bo la ni
351a6(rgyud): zhabs kyis gnon// na ra'i lpags pa gosu banabs// zla ba phyed pas rnam par rgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btag
351a7(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan// gnyi su med par sbyor ba yi// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thod pa yi ni phreng ba
351a8(rgyud): ste/ snying rje bde bas rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas bde bar dgyes// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'chang // tshangs pa'i mgo bas
351b1(rgyud): phyag gzhan la// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan// de yi sku mdog zhal phyag mtshan// 'on kyang gri gug 'dzin pa yin// gnam mdog ser skya dmar dang dkar// rnam par gsum dang / 
351b2(rgyud): sku gsum dang // thams cad 'khor sogs mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo rnal 'byos mkha' 'gro// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ 
351b3(rgyud): yi dgas gdan la brtan par gnas// gnyi su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar sngo dmar// lA ma ljang ku sI la dkaro// dus skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo// gzugs
351b4(rgyud): can ma ni ser sno dmar// 'di dag ni spyan gsum pa gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dgas kyi steng du g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa dang khA T+wAM ga dang / ral
351b5(rgyud): gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / cang te nu bsnams pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor mi rnams la shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang / 
351b6(rgyud): rab gtum ma ste sngo ba dang // dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// byang du keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / snga ba'o// nub tu keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma
351b7(rgyud): ste dkar ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ku'o// lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang ku dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// me'i phyogasu lha dag dang // dpa' ba'i blo
351b8(rgyud): gros ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// bden bral du 'od dpag tu med pa dang // mi'u thung ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// rlung gi phyog su rdo rje 'od dang / lang / 
352a1(rgyud): dbang phyug ma ste sngo ba dang // dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// dbang ldan du rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ldang ba dang / dkar ba dang dmar ba'o// gsung gi
352a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i shar phyog su myu gu can dang sa srung ma ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// byang phyog su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / 
352a3(rgyud): dmar ba'o// nub tu dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste ldang ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmor ba'o// lho ru rdo rje hu mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ ser ba dang / sde ba dang / dmar
352a4(rgyud): ba'o// me'i phyogasu rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ 8ldang ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// bden bral dgyi phyogasu rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste sngo ba dang / 
352a5(rgyud): dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su 'jigs/ byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba'o// dbang ldan du mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong
352a6(rgyud): ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// sku'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogasu stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po'o// byang phyogasu rnga
352a7(rgyud): rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste ser baM dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// nub phyogasu rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// lho phyogasu na mkha'i snying po/ 
352a8(rgyud): dang / 'khor lo'i go chom ste sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ku'o// me'i phyogasu khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa'o ma ste/ ljang ku dang / ser po dang / dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+ma gar/ 
352b1(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// rlung gi phyogasu rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste/ ldang ba dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba'o// 
352b2(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi phyogasu rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo sti na mkha' mdog can sngo bsings dang / ser ba dang / ljang ku'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor khwa gdong ma ste/ sngob
352b3(rgyud): dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// byang du 'ug gdong ma ste ljang ku dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o// nub du khyi gdong ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// lho ru phag gdong ma ste/ 
352b4(rgyud): dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// me'i phyogasu ga shi na rdza sreg ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang ku'o// 8/ bden bral dug shin rje pho nya ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba
352b5(rgyud): dang / dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogasu gshin rje mche ba ma ste dud ka dang / dmar ba dang dkar ba'o// dbang ldan du gshin rje 'joms ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar
352b6(rgyud): ba'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ pad+ma pad+ma'i
352b7(rgyud): dril bu dang / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste/ sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang // thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta ba'o// lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang / gri gug yang ni de bzhin te/ khwa
352b8(rgyud): gdong la sogs pa ni ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / mgo bo dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni thod pa dang / 
353a1(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang / dril bu dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa'o// de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa
353a2(rgyud): na ra'i lpags pa banabs pa// dpa' bo rnams ni g.yas brkyang bas bzhags pa// thod pa'i phreng ba can/ rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can// yi dgas kyi steng na bzhags pa// rnal
353a3(rgyud): 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khyil ba/ gcer bu skra grol ba// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dang // gshin rje sreg mo la sogs
353a4(rgyud): pa'i lha mo rnams ni gcer bu skra grol ba yi dgos kyi ste dang du g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par rgyan pa/ thod pa'i phreng
353a5(rgyud): ba can/ gsus pa rlob/ skye gnas ring ba/ mche ba rna ma par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i cha gas pa'i ros rnam par myos pa/ 'jigs pa'i g.yo bas
353a6(rgyud): 'jig su rung ba/ 'di ltar mo lus bsgoms nas ni// ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang // ye shes chu sogs arga dang // dam tshig mchog gi mchod par bya// mthong ma thag tu dbang
353a7(rgyud): yang bskur// mchod nas thim par byas nas ni// ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin// btab nas 'thor thung rab tu bya// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub
353a8(rgyud): thob pa yin// dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas nas// 'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig/ gsang sngags khro do'i tshig gis bzla// bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor
353b1(rgyud): ma lus thams cad bya// mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin// rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpal// mngon/ 
353b2(rgyud): sum du ni mchog kyang stsol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ke huM hU~M phaT/ oM a A/ i I/ u U/ e aM/ oM oM/ aM aHhUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM/ 
353b3(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+t+ta nI ye huM hUM phaT/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying nge'o// oM DA ka nI ye DA huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me lAM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da
353b4(rgyud): ro he kha~M hu~M hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI yai ru huM hUM phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra da kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru kaM/ da huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+Sha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha Ta kaM huM hUM phaT/ 
353b5(rgyud): oM pra b+hA ba ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tra sa ya trA sa ya baM huM hUM pha Ta/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya saM hUM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tA~M ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM AM huM hUM phaT/ oM/ 
353b6(rgyud): kharda rI ye tsu hUM phaT/ oM hra/ hA/ be huM hU~M phaT/ oM li kai shwa rI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM pa~M pheM ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM dru man+da ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT oM huM hUM phaT/ oM e ra bai tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha
353b7(rgyud): baM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ba tsa pa tsa maM huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha bak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+ta mA la ba laM bi nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ 
353b8(rgyud): oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzi ga sarba pA tar+N+Na ya tar+N+Na ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ya~M huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya an+d+ha baM huM hU~M phaT/ oM su b+ha dr-i huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM me hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ha/ 
354a1(rgyud): ya kar+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+haiM dz+nyo baM huM hUM phaT/ oM kha g+ha na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM k+ShAM k+ShaM saM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM haM rAM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ 
354a2(rgyud): oM he hai haM huM hUM phaT/ oM shoN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM huM hUM aM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ka li ki li haM huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM saM li si laM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM/ 
354a3(rgyud): mahA ba le haM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li baM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra brti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li baM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ka ka se huM hUM phaT/ oM u lA ka se huM hUM phaT/ 
354a4(rgyud): oM shA nA s+ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da dA D+ha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA tA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ya ma doSh+TaM NA~M ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ya huM hUM
354a5(rgyud): phaT/ 'di dag ji ltar rim pa yis// bzlas dang sgom pa byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi sgom byas nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas// mngon par brjod
354a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjesu bstan pa le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa// de nas mchog gyi dam pa bshad// 
354a7(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa mchog/ gcig car 'jug pa mthong nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms
354a8(rgyud): nas spro// a l-i ki li las byung ba// he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas// ser dang sngo dang ljang ku ste// steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o// dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can// spyan gsum thugs rje
354b1(rgyud): drag po ste// phag mo yis ni rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// drag po gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs
354b2(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba phyed dang rol pa mching sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon// sku la phyag rgya drug gis mtshan// phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te// sta ga/ 
354b3(rgyud): gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste// gcer bu skra ni grol ba yin// de yi sku dang zhal dang mtshan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs
354b4(rgyud): par 'khril// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mchu dang dmachu ni pi di dam// g.yer kha yi ni sku rigs can// rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bu maH
354b5(rgyud): ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// tshangs pa'i lpags pa brkyang nas ni// mgo bo'i steng
354b6(rgyud): du phyag gis 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni snyan pa dag/ chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gengs// g.yon dang g.yas kyi thad du ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi po rnam par sgom// g.yas phyogs mkha' gro
354b7(rgyud): mo lA ma// byang du dum skyes gzugs can ma// sngo dang ngur smrig dkar la ser// spyan gsum rnam bsgyur drag po dang // dkar sngoni ljang dmar ngur smrig ste// de ni rab tu cher 'bar bas
354b8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyogasu bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// g.yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ljang // dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin// ljang dang dmar po ser po ste/ 
355a1(rgyud): steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs kyis gos mchog 'chang ba dang // skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste// mgo bo
355a2(rgyud): phreng bas rnam par rgyan// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dung ni phyag na bsnams// na ra'i lpags pa gos su
355a3(rgyud): banabs// dril bu cang te'u de bzhin te// mgo bo'i gri gug phyag na bsnams// g.yer ka'i ska rags sgra sgrogs pa// rkyang rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni nyi ma'i dkyi
355a4(rgyud): 'khor dbus bzhugs te// gdan gcig la ni rnamapar bzhugs// snying la dam tshig ye shes ni/ de mdog phyag dang phyag mtshan te// rdo rje sems dpa' he ru
355a5(rgyud): ka/ mi bskyed pa yi cod pan can// thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni// mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa/ ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom
355a6(rgyud): pa bzlas// oM AHshrIHbadz+ra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM AHbadz+ra bA rA hI ye h+ye baM/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bai ra/ 
355a7(rgyud): tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra DA ki ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra khaMN+Da ro haM huM hUM phaT// oM
355a8(rgyud): badz+ra rU pi NI ye swA hA// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya// dus bzhi'i rjes 'brang rim pa yis// dam tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa// mar me lnga yang bza'
355b1(rgyud): bar bya// rtag tu dur khrod nang du sgom// nub bdun du ni sbyor ba yis// mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub// mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro/ sna tshogs gzugs can bde
355b2(rgyud): ba che// bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing // sgom gyi btung po'ang de bzhin te// phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni// myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas// grib ma yang ni med pa ru// rnal
355b3(rgyud): 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// ma hA ru d+hir bcas pa yi// dri chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas// mAM sa sna tshogs du ma dag/ rtse gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan
355b4(rgyud): pas// rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar bya// mnyam par ma ga zhag sbyor ba'i bdag/ ye shes mig gis mthong ba yi // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' ga/ 
355b5(rgyud): ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i cho ga ste le'u bcu dgupa'o// // de nas gzhan yang ba shang bya ba// cho ga bzang po bzhin nang ni// zhal brgyad
355b6(rgyud): pa la phyag bcu drug/ yang ni zhal ni bcu gnyis te// phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal// phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
355b7(rgyud): rigs// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gzungs dang ni// pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te// phan tshun bye brag can gyi zhal// mdog gi bye brag sna tshogs/ 
355b8(rgyud): dang // phyag ni steng dang 'bum gyi bar// sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang // sna tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa// sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing // g.yas brkyang ba yi g.yengs pra
356a1(rgyud): bzhugs// 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan la sogs pa dang // tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug dang / kun bged gzhon nu nga
356a2(rgyud): karti ka dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sna tshogs pa'i bdud dang / bgegs thams cad kha sgrub tu zhabra/ 
356a3(rgyud): kyis mnan par rnam par bltas te/ 'dzeg su rung ba/ gzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ drag po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ bzhad pa/ mi sdug pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa/ dpa' ba/ sgeg pa/ rngam
356a4(rgyud): ga smin pa rnam par g.yo ba/ snyems pa/ zhig g.yo ba/ zhal mig g.yo ba/ zhal rnam par gdangs pa/ rnam pa ngar rol pa/ ljags rnam par bskyod pa/ sna tshogs pa'i nyams
356a5(rgyud): kyis mchog gter bar mdzad pa'o// thod pa'i phreng ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// sangs rgyas lA yi cod pan can// rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug
356a6(rgyud): rgyan// spyan gsum stag gi lpags pa banabs// mgo rlon phreng bas sku lus rgyan// phyag rgya drag po sku la rdzogs// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud mdzad pa'o// sku la phag mos 'khril mdzad cing // 
356a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// rdo rje bsdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud// byin pa
356a8(rgyud): gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myas// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'chir ba dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// glang po'i lpags pa
356b1(rgyud): brkyang ba ste// lcags kyu zhags pa dgra sta dang // mdung rtse gsum pa mgo bo nyid// cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang // mda' dang gzhu yang de bzhin te// thong pa'i dbyig tho mdung thung dang / 
356b2(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub dang ni gtum shing dang // 'khor lo rol gri rin chen dang // pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang // dbyug to yu ba rdo rje can// gad mdung dang pa Ti s+ya// gshin rje dbyig the chu gri dang / 
356b3(rgyud): dung dang ru dung pa Ta ha// pi dang gling bu rdza rnga che// rdza rnga mtshon cha phyag mtshan bsnams// rtse mo rno bar bltas nas su// sna tshogs phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'byung // ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar
356b4(rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs de bzhin te// cho ga sna tshogs de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor rnams dang // dpa'i bo dag ni thams cad dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs dag
356b5(rgyud): mdog ni mtha' yas sna tshogs mdog/ phyag mtshan sna/ tshogs 'dzin pa yin// phyogs kyi gos 'chang sbra grol zhing // sna tshogs nyams kyi bde ba can// 'jigs rung
356b6(rgyud): drag po ha ha bshad// sna tshogs gar gyis longs spyad cing // glu dang rol mo nyams de bzhin// sna tshogs dam tshig zas rnams dang // me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// dri dang bdug pa de
356b7(rgyud): bzhin gos// mar me phreng ba yid 'ong ba// phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams// mdog ni sna tshogs mchog dam pa// 'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms nas ni// rnal 'byor
356b8(rgyud): mchog gis rdzogs byas nas// der ni phreng ba sngags kyang bzlas// yi ge nyi shu gnyis bsres nas// lha me rdo rje phag mo ni// 'di ltar de bzhin bsgom par bya// zhal gdong sna tshog
357a1(rgyud): legs mdzes pa// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste// sa 'dzin thams cad de bzhin no// 'di ltar/ 
357a2(rgyud): cho ga byas nas ni// phreng bas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM shri badz+ra he ha ru ru kaM/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ka ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ ho hau/ ha haHphe paM/ phaT phaT/ 
357a3(rgyud): da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba se ru d+hi ra/ an+d+ra mA lA ba laM bi naM/ grah+Na gr-it+taM/ sap+ta pA tA la ga taM b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA tir+dz+dza ya tar+N+Na ya/ A kan+tha A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrIM grI dz+nyAM dz+r-I/ k+ShAM k+tAM/ hAM hAM/ hAM hAM/ 
357a4(rgyud): hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si laM/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li// huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA// 'di ni da snying po mchog yin te/ las rnams thams cad byed pa dge
357a5(rgyud): dpa' bos sa bon rang ming dang // rnal 'byor mos pas rtag bzlas na// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // 'gro ba'i gnas su 'gro bar byed// dus ni de ma thag tu yang / 
357a6(rgyud): sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin// rdo rje phag mo'i gsang sngags 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad stsol// oM badz+ra bA rA hi/ pro taM ge pro taM ge/ ha na ha na/ prA NAM/ kai ki Ni ki ki Ni/ khi khi Ni khu la
357a7(rgyud): ni/ d+hun d+hu na/ badz+ra haM ste/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ kha T+wAM ga ke pA la d+hA ri Ni/ ma hA pi shi ta/ mA sA sha naM/ mA nu kha a tra prA br-it+te/ sin+ni d+h+ya na ra si ra mA lA grin+d+ha ta d+hA ri Ni/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+he/ ha na ha na b+hA
357a8(rgyud): NAM/ sarba pA pas twA naM/ sarba ba shUn+da/ ma hA mA sa ts+tshed ni/ kro d+hamAr+d+he Sh+Tha ka rA li ni ma hA mu tre/ shrI he ru kade bas/ e gra ma hi'aM/ saha sra shi re/ saha sra bA ha bau/ sha ta sa~M ha sra An naM/ 
357b1(rgyud): dz+wA li ta te dza sa/ dz+wal mu khe/ ba~Mbi gal lo tsane badz+ra shA rI re badz+ra As ne/ mi li ti/ mi li tI/ he he hU swA ga ga d+hAd+ha/ ru ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu rA/ a dwe te/ ma hA yo gi ni bathi ta sit+ta/ 
357b2(rgyud): dro dri dz+nye d+h+waM/ daM daM/ d+ho d+hi/ gre gr-i he he he he b+hI me hA sa ha sa bI re hA ha ho ho hUM hUM/ tre lo kya bi nA shA ni/ sha taM sa ha sra ko Ta ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ri te huM hU~M phaT/ siM ha rU be khaHga dza rU pe gaHtrai lo kya u
357b3(rgyud): da re/ sa mu dra me kha la gras hu~M hU~M phaT/ bI ra dwe te hu~M hUM hA hA me hA ba shu ma~M ha ne/ ye gI shwa ri t+na Da ki nI sarba lo kA nA~M/ ban+d+ha na/ sat+ya hu~M hU phaT/ b+hU ta trA sa ni/ mahA bA re ba rim sid+d+hi yo rgo triH
357b4(rgyud): shwa ri phaT/ huM hUM phaT swAhA// rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i snga/ des so// 'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog/ snying po mchog tu dgrub pa yin// gang gis bzlas dang sgom pa yi// de yis
357b5(rgyud): las rnams kun grub ste// the tsom med par mod la 'a grub// bdag nyid gnas su mchod pa ste// phyi rol nam yang ma yin no// grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi gsang
357b6(rgyud): sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te b+hi re shA ya huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kalpAg+ni saM ni b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza Ta ma ku Tot+ka Ta ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daMSh+Ta ka rA le gra b+hI Sha na mu khA ya huM hUM
357b7(rgyud): phaT/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dza b+ha su rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA she d+ya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ra Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM byA g+hA dzi nAm+ba ra d+ha ra ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA d+hA mAn+ta ka ra ba pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ 'di
357b8(rgyud): ni khrag 'thung gi gsang sngags te// bdag nyid bsgom zhing mchod par bya// e na ma b+ha ga ba te/ badz+ra bA ra ho bi huM hU~M phaT/ oM Ar+ya bar dzi te te lo kya mA to bid+ye shwa ri huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sarba
358a1(rgyud): b+hu ta b+ha ya ba he ma hA badz+re huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A sa ne a pa rA dzi ti ba sh+yaM ka ri ne tra b+h+ra ma Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM sho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni kro d+ha kA rA li ni huM hUM phaT/ oM san+na sa ni mA ra
358a2(rgyud): Ni su pra b+he da ni ba rA dza ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bi dza ye dzaM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ni huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA ra hi/ ma hA yo gi ni kA ma~M shA ri kha ge huM hUM phaT na maHni thams cad du bya'o// gsang sngags
358a3(rgyud): 'di yis las kun bya// a li ka li rdo rje ni// phag mar bdag nyid sgom byas na// rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya// zhal bzhi byin rlabs byas
358a4(rgyud): nas su// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+has mchod// yang na zhal bzhi ku na rdo rje// de yi lte bar he ru dpal// bdag nyid sgo dam pa byas na ni// 'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin sgom/ 
358a5(rgyud): ba sha la sogs bza' zhing sgrub// bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'dug/ skye ba can ni ba shar grags/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang // mtshams
358a6(rgyud): med pa ni byed pa dang // gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po smod pa dang // phyugs de rnams ni bsad nas kyang // rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// phyugs de rnams
358a7(rgyud): ni dgug pa yang // sgrub pos sngon du bskyed pas bya// phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs// bong bu mi dang ru sbal dang // khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang rta// phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni// 
358a8(rgyud): sgrub po'i dbye ba'i yan lag grags// rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs// rkang bzhi rnams la glang po che// bya rnams las ni ngang sgyur te// dud 'gro rnams las mchu g.yo ba'i// 
358b1(rgyud): lha rnams kha ru lA ba shos te// 'di ni byugs kyi brtag par bshad// grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshad ba// bya rog bya skya lce spyang dang // skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang // kru / 
358b2(rgyud): bzhad dang kang bu ka/ bza' dang sbyin bsreg gtor ma bya// dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba// khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // snron ma nag po 'bras dang ldan// ro yi khar ni sbyin bsreg
358b3(rgyud): bya// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya// de nas ro de langs nas ni// ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing // sa 'og 'gro ba 'am ral gri 'am// tshar gcod pan 'dogs nyid dang ni// ril bu
358b4(rgyud): mig smon gser rnams sam// rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len// gcig cig sbyin par byas nas da ni// 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu
358b5(rgyud): pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin// mngon pa ra brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor gyi snga ma pa'i tshi ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// 
358b6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srung dang phyir bzlog rim pa ni// rgyud gzhan las ni smras pa yin// srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rgyud 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 
358b7(rgyud): nges brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// the tshom bza' bar mi bya ste// sems can rjesu srung ba'i phyir// pad+ma mdab brgyad bri bar bya// pad+ma'i lte ba ge sar can// de rgyab sna tshogs rdo/ 
358b8(rgyud): rje ste// gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// de yi phyi rol ska rags can// mdab mo bcu drug bri bar bya// der ni cha rnams rnam bkod de// de yis phyi rol yongasu bskor// 
359a1(rgyud): mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// de yi lte bar dgod pa ni// hUM ni 'jig pa rnam 'jigs pa// hUM gi lte bar yi ge baM/ 
359a2(rgyud): ni lte ba yi ge gsum// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri// mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag/ de yi g.yon nas dgod bskor ba// DA lAM kha rU de ru dgod// re r-I l-i lAM lhan cig tu/ 
359a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dgod cing ming dang ni// rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ji bzhin// mkhas pas mdab mar dgod bya ba// kha pra shar gyi mdab ma la// byang
359a4(rgyud): du kaM tsa nyid yin te// nub tu kaM paM kho na'o// lho ru ba maM de nyid yin no// me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su// / su baM aM khaM baM laM baM hraM/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// yig
359a5(rgyud): hU~M dang spel nas su// sa bon dag ni bri bar bya// kaM khA gaM g+ha ngaM/ rtsa cha rdza/ 'di dag ni pad+ma'i ska rag su bri'o// rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa// bskor la bin dus rnam par
359a6(rgyud): rgyan// mdab ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri// de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya// mkha' 'gro dang ni dpa' bo'o// 
359a7(rgyud): a e/ bAM maM maM pAM baM suM suM shi bi su ma haM baM khaM/ maM tsa ra kha hi saM/ a tse he suM paM maM baM/ tsaM ba maM/ 'di ni hri dang spel nas su// oM dang spel zhing bri bar bya// sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du byA/ 
359a8(rgyud): ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang bri// dz+nyAn Ta na r+d+ha Na/ ta thad d+han/ baM pa bi b+hi maM/ phyi rol tu ska rags bri'o// 'khor lo'i phyi rol grub bzhi pa'i// nang du sgoni 'brel bar bri// ji ltar
359b1(rgyud): khwa gdong la sogs rim pa'i bar// gshin rje 'joms sogs sa bon dgod// kaM a shwa su/ ya ya ya ya/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha/ sbyar zhing / hUM dang phaT dang rnam par
359b2(rgyud): spel// ming dang yang ni spel bar bya// sgo yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i// rdo rje byed pa bri bar bya// zur rnams su ni nyi zla dang // rdo rje byephyed pa bri bar bya// de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod
359b3(rgyud): pa'i// khro bo brgyad pa'i zhal du blta// phyi rol ska rigs dbus dag tu// phyir bzlos 'di dag bri bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya ba krit+ta badz+ra he ru kA nAM/ oM hUM badz+ra he ru ka tsakra baN+Da
359b4(rgyud): sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta rA Ni/ yan+d+ra man+ta tan+na tsun+ta pra yo ga d+hI ni ye na ka na tsit+tan tan sarba ni A kan+d+ha A kan+ta/ tardza ya tardza ya/ grah+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+hak+Sha yaM b+hak+Sha ya/ trA sa ya tA/ 
359b5(rgyud): sa ya// ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pe tsa ba tse/ k+Sh+mA k+ShA/ dz+r-Idz+nyAM/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+hi sa ya bi d+hi sa ya/ shaHsa ha sra ta tsur+N+Na ya tsUr+N+Na ya/ aM phaT/ badz+ra he ru koSh+Ti
359b6(rgyud): tsakra bar+t+ti ta s+ye ba mu khaM tsak+Shu ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUM hU~M/ a mu ka s+ye/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ huM hUM phaT/ 'di yis yongasu bskor byas nas// k+Sha yi lte ba'i dbus su dgod// yi ge k+Sha yi phyi rol du/ 
359b7(rgyud): tha yis yongs su bskor byas nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor byas nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yongs bskor// he ru kar bdag bsgom byas nas// 
359b8(rgyud): ge bdun pa'i sngags kyang bzla// oM hrIHha ha a mu ka s+ya shan+tiM ku ru huM hUM phaT/ rigs ngan yang na bram ze 'am// rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du// rang byung me tog blangs nasu// 
360a1(rgyud): glang chen me tog dang bsres dang // byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa// ro ca na dang lhan cig sbyar// pad+ma rdo rje chu de bzhin// mig
360a2(rgyud): sman chen po dang bsres nas// lha mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya// rdo rje phreng bas rnam par bskor// mi yi lpags pa'am// gro ga'am/ yang na yi dgas gos kyang rung / 
360a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// mar dang 'o ma blangs nas su// gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad kyi brjod// de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod// gser ram dngul gyi bum bdag
360a4(rgyud): ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chus// gang ba'i dbus su bcug/ nas su// 'khor lo srang bu dkar pos dkri// phreng ba'i gsang sngags de la bzla// de nas pa dbang bskur
360a5(rgyud): sbyin par bya// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// nad med pa yang nang du byed// myos byed chang gi dbus su ni// mkha sa pas de la bcug nas ni// nad med nang du byed pa
360a6(rgyud): s+ho// ji lta'i las kyi rjes su 'bradrang // gang yang rung ba'i las rnams la// phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam par bskor// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni// mgo bo'i nang du spras nas ni// 
360a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gros de la byin rlabs ni// gdon mi za bar byed par gyur// ci 'dod thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// bgegs med par ni dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
360a8(rgyud): bla ma las srung ba'i phyir bzlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas de yi sgom pa bshad// sems can ku yan 'dogs pa'i// skad cig gis ni bdag nyid dag/ 
360b1(rgyud): lha mo phyir bzlog rim pa ste// zhal bzhi pa las phyag bcu drug/ gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// bgegs ni pad+ma'i 'og mnan nas// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ 
360b2(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas// dkar zhing sgro la dmar dang ser// steng gi zhal gyis rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan
360b3(rgyud): dang ldan// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// 'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la 'jam pa'i ngag/ gzhan ni gtug cing gtum pa la// bsdigs mdzub rdo rje
360b4(rgyud): gsor mdzad cing // dril bu zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje ral gri mdung dang ni// dgra sta thod pa lcags kyu dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mda' ni
360b5(rgyud): dam pa 'gengs par byed// zo ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// yang na 'di la zhal brgyad pa// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag
360b6(rgyud): tu// g.yas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser// drag shul ha ha ra bzhad pa'o// g.yon pa ldang zhing dmar ba dang // dud ka dag gi mdog can yin// steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste/ 
360b7(rgyud): sku lus zla ba'i mdog cano// de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// dad pas shin tu mnyam gzhag ste// 'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rig sngags bzla// oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni/ ma hA
360b8(rgyud): a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI ba/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+ra pad+ma sa ma yo ga mA ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ba~M tha bi ta mud+he huM hUM phaT/ A A/ A A swA hA/ 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas/ 'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed/ 
361a1(rgyud): dus min 'chi bzhi 'gyur zhing // 'chi ba las ni nges par slong // gzhan du rnal 'byor ma dgyes nas// rmang du drung bar mdzad pa ni// so sa nas ni gang mdzad cing // 
361a2(rgyud): hi hi dag gis dga' ba dang // ho ho dag gi dgyes pa dang // he he dag gis tshig tu smra// hUM hUM dag gis rdzogs pa'o// hUM hUM dag ni bsam gtan// phaT phaT dag gis gsod pa dang // tsUH/ 
361a3(rgyud): dag gi phur du'o// dzaH/ dag gis legs par drongs// sas dag ni bden par byed// nges par legs so zhes pa'i sgo'o// hu bru dag ni gsod pa'o// hUM b+hud+d+ha b+hU
361a4(rgyud): dag ni thal bar klog pa'o// ha ha dag gis gsal bar byed pa'o// b+hu b+h+raM dag ni gzi byin byed// d+hI d+hi dag gis leg sa par drongs// tU tAM dag ni mchod pa'o// so
361a5(rgyud): sa dag gis dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o// hi hai dag ni rmongs pa'o// laM laM dag ni shis pa'o// di de dag ni 'dzin pa'o// dzi dzi dag ni legs par dros
361a6(rgyud): hUM hUM dag ni 'khor ba'o// hri hri dag ni gsod pa'o// dzAM dzI dag rmugs par mdzad pa'o// ho ho mdzad pa rje su chags par bya'o// haM ha dag ni srung ba'o// he ho dag ni dgye
361a7(rgyud): pa'o// TaM Ta dag ni gdug pa'o// g+haM g+h+raM dag ni me tog go// gaM ga ni dri'o// ra ra ni gsang ba'o// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// zhi ba la sogs cho ga yis// rim
361a8(rgyud): pa'adi la rjesu gnas// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / 
361b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog/ rnal 'byor ma
361b2(rgyud): yi rgyud pa'i rim// gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ 
361b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro mas ni yongasu khyab// sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che// ye shes lnga las nges byung ba// dmar zhing sngo la ldang ba dang // ser zhing zhil steng zhal dkar// spyan gsum
361b4(rgyud): pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas rkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhu gus// 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag/ skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya drug dang zla ba
361b5(rgyud): phyed// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang // glang po'i lpags pa/ gosu banabs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// / ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni kha Ta
361b6(rgyud): 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u 'tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan/ 
361b7(rgyud): de mdun rdo rje phag me ni// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// byin/ 
361b8(rgyud): kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba// de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
362a1(rgyud): gnas pag/ ye shes sems dpa' rnam par sgom// bcu gnyis chu las nges 'byung ba// dam tshig sems dpa' de ba che// thams cad mkhyen pa des 'byung ba// sdugs
362a2(rgyud): kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla// oM shri badz+ra he he ru ru kaM/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e e/ b+h+yam+b+ha aHDA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra hUM hUM phaT sA hA/ oM a A a aH huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang / 
362a3(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bA ra hi/ a A/ i i/ u u/ e e/ o au/ aM aH huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsi ni ye a A/ aM ahUM hUM phaT swat+su/ lha me'i snying byo nga / 
362a4(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'o// o DA kA nI ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM lA me rI huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da re he li huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye li huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Di kaM pa la kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM br-i hu/ 
362a5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM kaM kA la kha hu hUM phaT/ a tsa huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kaM kA la kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM praM hUM phaT/ e bikaT daSh+Ti Ne g+haM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM su ra bai ra Ni
362a6(rgyud): nga hu hUM phaT/ oM bi hUM phaT/ oM a me tA b+hA tse hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pra b+ha tsha ma hUM phaT/ oM la~M hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra de ha dzaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM huM hUM hUM phaT/ oM aM ku ri ka dz+dza hUM phaT/ 
362a7(rgyud): oM oM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dza Ti la nya hUM phaT/ oM ma hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra Ta hu hUM phaT/ oM baM huM phaT/ oM badz+ra hUM kA ra dza hUM ga li tsu / oM su b+ha dra De hUM phaT/ oMSh+Ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha dra Da hUM phaT/ oM
362a8(rgyud): suM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra ba Na hUM phaT/ oM ho hUM phaT/ oM bi ru pAk+Sha ta hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la thaM hUM phaT/ oM tsa~M huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ra de hU~M phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ e he ya gr-ib
362b1(rgyud): nga hUM phaT/ oM shau hU~M phaT/ oM A ka sha gar+b+ha ne hUM phaT/ oM tsa hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka paM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma neN+Te shwa ra paM hUM phaT/ oM ma~M hUM phaT/ oM bai ro tsan baM hUM phaT// oM na
362b2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sitwa b+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hUM phaT/ oM ye hU~M phaT/ oM ra hU~M phaT/ oM laM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM sha hUM phaT/ oM She hU~M phaT/ oM sa~M hUM phaT/ oM ho hUM phaT/ 'di dag ni
362b3(rgyud): dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa// de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar// mkha'
362b4(rgyud): 'gro ma ni sngon po ste/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'jigs byed chen po gzhin rnam sbyar// zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen dpo// gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar// mkha 'gro ma ni dman
362b5(rgyud): po ste/ pad+ma dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser// mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi mdog/ gti mug gis khyab bde ba che// mkha 'gro
362b6(rgyud): ma sogs lha mo rnams// sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po// kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// dmar ser dkar la ljang ku'o// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // de bzhin
362b7(rgyud): dkar ba'i mdog cano// 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun// spyan gsum g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// dpa' bo stag gi lpags banabs shing // lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste// 
362b8(rgyud): skra grol ba ni rnam par mdzes// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // phyag rgya lnga yi rnam par rgyan/ thong ba kha T+wA~M ga
363a1(rgyud): 'dzin cing // dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams// thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo yang ni de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma sogs khwa gdong dang // gshin rje sog sogs
363a2(rgyud): lha mo rnams// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// me long dri dang ro dang reg/ gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang // cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin// mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang // khA T+wAM ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing // 
363a3(rgyud): dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnams// kha gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag/ thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thugs
363a4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo drag po ste// gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal// / sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhin rnam sgyur// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni// dbus kyi ga
363a5(rgyud): bor rnam par brtag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ khro bo sna tshogs du ma'am// kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'am// ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang // 'od zer can nam bskul
363a6(rgyud): byed ma// shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin// gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni// yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag/ de yis dregs par byas pa ni// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// yang na rdo rje sems
363a7(rgyud): dpa' ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i/ 
363a8(rgyud): dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim// sna tshogs du ma'i rigasu bshad// mdor bsdus na ni gsu
363b1(rgyud): dang lnga// drug du yang ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin// sku kun so
363b2(rgyud): sor 'byung ba ste// gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigaso// dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba// yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pas/ 
363b3(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'di bshad cing bstan pa// hUM bruM aM hri khaM baM// de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams// rab tu g.yo zhing brgyal nas kyang / 
363b4(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran// mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// 'di ltar sangs
363b5(rgyud): rgyas sku lus kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags// thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'a gro yini// gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha'
363b6(rgyud): 'gro yin// lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin// lnga po he ru kar shes bya// rdo rje dpa' bo yang de nyid// na mkha'i zas kyis longs spyod cing // zla ba'i zas kyi longs
363b7(rgyud): kyang spyad// sprul pa'i longs spyod na mkha' ste// pad+ma'i zas kyi longs spyod sprul pa ste// sna tshogs longs spyod sprul pa ste// sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa// mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag/ 
363b8(rgyud): gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bur bsol// dag pa'i mdog can mchog gi mdog/ zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum skal pa sna tshogs bzang // sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// zla ba/ 
364a1(rgyud): nyi ma'i dbus na gnas// rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// thams cad ral ba'i cod pan can// thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te// phyagargya drug ni thams cad rgya// rang gi
364a2(rgyud): gdan la legs par bzhugs// glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya dang ni na mkha' lding // de yi steng du yi dgas gdan// bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol// rdo rje lag gis sa la reg/ rdo rje dril bu
364a3(rgyud): dkur brten cing // zhal gyi mchu ni rnam par bsgyur// 'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas// rin chen dril bu'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i dril bu'i rim pa dang // dril bu sna tshogs rdo rje nyid// thams cad
364a4(rgyud): snyems par rnam bsgoms te// rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam da pa// dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya// sgo bzhi dang ni de yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'khor los bskor ba ste// rin chen pad+mas de
364a5(rgyud): bzhin bskor// sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste// dbus su rdo rjes bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar ni// khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog/ rigs drag dag ni rnam par
364a6(rgyud): dgod// der ni gnas sogs rim pa dgod// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la// pul+lI ri ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang // rab gtum ma'o// 
364a7(rgyud): byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang // gtum mig ma'o// nub tu ur+yan na keng rus can dang // 'od ldan ma'o// lho ru ar bu dan mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // sna chen ma ste dbus nis dang po rab
364a8(rgyud): / tu dga' ba ste// dpa' bo sku mdog nag po// mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang // sprin gyi mdog can// dpa' bo na rdo rje dang / rdo rje da'i bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang / rdo rje bsdigs mdzub
