364b1(rgyud): go/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor god pa rin lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo can ma'o// byang ngur me shA
364b2(rgyud): ran 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o// nub du di bI ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang // lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// lho ru mA la ba na rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma'o// dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po// mkha' 'gro/ 
364b3(rgyud): ma ni ser po'o// dri ma med pa'i sa ni dbus ma ste// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o// 'od byed pa'i sa 'di bus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ru kA ma rU pa na myug gu can dang sa srung ma'o// 
364b4(rgyud): byang du oM drin rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o// nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// lho ru ko sa len rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste
364b5(rgyud): dpa' bo ser po// mkha' 'gro ma ljang ku'o// 'od 'gro ba'i sa'i dbus su pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ka lang ga na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o// byang dul
364b6(rgyud): bA ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang mo'o// nub du kaM tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o// lho ru hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste/ dpa' bo dmar po// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar mo'o// sbyang
364b7(rgyud): dka' ba'i dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu rini stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// byang du gri ha de ba tA na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o// nub tu so rUSh+Ta nau
364b8(rgyud): rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma'o// lho ru su bar+Na dI pa na// nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o// dpa' bo nag po// mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o// mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs
365a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor nag ran he ru ka dang / rab dpa' mo'o// byang du sin d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// nub tu ma ru ta na rnam par snang
365a2(rgyud): mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma'o// lho ru ku lu tAn rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste/ dpa' bo ni sna tshogs kyi mdog can la// mkha' 'gro mdud pa'i mdog can no// dkyil 'khor de
365a3(rgyud): yi phyi rol tu// yi dgas phreng bas yongasu bskor// de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje// zur du mkha' 'gro ma yang bri// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// thod pa bzhi ni mtshams
365a4(rgyud): su br-i// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtsham su ni// ring du song sa ma kha' 'gro ma// lA ma mi g.yo ba yis// legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma// gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin/ 
365a5(rgyud): sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // bzhi pa dmar nga'i mdog can yin// kha gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdogacan yid 'phrog ma// gshin rje sreg srogs mkha' 'gro ma/ 
365a6(rgyud): phyed na bud med dbang phyug zhal// dpa' bo thams cad g.yas brkyang gnas// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi
365a7(rgyud): gos 'chang skra grol ba// yid 'ong mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs// thams cad yi dgas stong du bzhugs// dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgoms// pad+ma la gnas 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor
365a8(rgyud): sdom pa'i mchog yin no// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u ni phyag grayas na// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par rgyan// khwa gdong la sogs mkha'
365b1(rgyud): 'gro ma// lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan// g.yon par kha T+wAM g.yas par ni// ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu yang ni de bzhin no// gshin rje sreg srogs mkha' 'gro
365b2(rgyud): ma// me long dang ni pi bang dang // dri dang ro ni g.yas pa na// g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas// 'khor
365b3(rgyud): lo so sor bsgoms nas ni// 'khor dang bcas pas yongasu khyab// ye shes sems dpa'athugs khar blta// rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor long mthong nas// bsgoms
365b4(rgyud): pas thim par byas nas su// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dbang bskur nas ni rim par spro// oM AHba~M hUM/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// srog dang rtsol ba
365b5(rgyud): rim pas bya// mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur byin// ji ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom bya// ji ltar gsang sngags rjes 'thun par// 
365b6(rgyud): dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya// hUM bruM/ oM hU~M khe ba/ oM a baM hUM/ oM shrI ma hA su khaM badz+ra satwa DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a la la la aHhUM DA ki nI dzA la
365b7(rgyud): shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI rat+na DA ki tA aM a/ DA ka nI dzA la saM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA// oM shrI pad+ma DA kihA~M hA~M a hU~M a T+TaH kinI dza la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra DA ka aHhUM phaT DA ki nA~M dzA
365b8(rgyud): sha bar hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bi shwa DA ka ho khe A ny+dzu DA ki ni dz+wa las ba ra hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM khi hU~M phaT/ oM br-is+phu phaT/ oM ke hUM phaT/ oM ka tsi hU~M phaT/ oM ma~M hU~M phaT/ oM pre hU~M phaT/ 
366a1(rgyud): oM bahUM phaT/ oM me ny+dzu phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM bihUM Ta/ oM A hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM bahU phaT/ oM la~M hUM phaT/ oM ba hUM phaT/ oMng+ku
366a2(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM oM hUM phaT/ oM oM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM ba hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM shAM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM
366a3(rgyud): khaM hUM phaT/ oM me hUM phaT/ oM tsa hUM phaT/ oM raM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sho hUM phaT/ oM oM hUM phaT/ oM tse hUM phaT/ oM haM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM paM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM
366a4(rgyud): phaT/ oM pa~M hUM phaT/ oM tsa hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM maM da hUM phaT/ oM DA hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM pha/ Ta/ oM r-I hUM phaT/ oM kaM hUM phaT/ oM uM hUM phaT/ oM shaM/ 
366a5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM ye hU~M phaT/ oM ye hUM phaT/ oM yaM hUM phaT/ oM ye hUM phaT/ 'khor la sogs dra thams cad kun// sgom la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// 'khor
366a6(rgyud): los bsgyur drug lhan cig tu// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig dam tshig mchog gyur pa// gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsang
366a7(rgyud): sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur// zla drag nges te gzhan min par// 'khor los bsgyur drag dngos grub 'thob// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po
366a8(rgyud): dang // dbang phyug rta mchog he ru ka/ gnas sogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// mkhas pasangs bsgoms nas ni// rim par sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // brgyud pa'i gnas kyi rim pa dang // rnal 'byor ma
366b1(rgyud): yi bka' dag ni// bla ma'i brgyud pas 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan du sngags pa 'khor byed cing // bka' ni nam yang mthong ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rigs drug rga
366b2(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// rnal 'byor lam ni rnyed dka' ba// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying po// gzhan
366b3(rgyud): gyi rnal 'byor rje su 'thun par// yi ge las byung gcig car tshul// gcig car mtshan ma phyag mtshan yin// gcig car rdo rje sems dpa' ste// bde ba chen po bla na med// de ru 'jug cing de mi
366b4(rgyud): tshul// gcig car he ru ka dpal mchog/ ston ka'i na mkha da'adri med ltar// zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa// phya dag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// 'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs
366b5(rgyud): par mdzad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma yi gtso// zhal gdong g.yon dkar g.yas dmar ste// steng gi zhal ni ser la mdzes/ 
366b6(rgyud): dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs can// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis
366b7(rgyud): pad+mar gnod par bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas mkhyud// phag mo yi ni byin pas 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pas// dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can// sku mdog mnyam/ 
366b8(rgyud): zhing mtshungs par ldan// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab tu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rgyal ba'i lpags pa stong du ste/ 
367a1(rgyud): thob mdung ste gzhan dun// tshangs pa'i mgo brgyan pa la// zla baphyed pa ni pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dngul rgyun// phyag rgya drug gis skul rgyun/ 
367a2(rgyud): mtshan ma dag gis rgyan// rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'og bag dag gis sku regs byas// dpung rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni// 'di ltar cho ga'i
367a3(rgyud): snying po shes// phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i lpags pa rnam par spangs// phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las// cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis rgyan// bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba
367a4(rgyud): dbus// pad+ma mdab brgyad yid 'ong ba// sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la// thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa // shar gyi mdab sogs phyogs chal// mkha' 'gro ma sogs
367a5(rgyud): bzhi po dgod// shar du mkha' 'gro ma dgod cing // byang du lA ma de bzhin te// nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru gzugs can ma yin te// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmas
367a6(rgyud): ljang ku dang ni bzhi pa'o// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum dag po gzi brjid can// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// skra gol ba ni yid 'ong ba// phyogs kyi gos can mgo
367a7(rgyud): yi phreng // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing // rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin// snyems
367a8(rgyud): pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang // ljang ku steng gi zhal dkar po// ser zhing sngol ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal gdong drag la
367b1(rgyud): dmar// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // steng gizhal ni dkar la ni// ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang // steg gi zhal ni ser po mchog/ bdud bzhi po na nabs kyis gnon// bcom ldan 'das la
367b2(rgyud): gdong gis lta// zur gyi char ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// de yi steng du thod pa ni// byang chub 'o mas rab gang ba// phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor la// khang pa brtsegs pa legs
367b3(rgyud): par mdzes// shar phyogasu ni gau rI ste// byang du de bzhin tso ri ma// nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no// lho ru yang ni ri langs ma// me la lbos byed ma yin te// bden bral du ni gtum mo yin// rlung phyogs sme mo
367b4(rgyud): nyid yin te// dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste// de bzhin rnal 'byor/ dam brgyad ni// dkar mo ser la sngo ljang ku/ skul byed dmar la sngo ljang ku/ rab rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljang // ro langs ma
367b5(rgyud): ni dkar sngo ldang // lbos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang ku'o// gtum mo yang na lding sngo so rau/ sme mo yang ni dung sngo ldeng // he ru ka ma sngo ljang dmar// 'di ltar
367b6(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang // spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyis gos 'chang gir dang bcas// yi dgas gdan lags par bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// kha T+Ta thod pa dril
367b7(rgyud): bu dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu thogs// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan byas// 'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// 'di ltar/ 
367b8(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// lha mo dkar mo la sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu bshad// bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad de// thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub// lha mo mkha' spyod grub
368a1(rgyud): nas ni// mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed// de yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo// shar du bi stangs thabs ma// byang du gling bu'i stangs thabs ma// nub du rdzardza
368a2(rgyud): che stangs thabs// lho ru rdza rnga'i stangs thabs te// sngo dong ser dang dmar ljang ku/ me sogs rdo rje bzhad ma ste// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gla/ rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang ku'o// de dag
368a3(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// tsham ngam lag pa'i stangs thabs kyis// 
368a4(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu stangs thabs can// khrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni// pad+ma bskor ba'i stangs thabs can// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// tshan do dang ni tshan doha// de dag 'od
368a5(rgyud): dpag med dbu rgyan// sku yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni// me tog ma byang bdug pa ma// nub du mar me lho ru dwi/ ser dang dud ka dmar dkar po// me long ro dang reg bya chos/ 
368a6(rgyud): me phyogs la sogs mtshams bzhi ste// zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar// de dag spun ni gsum pa ste// gcer bu dbu skra gol ba dang // zhabs kyis kun tu gar byed cing // phyag tu mchod pa
368a7(rgyud): thogs nas ni// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // cang ti'u ni phyag na bsnams// thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'dra sa dang // nye ba'i 'dus dur khrod dang // nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te/ 
368a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas// sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang // rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog/ rdo rje dril bu de bzhin te// sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser/ shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi/ 
368b1(rgyud): phyogs kyang de bzhin no// me las sogs pa'i mtsham su ni// gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag/ dmar dang sngo dang dud ka ser// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang // gi gug dang
368b2(rgyud): ni mgo bo 'chang // spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas bzhugs// thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan// thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can// dza lta'i rim pra
368b3(rgyud): rjesu gnas// de yi snying kar ye shes sems// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum// gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya// dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ ji lta bu yis
368b4(rgyud): bsgoms pa na// rjesu bstan pa'i sgom pa las// ye shes lcag sa kyu dag gis ni// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// ji da ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur// gcig tu bsdus te bstims/ 
368b5(rgyud): nas su// ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su// ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya// spro bsdu srog dang rtsol ba yis// 'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yis// slob dpon gyis g+h+ri bzlas pa bya// oM
368b6(rgyud): AHhuM hUM/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis// grangs med par ni byas nas su// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par// gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mnyam par gzhag te bzlas par bya// dud chen phreng ba blangs nas ni// 
368b7(rgyud): sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya// oM aHhU~M/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA rA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA maM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he hu
368b8(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM ru bi trI yi huM hUM phaT/ oM ga ra huM hUM phaT/ oM tsa rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM pra mo ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM bi tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM tsan+d+ra li huM hUM phaT/ oM g+hasma ri huM hUM phaT/ oM
369a1(rgyud): he ru ka b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bin huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ba shaM huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA~M daM ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mu ra dze huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ sa~M tshu gyu
369a2(rgyud): hrIhihU~M d+hu TaT/ oM badz+ra ni t+ye hu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dI bai huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pa badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM ra sa badz+rI huM hUM phaT/ oM s+phar sha badz+rA/

369a4(rgyud): tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+NI NA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma da tha nI ye huM hUM phaT// dam tshig can gyis tshig/ dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla// nang gi bdag nyid
369a5(rgyud): spyir ldan pa// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// rang gi thab sa dang rig pa'i lus// gnyi su med par mnyam pa'i bdag/ khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas// 'gro ba gsum po bcas

369a8(rgyud): gsol ba gdab par bya// khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi// longs spyod las ni byung ba yi// rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas// bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te// ra ma he nad Ta Na su ra A ma hA su hU ba dzi ma
369b1(rgyud): ni ka ma la suh+ma/ a la la la ho// su ra a ut+ta ma many+dzu/ ma hA sidz+dza/ u ma rdzo i ni dzi la ma ho// A I/ A Ar ho// a ru he b+hi nu su pa ya nAH/ su ra a ru dra de hi bar TA i ni/ dza la su d+hU bas pan
369b2(rgyud): ta ro Na Na ba de hi ma hA su hU madz+dza mu hU mo k+ShA pa lag kha u/ tut+tA sa hUn i sun+du/ bah+ni su mo khu su hUM/ i na i du/ khe la tha i mo khu su huM/ ba su i baM ka u madz+nyA te nun pa rA/ A ba daMtra
369b3(rgyud): bu dza ta nu muny+dza hA su hU/ mi la dpag/ sum hA/ a ra bI a gi a paM u ra su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni// dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste// snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin po'i dbyangs// dpyid kyi rgyal/ 
369b4(rgyud): po'i glu blangs pas// mkha' 'gro dri ba dri med rnams// gzi dgas shing las kun mdzad pa yin// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ma// / sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// dgyes pa 'di yis
369b5(rgyud): bskul na ni// bde ba chen po stsol ba yin// sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu// rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar// thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla// 'khor lo dag
369b6(rgyud): ni brten byas te// dpa' bo dang ni mkha'agro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// thams cad snying kar brtan byas te// bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur// 
369b7(rgyud): gal te bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod// dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin// oM badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya badz+ra he ru ka/ twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to ma b+ha ba// su brgya
369b8(rgyud): me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho// badz+ra he ru ka mA ma muny+tsa he ru ko b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab
370a1(rgyud): cing // yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin// phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa// bcu drug mdab ma la bkod cing // rjesu bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// bdag
370a2(rgyud): gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid
370a3(rgyud): de/ de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin// bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med// phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med// gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim/ 
370a4(rgyud): pa'i gzhi yang med// rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med// rdo rje chen po dngos 'ji na pa// rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa// 'gog pa nyid kyang
370a5(rgyud): mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyi la 'khor gang ba ni// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par sgom// yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa// lha yi gzugasu sgom pa ni// de
370a6(rgyud): yi dbus su rnam par bsam// sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can// de yi lus las 'das gyur te// sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med// chags pa med cing chags bral med// chags bral dang ni ldan gyur
370a7(rgyud): pa// snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni// brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni// yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste// rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed rgyan// ye
370a8(rgyud): shes sems ni bsam pa ni// mchog ste spyad par bya ba med// bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bar ba yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni// 'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te// sbyor
370b1(rgyud): dang sbyor ba bral byas nas// go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yin// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang // stegang na gzhung lugs log pa'i blo
370b2(rgyud): gros de nyid ni// ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
370b3(rgyud): de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa// de nyid sbyor ba kun gyis mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsal pa// gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing // gang gis su la'ang mi bstan to// 
370b4(rgyud): de nyid mchog gi sgom pa bzung // rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas// gsang ba bstan par sba bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom dpar bya// dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba// sgrub pa po yis
370b5(rgyud): nges bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni ba sgom par bya// de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas
370b6(rgyud): thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin// a li ka li las rang 'byung // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// phyag
370b7(rgyud): rgya drug gis rnam par rgyan// 'dzam bu'i mngon can mnyam pas khyab// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal// sems dpa' kun gyi
370b8(rgyud): sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na med// stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs// na ra'i lpags pa steng du brkyang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yi
371a1(rgyud): dbu rgyan can// mgo bo 'phreng bas rnam par rgyan// de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni// rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa// 
371a2(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi 'dzags dog pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol// gdug cing 'dzegs pa ma lus kun// 'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon
371a3(rgyud): par mdzad// gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong // zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbul mtshan// rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes// rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can// sna tshogs pad+ma mdab
371a4(rgyud): brgyad kyi// lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can// yi ge bruM las
371a5(rgyud): byung bar sgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo snying ka ru// he ru ka ni rnam bar sgrom// gsung gis 'khor lo kha la sgom// sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin// sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang // phyag
371a6(rgyud): drug pa la zhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang // rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus// bde ba
371a7(rgyud): chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu// yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sogs pa'i
371a8(rgyud): rim sbyor ba// sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa// mkha' gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha 'gro ma ni
371b1(rgyud): kha dog ser// ldam pa la sha yi mdog/ dum skyes mni sngon po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnams su ni lha mo ba ni// khwa gdong
371b2(rgyud): la sogs mkha'agro ma// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku drag po'i gzugs can no// mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs// rab 'jigs shin tu 'jigs pa ste// thod pa dang ni khA T+wAM 'dzin
371b3(rgyud): mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gi gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la skra gol ba// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 
371b4(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// me long ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste// sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang // sku gsung da thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang
371b5(rgyud): chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// mgo la bin dus mnan pa ste// gsal byed hUM gnyis dang yang sbyar// mthor ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang
371b6(rgyud): sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// gsal byed mkha'agro ma yi ming // mthar ni huM hUM phaT yin to// 'di ltar rab gtum mkha' gro ma// sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ 
371b7(rgyud): hUM AHaM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// pad+ma'i med pa la mkha' go ma// gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa// hUM na gnyis pa nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// kha gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni// 
371b8(rgyud): ya ra la wa/ gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste// mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar// gau shin rje sreg ma la sogs pa// sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang // phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su sangs
372a1(rgyud): rgyas thod pa yi// gsang sngags de bzhin rje su dran// oM a~M AM/ oM I/ u UM/ e aM/ oM aHSha swAhA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// go cha rnams ni sbyar
372a2(rgyud): par bya// ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya// mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams// rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar/ 
372a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba// rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste// thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar// mthor 'thung ngu ni rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo
372a4(rgyud): gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor nas su// dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi
372a5(rgyud): gsang sngags kun// sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing // ye shes 'chi med
372a6(rgyud): lnga yi mchog/ yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya// sngags kyis de nyid bzlas par bya// oM shrI bu d+hi ka pA li bruM AHhUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA// 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi ye
372a7(rgyud): shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la// sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla na med pa// rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang bskur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya// 
372a8(rgyud): yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang // bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ 
372b1(rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// 'gro ba'i gcol skyabs su mchi// des ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig las
372b2(rgyud): ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba// gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang / 
372b3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyid med rnam par dag/ theg ma dbus mthar dri ma med// a yi ye
372b4(rgyud): shes las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyam das// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// rang bzhin dag cing
372b5(rgyud): dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbul rgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul mtshan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan// sems dpa'i skyil
372b6(rgyud): mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya dag gis rnam par rgyan// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad
372b7(rgyud): rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa' snying ka ru// 'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom// hUM las thugs kyi 'khor
372b8(rgyud): lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang // AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o// aM las sku yi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo
373a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor// sku gsung thugs ni dri mi med// raM las phyag rgya chen po ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam// i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste// byang
373a2(rgyud): chub zla ba dri ma med// u ni snying kar bsam pa ste// e ni mgo la rnam par dgod// a ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod// a ni mig tu dgod pa ste// a ni go char byas nas su// a ni mdun
373a3(rgyud): gyi mtshon cha'o// li las lha mo spyan yin te// ri las dam tshig sgrol ma yin// l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo// r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung // rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron// dkar
373a4(rgyud): zhing pa la sha yi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzem bu chu bo'i mdogazhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos// thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te/ 
373a5(rgyud): rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje/ dang // pad+ma dmar po rin chen dngong // rdo rje dri la bu lhan cig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// 
373a6(rgyud): ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin// gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thod pa yin cod pan can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni// 
373a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste// dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan// zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can skra gol ba// zhal
373a8(rgyud): gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can// me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang dang dang bcud kyis len// chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltar
373b1(rgyud): bdag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// skyi la krung phyed par legs par bzhugs// lag bstim pa'i thal mo yos// mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni// dzang/ 
373b2(rgyud): lha'i tshogs thams cad mkhyen// a li de nyid dri ma med// gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag/ sku gsung thug
373b3(rgyud): su yang dag sbyar// oM shrI mahA su la badz+ra sa twA a// an+d+ra DA ki nI dz+wAl sha bar swAt+ma/ oM sat+pa la can la aHhUM swAhA/ oM sa ma ya tA ra tut+tA ra d+hu ror AHhU~M swAny+dza/ oM bad+d+ha
373b4(rgyud): d+hAl+le pAN+Da ra bo si na si la~M AHhUM swAhA/ oM rat+na ku la ke ka/ darat+na dz+wa li nI r-I AHhUM swA hA/ oM rU pa badz+rI pru/ oM shab+da badz+ri hUM/ oM gad+ha badz+ri Sha~M/ oM ras badz+dza
373b5(rgyud): hrIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga 'i dbus su gnas par skam// a li rdorjegasang ba ste// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gi
373b6(rgyud): dngos po kun gsang ba// de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya// som nyi thams cing spangs nas na// sems
373b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag gcig tu bstims nas su// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yos/ 
373b8(rgyud): khams gsum dag na mi lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu// 'das pa dang ni de ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po// de ltar sems can gsum po li// rdo rje sems/ 
374a1(rgyud): dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems
374a2(rgyud): dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni// maM gi ye shes las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i dzarje
374a3(rgyud): bde ba che// zhal drug phyag drug ni bste// sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas rgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can// thod pa'i phreng bas
374a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang ku de bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi bste// 
374a5(rgyud): lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gau po ti 'dzin pa ste// ut+pal dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes lus can rnam par sgom// sku gsung thugs kyi
374a6(rgyud): snying po ni// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par sgom// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' lta'o// gsang sngags 'di ni rje su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni/ 
374a7(rgyud): gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o// oM shrI ma hA su kha many+dzu badz+ra a maM hU DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA// rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni// brtul
374a8(rgyud): zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ 
374b1(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yi ge dgu pasgrub pa ste// kA ya
374b2(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// za byed mkha' 'go za byed cing // rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba// na mkha'i longs spyod za
374b3(rgyud): byed cing // zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// g.yas bskyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// gdug pa'i bdud ni ze byed cing // 'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs
374b4(rgyud): byed ma'o// khas bub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs// stag gri lpags pa gos su banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam dpar rgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed
374b5(rgyud): pas nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa mnan// phyag rgya/ drug gis sku lus rgyan// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par ga tshogs// 'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs zhing // sngo dang / 
374b6(rgyud): dud ka ljang ku dang // dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la// gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma/ 
374b7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // dbang du rdo rje phag mo ni// de mdog stang zhal phag mgo ste// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// skra gol ba dang
374b8(rgyud): phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i lpags pa banabs pa ste// rdo rje mdung dang / 
375a1(rgyud): cang te'u dang // gri gugazhags pa mgo bo dang // phyag du ral gri 'phyar bste// drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa// snying kar ye shes mkha' 'gro na// kha gdong la so ga/ 
375a2(rgyud): yongs kyis khyab// 'khor lo mad ba brgyad dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni// dur khrad dang ni nye dur khrid// mkha' 'gro mchog ni dgod par bya// ya la waM/ shangs / 
375a3(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod// zhag bdun par du bsgoms nas ni// gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim// chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du// bsgom pas dngos grub nges par rnyed// 'phrog
375a4(rgyud): pa dang ni gsod byed cing // gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'di dar yid gnyis dpyod pa med// sngo dang bal sha yi mdog/ 
375a5(rgyud): dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang sngo dang dud ka ste// zhal mdog dkar po mchog
375a6(rgyud): tu mdzes// thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal// skra grol ba la phyogs gos can// khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal// 'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi zhal
375a7(rgyud): gdong yin// bzhi pa phag gzhal gdong ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'o zhal gdong ni// dag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong na// g.yon dang g.yas pa
375a8(rgyud): gnyis de bzhin// thugs ri rnga mo rta dang ni// seng ger dang glang ma he// gzhan yang dem gyi zhal yin te// thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// zod pa dang ni kha T+Ta 'dzin// zhags pa/ 
375b1(rgyud): lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// yi dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs// mi'u thung la skyes gnas
375b2(rgyud): ring // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM aHoM// 'di ni gsang ba
375b3(rgyud): bshad pa ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dbus// ye shes mkha' 'gro snying ka ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi ge'i 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchad cing thim par rnam par sgom// 
375b4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag nas yi ge rnams// srog dang rtsol bas gdasang sngags bzla// rang gis thor 'thung byas nas su// / gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro// oM shrI kA DA ka nI dzI la
375b5(rgyud): saM ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA// thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM/ mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar// mkha' gro zla bas pa shad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// mchog
375b6(rgyud): 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi bya// zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te// rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms nas ni// 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges
375b7(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las kA'i mkha' gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// a li mkha' gro sgrub pa ste// a li ye shes las
375b8(rgyud): byung ba// a li mkha' go mchog dam// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ g.yas brkyang ba yi
376a1(rgyud): zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba phyed pa la pa 'chang // thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyun// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnas/ dpral ba la ni jirje phreng // drug gi lpags pa
376a2(rgyud): gosu banabs// phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan// rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid// sred dang drag gos mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul
376a3(rgyud): mdzad cing // bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can// sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes// dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra// lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can// sngo zhing ser la dung kad
376a4(rgyud): g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te// ljang ku dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes// steng gi thal kha sbyin mdog zhi// chags shing rje su chags pas lta// thuH
376a5(rgyud): rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can/ a li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku// phyag gnyis pa la gce/ bu'i lus// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la rgyan// skra grol ba
376a6(rgyud): rnam par myos// spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can// de yi mdog can sku rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag
376a7(rgyud): ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o// ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la// khyab 'jug lpags pa banabs pa yin// thod pa dang
376a8(rgyud): ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid// dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying dkar rtsibs ni/ 
376b1(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'i// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni/ ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya bzhin
376b2(rgyud): te/ shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'i rigs pas byung ba'o// byang phyogs sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung te bzhugs pa'o// 
376b3(rgyud): nub phyogasu na mkha'i mchog ces bye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ye ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lho phyogasu gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o// 
376b4(rgyud): phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po da grong par bya ste// thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i ma kha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du drag
376b5(rgyud): po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'agro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// rlung gi phyogasu dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha'/ 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang ldan du khro bo'i
376b6(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru// dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa// yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i
376b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang // yi ge li las du khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang // yi ge rI las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang // yi ge lI las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya bI
376b8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang // mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// thams cad spyan gsum rnam sbyar zhal// sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal/ sngo
377a1(rgyud): / dang ljang ku gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas// sgra grol ba la rab tu 'jig
377a2(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun// sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams// ro yi sgo yi steng bzhugs shing // thugs rje'i ro// 
377a3(rgyud): ni yongasu rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan// mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// thams cad a la la yi sgra// oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ A ni gsung du 'gyur ba/ 
377a4(rgyud): yin// a ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus// 'di ni ma chog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ rdo rje sems pas gsungs pa ste// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin// 
377a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor la sogasapa thams cad dgod// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ gcig pu chos kyi ro yang sgom// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yi// 
377a6(rgyud): rang gi sngags kyi mthor mthung bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// 'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro// mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa// sa ni bcu gnyis dag
377a7(rgyud): nyid de// rdo rjes ni bcu gsum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba/ sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// gzugs med
377a8(rgyud): pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po// 'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod// dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog/ ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbusu'o// 'khor la sogs
377b1(rgyud): bkun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed du byas te// de dag mthar ni tha dang sbyar// sngags kyi gcangs gsang sngags ni// rang snying rang gis byon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam pa
377b2(rgyud): sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas// gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya// bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang // mnyam par gzhag ste mi smra bzla// rang gi mthor 'thung byas
377b3(rgyud): nas ni// blo ldan sreg stsol bzlas pa ba// oM shri A la DA ka a a DA ki nI dz+wa la shi ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 
377b4(rgyud): sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams// sems can khams ni cha gnas pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing
377b5(rgyud): mchod par bya// mnyam par ma gzhag sems kyis ni/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te// sngags dang dbyi bas dang chos nyid de// chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin// cho
377b6(rgyud): rnams bdag med nyid yin te// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni// rje su brtag par bya ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba A li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste/ 
377b7(rgyud): le'u sum cu tham pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che// dngos grub chen po logs
377b8(rgyud): stsol ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// i oM dr-i las rdo rje 'byung // de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid// gsal byed ma
378a1(rgyud): // khro mchog gyur ba// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/ thams cad rims kyi mchog ngam pa// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsum ba la g.yo ba'i snga// zla ba byed pazhipa 'dzin/ 
378a2(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng bas sdud pa ste// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan// lha yi rgyan gyis sdud pa ste// skal ngan mu stegs can rnams
378a3(rgyud): ni zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu mnan// lnga pa lnga yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi mnan// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar zhabs can// zhal drug gos ni rnam par rgyan// khyab 'jug gi ni
378a4(rgyud): lpags pa banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rgyan pa ste// rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// ska dgrol ba la spyan gsum can// mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'chir
378a5(rgyud): zhing rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas 'chir zhing // byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'a khril// thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde// tshangs pa'i lpaH
378a6(rgyud): pa yan lag ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha Ta 'chang // dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu
378a7(rgyud): bsnams// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dud ka ngur smrig ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// pi la dang ni nye pi la// mkha'agro ma ni gnyis po sbyar// chos kyi mchog ces bya/ 
378a8(rgyud): bayi/  rdo rje mkha'agro ma nyid ni// yi ge de las yang dag 'byung // g.yon gyi phyogasu dgod par bya// li ge si las nges byung ba// rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje mkha'agro ma gnyis/ 
378b1(rgyud): ni/ sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal// spyan gsum pa la gzhin rnam bsgyur// skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum drag pa
378b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// thod pa'i
378b3(rgyud): phreng ba'i sku rags can// rkang rngub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa// rdo rje gsor zhing bsdigs mdzub kyis// 
378b4(rgyud): gnyisu med par rnam par rgyan// thod pa gnyis med rnam rgyan te// / zhags pa lugs kyu phyag na bsnams// thod pa dang ni gro gug mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbu la rgyan// dngos
378b5(rgyud): grub thams cad rab stsol ba// ye shes mkha'agro ma dbus su/ 'khor lo gsum gyi thabs kyang sgom// oM gyi ye she sa mkha' 'gro ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sku
378b6(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi mkha'a'agro ni// rang gi snying kar de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// gnas la sogs pa'i rjes rim pa// de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te// gsum po'i rim pa
378b7(rgyud): rje su spro// des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sgom// ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni// bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya// oM shrI pra Na ba DA ka A A/ oM hUM
378b8(rgyud): DA ki nI dz+wa la saM ba ra oM swA hA/ oM hriM d+harma ut+ta me/ ma hA badz+ra DA ko nI ya daM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM saM sA ga ra ut+ta me ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ye saM huM hUM phaT swA hA// gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni/ 
379a1(rgyud): dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming hUM gnyis dang // mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// gsum po bsdu zhing
379a2(rgyud): bsgoms na su// dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis// b+ha ga'i dbus bsgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo na da gsum// gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te/ 
379a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro/ sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phag me ni// gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// de na nga rgyal rnam
379a4(rgyud): spangs nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de bzhin bsgoms dang bzlas pa dang // rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA mAM sa
379a5(rgyud): mnyam ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te// ba za' ba dag ni bza' bar bya// 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa me de// yongasu bzung ba'i 'khor yang med// longs spyod min pas
379a6(rgyud): longs spyod la// 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten// longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang btung // gzhan du gang yang btung
379a7(rgyud): ba min// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba// rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la// thabs ni pi la bar shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i pi la
379a8(rgyud): pa/ grong khyer mthar ni bi la nyid// grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la/ zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba/ pi la dang ni nye bi yin// skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba// dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs du ma ldan par ni/ 
379b1(rgyud): skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing // lha ba shos dag kyang de bzhin sgrub// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas// dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas/ glu dang gar dang bza' ba
379b2(rgyud): dang / 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsal byed mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i// 
379b3(rgyud): mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor// dam
379b4(rgyud): tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbu sa gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa// de yi dbus
379b5(rgyud): 'khor lo tshe// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan// dbusu nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes/ a li ka li mnyam par ldan/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan
379b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las bskyed// yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par btsigs// spyan gsum ljags ni bskyong
379b7(rgyud): pa'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste// ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyi bzhugs/ 
379b8(rgyud): mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i lpags pa yis// sked par sku regs bcings pa yin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs
380a1(rgyud): rdo rje zla byed 'chang // dpral ba las ni rdo rje phreng // khro mthong nas rnam par brtag/ lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod// keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'tshag
380a2(rgyud): 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus rgyan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud pa ste// phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dngasar/ 
380a3(rgyud): dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dkar po zhi ba ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo yi ni sku lus khyab// lha chen lpags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni khaT+Ta
380a4(rgyud): 'dzin// drug pa na ni cang te'u dang // zhabs g.yon du ni dus ma tshan mnan// g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byedade// zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing rab tu myos par
380a5(rgyud): mdzad// rdo rje phag mo de mdog can// skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste/ thod pa phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgul
380a6(rgyud): pas 'khyud cing myos pa ste// de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin// drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod// 
380a7(rgyud): shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste// byang du las kyi mkha'agro yin// nub du pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang ku dang ni ser po'o// 'khor lo
380a8(rgyud): dril bu mnyam par ldan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi bzhugs// ljang ku ser po dmar po sngo// dkar po stang ltas dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud// g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs// 
380b1(rgyud): dmar rdzo ser dang ldang ku dang // dkar po yang ni de bzhin no// pad+ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing // lha mo'i num 'chir ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dkar po'i kha dog ste// rin chen dril bus snyoms par
380b2(rgyud): 'jug/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do// me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro/ 
380b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam pas
380b4(rgyud): rgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo yis phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mda' la sog/ sa pas rgyan// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod
380b5(rgyud): pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing // thugs rje'i rini yang dag rdzogs/ thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mi gzur can// dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste// de ltar sna
380b6(rgyud): tshogs du ma yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab// du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma// rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong // rdo rje drag po snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje
380b7(rgyud): sen// rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kaM bo tsa yang de bzhin te// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te// dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer can dang sna
380b8(rgyud): tshogs gzugs// rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te// rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni// sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma// na lar ki dang ser skyam// rdo rje 'bar mthal sbyor ma// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de// dkyil
381a1(rgyud): 'khor grub pa'i mkha' 'grom// mkha' 'gros ni de dag kun// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// gsus pa 'chang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rgyan
381a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gang mchog ste// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can
381a3(rgyud): yid 'phrog pa// thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing // nags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog ni gser byed cing // dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog/ zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste// thugs rje'i/ 
381a4(rgyud): nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// spyan ni zur gyis gzigs ma dzad cing // dgyes pa'i stsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos dgrub thams cad stsol mdzad cing // sgrub pa po kun rje su chags
381a5(rgyud): zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro/ thod par byed pa yin// dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang // mkha' la
381a6(rgyud): spyod par the tshom med// nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas// sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ste// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri// snam bu'i mtshams
381a7(rgyud): bzhi de ru ni// lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing // mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i 'bras
381a8(rgyud): buthams cad ster// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// zung bzhi tshan thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khrud mtshams rnams su// rdo rjen chen gyis rgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdapa 'o// de yi nang pa
381b1(rgyud): rung gang// rnarnams bdun byabaste// 'di lta gapa' 'grom pa 'grob// draba'i sngob pastong pa ste// byang chub rgyagasan sum nu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pazhin// dbus sus ni bcugasas
381b2(rgyud): ste/ byor la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// du khrod dang ni nyadu khrod// 'di ltar sbyong bas rnam dag par// sdom nga mchog ni brnam par bye// deni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'grim par
381b3(rgyud): 'gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la// chag gnyis pa sbyar bar bya// ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste// gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// phyed dang bred du rnam par dgod// mkha' 'tsha
381b4(rgyud): gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// zhabs bsil byas/ de nas gzhug par bya// ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag
381b5(rgyud): ni rnam par sgom// bdag med chos kyi kun gyis// dam tshig marmo gni drim med// baspu khung bu thams cad las// dam rje gagasang ba gsum spros nas// sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ 
381b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni// byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg che te// mkha'
381b7(rgyud): 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs// sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster// dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor
381b8(rgyud): lo mchog ni rnam par spro// ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du// bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya// sngo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par sgom// ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu// sprin gyi
382a1(rgyud): 'drug sgra lta bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor bayis// mi swA rdo rje brtul zhugs che// zhag bdun gyis ninges par yang // mdu dang rlobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// gso zhing ldeg par byed/ 
382a2(rgyud): pa dang // 'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni// las 'dir the tshom med pa yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgom
382a3(rgyud): dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni// thogs pa med par tshe yang bstan// 'di ltar rang gi tshogs bzlas// sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug/ der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mkha
382a4(rgyud): pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya// gsang sngags 'di dag bshad parabya// oM shrI badz+ra DA ki ni aHhUM hUM DA ka ni dz+wa la she ba ra hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA kInI A b+h+rUM hUM DA ki ni dz+wa la shaM bar hUM hUM phaT/ 
382a5(rgyud): swA hA/ oM shrI karma DA ki a khaM hUM DA ki nA~M dz+wa la shaM bar tsu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka a hrI hU DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM bar huM hUM phaT/ rme shri rat+na TA a aM hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swA hA// mkha'/ 
382a6(rgyud): 'gro bzhi po de dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs// 
382a7(rgyud): phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgom// lha mo mngon du byas nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA hu~M btsu hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI DA ki ni TA tsu hUM paT swahA// oM shI lA me la tsun+da
382a8(rgyud): baTamahA/ oM shrI khat+ta ro ga/ lacu du pha Ta sa hA// oM shrI rU / ru hu thu TasahA// 'din lnga po'i bdag nyid bya'o// mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni// oM shrI pra DA kan hUM pa Tas du// mo shri kaH/ 
382b1(rgyud): kon du tsAb rdza hA// mo shrI pang+ga Ta kan cu nub rdzas hA// ma shwar t+na ShA gan tu nu ba TaswA hA// sgo rum par 'grom yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras buthams cad ster// ban po sna tshogs mdog can te// 
382b2(rgyud): ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab// oM hUM ba dU rA btsu hU~M phaT/ oM suM rI ba tsu hUM paT/ oM badz+ra dun tsu hU~M phaT/ oM pra b+ha kar hu~M hUM phaT// shar phyogs kyini snam bul// lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste// glu lus dka
382b3(rgyud): bo'i mdog can la// de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oM badz+ra pa TA ba mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM g+ho ra mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+ho Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ya sha sini huM hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po
382b4(rgyud): dgod par bya// sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste// de yi sngags su bsha dad pa yin// oM badz+ra du tI hu~M hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra na khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ko ma rI hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kaM bun+tiM hu~M hUM phaT// nub
382b5(rgyud): phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngag sa yin no// oM badz+ra be tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sa yi ki tsu hUM phaT/ oM gan+d+ha ri huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ma bi da ne huM hUM phaT/ byang
382b6(rgyud): / gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang ku do'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oM tsaSh+T+rA shaM kha re huM hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti huM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa rU pe huM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kar+d+ha ni hu~M hUM phaT/ dbang ldan
382b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te// de'i sngags bshad pa// oM shrI badz+ra kha li huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ya shaHka ri huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI na lA rA ke huM

383a1(rgyud): nub du oM shrI badz+ra kut+tA li pa bahu hUM phaT/ byang du oM shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bi ho huM hUM phaT// thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni// shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rims bzhin// sngags pas
383a2(rgyud): de ltar bzlas na ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni dri ba yi// sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste// zla ba drug gi bde dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te bsdus na ni// rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can// dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub
383a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni// khri'am 'bum du bzlas na ni// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin// snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing // rang nyid
383a4(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur// gzhan gyis lus su zhugs 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal 'byoradan po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin// 
383a5(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig gi sngo ma pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas
383a6(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim// sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi// lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya// rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa// sangs rgyas mu
383a7(rgyud): stegs can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya// dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro/ shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs
383a8(rgyud): na// rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub// gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam// sde zhing drag la gzhan rnam bsgyur// gtum zhing 'jigs pa 'jigs par mdzad// 
383b1(rgyud): zhal gyis mche ba rnam par gtsigs// ral ba zla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// bahUM badz+ra las byung / 
383b2(rgyud): sku lus can// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos su banabs// skyil krung byed pa legs par gnas// spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrin pa bzhi la zhal dzin/ 
383b3(rgyud): pa// bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan// stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/ gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng // dus mtha' las byung ngo shal can// gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon// 
383b4(rgyud): nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang // sred pa gti mug phra gdog ste// dus mtshan nga ni khas phub la// gdugadapa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can// thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu
383b5(rgyud): gnon// na mkha' dang ni skya ba dang // dkar ba dang ni dmarang dang // ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud// kun tu
383b6(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu// sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba// dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// chos kyi
383b7(rgyud): 'khor lo khar sil dang // lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang // lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis// na ra'i lpags pa brkyang nas bsnams// shar du
383b8(rgyud): mA trang gi dang Do bi ka/ dza ra ki dang pu ka si// kha Ta ki dang sha ba ri// d+hi ba ri dang sa ma ri// lha mo brgyad po de dag ni// ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod// ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar// dung pa
384a1(rgyud): yi ni mdog can te// dmar dang ljang dang dud ka'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no// sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba// khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang // rdo rje sring
384a2(rgyud): mchog ma dang ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste// gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing // thal ba sprin mdog ljang ku dang // dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyad pa'i dbus
384a3(rgyud): su chos khar sil// thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste// phrag pa'i steng du go 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha T+wA~M mi 'jigs pa// chos kyi khar sil cang te'u// zhal gcig pa la
384a4(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa// yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// skyil krung phyed pa'i dgar gyis bzhugs// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyis mi len dang cog pu pa// gzhi ci bzhin dang
384a5(rgyud): stan cig pa// bla gab med dang shing drung pa// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod pa// khrod pa dang ni phying ba pa'o// 'di dag rdzi/ lha'i rim pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag sgom// 
384a6(rgyud): ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ro gcig du ni rnam par sgom// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra he he ru ru kaM A huM hUM phaT/ oM me ma ta ga hu~M hUM phaT/ oM DaM badz+ra Da~M bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM raM rA dza ki hu hUM phaT/ 
384a7(rgyud): oM buM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM kha ta ki huM hUM phaT/ oM shaM sha ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM dzaM dzi ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM saM sa ma ri huM hUM phaT/ oM he he ru ki huM hUM phaT/ oM ba~M badz+re tsaN+Di huM hUM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra rAk+Sha si
384a8(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi badz+ra b+hai ra bI huM hU~M phaT// de kun gcer bu skra grol ba// spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste// mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing // phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus rgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i
384b1(rgyud): dbu rgyan can// bshad dang dang snying rje dang // sgeg pa dang rngam pa dang // drag cing khrob nyams can te// bzlas dang sgom pa sna ning bsdu// lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas// sems can mos pa snadzan/ 
384b2(rgyud): pa// gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis// yul la yongs su spyod pa na// bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob// sems can thams cad 'di yos bde/ 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// 
384b3(rgyud): shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi// mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste suM cu rtsa gsum

385a1(rgyud): dang na nor rgyas dang // 'jog po pad+ma pad+ma che// dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te// ljang ku dang /

385a3(rgyud): 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas bdud kadamar po ste// g.yon pa ljang ku dud kha'o// steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong // zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa'o// nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can// nyi ma bcu gnyis/
