408b6(rgyud): mthong bar byed pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin// namakha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong te// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dog tu lta ba'ang steng ba yin/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched nga/ 
408b7(rgyud): tulta ba'ang stong pa yin/ 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o// 'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin// phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid/ 
408b8(rgyud): ngag phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi ning stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
409a1(rgyud): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
409a2(rgyud): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyi dang // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'a/ 
409a3(rgyud): he ru ka dpal rnam par shes// phag mo na mkha' lta bu'o// lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// don rnams so sor yang dag rig rta gdong ma gang yin pa'o// chos rnams so sor
409a4(rgyud): yang dag rig/ rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma// nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma// spobs pa so sor yang dag rig/ lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus// ston pa rnam pa bzhi
409a5(rgyud): po ni// he li ka ni don la ston pa ste// ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin// ru tsuka me le ni ye shes rton// keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor
409a6(rgyud): lo la/ chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod// hU~M ni 'du byed thad mi rtag pa'o// phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// Da ma rini chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// ki li ki la ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o// me dang / 
409a7(rgyud): bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun/ lha mo yis ni rnam par dag/ mi 'jigs pa ba ni dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni u pal sngon po ma'o// chos thams cad ston
409a8(rgyud): pa la 'jigs pa ni dran pa'i mchog// nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa ni gsus pa 'phyang ma'o// zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri ma'o// mtsham su dkyil 'khor lha men// 'ang
409b1(rgyud): yis zur bzhi rnam par dag/ sgo bzhi dag tu lha me ni// gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i dbang po'o// rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// 'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting
409b2(rgyud): 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni// 'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan 'das ma/ rdo rje phag mo nyid yi no// mngon par ma
409b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshang byag/ dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag ni// 'byung ba kun gyi
409b4(rgyud): spyan yin te// rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags/ b+ha gas khyab pa'i darim pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes// dus ni sna tshogs rigasu shes// mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin// bu le rim
409b5(rgyud): pad+ma'o// dz+wa lan d+ha ra thugs 'khor lo// ur+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ a ra bu da ni sku yi 'khor lo// go da ba rir zur bzhi'o// rA mi shwa ra me phyog so// de bI ko Ta bden bral yin// mA la ba ni rlung gi zu
409b6(rgyud): dbang ldan kA ma ru ba ste// grwa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni// 'di la the tsom med pa yin// oM dri dag ni shar gyi ske'o// tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo/ ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o// ka ling ka ni byang sgo ste// shar gyi rta babs lam bA kaka~M/ 
409b7(rgyud): tsi lho yi rta babs yin// hi ma la ya nub phyog so// pre ta pu ri byang yin te// gri ha de ba lha snam bu// so so shASh+Na ni rin chen sa// su ba ra dri pa dra ba phyed// na ga ra ni rnga yab dang // dril bu rgyal mtshan pad no// sin d+hu rdo rje thig zlum/ 
409b8(rgyud): po mtshutshan po khyong// ku mu ni rdo rje dang / rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi/ thig ni blan med pa yin/ bur bzhi ba la sgo bani ga/ rta babs pa zhes ni rnam par rgyan/ dbadra byed kyis ni rgyan cingag/ nga dang grong bas rnam pa/ 
410a1(rgyud): / rgyan dbur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyung mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan cing // sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni// don yod grub pa rnam par spyod// gsung gi 'khor lo 'ong dpag me
410a2(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor lo mo bskyod pa// pad+ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sgom// tsher bsku yi 'khor lo ste/ 'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin// 
410a3(rgyud): thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de// rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za// ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa// de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can// sa dang ri mo thams cad kun// dpa' bos yongasu dag par sgom// ri mo nyi shu rtsa
410a4(rgyud): bzhi pa// de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag/ 'khor lo mkha'agro ma da yis dag/ ltalte bar phag mo'i sa bon ka/ he ru ka dpal mchog da yi no// mnga' ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag dkyil 'khor dkyil
410a5(rgyud): 'khor mchog dag ni// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na// dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin// gsum pa
410a6(rgyud): lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// bzhi pa gzugasu gyur pa ste// lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin// drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// pad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa// thugs kyi 'khor lo
410a7(rgyud): dri ma med// gsung gi 'khor lo 'ong byed pa// sku yi 'khor lo 'od byed pa// sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba// zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba// ring du song bsgo bzhi yin// zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros
410a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i thig/ chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rtag tu sgom zhing mchod par bya// dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi// dkyil 'khor
410b1(rgyud): gi de nyid ni/ he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa// de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste// dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor/ 
410b2(rgyud): dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin// bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin// lha yi de nyid de bzhin te// sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin// de lha'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog/ 
410b3(rgyud): yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing // rtogs dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs// phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing // de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yino// chos rnams thams cad rtag tu med/ 
410b4(rgyud): chos dang chos min rnam par spyod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor da bshad pa ni// rnam dag na mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ chags dang chags med chags par mnyam// pad+ma rA ga chu
410b5(rgyud): mnyam byung // rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// yid ni khams rnams thams cad de// gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med// bskul
410b6(rgyud): zhing sad pa yid yin te// sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor lusu bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te/ rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/ 
410b7(rgyud): sa 'og sa stengs sa blar khyab// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// sems can
410b8(rgyud): kun la phan stsol ba/ a li ka li las byung ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/ dra ba phra phyed kyis rgyan pa// dar dang phreng bas rnam par rgyan// de yi dbus rdo rje che// zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur/ 
411a1(rgyud): // de la lte ba'i dbus ni// sna tshogs 'khor lo bar bcas// thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus ngag tu// sna tshogs pad+ma ma ba brgyad
411a2(rgyud): pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa// lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// lte ba'i dbusu bstan pa ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// hUM las he ru kar byas te// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsums
411a3(rgyud): lus dkar po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'chir// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan// gdugs pa kun gyi klad pa la// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs
411a4(rgyud): kyis mnan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yis// klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan// gcer bu'o dod 'bod pa mnan// rgyal ba'i lpags pa'i lpag
411a5(rgyud): pa steng du ste// lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yangacang te'u de bzhin te// thod pa kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin// gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ 
411a6(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug rgyan// tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// bdag gi khro bo bdun spos nas// ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// 
411a7(rgyud): phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te// sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs// gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste/ gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni// lcags kyu zhabs pa de bzhi no// lha mo
411a8(rgyud): phyag ni brgyad pa ste// dkar zhing sngol ldang ba'o// steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni// ser zhing ldang ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du// phag ma
411b1(rgyud): yang ni de bzhin gyur// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can// pad+ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma// zur la bu lathong ba ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o// dpa' bom
411b2(rgyud): 'gro ma de bzhin// gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis// shar dang byang nub lho ru'o// sgo rnams ni sgo gsung te// khwa 'dod la sogs thams cad // zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar 'dod
411b3(rgyud): pa'i khyad par ni// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dong // bla ma'i gnan gyi rjes rim pa// sngar bshang sna tshogs rigs rnams ni// ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya// gzhan
411b4(rgyud): yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkha'agro ma yi mdog bzhin dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin// gan/ sogs rim pa de ltar dgod// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin
411b5(rgyud): gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// a li ka li'i nang byung ba// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// chos/ 
411b6(rgyud): dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par// sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las chos kyi dbyis
411b7(rgyud): kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag
411b8(rgyud): gsang ba nges gsang ba/ a li ka li zur gsum gnas// pad+ma mdab pa gsum rnam par sgom// rdo rje phag mo he ru ka/ lte ba la ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma
412a1(rgyud): // nyid// bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo// phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste// mkha'agro sngo la ser ba dang / lA ma ldang la ser ba ste// dum skyes na ma ni dmar la ser// zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi
412a2(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshon pa ste/ 
412a3(rgyud): zhi ba bzla ba phyed pa 'chang // mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching // rtag par gsang ba'i gis banabs shing // thos pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te// byin pa gnyis
412a4(rgyud): kyis legs 'khyud cing // gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la// spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste// gas
412a5(rgyud): brkyang ba yis gnas pas bzhugs// sku lus phyag rgya drug 'a dzin cing // mche ba rnam par btsigs pa dang // thugs rje/ 'i chags pas rnam par myos// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon
412a6(rgyud): ljang ku// steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar// gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag/ a li ka li b+ha ga'i mchog/ gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag tu// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par sgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i/ 
412a7(rgyud): dbusu na// sna tshogs pad+ma dag tu brtag/ dbu su he ru ka phag mo// mang ba rdzas pa 'gro ma sogs dgod// zur du thod pa dkar po dag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod// shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo// 
412a8(rgyud): rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la// khwa gdong la sogs rnam brgya do// gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur/ 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la/ shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste// rlung phyogs gshin rje/ 
412b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'o// den bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste// dbusu rdo rje he ru ka/ sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang // sngo nang dmar ba bzhi po yin/ rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan// gzhan du rang bdag
412b2(rgyud): de bzhin/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma// dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam// dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la// gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag/ 
412b3(rgyud): sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po mdog/ dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor// khwa gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs// gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid // rang gi thabs dang
412b4(rgyud): lhan cig tu// dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos// gsung dge 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dam / mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang ku/ sngar bshang rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams// de yang rigs kyi dbye
412b5(rgyud): so/ thams cad yi dgra bdan la bzhugs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rna rnam par rgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // phyag rgya ga gis bdag po bgod// thams cad rang rigs cod pan can// 
412b6(rgyud): ji lta ba yis rim pas sgom// mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis// ji lta'i rjesu rnam bsgoms nas// go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag/ sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ 
412b7(rgyud): dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa sgom// gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag na su// sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu sgom// 'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te// de nyid
412b8(rgyud): su la'ang brjod mi bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/ rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing // bza' dang bca' ba'ang sbyang bar bya// 'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu// 'char
413a1(rgyud): / nub dag tu rnam par spyad// gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa// sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'i ste lnga bcu rtsa
413a2(rgyud): lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa// rig lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i// sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin// log pa'i shes pa'i shes
413a3(rgyud): ba can/ gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya// bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan// gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing // dad pa yang dag
413a4(rgyud): bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin// lkug cing glen la sdig ngan can// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongasu ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis
413a5(rgyud): 'tshal ba// de dag kun gyis mi shes te/ mi shes mun pas khe/ bas pa dang // khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'// nga rgyal la// sogs gdug sems ldan// de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// 
413a6(rgyud): spyod yul gsang ba mi sheso// he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug/ slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// myur du dngos grub skyed byed de// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis// cho ga
413a7(rgyud): bya ba bstan par bya// srid pa gsum po ma lus ni// de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba// de ltar de ni the tsom med// lha
413a8(rgyud): rnams bzlog ste bkod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang // so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste// bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni// sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de// snyi
413b1(rgyud): po thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni// sems ni yongasu smin pa dag 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi// dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin// 
413b2(rgyud): bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin// dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa// bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang // nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur// de na gsung med bza' ba med// dkyil 'khor
413b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bdag po med// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med// mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin// gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni// bla mas bstan las brtson las te// phyi rol gyi ni
413b4(rgyud): bstan bcos la// lam de shin tu ring ba yin// rnal 'byor/ dpa rnams thabs kyis ni// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa// ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang // dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan
413b5(rgyud): pa yin/ skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig rnam pa/ ra phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad skad cig te// skadacig gis ni gsang sngags brjod// dbus mo sa la gtsug nas/ 
413b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni// go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa// 'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ci rigs bshad
413b7(rgyud): kyis legs par nyon// brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par// gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid// dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad// de ni sgo dgu dag tu
413b8(rgyud): 'gyur// de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che// thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad// rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa// cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa// lus can rnams kyi nang na rol// lus las 'das shing gos pa med/ 
414a1(rgyud): la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// la lar sna dang ngag ngag dang // la lar rna bar sgra ngag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu// la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems// la lar sgom dang la lar
414a2(rgyud): bkres// la lar khro dang la lar zhi// la lar bde la rnam par gzigs// la lar bud med 'dod chags te// la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste// la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog 'bras
414a3(rgyud): bur gnas// la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur// la lar srog du rnam par gan/ la lar sa dang chud / la lal byung chen po zhal lar rigs kyi bye brag gis// bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang sring mo ru// la lan
414a4(rgyud): chung ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // khyab 'jug da dang ni nyi ma nyid// la lar zla ba skar mas bcas// la lar ni nu dang mtshan mor gyur// la lar khams gsum pa rnams
414a5(rgyud): kun/ byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal// la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum// mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal// la
414a6(rgyud): lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid// la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o// la lar nad chen gyis zin pa// la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// la lar sngo dang leb rkan dang // la lar dkar dang ser ba'o// la lar sangs
414a7(rgyud): rgyas rnam snang mdzad// la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo// la lar spyan dang mA ma ki/ la lar dka' bzlog zhi ba mo// la lar mdab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid// la lar
414a8(rgyud): klu dang sbrul chen po// la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni// la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang // la la gnyid kyis log pa nas// la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang // la lar khrag dang lpags par 'gyur// la
414b1(rgyud): lar mya ngan du ba dang // la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin// la lar mtho ris skye ba ste// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu// thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di nyid bzhugs 'di la// lha gang cha ni rnam spangs
414b2(rgyud): pa'i// de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o// rtag pa min pa rdo rje can// gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang // lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che// bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par// yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas// 
414b3(rgyud): kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin// de dbus rtag tu gsang ba che// 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o// de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha// de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes// mtshan ni rab tu
414b4(rgyud): bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pas 'a dri bshad pa 'am// mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa// sgra ni nyag
414b5(rgyud): ma brgya yi cha// mchog gi gzugs can bsam ste// stong pa ma yin dmigasu med// yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med// gos ba med cing sa bon med// gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa
414b6(rgyud): ste/ rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni// rnam shes ye shes dag tu bzung // thang gsal byed sgron ma ni// dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta// gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag / dkar
414b7(rgyud): po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni// phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te// nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par rtag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod ni// bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan// / 
414b8(rgyud): gzugs dang reg sogs lha me ni// phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin// drug pa gzugs med ye shes te/ bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings/ brgyad pa rang nyid 'dod bzhin du// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag yin// sbas pa lta
415a1(rgyud): / dang lag pa dang / 'byung dang gnyis gnyi su la sogs pa/ de bzhin ga shegs ngas drags tsun gsu sa/ shub zlam tha te/ thams ca bdun brnyan pams rnam par gzhan rdza pa drA/ 
415a2(rgyud): de nyid srog chags rnam kyi srog/ de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyid thams cad khyab byed// lus kun la ni rnam par gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te/ he ru ka dpal yin par bshad// skyes pa man/ 
415a3(rgyud): la sogs nyid// phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin// ye shes dag tu 'byung de la// gang zhigs la gnas rnams dang // bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang // rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams// 'jig rten
415a4(rgyud): 'di dang gzhan dag tu// de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rig byed g+ha/ ba'i mtha' rnams la// 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad // 2dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang / byin
415a5(rgyud): gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / ting 'dzin mtshang ba bsdus pa yin/ de nas chog ming gzhan pa/ thabs dang shes ra ba gnyis med pa/ de nyid du ni kun skyes pa/ 'byin dang sdud pa
415a6(rgyud): bying ba yin// a A/ a AM/ u A/ ri rI/ li lI/ e e/ oM au a A/ ka kha ga g+hang / tsa tsha dza dzA ta/ kurba Da n+t+ra ma ta thad d+ha na/ ba pha ba b+h+ra ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ o hUM hU pakra 'di ni bcom ldan
415a7(rgyud): lha de yin// mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin// lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang // sgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas// don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te// brgyad du rtsa bzhi theg pa ste// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas
415a8(rgyud): mdes ni 'di ni nges rgyal te/ thams cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro// thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya// dge dang mi dge gang yin pa/ de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te/ sku rags gnas rnams \u0f7f
415b1(rgyud): cad yin// rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// chos rnams thang rtogs pa yin/ a li ka li bdun bsams na// rnal 'byor chen po ngal gsos te/ bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de// sems kyang rtag
415b2(rgyud): par mi bya'o// sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste// des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba/ khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin// 'di ni 'bad pas snga bya ste// gnyis med gnyi su med
415b3(rgyud): pa'i sdom// rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob/ sred pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin// bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni// bsnyen bkur
415b4(rgyud): med pa la mi bshad// gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing // sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyi 'khor// sems ni rnama' 'khor rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong // ji ltar bud med
415b5(rgyud): byis gtam rjes yi rang/ kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed// lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad // he ru ka dpal sku'i
415b6(rgyud): yan lag/ sku kun brten g.yo bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// 'dun pa mngon du 'gyur ba nyid// nye ba'i
415b7(rgyud): 'dun pa sbyar bka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa// 'di ni nang gi bdag
415b8(rgyud): can sa/ pha rol phyin bcus rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skang // mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag bstan g.yo 'i bdag/ thogs med dusu gang bstan pa/ phyi nang bdag nyid can du
416a1(rgyud): // gnas dpal ldam khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // kun tu mig dang mgo ba'i zhal// kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na// tham/ 
416a2(rgyud): cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad
416a3(rgyud): bya ba/ man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda'i yi skad du ni// nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin// gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li kA li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs/ 
416a4(rgyud): stong sngon 'gro yin// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid// bdud rtsi 'tsham byed mya ngan la ngas// lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba// go cha chen pos yang dag
416a5(rgyud): srung / sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin// de ltar de nyid da bcu bzhi no// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi ma cho ga gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/ de bzhi
416a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sa thob cing // skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// de ltar cho ga ldan byas nas// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// zla ba nya la sa steng du// 'di ltar/ 
416a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas bsgom na// de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin// lha klu mi la sogs pa kun// de yis bsod nams gang gyur nges// bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// 
416a8(rgyud): klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba 'am// yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro// 
416b1(rgyud): lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs klu yis mchod pas mchod// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' 'gro ba'i gan
416b2(rgyud): su khyer// de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa steng su ni rnyed par dka'// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
416b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btub// gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogasu// mkhas pas sa ni mnyam na su// bshang gtsi yas ni byug par bya// ma hA rak+ta byugs nas kyang // 
416b4(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// rigs ngan shan pa mo blangs nas// me tog la sogs gdab par bya// dpa' bo chen po'ibadug spos dbul// zhag la sogs pa mar me sbar// cang te'u dril bu
416b5(rgyud): brdung bar bya// glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// lu/ sa ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan// a li ka li mnyam byas te/ sde mtshan
416b6(rgyud): la ni thim par bya// bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas las// thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya// der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa// bzhi pi lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga
416b7(rgyud): pa dang / lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // sum cu pa ni yang dag
416b8(rgyud): blag nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang // de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // dang po yi na gsum nyid
417a1(rgyud): / sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // lnga pa 'i
417a2(rgyud): yang lnga pa dang // dang po yi ni dang po dang // de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang
417a3(rgyud): uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa cig blang // 
417a4(rgyud): bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// dang po'i gnyes pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// yi/ dge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// uSh+mA ni ni tha ma nyid// sum cu gnyis pa
417a5(rgyud): nyid dang lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// an+ta tha yi dang po dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa
417a6(rgyud): gcig pa// an+ta sgra yi gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // uSh+ma yi ni dang po nyid// de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang // bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang / 
417a7(rgyud): de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang // an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang // gsum
417a8(rgyud): pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang // yi ge bya ni de nas blang // dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag/ de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // nyi
417b1(rgyud): shurtsa gsum pas sa// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / bzhi pa yin pa ni pa dang // slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa de bzhin nyi shu na drug pa// nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang // sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / ni
417b2(rgyud): pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yis gnyis pa blang // bzhi pa yin lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/

417b6(rgyud): yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang // bzhi pa yi ni thog ma la// gzi brjid can gyis gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi yang dang po ste// ka dang sha yi yi ge ni// thog
417b7(rgyud): mdag ni blangs nasu// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste// de bzhin yang ni bsdus te blang // drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni dang po dang // uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa blang // bdun pa yi ni/ 
417b8(rgyud): bzhi pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin// uSh+man yi bani pa nyid// nyi ma yang ni gangan du byas// bdun pa yin bzhi pa la// mi yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya// gshegasu gsol dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa
418a1(rgyud): // yi ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin// bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis// gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas ni// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / su
418a2(rgyud): na yi bzhi pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig de blangs nas// gnyis pa yin dang po dang // lnga pa yi yang thog ma dang // gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug/ lnga pa
418a3(rgyud): yi ni bzhi pa la// kA yi yi ge de bzhino// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas// slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+man ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid//
