418a5(rgyud): pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi ni ga/ sum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dbye// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // gnyis pa yi yang
418a6(rgyud): gsum pa dang / nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye// uSh+ma na yi bzhi po dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yi na bzhi pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan gnyis bya// uSh+ma na yi/ 
418a7(rgyud): gsum pa nyid/ lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// bcu drug pa yi gdan du byas// nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis blangs// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi
418a8(rgyud): pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+ma na yi gsum pa nyid// nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te// nyi ma yis ni mnyam par mnan// lnga
418b1(rgyud): pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar byas// mthar gnas pa yi thog mar shes// der yang bcu drug pa yis gang ga
418b2(rgyud): gnyis pa yis ni gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang // thog ma yi yang dang po dang // bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang // thog ma yi yang dang po dang // gnyis pa yi
418b3(rgyud): yang dang po dang // de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o// bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du gdan byas// ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang // nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can// gsum pa yi
418b4(rgyud): yang gsum pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan du byas// gnyis pa yis yang gsum pa dang // gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang // ka sha'i yi ge sa bon te// nyi shu lnga pa gdan du byas// slar yang
418b5(rgyud): bsdu bar bya ba ste// sku ni legs par btu ba ste// dbang chen gyis/ ni gdon du byas// uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi/ ni bzhi pa dang // ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin sum cu
418b6(rgyud): gsum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te// lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o// de nas kyang nas btu bya ba// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin to// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // uSh+man
418b7(rgyud): yi gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste// ka ra ka ra/ 
418b8(rgyud): ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+ta/ tra sa ya tra sa yak+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ tsI gr-i s+dza traH/ pe pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha dang / pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi ra nA mA la ba la wa~M ni/ bi h+ma gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta/ b+hu dzaMgs pa ba ta rdza
419a1(rgyud): tardzas A gar+b+ha A kar+m+ma hrIr+m+ma/ d+har+m+ma s+thAm+b+ha/ hAt+ma/ hrI nI/ tsAn+da/ ka ma ka la/ sa las 'a tsham gyi med d+ha ma d+hi li/ hA hU phaT// rig pa'i rgyal po gas sngags te// bya ba thams cad smra
419a2(rgyud): pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod min te// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na// gzhan dag snying po med rtsar mtshungs// rtsa ba'i sngagasu bshad pa yin// mngon par brjod
419a3(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying po'i yi ge bdun nye snying po// ya chog
419a4(rgyud): brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge bar ma dor byas pa// yan lag drug ni he ru ka dpa' bo dug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ re'u mig drug tu sgom pa ste/ he ru ka yi bad/ 
419a5(rgyud): por 'gyur// yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas/ oM na ma swA hA bau ShaTahUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pos snying por shes par bya// dang po snying ka nyid ste// gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya// gsum pa/ 
419a6(rgyud): spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar// bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin// lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod// de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// dbya sa yig bcu gcig yang dag
419a7(rgyud): sbyar/ yi ge drug pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// mkhas pas yi ge brgyad pa sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ yi ges
419a8(rgyud): po brgyan par bya/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung // mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar
419b1(rgyud): dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bco lngar yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod // 
419b2(rgyud): dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni// yi ge bco brgyad pa ru sbyar// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ phyi mo'o lnga pa dang yang sbyar// yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa dang / 
419b3(rgyud): yang sbyar// yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni// yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shur lnga par sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa
419b4(rgyud): yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur// yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// gsum pa'i dang por yang dag ldan// 'og/ dgi cha ni me dang bcas// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// 
419b5(rgyud): yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig par// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang // dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya// yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ nyi ma
419b6(rgyud): yang dag ldan par bya// phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed ye// phyi rol lnga pa nyid dag ni// sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan// mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed
419b7(rgyud): yin/ sum nu brgyad pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya// bzhi bcu/ 
419b8(rgyud): gsum pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar// yi ge bzhi bcwa lnga pa ni// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyor// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag kyang // bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa// dpa' bo thams cad
420a1(rgyud): rab mchod cing // bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ 
420a2(rgyud): mdzes par mchog ni yin par 'dod// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum
420a3(rgyud): pa'ang dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste// dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin// sde tshan bzhi las bya nyid // yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar
420a4(rgyud): an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa dang // dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya// / de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur// yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nyid// 
420a5(rgyud): dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog ni yin/ par bshad// de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs yin/ gnyis par sbyar ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dong // yi
420a6(rgyud): go drug cu rtsa gsum nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag dang ldan// mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' phye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// 
420a7(rgyud): grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o// yi ge drug cu rtsa lnga pa/ me la gnas par yang dag ldan// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs// yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa/ dbyas
420a8(rgyud): yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// bya ba kun las grub sbyin par// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ yi ge gnyis pa yang dag ldan// rnal sbyor ma yis dgos pa kun/ 
420b1(rgyud): 'di nyid byed par the tsom med// drug cu brgyad pa nyid dag las// der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba// 'og gi char ni brtag par bya// yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar// yi ge kun la mdzes pa
420b2(rgyud): ni// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med/ sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bdag gdod nas grub yin par ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs// yi ge bdun cu lnga pa
420b3(rgyud): nyid/ ma me'i drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin te// dge ba kun las dam pa yin// bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing // 'og tu me dang ldan pa las// gan/ 
420b4(rgyud): dag mdzes pa yod ma yin// yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa// de ni dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro ma yis mdzes par dong // bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// dbyas yig gnyis pa dag dang
420b5(rgyud): sbyar// rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod// yi ge brgyad cu rtsag cig pa// bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye// gdod na/ sa grub byed 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi/ 
420b6(rgyud): ga brgyad curtsa gnyis pa/ de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ phyi mo yini lnga pa la// de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad // ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang / brgyad cu dgu pa de bzhin te/ ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te/ de ban/ 
420b7(rgyud): yi ge dgu bcu pa// ma mo'i lnga pa blang byas te// yi ge dgu bcu gcig par sbyor// ma me yi ni gnyis pa dang // yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ gdun
420b8(rgyud): bzang srog bying ga/ ma mo kun gyi bang po'i gnas/ dbyas kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa/ mi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan/ ma mi bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ yi ge lnga pa dag dang sbyar// gdug pa thams cad la drug bye/ 
421a1(rgyud): // mkha' gro ma yi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni// yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar// bco lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni// yi ge dgu pa dag dang
421a2(rgyud): sbyar/ steng du thig le yang dag gnas// yi ge dag ni sgrub pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// steng du bin dus rnam par rgyan// dbyangs
421a3(rgyud): kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa// yi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// 'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing // sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba yin// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa la// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyi
421a4(rgyud): sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu gsum dadang sbyar// ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang // yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyar// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni// yi ge sum cu drug
421a5(rgyud): dang sbyar/ dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba/ ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang
421a6(rgyud): sbyar dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni// yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar// ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar// 
421a7(rgyud): dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis padag / yi ge bzhi bcud gu dang sbyar/ dbyings kyi yi ge gnyis padag phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni// yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ thig les kyang ni rnam pa
421a8(rgyud): rgyan/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis bdag/ 
421b1(rgyud): yi ge drug cu drug cu sbyar// phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge drug cu bdun dang sbyar// bdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing // sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang // yi ge
421b2(rgyud): bdun cu pa dang sbyor// thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan// phyi mo yis ni bzhi pa yis// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// bco lnga pa ni rab blangs te// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni// yi ge bdun nu bzhi
421b3(rgyud): par sbyar// phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa ni// yi ge bdun bcu gsum dang sbyar// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bdun cu bzhi dang sbyar// phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun rtsa
421b4(rgyud): bdun dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par rgyan// phyi me yi ni ga das pa yang // yi ge bdun cu brgyad dang sbyar// thig le gnyis kyis rnam par rgyan// phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / yi ge bdun cung gu/ 
421b5(rgyud): dang sbyar/ ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni// yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni// yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar// thig le sgra yis bskyed pa
421b6(rgyud): ste/ theg les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar// 'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs// dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste// 'don rtsa ba'i gsang sngagasu// mkhas pa rnam
421b7(rgyud): kyis shes par bya/ dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na// dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal// bklag pas grub don yod pa// oM na dang por sbyar bar bya// hU~M hU Ta ni mthar
421b8(rgyud): sbyar ba// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// grub pa thams cad grub byed yin// de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod // 
422a1(rgyud): oM shrI bad+d+ha d+he ru ru kan+ta hUM phaT/ DA ki ni dz+wal shaM bar swAt+ma/ hA swa ra bas sa n-i kiT+Ta Ta la tsu n+du ka ru ru te rdza pa shrI so// rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po na// mthung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 'du
422a2(rgyud): dris ma/ yi ge ba dang yo dang ni// yi ga mo dang dri nyid dang // hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa yin// oM ba~M badz+ra bA rA h+ye/ haM yo ya mi ni/ hriM mo mo ha ni/ hreM hri sa tsa la ni/ hUM hU sa tra sa ni/ Ta phaT tsaN+Di ka/ rnal 'byor ma/ 
422a3(rgyud): ni drug tu bsgrags/ re'u mig drug la rnam par sgom// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha'i snying po sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ 
422a4(rgyud): snying po bla med bshad par bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phas// / lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ pad+mo bu su phag mo ste// mdab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi
422a5(rgyud): ngag gi phyogasu ni// lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom// oM las b+hU nga ba'i rta gdong dang // rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang // mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma/ hUM mdzad ma dang ldan
422a6(rgyud): lha mo// sreg lugs ma dang phaT byed ma// rang 'byung ma dang bcu gnyis te// ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa// sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang // ljang ku steng
422a7(rgyud): zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsum pa la gzhin rnam sbyar// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can// gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste// rang gi
422a8(rgyud): thabs dang sbyor bas gnas// 'jigs byed tsa muN+Di 'jigs mos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang // rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang // lcags kyu tshangs pa'i
422b1(rgyud): mgo bo dang / dgra stad ni bsdigs mdzub dang // na rA'i lpags pa stengs du rkyang // sku rags dang ni dpung brgyan dang // phyag brgya lnga yis rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thugs rje khro ga/ 
422b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa ste// mdab la lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ me phyogs dmar la dud kha ste// sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang // dbang rdza
422b3(rgyud): du ni dgod pa ste// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnams bsgyur/ thams
422b4(rgyud): cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// thugs rje'i chags pa rnam par myos// rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing // thod pa rak+tas bkang ba dang // dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrogs// lha rnams dga' bar byed pa
422b5(rgyud): yin// sgo rnams ni sgo bsrungs te// dpa' bo'i steng du rnam par ba zhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa lang bu skra brdzes// oM pa'i zen dbu rgyan can/ dring ba
422b6(rgyud): rgyan gyis spud pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams// thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang // thang mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan// sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste// ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog
422b7(rgyud): gnyis pa// gcer bu'i pad+ma'i rgya yang tshe// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste// bcu gsum pa ni rnam par sgom// snying po mchog ni bsgom pa yin// 'dod pa thams cad
422b8(rgyud): rab tu stsol// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha dang lha mo'i snying po sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba/ shin tu rnyed dka'i dgo/ 
423a1(rgyud): // bste gang shig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du sa grub 'grub pa'o// sa yi tshan mnyam yang 'o// tsan+dan gyis ni nye bar bsku/ dri bzang dri ldanas la ni// me togs lam gcal thakram
423a2(rgyud): zhing / spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya// bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing // phyogs bcing ba ni byas nasu// de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te// re mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la// yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya// der gan
423a3(rgyud): ba las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed pa tu// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa// dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub poso// thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur la// re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yi ni khyab
423a4(rgyud): par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ Te'u mig sum cu drug pa blang // gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// 
423a5(rgyud): de nas nyi shu lnga pa bzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum cu/ rtsa gsum yang dag blang // re'u mig bco lnga la yir lnga/ na// lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung / 
423a6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa yang de bzhi no// mdzes pa mchog ni yon par 'dod// re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa// me yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye// ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig
423a7(rgyud): sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// de nas rang byung blangs na su// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// 
423a8(rgyud): de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhi no// don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa
423b1(rgyud): dag dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// 
423b2(rgyud): de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste btu/ de nas go rims bzlogs pas gzung // re'u mig las ni dang / 
423b3(rgyud): po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzungs// bcu gcig pa yang de bzhino// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin pa
423b4(rgyud): bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re'u migasum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang // sum cu gsum rapa yang dag blang // re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re'u
423b5(rgyud): mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pa sgrub pos blang // / re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u mig nyi shu gsu ma pa la// gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan// steng du theg les
423b6(rgyud): brgyan par bya// de nas chu yi sa bon gzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dbye// yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis/ 
423b7(rgyud): rnam rgyan pa'o// e ni sku la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags// 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / 
423b8(rgyud): bde mchog rdo rje 'jig byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru// dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du ni// gdug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kya
424a1(rgyud): brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// sha chen dag gis thams cad kun// rdo rje yang ni med par bshad// rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras skye
424a2(rgyud): pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du// 'jigs byed mi bzang bar/ 
424a3(rgyud): bshad do// na mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbusu ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal
424a4(rgyud): brgyad pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par bcig sa// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thams cad kun gyis rnam par sdud// rje
424a5(rgyud): rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drug po thugs rje'i nyam// g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas pa yi// dbang ldan gyi/ ni thod pa gnon// u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon// khro
424a6(rgyud): pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// sku la mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te// lcags kyu bsdig
424a7(rgyud): mdzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs kar dpral ba phyag rgya ste// bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba
424a8(rgyud): ste/ mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang // na ra'i lpags pa'i steng du ste// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhi no// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sngo dang dkar dang
424b1(rgyud): ser ba dang / dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste// spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams
424b2(rgyud): thams cad byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste// sngo dang ljag dmar ba dang // dud ka ngur smrig bsres pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ 
424b3(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku rgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin
424b4(rgyud): rdo rje bsdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste// rang gi rigs dang gnyis med 'khyud// khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing // dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste// 
424b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis// khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs// spyan gsum mi bzang 'jigs pa ste// tho ba dbyug to mnga' dang ni/ 
424b6(rgyud): ral gri dril bu de bzhin te// yang na rdo rje dril bu dang // thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro// 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum
424b7(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ 
424b8(rgyud): oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM hUM phaT// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas// thams cad bskyed par rnam par sgom// dkyil
425a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba te// kha sbyar lnga yis ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin// snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin khyi dang ngag gi gzangs kyi gtsug pud rtsa
425a2(rgyud): de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin bsreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char
425a3(rgyud): rgyur las byung ba yin// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig slong // dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas// dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad/ 
425a4(rgyud): khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlab sa pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje
425a5(rgyud): hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa// mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i
425a6(rgyud): dbus gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par sgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.yas rkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zhal rnam bsgyur zhing
425a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rnam par btsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// ral pa'o cod pan
425a8(rgyud): 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gosu brnabs// rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod rlon do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis
425b1(rgyud): khyab par mos// dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyis gzugs// sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // dud pa yi ni mdog can
425b2(rgyud): no// rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas// rang gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril// tshangs pa bshus nas brnabs par mdzad// rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cig/ 
425b3(rgyud): mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste// bcom ldan pa hUM nges 'byung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar
425b4(rgyud): mdab lha mor dgod pa ste// ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te// me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan so/ dgas de bzhin// a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha'
425b5(rgyud): 'gro ma de bzhi// tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// Ta yi mkha' 'a gro ma dag ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogaso// dmar dang dud ka ljang ku dang // ser po
425b6(rgyud): dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma//  sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa// de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste// zhal cig
425b7(rgyud): ba la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi// rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnon// rnam bsgyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis
425b8(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin// drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// 'gro ba thams cad smon byed de// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa/ 
426a1(rgyud): dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ dril bu cang te'u yis rgyun pa// sde chen mkha' 'gro bde ba ste// 'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis sgom// yang na phag mo dgong bya ste// bdag mo yang ni bzhag par
426a2(rgyud): bya// rdo rje sems pa'i bdag po ste// mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugasu sbyor ba dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/ oM a ka tsa Tata pa ya sha hUM hUM phaT swA hA// brtan pa dang ni
426a3(rgyud): g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub// sde mtshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbusu bsgom par bya// a sha kA kaM/ tsarma tsa/ Ta ta pa ka/ ta pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza ya ma ma b+ha/ 
426a4(rgyud): ha tsata/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni// rtag tu dusu 'di brgyad bza'// rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ 
426a5(rgyud): zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// de ma rnyed na'ang sa lus bya// skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing // phyugs ni zas sa rta spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// 'di la yin
426a6(rgyud): gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba/ 
426a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog gi ga rang ba// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// ma me'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni// gar da wa yi gzugasu bya// phag mo'i gtsu
426a8(rgyud): ni de nyid kyang // zhal ni ga ra da wa ru bya// sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang // zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni/ 
426b1(rgyud): lag mdung thogs// thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun// mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong// sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdo // khyi dang nga
426b2(rgyud): dang 'ug pa dang // khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te// zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun// ma he ri dgas zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang // spyan gsum mig
426b3(rgyud): ni shin tu dmar// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa// sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed// rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i
426b4(rgyud): man ngag dang // ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster// ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas// sems can rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la sogs
426b5(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum// de kun dam thag tu mthong // sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i// gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha'
426b6(rgyud): 'gro ma mo de bzhin no// sngar bshad sngags kyis bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing // rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob// rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni// gar nga'i dngos grub
426b7(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob// mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// nad yod pa yang med par 'gyur// long
426b8(rgyud): pa yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang // khyi dang ba lang glang po mi// rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yin no// 
427a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'// dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas// yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs/ 
427a2(rgyud): yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing // rang gi gzugasu'ang 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par// bza' ba yang ni bza' bar bshad// 'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin
427a3(rgyud): teHbtung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i
427a4(rgyud): mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro lnga yi
427a5(rgyud): rnam sgom pa// rigs las brgyad pa'i tshig yin// gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon ma rma/ ga gyur pa'o// pa nya Na na ma zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mcho/ 
427a6(rgyud): grub pa// nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// na ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// mkha'
427a7(rgyud): 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis// 'dod las grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje 'khor lo rin
427a8(rgyud): chen dang // pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin// sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni/ ser dang dmar po ljang ku dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i phyag
427b1(rgyud): rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin// glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang // dbang phyug che dbang po yang de// rang rig yan
427b2(rgyud): lag dang bcas pa// gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// lnga po la
427b3(rgyud): dag lnga sangs rgyas/ lnga po bdag nyid lnga yi no// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbu su ste// b+hA ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o// lho dang nub dang de bzhin te// byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang
427b4(rgyud): nang busu zla ba ste// shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan// de dag dang/ 'bor gyur pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po
427b5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje sra ba dang / bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'grodakyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o// rdo rje zla dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra
427b6(rgyud): dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te// seng ge'i gdan khri'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni rin chen mkha'
427b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ste/ rta'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang / rdo rje dri bral dang / de dag gi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ste/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje ga
427b8(rgyud): ngan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa'o dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o// dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / 
428a1(rgyud): / thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// mche ba rnam par btsigs shing rnam par
428a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba// stag gi lpags pa gosu banabs pa// zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u'i sgra hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis rgyan pa/ 
428a3(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rig kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po// byang ljang ku/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ las kyi mkha'
428a4(rgyud): 'gro'i shar ser po// byang sngon po nub dkar po/ lho dmar po// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang ku/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha'
428a5(rgyud): 'gro'i shar ljang ku/ byang ser po/ nub dkarapo/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar/ sngon po// byang ljang ku/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po
428a6(rgyud): 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen phreng ba yin// chas ni yongasu bskor bar bya// grwa bzhi ma mo bzhi sgom ste// ma mo rmongs byed ma
428a7(rgyud): dang ni// ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te// chags pa yi ni ma mo dang // phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te// me yis phyogs la sogs par bgod// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldas
428a8(rgyud): skra grol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur// spyan gsum pa la gcer bu ste// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// 
428b1(rgyud): dbang chen me dang chu dang ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas// rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang // ral gri thong pa kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug yang ni phyag na
428b2(rgyud): 'chang / ma ning las byung lha ma sgom// thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying pa dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / 
428b3(rgyud): / rdorje dreng gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshamasu te// sngo dang ldang dang dmar ser po// dmar
428b4(rgyud): dang sngo dang dud ka dkar// lcags kyu zhags pa ra lcags sgrogs dang // dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/  cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te// thod pa dbyig to mdung dang ni/ 
428b5(rgyud): dgra sta thod pa kha Te ga/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu skra dmar/ ser gyen du brdzes// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// stag gi
428b6(rgyud): lpags pa gosu ben pas// thod pa yi ni phreng ba 'chang // mgo bo'i do shal rnam par rgyan// nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni// g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs
428b7(rgyud): skyong brgyad kyis khri la bzhugs// mche ba rnam btsigs rnam sbyar zhal// spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can// rang gi rigs dang gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams can te// phyi rol
428b8(rgyud): rdo rje yi dgas kyis// yongasu bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog ma ragasal byed ming dang hUM// mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya// sngar bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya// phung po khams dang skye mched
429a1(rgyud): dang // lus ngag yid las bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro nal drug phyag bcu gnyis// rang gi mtshan madril bu yis// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// mdu
429a2(rgyud): dang lcags kyu thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang // cang nye' ga gug dang // na ra'i lpags pa 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang ku// dung ka dang ni dkar ba dang // ngaka
429a3(rgyud): dang sngo dang ser dmar dang // ljang dang brel ba'i mdog lta bu'o// ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang // dmar dang ljang ku pad+ma'i mdog/ dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang // ser dang ljang dang / 
429a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i mdog/ ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // swa dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/ de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin// yang na zhal
429a5(rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis sgom// phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas// mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so// mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar// oM ma hA su kha
429a6(rgyud): badz+ra DA ka hUM Da ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra A/ hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bru DA ki nI dza la shaM ba ra A/ hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha rak+Sha DA ka tr-i DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra A/ hUM phaT/ 
429a7(rgyud): swA hA/ oM ma hA su khaM pad+ma DA ki hA/ DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bi sha DA ka khaM DA ki ni dz+wa la shaM ba ra A/ hUM phaT swA hA// de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang
429a8(rgyud): sngags te// 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badz+ri DA kad hUM phaT swA hA// oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT/ oM rad+na DA ka Na hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/ oM bi sha DA ka ma hUM/ 
429b1(rgyud): phaT/ ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa// mkhas pas sgom par byas nas su// dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur// sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor
429b2(rgyud): ngag ni thams cad kyang // go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur// sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum pa na// b+ha ga'i ling ka'i sbyor ba dag/ ye shes
429b3(rgyud): rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug/ rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag/ dga' ba dang po shes rab te// mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor// bde bar dag
429b4(rgyud): bar grub pa che// lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin// sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor// sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor// de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o// thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na/ 
429b5(rgyud): phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob// tshe/ ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grus
429b6(rgyud): 'di ni nges pa kho na'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 
429b7(rgyud): thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom// a yi yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kha ba kun da'i mdo/ 
429b8(rgyud): lta bu dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla dbus bzhugs// stong pa'i ye shes la/ 
430a1(rgyud): / byung ga/ zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang gi lus dang sbyor ba
430a2(rgyud): gnas/ snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa// dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'chir te// rdo rje/ 
430a3(rgyud): mdud dang thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin// yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// i las rdo rje zla ba ste/ I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrulo// a las chos kyi rdo rje
430a4(rgyud): ste/ a las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul na// lha mo bzhi po dadag ni/ de yi zhal mdo ga'adzin pa'o// skra grol ba la mig po che// snying rje chags nga pas rnam par myos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas/ 
430a5(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sna tshogs yi dgas ste/ nga du sgom// gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung // thod pa 'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par
430a6(rgyud): rgyan/ rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog
430a7(rgyud): dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang // snying po sbyor ba mchog yin// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ thad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha' 'gro ma yi
430a8(rgyud): snying po mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying khar sgom pa ste// u ni mgo bor de bzhi no// oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste// oM ni mig tu
430b1(rgyud): dgod par bya// oM ni go char dgod pa ste// a ni mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsungs thugasu sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas// ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis// bla med/ 
430b2(rgyud): mchog dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yis// dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste// gnyi su med pa'i mchog grub pa// dam tshig thun
430b3(rgyud): mtshams bzhin du ste// dus bzhi dag tu rnam par sgom// kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam// snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing // cha med par ni rnam par bsgom// tham
430b4(rgyud): cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ shes rab cha med rje su 'gro// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor// bdag nyid rdo rje bdag pa yin/ bgrang du med pa'i rus pa yin// ye shes bzlas pa yin par
430b5(rgyud): bshad// bzlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste// sprul pa drug ni spro ba/ 'o// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin// cho ga bzhin/ du bzlas pa bya// u o o u/ A a/ !/ 9/ i I/ u u/ 
430b6(rgyud): e ai/ o o// aM aHhUM swA hA// dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla// dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin// sdug bsngal thams
430b7(rgyud): cad 'joms byed cing // dge ba kun gyis 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste// rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogasu// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi// dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba// lha mo bzhi po/ 
430b8(rgyud): dga' ba ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor/ 
431a1(rgyud): // gyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa thams cad babyed pa// ma rus phyi dang nang 'joms gnam pa' stong pa lta bu/ 
431a2(rgyud): las/ yi ge kA las mngon byung zhing // nam mkha' 'gro 'bri ba bde mchog ni// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa la
431a3(rgyud): ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing // phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas// thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud// thod pa'i dbusu yid 'ong ba'i// rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan// ye shes bdud
431a4(rgyud): rtsis yongs gang ba// lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni// sna dgas pa yi sku lus la// phyag rgya drug gis sku yang rgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam btsigs shing // spyi gtsug thod pas
431a5(rgyud): rgyan du byas// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan// zla ba phyed par la pa 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje/ 'jigs byed sgom pa yin// dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yo
431a6(rgyud): su dag pa'i blos// rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par med par byed// byams dang snying rje'i rgyan du byas// 'dzem med pade ba'i rnal 'byor logs par bslabs pa'i bdag shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod chen po
431a7(rgyud): na/ ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrogs par byed// phem gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jig pas khyad par byed// gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor mthun pa'i yul du sgrub// yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang // 'di la phyag
431a8(rgyud): brgyad rnam par sgom// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po// zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa mdzad// mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wAM gtsang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs/ sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags/ hA hA hi hi hU~M hU~M ngas/ 
431b1(rgyud): phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // dpa' bo'i gcig pu 'jig mdzad pas// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro// bas
431b2(rgyud): gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo yi ni sku ru sgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas pa bya// dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla// mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su// chos rnams ma lus
431b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// oM ak+Sha hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing // mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing // srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed// sbyor ba
431b4(rgyud): yi ni mchog dam pa// bklags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub// gdug gcig gnod byed sems can dang // ma rungs las la chags pa dang // log par lta dang bcas pa las// 'di
431b5(rgyud): dag nges par bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan rnam spro// khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed// sngags pa sa sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla/ 
431b6(rgyud): oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha yaM phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni// mAM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang // skra grol rol la mnan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin// gsang / 
431b7(rgyud): sngags cho ga bzhin du ni// khri phrag stong du bzla zhing sgom// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// khams gsum po dag bsod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni rnam
431b8(rgyud): ba bsam/ bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'o// khro bo snying du bzhugs par bya/ snying dang sgyu ma rkang dang rus// sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing // mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa dang // gdugs pa can nas
432a1(rgyud): / bza' bar bya// mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur// bsam gtan
432a2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang // las 'di dag la 'jug par bya// gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis// gshin rje'i phyogasu kha bltas
432a3(rgyud): te/ khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// me yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya// hUM phaT ra ra ra/ mtshams med pa 'dis zhes bya ba// ra ra ra hUM phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis// nyin zhag bcu pa
432a4(rgyud): dag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang // 'chi bar ya/ dang ni the tsom med// gal te sdig can slar log na// 'di/ la zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas
432a5(rgyud): nas// 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// oM swA hA/ a A pra a mu ka pA pa bI ra ho b+ha biSh+ya ti ta sa s+ye ba shAn+ti b+ha baM tu/ baM a a oM swA hA/ 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon// zhi ba'i
432a6(rgyud): sems kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dri yis lus byugo// bya rog khyi dang byi la dang // na ku la yi sha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon
432a7(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba// srid pa'i
432a8(rgyud): nang na skye ba bdun// sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// pa shu'i nang na rgyal po yin// skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro sgra
432b1(rgyud): sgra yi myu gu de bzhin ring // mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar// pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung // lus las lha yi dri 'byung zhing // kha yi dbugs ni ga pur dri/ 
432b2(rgyud): ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang phyis glu rtsi dri// tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang // lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam// ud pa la yi dri dang ldan// skrad dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol// 
432b3(rgyud): lus kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur// grib bdun ngang pa'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te// dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dang // 
432b4(rgyud): sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na// mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag/ gang yang rung ba za mi nus// 
432b5(rgyud): de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste// mi snang ba yi dbang phyug ma/ cho ga/ 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gi/ blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// mkhas
432b6(rgyud): pas blangs te ril bu bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas// de 'di lag tu byin nas ni// 
432b7(rgyud): sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin// de 'di de ma thag tu yang // mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed// de ni dben par khyer na su// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya// 
432b8(rgyud): dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog dam pa// de yi spyi bo'i sgra bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni// de bsres tha gur byas nas su// gang gi mgul du bcing byas pas// de 'dra ba yi gzugasu
433a1(rgyud): / 'gyur/ sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin// de yi lpags pa blangs nas ni// de la he ru ka dpal bri// mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni// he ru ka dpal byed pa yin// rkang lag
433a2(rgyud): lpags pa blangs nas ni// 'byung ba'i sgra dang bcas bsres nas// phyi ma'i ril bur byas nas// mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags gsum gyis
433a3(rgyud): ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te// the bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na// de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs// rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs
433a4(rgyud): rang sgra zhags pa blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri// phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba yi// de yi phyogs mthong blangs par bya/ 
433a5(rgyud): khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas// sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod// oM dzA a baM a paM hUM ho pa ra ha ra to// khe tsa ra ri dza hri swA hA// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yid la
433a6(rgyud): gang 'dod ci yang rung // de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs// khyim ni gang bar yongasu mthong // mAM sa dag ni zos na su lha yi lusu gyur pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des ni shi ba dbang du gyur/ 
433a7(rgyud): chub cho ga bzhin blangs nas// skra dang bsres nas de sgril te// the gu cho ga bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhags pa dag du bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi ming gis bzlas brjod kyis// 
433a8(rgyud): zhags pa btab na de ma thag/ lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas// de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas/ 
433b1(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyun tu byas pa dang // rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya// chub dag gis mchod phyir thogs// de ru bdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// drug pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni// mkha' la spyod par
433b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa til mar cher po yi// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na ni// mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur/ 
433b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing // yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rje sems
433b4(rgyud): dpar 'gyur ba yin// sgyu ma phye mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma la yang skam// gang gis mgo la bzhag pa na/ de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas glo ba zos nas ni// de ma/ 
433b5(rgyud): thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sa snun na// char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba blas/ nas skam// tsan ngan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phye mar byas na/ 
433b6(rgyud): sus bud med gang la byin na ni// 'dod pas gdungs pa'i bu med gang // dbang du gyur te mngag gzhugs byed// pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas
433b7(rgyud): sbas pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dzi hwa zos na no// ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor hrid zos nas ni// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so yi rgyal po/ 
433b8(rgyud): bzhi po dag/ steng 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang / bung ba yi ni bshog pa dang // tshub ma'i mngab ma rdul dang ni// rdul 'dis sgrub pa byas nas ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs// rtsa rnams phye mar byas pa yi/ 
434a1(rgyud): // bud med thams cad bskam par 'gyur// rang byung me tog ro tsa na// a lag ta dang gur gum gyis// thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// 
434a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis// pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur// 'byed nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs// rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos tsam gyis// bud med/ 
434a3(rgyud): sa bon mod la 'gug/ rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes// gang gi gang gis mgo la gtor// grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin// pa dang bu ni yin na yang // rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur// 
434a4(rgyud): mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha ni gnon par 'gyur dar ba yin// sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbug/ sa ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par
434a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ mgo bo'i lpags pas mngon btags te// kha yi drung du mngon bzlas na// lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur ra// thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis// rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa
434a6(rgyud): yin// thod pa kha ni sgrub pa yis// gnod par byas pa kho na yin// in+d+ra ba ru re tsa na// de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas// gang la thig le gcig gyur na// dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro
434a7(rgyud): tsan dang myang sbas dag/ lhan cig tu ni drug pa yis// thub pa med pa stobs 'gyur te// pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur// bu tran dza li ro tsan// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// bud med gang la
434a8(rgyud): phyes gtor na// de ni 'dod pas myos gyur na// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas// ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis// lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis// 'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams// ci bgyi zhes ni/ 
434b1(rgyud): sgra bzhin du// de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur// ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur// ro tsan dang dzi ban ti// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te/ shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar// bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni// 
434b2(rgyud): 'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// chu srin lag ni ro tsa na// / lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// nA ga ma do lhan cig tu// ril bu dag tu byas nas kyang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas// mig gi/ 
434b3(rgyud): sman ni byas gyur na// nor skyong gi ni glang po yang // mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag gis zhon na ni// glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang // gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyu ro// pha rol sde na
434b4(rgyud): 'joms byed cing // gzhon gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i// 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur// 'bram ma daN+DI ro tsa ni// lhadan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis// rig byed rgod pa med par 'gyuraro// 
434b5(rgyud): rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu/ ril bu dag tu bsgrub byas nas// rma bya'i 'jugs mas bcings na ni// bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// lha
434b6(rgyud): rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing // rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur// de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi gzhal med khang 'phrog cing // lha yi bu mo
434b7(rgyud): 'ang 'gug par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang du sdong byed cing // mi 'dod sems can don yang byed// mjug mthur bltas byas na ni// gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur// blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha
434b8(rgyud): rol phyin// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la// mjug ma bskor ba byas na ni// sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya// lha min bu mo lhan cig rol// lha yi bcud dang bcud
435a1(rgyud): kyis len// 'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te// 'dod pa'i lha yi gzugs su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro// de nas yan lag/ 
435a2(rgyud): lnga pa yi// cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang lpags pa sha dang ni// rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su// dri chen chu dang shu kra dang // 'tshal rnams ngag ni lhan cig tu// ril bu byas nas bsgrub
435a3(rgyud): par bya/ lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// kha yi nang du spras nas ni// na mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal cher 'gyur// 
435a4(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las skye ba bdun pa de'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ rang ga chos kyi
435a5(rgyud): yig sgom pa// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med chos zhi yang dag sgom// rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba/ sa kyi sku lus rang byung yin// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ he ru ka
435a6(rgyud): ni rnam par sgom// yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hUM gi yi shes las byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// mi bskyod pa ni rnam par sgom// ba gyi ye
435a7(rgyud): shes las bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// oM b+hu a b+h+rUM las byung ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// oM tA ra swa las byung ba// rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hri hri a
435a8(rgyud): las nges 'byung ba// pad+ma'i mnga' 'gro rnam par sgom// khaM ta he haM las byung ba// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// DA las mkha' 'gro ma nyid de// yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// b+hU las
435b1(rgyud): lha mos la spyod// ba las mkha' la spyod pa yin// maM las ma mo nyid yin te// dpa' de'i btsun mo snyan grags ma// he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste/ ru las dag ni byung ba yin// ka ni lus
435b2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje ste// yig gsum las byung te rloka/ ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste// sa las kun tu bzang po yin// lo las 'jig rten mgon po ste// klu las sa yi snying po'o// ba las phyag na rdo rje
435b3(rgyud): ste/ mr-i las byams pa nyid yin te// khaM las na mkha'i snying por grags// gaM las na mkha'i mdzod yin+da// sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// ga las spros kyi glang po yin// dzA las ye shes
435b4(rgyud): rtogs kyang yin// a las blo gros mi bzad pa// pra las ra spobs pa brtsegs pa ste// sa las ngan song kun 'dren pa// sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las dra ba can gyi 'od// 
435b5(rgyud): tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// sU las nyi ma'i 'od yino// ba las rdo rje 'od kyang yin/ ma las mthu chen thob pa ste// su ni su d+ha na yi no// b+ha las bzang
435b6(rgyud): skyong nyid yin te// sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten mgon po sa snying po// phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang // nam mkha'i snying po na mkha' mdzod// sgrib pa rnam par
435b7(rgyud): sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid yin te// mi zad pa dang ye shes tog/ spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te// mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra ba
435b8(rgyud): zla ba rin chen dang // nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su d+ha na dang rin chen thob// rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo // de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig
436a1(rgyud): / du bshad de// dngos grub kyi ni grub pa rtsol// rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang // bskul byed dang ni rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// ro langs rdo rje gzhon du ma// ka
436a2(rgyud): dzi dang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin// ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs ma// ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma// sgrol mad ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma ki mchog
436a3(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang // rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma// lu gu rgyud dang phyir bzlog ma// lha mo gtsug gtor rdor 'jigs ma// sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i
436a4(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsal byed ming dang bcas pan ni// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// tha mar swA hA mnyam par sbyar// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ 
436a5(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni// 'dra da pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stos
436a6(rgyud): po che/ brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste// khro bo chen po sngon grub pa// gdug pa thad nges par gnon// dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnam
436a7(rgyud): te/ khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya// gsal byed e ni kun tu yang // mthar ni hUM phaT swA hA ra sbyar// gsal byed ming dang hUM/ 
436a8(rgyud): dang ni/ mthar ni phaT dang sA hA s+ya/ gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang // dri dang ro yi lha mo ste// mdab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma// reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyisu
436b1(rgyud): med par yang dag gnas// dbus khrag 'thung rgyal po ni// lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs// snying po'i chos kyi dbyingasu grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // ye shes sems
436b2(rgyud): dpa' gnyis med bzhugs// rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o// de ni gsang de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni yang dag stso
436b3(rgyud): che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sbyor ba rgyud kyis rjes 'brangs pa// bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te// rdo rje
436b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig/ sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yino// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin// nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa// 'dus pa mchog
436b5(rgyud): ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// sems can rje su bzung ba'i rgyur// 'dus pa mchog gi dam pa/ 'di // sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam
436b6(rgyud): pa lnga bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ji ltar ming gi rjes 'thun par// ngas brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje sgrub pa po yis/ 
436b7(rgyud): ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te// gnyisu med pa'i sgom pa nyid// theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog/ dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog
436b8(rgyud): bshad bya// gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba// bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom bya// sku lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsum pa/ 
437a1(rgyud): / lags ldag// drug drugagapas ni ngan pa ste//  pa'i phreng brjing ba rdzun sa/ la pan byed dul bas su//  chags nan sa rgyag ma drugasas skulas / 
437a2(rgyud): gi lpags pa gosu banabs// mgo bo'i do shal gyis rgyan pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang ku steng zhal sngo ba'o// bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang // rnga ma dang zhi dang drag po ste/ 
437a3(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i lpags pa mchog kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// thod pa ni kha Ta 'dzin// rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste/ 
437a4(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs da'og gnon// reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang // dkar ba'i ma dngas kyis gzugs can pa// ljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang // 
437a5(rgyud): dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs// skra grol ba ni rnam par myos// seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can// byin pa gnyis ni leg par 'khril// 
437a6(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan// dril bu cang te'u yis rgyan// mdung dang kha T+wAM phyag na bsnams// chags pa chen po me yi 'od// 
437a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gdug dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongasu rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbusu yang sna tshogs
437a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par sgom// 'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum pa// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi ba nyid yin
437b1(rgyud): te/ rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni// dam tshig gnyisu med par sbyor// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhug
437b2(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// mtshams rnamasu ni bum pa da// thod pa zla ba yongasu gang // zur rnams
437b3(rgyud): su ni sgo bsrungs te// ji ltar mdog gi cha rnamaso// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thugs rje khro bas
437b4(rgyud): rnam par myos// dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang de ba bzhi no// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni// 'khor
437b5(rgyud): sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbusu ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang gi byin rlabs/ 'chang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba// 'di ni
437b6(rgyud): rab tu gsang ba ste/ bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi drin yino// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba
437b7(rgyud): yin/ sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don// 'di na dri med sgom pa mchog/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag
437b8(rgyud): nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i mir// mA ma/ 
438a1(rgyud): ki dang spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang dzaM b+ha la// lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byang ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par rgyan// 
438a2(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas// rigs byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste// phyogs glos can ro yi gdan/ 
438a3(rgyud): sgra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// thong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas lta zhing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shes mchog las byung // so so yang dag sbyor
438a4(rgyud): ba'i bdag// de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo sna tshogs ga/ zugs can ni// dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba// khrom cho ga mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang // gos pa med par nyams pa
438a5(rgyud): yid bdag po sgom pa nyid yino// mnyam par ma bzhagasbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// phra ba 'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// snying ka'i pad+ma'i dbusu ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro
438a6(rgyud): thugs brtse can// 'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'os
438a7(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa yin// gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// 
438a8(rgyud): yid 'dod rnams kyis lus la 'dod// mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ gang 'di rgyud las gsungs bdag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos
438b1(rgyud): med bzhi la dgod pa yis// lha yi gzugs sgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// sngags dang de nyid bstan
438b2(rgyud): ba yi// bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med// nyi shu rtsa
438b3(rgyud): bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// skyo bya de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid med gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig/ 
438b4(rgyud): bya// 'on te de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrul pa zhig yod// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnam/ nas// bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus
438b5(rgyud): bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te// bsam gtan las gzhan bde med
438b6(rgyud): phyir/ de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par
438b7(rgyud): bya// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub
438b8(rgyud): mchog ta ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi// spyod dang brtul
439a1(rgyud): zhugs 'dir spongs la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya// gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa// rnam pa des byas brtul zhug ca/ bsam gtan pas mchog gnol 'gyur bas// / 
439a2(rgyud): pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min// gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam// lkugs
439a3(rgyud): pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// rtswa drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na// rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na// rnam
439a4(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar// ngang ba'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhi mo// mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gro kun don ni
439a5(rgyud): byed pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'gyura'adi la the tsom med// spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar// sems ni dag par gyi
439a6(rgyud): shig ces// sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs// gang gis rmad 'byung snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma
439a7(rgyud): ni snying dkar dgod// snying kar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba// chos kyi dbyingasu rnam par brtag/ rang gis na mkhar sbyor nas
439a8(rgyud): su/ gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par sgom// rang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa// rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med// rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom/ 
439b1(rgyud): ji la ji ltar rtogs pa ma// gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma sgom par bya// ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis/ 
439b2(rgyud): gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// mngon par rjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
439b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsung so// rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med
439b4(rgyud): stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// legs so bya ba rnams byin nas// rgyud skyes pa yis sbyor ba las// leg
439b5(rgyud): so legaso ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mtshan/ gi mchog/ legs rdo rje tshul drag po// sangs rgyas byang chub dka' drin rab// legaso gnyis med sbyor ba ni// 
439b6(rgyud): mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// legs zhes bya nges par sbyor// 'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni// leg so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di/ 
439b7(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni// man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste// legaso rdo rje bla ma kun// de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma// legs so 'khor dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub
439b8(rgyud): bla na med pa byin// rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje
